cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"18bcff0a-13ca-4c8a-b218-42d0f065f0ce","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习需要反馈"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"00357daf-50e8-46fc-a388-d478c673d0cc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最近看了王树义老师的 2 个视频颇有启发，以下是整理的笔记与感悟。视频链接在文末。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"2c759378-811b-493b-adb1-a136bfe55d27"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fe11d7a7-1280-4600-8c7e-e3a2f2fe3324"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"做用户体验的同学都知道，产品中的反馈是非常重要的，如果没有操作反馈，用户会觉得是软件坏掉了。今天想分享一下学习相关的反馈。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1e731db1-4491-4d09-9ccf-3e01adffdc29"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"线上学习非常有效率，制作一次课程就可以覆盖到数以百万计的学生，那为什么我们还需要线下教学？因为后者提供了线上很难完成的「反馈」。在线下教学中，老师可以提问获取学生对知识吸收程度的反馈，学生也可以通过回答问题、提问获取反馈。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f12bc581-53cf-4d5c-98e8-24818aaf7db9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"反馈很重要，但很多人和我一样已经离开学校，在独自学习的过程中要怎样给自己创造反馈呢？"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"f807b6d7-7eae-478a-8603-374a016dc2c7","src":"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1536925155833-43e9c2b2f499?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":667,"originalWidth":1000,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0b4ce68f-ab08-4fdd-b098-7f40ea932c40"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"951115a8-a5de-4b21-91a7-1bf69c0abc30","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"先给出自己的答案"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"685ac265-b4d6-4c0e-8e27-47845c52419b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在 B 站看到一位英语老师的外语学习方法，通过观看影片学习外语，当看到角色说完一句话时，先按下暂停思考如果是自己要如何做出回应，然后继续播放，对比影片角色的回应和自己的有哪些差别，从而获得反馈纠正自己的发音、表达方式。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ff8919e-929c-4977-8d6f-8c77d89b76b9"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1HG411p7us/?spm_id_from%5C=333.788.top_right_bar_window_view_later.content.click","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"王树义老师分享了他的论文阅读方法"},{"type":"text","text":"，通常阅读会从头到尾看完，但他建议先看论文的引言部分，通常会介绍课题研究的背景、当前面临的问题等。然后不要急着往下看，先把论文盖上思考如果是自己要从哪些方向开始研究、会提出怎样的解决方案。然后再回到论文对比作者的思路和自己的差异，思考哪个更好，有哪些可以学习借鉴的地方。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2d97d73c-cd72-4bce-852f-2437d05a1744"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"回到我自己的例子，最近一直通过阅读 Discord 兴趣社区中的对话来学习英语阅读，当一段话中存在陌生单词时，我不会急于停下查询含义，而是将整段话读完根据上下文猜出单词的含义，如果还不理解则扩大上下文范围，从前后的对话中寻找线索。最后再通过工具进行翻译对比正确答案和自己理解的差异，纠正自己的错误。这就完成了一次反馈，也让我对单词、句法的印象更加深刻。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5a75d6c5-3b61-400b-858b-9265d4249f9e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"甚至也可以在产品设计的工作流程中应用此方法。过去我在做竞品分析时会直接开始寻找竞品，然后观察竞品方案的优缺点再思考有哪些借鉴点和设计突破点。其实在拿到产品需求时，可以尝试先思考可行的方案，再进行竞品分析，对照自己的方案和竞品方案，在进行设计的同时，通过这种反馈也可以提升自己的产品思考深度。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"f7c43aac-0501-4ff8-a051-b3b99476d4ec","src":"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1558021212-51b6ecfa0db9?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":657,"originalWidth":1000,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5e5bac1a-3bcd-4114-ba14-3fdca88572d1","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以教代学"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"267f487c-04b8-4a3d-a613-85a8989868d5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"著名的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"989780e5-5139-4c22-bc7d-49e368cc88ad"}},{"type":"text","text":"就倡导以教学的方式来学习，检验自己是否掌握知识。过程中就制造了反馈。在编辑教学内容时，你会发现原来以为自己已经掌握的知识，还存在很多问题没有进行研究和思考。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d6cb300d-478e-42ad-b6d7-5bff7d175dea"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我在写的这一篇文章就是一种以教代学，通过分享自己理解的知识我也发现了自己对于「反馈」这个课题中存在的理解不足；也在整理思路的过程中发现了方法论的更多可能性，例如前面提到在竞品分析中的应用就是编写文章过程中激发的灵感。此外接受教学的受众也会提出问题，也形成一种反馈。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4ad010df-de9b-4769-8690-c3983ee9bd38"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在实行以教代学时，很多同学也会遇到障碍，例如「网上那么多大牛他们都比我写的好，我凭什么教别人？」"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c7f49a5a-c7a3-42a3-9975-13390f62f9a8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"首先「以教代学」更重要的是「学」，是为了给自己制造反馈提升自己对知识的理解能力，其次才是通过「教」来给其他人带来价值。所以无论你的教学质量如何，这对你来说都是有意义的。而即便是「教」的部分，网上虽有大牛的见解但不见得适合所有人，尤其对于初学者，所以你从刚刚掌握这个知识的角度出发编写的内容会更加容易理解，是有价值的。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0badfadd-06e1-4bad-bbe4-515c809b238b","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"小结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1c65c5fe-86e7-4d35-b1a8-9314564c22a7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"反馈在学习中非常重要，我们可以通过遇到问题先给出自己的答案，再看其他人的方案，以及通过以教代学的方式给自己创造反馈。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7da03ab3-be5c-4c95-a945-dbb84efd5374"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"943463d6-a576-4649-8b1e-9ac15ce78efd"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"参考资料"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1020eb58-e6a2-49b2-b58d-d06a828ad1ca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"王树义. (n.d.). 学习科研缺乏有效反馈怎么办？. Retrieved from "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1HG411p7us/?spm_id_from%5C%5C%5C=333.788.top_right_bar_window_view_later.content.click","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1HG411p7us/?spm_id_from\\\\\\=333.788.top_right_bar_window_view_later.content.click"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e908dec7-49c3-49d7-aec8-43bb4a514315"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"王树义. (n.d.). 怎样以教促学提升技能？. Retrieved from "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1PB4y157Np/?spm_id_from%5C%5C%5C=333.788.top_right_bar_window_view_later.content.click&vd_source%5C%5C%5C=0f859b72eb7df78d7e35f50196a5b095","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1PB4y157Np/?spm_id_from\\\\\\=333.788.top_right_bar_window_view_later.content.click&vd_source\\\\\\=0f859b72eb7df78d7e35f50196a5b095"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"932cfbc6-4232-49f1-acdb-a07c18e161c3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"图片来自 unsplash"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"269b8441-deb9-425f-8e37-333d0b17e210"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"edae3721-1241-47e3-ab87-467e563b0323"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分享渠道"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d4221f45-261d-44df-a238-d2738bbcf279","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"68185409-d352-44e9-a27f-6cb6297a24c3"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://sspai.com/post/76475","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://sspai.com/post/76475"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6aff053b-fa40-45bc-9463-6f1c9311b0d5","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"676ecd06-4fd2-49c7-ae1b-b8cbbe24c2e5"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.notion.so/jiangzilong/83fe3e678d8948c8b8a3641ca3b2875b","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.notion.so/jiangzilong/83fe3e678d8948c8b8a3641ca3b2875b"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 学习需要反馈

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e25a6b8d-441f-49a8-b468-975e558f68a5","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"切换成本与刷微博"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2bf74d05-1db9-46d6-91f9-95059ec37d9c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"持续很长一段时间，我一直利用工作、生活的闲暇时不时刷一下微博，最近越来越感到消耗了很多时间但却没有任何收益，既没有获取有用的信息，也没有让身心得到放松。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5dbd5c13-ea90-49d7-bea2-cfb84e066abc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"于是下定决心要改变现状，首先改掉时不时要刷一下手机习惯，改为每天晚上集中一个时间看，再辅助以 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.google.com/alerts","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Google Alert"},{"type":"text","text":" 订阅关注的领域，它会在每天 22:00 发送简报，这样信息获取的需求也解决了。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"fc23fb52-11be-403a-91ea-543ff27bf26c","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/8f7726de-1fc9-4fa7-a6e9-0c9a638b67ea/image.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"40%","originalHeight":3252,"originalWidth":1626,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e443c307-f2ab-4730-b079-2ecf8d3858ff"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在反思时发现，反复在工作状态和刷微博状态间切换时，中间的切换过程会造成额外的精力开销，这正好和近期研究的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E5%87%8F%E5%B0%91%E5%88%87%E6%8D%A2%E6%88%90%E6%9C%AC%20c0599d03-acb3-45d9-a9bb-1173dff99b76.md","title":"减少切换成本","data-internal-href":"meta://card/c0599d03-acb3-45d9-a9bb-1173dff99b76","edited":true}}],"text":"切换成本"},{"type":"text","text":"有关。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97bae681-3370-4c79-9040-50a970ba85be"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E4%B8%80%E6%AC%A1%E6%8F%90%E5%8F%96%E6%93%8D%E4%BD%9C%E4%BC%9A%E5%AF%B9%E4%B8%8B%E4%B8%80%E6%AC%A1%E6%8F%90%E5%8F%96%E9%80%A0%E6%88%90%E5%BD%B1%E5%93%8D%20982039a5-c7af-42e9-ad5c-74683d224c5a.md","title":"一次提取操作会对下一次提取造成影响","data-internal-href":"meta://card/982039a5-c7af-42e9-ad5c-74683d224c5a","edited":true}}],"text":"神经科学的证明"},{"type":"text","text":"：大脑一块区域开始工作后，其周围的神经元也会被激活(类似预热)为后续的认知活动做准备，然而切换状态需要激活新的神经元，并且之前所做的预热工作也就浪费了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6ecc5d5c-4931-4aff-8299-da75b393eb9a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不止是大脑的认知活动存在切换成本，具体的物理世界也存在。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e0370dc8-bdcc-4eaa-8ad8-52eb972d255e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E5%87%8F%E5%B0%91%E5%88%87%E6%8D%A2%E6%88%90%E6%9C%AC%20c0599d03-acb3-45d9-a9bb-1173dff99b76.md","title":"减少切换成本","data-internal-href":"meta://card/c0599d03-acb3-45d9-a9bb-1173dff99b76","edited":true}}],"text":"Tinkpad 键盘的红点设计"},{"type":"text","text":"，用户可以在不脱离键盘的情况下操作鼠标，减少了手掌在鼠标、键盘间来回切换的成本，提升了使用体验。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"95d1f3fe-97bb-4bb5-a5fd-3fd692f1f793","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20221027202513.jpg#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"50%","originalHeight":500,"originalWidth":500,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f6394823-1fe4-4da9-8a8e-b62723b61e47"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"参考资料"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ce72d76b-14d6-43d2-8c09-59994751a7e0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"[美] 罗伯特·索尔所 / [美] 奥托·麦克林 / [美] 金伯利·麦克林. 认知心理学[M]. 上海人民出版社, 2019 :#6489."}]}]}
cards.title: 切换成本与刷微博

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"504499ed-be97-412d-9bb8-01c5746a5bd5","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过分支维护设计模板"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0f72ca18-83dc-426c-bc01-18bc8436e81b","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现存问题"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"34908f39-9a9e-4821-9767-9b6b9f98eb89"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一些成熟的设计方案会被沉淀下来多次复用。每次复用时，现有方式是复制模板文件到新需求文件中，结合新需求的要求进行修改。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a4ff7999-fa8e-409e-8503-9706ff5495ba"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"除了此需求个性化的修改外，还包含许多通用的设计优化点；而这些优化点随着每一个需求的复用散落在不同的项目文件中，难以管理、迭代。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"47357006-ea3c-489d-8422-d97060debd90"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"此方法可以让模板满足具体项目的个性化需求，同时也能集中管理通用的设计优化点。并且技术同学也使用了类似的流程管理模板，设计与技术工作流的一致可以减少沟通上的摩擦。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1a423242-24f5-4d22-b4f1-05e09f04c40f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"终上所述，此方法可以"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"更好地实现设计模板的迭代"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1193c83b-f8e1-44d3-a5d2-f06aabc55bd0","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"名词解释"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e53eb960-c6de-4dfe-b392-011fde85097d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c58f155-42f9-4833-bc9d-69ef7f6065f5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主干文件：简单理解的话，我们接触的大部分文件都是主干文件"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0ab817d0-cbb2-4413-86c9-b755bbf8c525","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e006d51d-69cc-47b1-852e-06c8579c6649"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分支文件：通过下述「创建分支」步骤可创建分支文件"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2d2d1d86-f3f3-4c35-a104-683ca28fdfc5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"上述两种文件的修改是隔离的，但可以通过某种方式互通，具体请继续看。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"074985d1-b8cd-4773-af68-c4fb44943e8f","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前期准备"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2bed4b92-0cb0-4a8d-803f-51c1c641c32b","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"创建分支"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3533cacc-3847-42c5-b981-f5cd83a5d294"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当你接到需求时，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"请不要直接修改主干文件，请务必先创建分支"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"34395831-d6e1-4e7d-8295-eb9d63cb5406","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"44089764-a1fe-47a6-a7c4-4911122cb825"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在顶部标题栏点击「Create branch…」"}]}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"7b468c3a-213f-451d-b98e-e493f6ac13e4","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/79a4690b-144e-4cb0-b14a-590fe52e4832/image.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"60%","originalHeight":214,"originalWidth":444,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a80193f7-c5ee-4539-abac-84e53ce4f46b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c89ecb4-7839-458b-8ec8-eaaf6ae2989a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设置分支的名称"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b0579bbf-d195-4b90-aa37-4b6da58e99de","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b4b4fd9f-341b-4e2c-bbe7-25bf2f64c1c8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"之后会自动打开分支文件"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9875e872-9c64-4a09-a528-009377ade56c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分支文件的标题包含此符号时，表示你正在访问分支文件："}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"b95e657a-60e7-4078-aa26-2525fb342507","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/8l4Muj20220901234028.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":113,"originalWidth":586,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"61539663-00ad-45cc-99e3-8494589ef2fb","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设置分支权限"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"692608ce-fe15-437d-b787-6d6b444344bf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分支默认需要邀请才能阅读，需要设置为「Anyone at Guangzhou Boguan with the link」，否则合作方将无法阅读文档。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"d04d23ca-d2b6-400f-9a62-02f23c346246","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/2cec5fd6-a993-471f-a7f2-a88aede3f0e6/CleanShot%202022-09-26%20at%2015.41.32.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":298,"originalWidth":485,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"13699c80-d180-48ac-9222-0fa9e6dbd634","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"修订记录"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1d26fde5-d160-46c1-9840-82745cf1f48a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ab80a713-1ba9-4995-a8f4-8ad872e15dfb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"复制分支文件的链接"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0615230f-74f7-4866-a4cd-7d8f5670f94a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6417660c-893a-43f8-8387-33f58a9f0f68"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"填写到"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"主干"},{"type":"text","text":"文件的修订记录中"}]}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"f210a4b7-cf87-4f38-ba61-d71fbe043e7d","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/6c951bf5-671e-4f6d-9377-899badebd120/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":279,"originalWidth":1484,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c7838739-4c30-4b28-8629-17e1cea74ef8","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输出设计"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0f81c9f0-93b8-487e-b815-d32f733c7968","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"编辑"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"61068b98-c166-4f0c-b9eb-bf0824d2f038"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"动手修改前，请先判断："}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"07174a81-1175-4172-883f-b65dcee5f787","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e56945b1-28df-442f-866f-835c2dfd112e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"此修改为基础体验优化或其他"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"通用"},{"type":"text","text":"的修改点"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b75a6585-0d42-4ef2-a665-4d792c8e0f8e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9b8f1736-5e6b-4fba-bc55-8cf491fdb379"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"},{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"主干"},{"type":"text","text":"文件中编辑，并且编辑此修改为「通用修改」"}]}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1baebd1c-10b0-4e98-a886-188e71381da6","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"84348546-519d-4af6-85dc-519600850389"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"此修改为本次需求"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"个性化"},{"type":"text","text":"的修改点"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"927b4db8-1fc6-4199-9b03-e7c2dc7369ff","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6f028f2c-1610-48af-b56f-248caf56f6a9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"分支"},{"type":"text","text":"文件中编辑"}]}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"924f1828-401a-4490-a8bd-69fdad6318ff","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将主干的修改同步到分支文件中"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fde6d88f-fdb5-4c83-98a3-fcbd48a29f31"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主干文件修改后，不出半分钟就会在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"分支"},{"type":"text","text":"文件右下角看到更新提醒，此时点击「Update」即可将主干的修改同步到分支文件中。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"5caec428-d161-401a-a7aa-9389ba2f4308","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/caa6d78b-436d-4e53-85b0-02f683311103/image.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"40%","originalHeight":272,"originalWidth":423,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9364ebcf-f56d-44b2-bdfa-36c4c26b8af5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以最终交付的设计 = 主干文件编辑的内容 + 分支文件编辑的内容"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bad58b57-f7c1-413d-8efd-6d2cc53b626a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果主干和分支冲突怎么办？更多技巧请参考："}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"eb72e95a-7b0e-44f1-b2c9-8824e19771dc","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f262d88e-268a-431a-8524-6125ef9addde"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"中文介绍："},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://figmacn.com/post/branching-is-online","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://figmacn.com/post/branching-is-online"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f882c576-5ab1-4911-92bf-c4ec223576bf","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c26fd21-88ef-4b13-acf7-2bdcefc783ea"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"官方介绍："},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://help.figma.com/hc/en-us/articles/360063144053-Guide-to-branching","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://help.figma.com/hc/en-us/articles/360063144053-Guide-to-branching"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 通过分支维护设计模板

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"49b4557c-a00b-4198-a722-9b5d96086794","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"产品设计中的负担"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"595c5b2f-3021-466b-abf6-f494ed2721b9","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"什么是负担"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8639afa4-41d5-4b19-aff4-d1e23b2b7d11"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"724c99ab-a7dc-4b10-87f7-d9e197329511"}},{"type":"text","text":"这本书提出任务的几种类型"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3c73d573-acab-486d-92c8-d982e067c754","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"301034f6-6488-4a18-a091-a2a089faaad3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目标任务：例如去上班"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9ac89526-04f0-4df7-b5b5-eab7cb0cd9cc","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e2427199-ee26-4458-b7c3-381967a86086"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相关任务：例如开车"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7a9b764e-c36f-47c3-a050-e515586f9596","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a52438ea-071a-4d8c-99d3-26b5411b7941"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"负担任务"},{"type":"text","text":"：例如加油/充电"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8e8f1ff7-cc5a-4466-a135-776e545ab984"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"负担是一种满足工具/外部事物的额外任务，而非目标本身。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"323371fd-f7c5-4cbd-8595-9b61e2e846d8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"负担又可分为 3 类"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"40771425-bb78-4bc1-b744-757316a86922","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e8376d41-28c8-49e5-90a0-c9e168fadb71"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"手动"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d3109c56-2976-4d23-af71-c0bf282ce9ea","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c5b58d0f-f7aa-49a9-a93a-f107d64b7b78"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"眼看"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8d7c3de6-0f91-4d4c-9851-5817a402718b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3c26494f-a9d6-4af7-8722-0cdcbdfc3e79"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"脑想"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4ca15697-cc68-4c70-a4e1-7e3ea50e0ae1","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么要消除负担"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"115a3e14-e746-475d-bdcd-0916bc5ae399"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"消除用户负担帮助用户完成任务，可以让产品更好的为用户服务，也有利于业务目标的达成，从而提升业务的收入。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"380d0ffb-b3b3-4e18-a26c-4d7b43939fe1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如：我们尽可能消除充值流程的负担，有助于用户完成充值这一目标任务，也可以提升业务的营收。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c83223af-655f-4638-91d2-bba614b195e3","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何消除负担"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3843882f-c1bc-4adb-b5a2-2ad70576260a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"消除负担可能有很多方法，下面我从大脑、眼睛、操作 3 个角度各举一些例子进行说明"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e23dbcdc-e47d-47d2-951c-4743fb27b04c","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"减少大脑负担"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"37a96f4c-f451-41fb-ba06-4f8568c209cc"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"减少原子数量"},{"type":"text","text":"是减少大脑负担的方式之一。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"62b03f43-65ae-40d1-ac3b-6e7891102009"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"图形界面的操作效率相比命令行来说并没有进步，甚至退步。但图形界面"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"减少了用户操作的原子数量"},{"type":"text","text":"，让软件更易于使用和学习。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"330e0da6-e587-4c83-ab23-45727fc9a678","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/e56d9ce7-a5ac-46c5-b189-012744e53dc4/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":705,"originalWidth":2000,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cf678cf7-612e-4486-aefb-d287dc501594"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"图形界面将各种信息的获取、功能的调用浓缩成滚动、点击等少数的几个原子操作；而命令行则要求用户操控几十个键盘按键完成精确的输入来发送命令。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d463f855-dd3e-4105-b964-e8b2711b682b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"图形界面的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"操作"},{"type":"text","text":"成本可能比命令行更高（这也是为什么到现在命令行仍有生存空间的原因之一）但较少的原子操作降低了大脑的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"学习和理解"},{"type":"text","text":"的负担，得以在人机交互中得到更多的普及。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"052bb228-85d3-4a71-97ce-3545db42a89d"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"86a14082-4394-4dc2-b26f-ba0099cf67f5"}},{"type":"text","text":"是一种减少原子元素、原子交互的手段。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"79845ea8-5f71-48d5-9195-0965b6aa403a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计系统提供了一个统一的空间供团队成员迭代组件、使用组件；当拥有一个统一的空间，我们就可以知道哪些组件是已有的，满足需求则可调用，不满足则迭代。这样可减少同样可以满足需求但又存在差异的组件诞生，避免造成产品复杂性增加。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"02c0ce39-abd6-4e3b-b3a0-33bb0df72783"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"包括著名的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7de148df-9b26-4093-8e54-7ebf359abb83"}},{"type":"text","text":"中的前 3 步删除、转移、隐藏都可以起到减少原子数量的目的。其中的认知心理学原理："}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ad9caeee-c7e1-4322-9438-6c0226f6f6d6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人类在认知时，会存在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"eaedfa86-3aa3-4ea8-9818-68be66c05cb2"}},{"type":"text","text":"和"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"aedd8c54-2ee5-4b6c-b2be-f7b67ebc4c76"}},{"type":"text","text":"现象。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e3ba2326-3b08-4b81-9a28-4846f52c60b8","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"42ba6f53-160f-4cc6-9941-42217ff83c5b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"模板匹配：将刺激物与自身已有的知识相结合，如果可以较好的匹配则可以降低认知成本。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1aa292bb-bb7b-47b4-b2b6-ef05a90abcf6","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f65404f7-d07e-486a-abf6-ad998e500c4e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"认知自动化：对于熟悉的事物，人们所需要投入的注意力则更少。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f5f81bdb-0887-4233-b074-f721e5c99a60"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"控制原子数量降低了用户需要理解和学习的对象数量，类似于记忆 10 个单词和 100 个单词的区别。一致性的视觉与交互有助于用户快速熟悉实现模板的建立与识别，实现认知自动化，所以提升设计一致性降低原子数量可以提升产品体验。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3150bcbe-ae71-47d0-b889-4ae85ea5ed51","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"减少眼睛负担"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4da03d26-0e26-40c4-88f9-60f705fbcfe3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其中一个方法是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"直截了当"},{"type":"text","text":"，减少视线切换负担。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a0c15d6c-878c-4296-bde6-0b0e630cf19e"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d434a10f-09ac-452c-9184-755ec58ae8d8"}},{"type":"text","text":"中提到通过「"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"直截了当"},{"type":"text","text":"」的设计原则来减少界面的切换，从而减少眼睛切换焦点的负担。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6f8c8d21-33c7-4056-9945-9e2b4fc4aa8e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如 Figma 中对图层重命名有两种方式，一种是在图层列表中编辑，另一种是在画布的具体图层上双击名称进行编辑（哪里要编辑点哪里）。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"b0a43017-8f1f-4a4a-8408-f0a082de8d19","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/1ahVvm20230420115940.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1000,"originalWidth":1600,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a414be59-2bba-4507-ad12-49b2d1d3cde3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"而许多国产的在线协作设计工具都只实现了在图层列表中编辑的功能，导致用户在画布中试图直接修改图层名称时，点击发现没有反应，需要"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"将视线切换到图层列表中进行操作"},{"type":"text","text":"。这 2 种设计方案的体验的差距显而易见。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4e48a215-ec20-48f3-87e8-f17e8280a3a1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另一个方法是保证文字的可读性。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0308f4f4-a4f5-47c1-a691-d9a61ecdf633"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"CC 产品中，燃舞机玩法考虑到主播在跳舞（距离显示器较远）的同时需要阅读界面信息，所以针对主播身份放大了信息，降低主播的阅读负担。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"665d8ceb-ef4a-489f-b776-e2f3a72b5a88","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/2tjgr520230420120003.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1000,"originalWidth":1600,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5b2b5911-70b1-43e8-bfe2-aa8da02d76c0","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"减少操作负担"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a6e984e0-42a3-452f-a5e6-819236cbdbcc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"关于减少操作负担有很多方法，例如填写表单时用「选项」替代「填空」。但这里想分享另一种方案——自动化。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"37a240cc-4a1c-485b-8d9c-e7f4c75208e3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自动化可以最大化减少所需的操作。例如 macOS 的访达通过设置监控、过滤、执行即可完成文件整理的自动化。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ac75e9cf-b09d-49d8-aa38-1e9d9b954e4f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"427c6c6a-c587-4441-a1c7-40e2112d91d4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"监控（WHERE）：哪个文件地址需要监控——输入"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"81c7b5dd-7259-491d-b48f-8fbf76c890b4","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"42866203-bc29-4ec0-a365-0b2a3f4e5385"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"过滤（WHAT）：哪类文件需要处理——过滤"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"37b99ea6-901d-435e-97ac-ecd70aabeb01","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2c8c6de0-db39-419d-a8e0-534a0ab7734e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"执行（HOW）：如何处理上述文件——处理"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d08a9859-4bbf-47a3-a792-2e3fd1300ab2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如可以设置「下载文件夹」新增文件时，筛选出 PNG 图片，自动将图片放到「图片」文件夹，当设置一系列自动化规则后，就可以减少整理文件夹所需投入的操作。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d1eec379-1b3c-455b-8a03-21f74e84dc69"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"81b5d2ab-6ab2-4e22-8e26-c9a89e29eb2a"}},{"type":"text","text":"，在整理文件夹的案例中「监控」、「过滤」和「执行」帮助机器理解了指令，但面对复杂的流程和设置界面，需要用户具备较高的逻辑能力和计算机使用经验。而近期 ChatGPT 的出现大大降低了自动化的成本，通过非常简单、直觉的 IM 对话式的交互下达指令，它甚至可以理解非常抽象的指令来完成任务。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"d998ac96-ebd7-4bfc-ab01-2367e0cef9b7","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/6c6797dd-7624-4113-ac59-785be81b8607/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1658,"originalWidth":2400,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"eb1275fc-98b4-48d4-8950-6ee939170a48","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"负担消除的优先级"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bfb881f6-e92e-4af5-9988-a1693b461fa2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大脑、视觉和手指的操作给人的负担并不是一致的，其中大脑的工作给人的负担最大，按照负担大小决定了负担消除的优先级：大脑负担>视觉负担>操作负担。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3af91578-e3d8-4df1-b6d4-bba543572719"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"举个例子，界面中我们将相对次要信息收纳到二级界面，虽然增加了"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"操作步骤"},{"type":"text","text":"（操作负担），但是让主页面的重点更突出，从而降低大脑的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"理解负担"},{"type":"text","text":"和视觉的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"阅读负担"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c7059f98-adf7-42aa-a1aa-ec73f1d70699"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"之前设计过一个主播举行「派对」的玩法，通过举办派对帮助主播更好的和粉丝互动。用户需要填写派对主题、节目等复杂信息，为了提升举行派对的转化率，我在创建派对前只保留了必要的信息，将具体的派对细节（例如节目清单）放在了派对创建成功后处理，将原本复杂的创建流程拆分成几个小的相对容易完成的部分，降低了用户的认知负担和前期的操作负担也提升了业务转化率。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d577e88f-be70-4f23-b2d0-f0071fd7bb7d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在工作中经常有产品经理会要求放置尽量多的信息、减少操作步骤，因为多一个流程就会多一个漏斗，导致更多用户在流程中损失，但不妨不要只关注操作成本上的负担，也关注一下视觉和大脑这类更重要的负担来设计产品吧。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f81326a8-1bd3-4dd6-969b-7a52d4a515ea","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"比起降低负担，不如直接去除负担"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c12bd916-47f4-40d6-a20c-4e669c9aa625"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有时候面对一个工作流程我们经常会思考如何让流程的负担更小、更容易完成，通过降低负担来让特定的行为更容易发生。不妨更进一步思考如何去除这个流程，而不是在流程的基础上优化。（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"823b6540-34a9-4a64-9ab4-956aae47c711"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b45b7bb6-bd10-44ad-b7d9-b2a60cb7ea5a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在设计团队的组件库推广中，面临普及度的问题，许多设计师在组件库建立前已经有了自己的输出习惯更喜欢从直接的历史设计稿中获取组件进行设计，这导致了团队输出风格迥异，设计风格不一致从而导致产品体验不一致、开发需要重复造轮子的问题。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cdddd1e3-1107-4c41-afde-718ce5d62431"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为了解决这个问题，最开始我输出了一篇文章——"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4fe942a5-93d7-4427-acbb-50f0c4550ea3"}},{"type":"text","text":"，帮助大家优化组件的使用体验"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7f8b1e51-40ff-4087-8478-3db4c1aaea5a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dbc6c947-63e4-4152-90f0-40ac6bf5849a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过增加组件别名提高搜索的便利性"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d29e309b-4d1d-407f-bb5c-42f7ab03ba5d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0aa07e10-25f3-4299-bd0c-b2770029785b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"隐藏不会直接使用的原子组件让组件列表更简洁"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ba7cbde3-9843-4fb1-9df6-014c37b728d9","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cf46a26b-44c8-4292-a042-b019b5a30bd8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"……"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6ae3c21f-e861-4e32-bb2a-d524b0dd1053"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"但最有效的还是将组件涉及的设计写到开发底层中，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"无需设计师（组件用户）主动进行使用"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9f45b9fe-6288-41de-a467-ace5e030ff79"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如通过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1855bdad-869b-413e-922c-abbc755ff2fc"}},{"type":"text","text":"，设计师无需进行描述，拖拽到文档中即可输出设计需求；例如弹窗的加载体验优化，通过与弹窗调度系统结合，将设计规范和交互逻辑作为弹窗接入的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"默认逻辑"},{"type":"text","text":"，设计师无需额外付出精力进行设计/沟通。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e94a238d-ef05-4263-8608-0dbf9fc1e2b1","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"负担一定要消除吗"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"21b5271f-e1cc-4d2d-b7b0-18cd9becfb18"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不一定。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b0b20d9c-8c7a-417a-9c63-9eddee37d7e0"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7"}},{"type":"text","text":"法要求记笔记时不能复制粘贴原文，而是要用自己的语言"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"复述"},{"type":"text","text":"一遍，这增加了大脑和手动输入的负担，但是负担带来的更加深度的加工使得知识可以更好的被大脑吸收（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4348348e-b6c0-490b-af1f-22bb0b3bc5eb"}},{"type":"text","text":"），使知识更有机会在未来得到提取与应用。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"abb8d7bf-657b-4d67-b529-17887a4f648d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"游戏中拟物化的界面增加了阅读负担，但让界面更加吸引人、更具探索性和可互动性，带来了更大的乐趣。（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b59319b4-77de-4a02-97a0-1165b1281c4b"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ccd93add-9f10-4176-9b4c-8ebd7a540b5c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总之负担不一定要消除，一切以业务、用户目标为准。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1f9c4d26-3469-44fa-b604-08e1961b6a0e","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3818c878-65e8-4be3-b31d-fe166b9a0c5d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"负担是用户完成任务过程中所会遇到的问题，设计师大多情况需要帮助用户消除负担。可分为操作负担、眼看、思考负担 3 种。负担有时未必要消除，甚至会有意增加负担。"}]}]}
cards.title: 产品设计中的负担

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d8fb63f6-d668-4346-a741-babe4557c8a3","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"回归测试思路在设计中的应用"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"28de7c27-4e36-4b45-819c-d4085df91900","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"95e98fc0-1d9d-458c-b754-a9ae6a105568"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"「回归测试」是一个测试领域的词汇。回到一个已经去过的地方称为「回归」，当加入新模块、修改旧模块时需要回头对之前已经测试、上线但可能关联的功能进行测试，以避免造成连带问题。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b34d7ffe-8839-4d79-8754-2567d54597e3","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"方法"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"242923fc-1719-450c-8115-dfea5176c345"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最近在项目中发现这种思路也可以运用在设计流程中。具体的做法是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"保持文档的完整性"},{"type":"text","text":"，在整体文档中修改、新增模块，而不是新建一个文件；在此基础上不止考虑本次需求的内容，还要考"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"虑局部和整体的关系"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"cb80976b-0209-4601-80f8-89b8b9ef146e","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"意义"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"003f59f5-bb55-4caf-a375-c6b46b324c55","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"便于后续维护"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4a634c52-42df-455a-aff6-be8648e809b7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"新建文件固然可以给本次修改、阅读造成便利，但长期如此会导致业务失去完整性，给后续的迭代工作造成阻碍。新接手的人不知道完整的逻辑是什么，造成难以下手的局面。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f55621e4-1827-4991-8389-aad596a2f3b7","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提高方案完整性"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"19d24785-6fb1-4868-8ee6-6ebd6989f254"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在完整文档中输出可减少方案考虑的遗漏。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"27e0925e-2e29-456f-905f-314ac8744bc4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如粉丝团需求中，由于在完整文档中进行编辑，很容易提醒自己要考虑各种情况的处理方式；比如新增的活跃任务在不同的徽章状态、不同的主播状态下的表现。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"727d16d7-cf9d-413f-a306-cf9dfe93935f","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/a0754a91-d887-463e-bf6c-f537864af4cc/CleanShot%202022-09-22%20at%2019.40.47.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":555,"originalWidth":1004,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"848905f6-bdb9-41b9-a9c7-2d8e22ad2e74","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"扩宽业务思路"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e2033491-0593-480d-b8a1-0a1407aa53a0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在优化部分模块时，走查整体业务可以挖掘到更多机会点。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e5d89eff-21eb-4a53-8093-fc5e73fe2be2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如粉丝团新增了一键升级的功能，当某个特权要求用户达到一定等级时，原本只能计算并逐个刷礼物升级；一键升级可以让用户更快捷实现目标。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5bb170c8-4c1f-426c-8b82-a8a88b2844f8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在走查整体模块中发现，除了本次需求新增的「特权内容」需要支持一键升级外，之前做过的高等级限定礼物、限定发言气泡也存在粉丝等级的限制，并向策划提出机会点，是否可以一起接入「一键升级」。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"865ee73c-70af-49e4-8747-8e54143b5694"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可能存在的疑问是，开发等阅读者如果只想关注本次的修改点，放在整个文档中会比较影响阅读，要怎么解决？我通过评论功能建立更新点的标记，辅助页面上标注，可以帮助阅读者快速理解需求。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"2e3ddd7a-aaeb-4969-ab06-3e8b16e2f1ba","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/c2d848a9-6757-49a1-bc60-7e4d3b103e7a/CleanShot%202022-09-22%20at%2020.25.57.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":766,"originalWidth":1461,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"70dd45a2-9fd9-4259-b3e8-bdcc3b762a9d","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"817b428f-2912-4c36-8e69-1f9178976269"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"「回归测试」是测试领域的词汇，在设计流程中学习其核心的思路，我们可以通过将小模块的迭代方案合并到整体文档中，思考局部迭代对整体造成的影响，从而达到"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"提高方案完整性"},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"扩宽业务思路的效果"},{"type":"text","text":"。最终"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"实现扩大职业边界和影响力"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]}
cards.title: 回归测试思路在设计中的应用

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3a93de30-2dd3-4e8d-8714-105f53b5e7d3","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"交互设计交付"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8c6c9df4-39ec-4ae9-945a-63225b839e22"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"部分原则也适用于 UI 的愿景所感动、影响，结合自己对计算机先驱的理解开始思考自己的愿景。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e0a88251-c007-4cc4-a89f-2209ada37e2d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Doug a9df465-e67e-4823-b2b2-3aeb55143753"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"支持人类对媒介进行编辑、输入和输出。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4c41f6c5-4c58-4887-b4da-ce6bd59972a2","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d15da88c-d4ce-4d00-862d-16b4ca829064"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"媒介是一种中间状态[1]，在信息发送者、接收之间传递信息。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6ea52170-2d25-4320-9c28-cf8f40a5cadd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如口语的介质是空气，人的声带振动通过空气传播信息；书籍的介质是纸张和书写工具，人类通过双手填符号记录到纸张中。而新一代的介质是互联网（比特），这种介质更是突破了物理上的限制，有非常大的发展空间。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"549edf80-867b-41d2-b265-18594ded847f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"**计算机则是一种"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fb740c7c-4130-435b-85ab-1f20463607ff"}},{"type":"text","text":"**，因为计算机相比之前的媒介来说，具备"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E6%9C%BA%E5%99%A8%E6%8B%A5%E6%9C%89%E4%B8%A4%E7%A7%8D%E4%BA%BA%E7%B1%BB%E4%B8%8D%E5%85%B7%E5%A4%87%E7%9A%84%E8%83%BD%E5%8A%9B%20OTg0MjQ1MQ_20211119190820%20438f75d3-2d0a-4301-a925-9af978e721d9.md","title":"机器拥有两种人类不具备的能力 MTc1Njk2MzY_20220305104302","data-internal-href":"meta://card/2ffab447-a5cb-41e1-b790-4047343c038f","edited":true}}],"text":"链接"},{"type":"text","text":" 需要耗费大量的人力从而影响真正重要的工作——思考；因为具备了"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"可更新性"},{"type":"text","text":"，我们打开 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://sspai.com/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"sspai.com"},{"type":"text","text":" 设计文档则需要通过分支等功能提交确定的可开发版本，避免中途不断变动造成的混乱。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4367d76a-8eb3-4cf7-b613-1847fdb87e0d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"拥抱可更新特性时，需要处理好静态与动态之间的平衡。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ea505495-6985-425a-af31-ed36f3d4e5fc","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可交互性"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4eeae4d4-c125-4a21-a5a3-29f244c5d50e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习过编程的朋友应该知道，要知道一个函数的逻辑与用法，最直观的方式就是直接上手使用，观察不同参数对于输出结果造成的影响，回形针的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://jibencaozuo.com/zh-Hans/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"交互式课程"},{"type":"text","text":"就可以在学习过程中调整公式，获得操作的实时反馈，理解不同数字、方法对于结果的影响。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"576bd555-b2af-4871-af07-2477b2dd5941"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://ncase.me/remember/zh.html","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"这个课程"},{"type":"text","text":"也运用了动态媒介可交互的优势，让学生边学边实操，提高了自学的效率和质量。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f10f27e3-e484-4f3f-acbe-d1a2332d7dd8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在学习领域，动态媒介的可交互性让学习的内容更容易被理解 后，通过自动布局、组件等功能理解了设计如何兼顾开发思维让方案可以更好的落地。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f5e5b50b-efe7-43e4-ba4e-c07231ef4cc5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在方法论和观念能够与动态媒介匹配之后，我们需要掌握具体控制媒介的能力。正如书写能力对于纸张，控制动态媒介的能力需要编程，至少也需要编程的思维。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7c996a06-4891-4014-8437-9672470f3b25"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5043a2a5-62cb-458e-96e5-0e9a8255165e"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"652387df-4e16-4f16-8f25-eefa3d4925e2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"你可以通过编程兑现动态媒介的可连接性特性，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://github.com/craigary/nobelium","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"将 Notion 中的文章同步到你的博客中"},{"type":"text","text":"、将 Figma 的更新动态发布到团队 IM 中。通过学习编程思维，理解 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zh.m.wikipedia.org/zh-hans/%E4%B8%80%E6%AC%A1%E4%B8%94%E4%BB%85%E4%B8%80%E6%AC%A1","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"DRY 原则"},{"type":"text","text":"你可以更好的管理 Notion 的数据库、编写"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zettelkasten.de/introduction/zh/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"卡片笔记"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"78e5f3f0-869b-490f-b8dd-2aae21f2661f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总之，虽然"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"795cd3e4-cc55-427c-81e9-7b693e9f4bd4"}},{"type":"text","text":"，我们完成目标不一定要亲自写代码，但需要我们熟悉动态媒介的特性，以及勤奋思考如何发挥它的价值。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8cdcc067-ea6c-4014-a6ed-fe1c4a8bff31"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以上就是我目前对于动态媒介的理解，这是一个长期的课题我会不断完善自己的想法并更新文章。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2cd49c50-bc18-4d21-8d40-aa744daaeb81"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"说到媒介，就不离开其中承载的符号，下一篇我会分享我对于符号的认识。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"31639ca2-0493-446d-bd3c-980e75764fe3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f76f60a-d8e8-41df-9333-cec171534592"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考资料"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"143d42ae-1047-44ff-bbc4-70f4eb70461e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4af18fbc-36c1-4a80-af7f-c6c35f951f5e"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"http://www.woshipm.com/pd/1919068.html","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"http://www.woshipm.com/pd/1919068.html"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"26f5e795-eb5c-4e53-a5b9-32a8fa90b999","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"de5e18fe-a81f-4d5b-8d80-7dcbb72d0913"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://sheracaolity.ghost.io/my-vision-heptabase/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://sheracaolity.ghost.io/my-vision-heptabase/"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"5c5acf54-15c9-4d01-9510-a8c8a018a726"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d0feb8d0-39a6-4971-9fdd-ceac6b2538df"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"已通过 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.notion.so/jiangzilong/af53ecc9f9d2457fbb3ca70217e4690c","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Notion"},{"type":"text","text":" 发布"}]}]}
cards.title: 我的愿景：动态媒介

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ed76a9a5-63f9-4207-821e-27c6ef66683b","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么要记录"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f53f1c31-ec5a-4124-ae67-4ffffcf9f99e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"今天和网友讨论了几个关于博客与记录的问题，正好分享一下自己的想法"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8699095b-0992-48da-a89e-97437a175e9f","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"持续的动力？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5dba76e6-cb2a-4d54-865e-b1441fc384b3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输出对我来说不是一个结果，而是一个过程，所以我的压力会很低，不会强迫自己要写到「完美」再发，甚至发草稿也是可以的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"45770a39-88be-4234-a655-e762ba65191e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另外不知道你有没有看「"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"01931149-439e-490b-b51b-602f289de20c","cardTitle":"请别忘记我的信息"}},{"type":"text","text":"」这一篇，我认为博客等信息是我的生命的载体，当我肉体消亡，他们会是我继续生活在这个世界的方式。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0663a866-9405-408b-a0e6-284a0455b5e1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另外，写文章的过程，是一个思考和自我对话的过程，让我感到很舒适。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e0ae2f25-1117-4b77-906d-a10e7e183103"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"记录、输出让我结交了许多原本在我的圈子内难以接触到的人，产生了许多交流，这是无法估量的价值。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2342ba2d-0fb8-42b4-8346-232ed4fb1c27"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最后应该和自己的性格有关，很多想法不想在微博、朋友圈这样的广场上发表，喜欢在自己的地盘不受限制，基本没有顾虑地表达。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"cafce329-06bc-4d77-bf72-f10384782300","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"记录的价值是什么？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a7eabbcd-663a-47c2-ae22-3ec68016dcc3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"价值的定义，要看你写作的目的了。如果只是当做思考的工具、倾诉的渠道，就不用担心价值问题了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6f49d720-a64f-4c1f-916d-8afc813c3428"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么他人要看你写的东西呢？也要从你写作的目的出发，可能只是单纯地想了解你(是你的个人名片)，如果是我，我会想看看其他人都在写什么，扩宽自己的写作领域。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ec2c178b-5f5f-497e-938d-5d08ee456564"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另外很多价值，已经在「持续的动力」部分说明了。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a64bb255-dd07-4c16-a906-c5bfed929ec3","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"写给谁看？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3596d333-089f-4a21-8e73-a260f75f2199"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"写给自己看、写给公司的同事看、写给任何想了解我的人看。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6c1a3a29-db81-4f6b-8732-e09b95a9ed03","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"需要读者反馈吗？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6a0f437a-030b-4d70-8d71-58a9ee8d7c9f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不强求有反馈，不过如果有我会很开心，因为写作而结交的朋友就算是一种反馈了。另外，我也会将文章发到少数派或者 Hepta 的社区，就会有人看文章、获得反馈。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"035a650e-fd93-41c3-b825-d2ce21234f3a","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有考虑其他方式输出吗？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c112a588-5e8c-489f-af2e-486772502782"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有社区的负责人邀请我用访谈或直播的方式分享，这个也是不错的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1ed65722-530e-4f17-8485-f6c9f8fc0478"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最后，不用在乎自己写的质量，不要在乎博客是否美观，不要在乎其他人怎么看，就像朋克那样。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e79bfd0-74ce-447d-93a1-0cce2376bccc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这位前辈用 txt 写了 20 年的博客 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"http://scz.617.cn:8/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"http://scz.617.cn:8/"},{"type":"text","text":" 。"}]}]}
cards.title: 为什么要记录

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"47f5fb1e-561e-41ee-8f8a-7edeac64fcf2","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计系统是一个知识生产和应用的系统。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"05da3a07-5be4-4417-bea1-3a10078c779a","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计系统的意义"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"245eee6f-de8f-468f-82af-32ec7d6f1dc3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"82864b21-f964-498d-9b3a-82b6d3caf3ab","cardTitle":"《设计心理学3》"}},{"type":"text","text":"中作者提到设计的本质："}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"b90248ff-e71f-4408-a570-d630f6468246"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"986d4476-84c5-42f2-960c-d06dfbee6737"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有一堆选项，其中一些选项比其他好，但没有哪一种选项是完美的。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"64271b00-76f5-47bd-9380-f356f1882fee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这些选项可以称为设计材料。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e176f705-c48d-4071-a927-b334493ccdb6"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"32e038a0-493f-4652-abca-5c8e1724f052","cardTitle":"设计是与材料对话"}},{"type":"text","text":"，我们需要知道有什么材料并且熟悉各种材料的特质才能做出更好的设计。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"573abf84-45d9-4ba5-8947-a7041e2371a9"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"987951fc-0738-47e6-8c67-0b4607ecc417","cardTitle":"设计系统是一个材料清单"}},{"type":"text","text":"，可以帮助我们实现上述目标。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d687e697-8e06-4d4a-886b-5fbf8d465797"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"此外，设计系统沉淀的设计模式、通用规则可以提高设计的效率、减少团队的沟通成本。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0f9104bf-473e-42ca-9e8e-de4f67c6d234","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计系统的维护"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"699a3c4e-4991-41e2-b6b9-cc55d57aab67"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计系统也是一个知识生产、沉淀和应用的系统，下面会基于这个认识梳理组件的生命周期。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"99bc63ec-8c21-418a-8adb-5a28198665b3","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"生产"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"77ae731b-fae0-47f2-a054-1d98359c8c18"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"团队共建"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0f482b01-f430-4c90-840d-16a180ebe38b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计系统关系到团队的每一个成员，即便从搭建的工作量上一两位设计师也可以胜任，但团队共建仍然存在一些好处"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"fd9c47b5-8aa7-4cba-b09b-f172daf3470d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c5dbd36a-717e-4485-826d-0e10bcc50c8b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计系统对产品有重要影响，需要成员理解系统的内容，最好直接参与建设"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"18777897-599d-4b1e-b183-bd65aec36576","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"568405e2-1449-4383-83cc-e189330793c4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"培养团队成员积累设计模式、经验的意识"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b6fa23ea-8edb-4f2e-a447-16d906605525","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"527dca49-f188-4d4b-949b-2e0b156e22b6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"……"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"34480d7c-e4bc-43d0-b3a3-7bbb526d3a8e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"依赖成员自觉是行不通的，需要建设一套共建流程进行推动。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"de41eaa4-2992-4e2c-bfab-f0a72789eea8"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"轮班制"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"29823284-6bce-43bb-b9ab-c8c4e5f34ec4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"按照一个固定的周期（例如每周、每月）选取部分成员完成指定的任务；未被指定的成员也可自主加入。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"35a6ea0d-5666-4c23-9b72-c9c2784070bf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以自行从以下任务中选择"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b03d1edd-7d99-4e74-8e0e-a404dd3d7182","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e6b9c2e7-fd8e-4e50-aa07-6f3002f54777"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"新建组件：拥有一个新组件想法时，可以新建组件；"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"39e1f7a7-01ff-40c7-a3ef-4ff827dffd2b","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d0ab207f-b38a-47d1-8396-ec3aa036dbfa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"迭代组件：通过收集组件使用反馈、通过数据评估"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e3dc7184-422b-47f8-bbef-515e9ffe5861","cardTitle":"组件上线效果跟进与优化"}},{"type":"text","text":"寻找迭代方向"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"130762d9-6a89-4e8d-9fdf-93a2ef21ee74"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"组件创建流程"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6d8f5871-0658-4636-a54e-43c5985b1361"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在创建前（主要针对新建组件的场景），设计师需要先自查这几个问题"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8e7759d7-755a-4ba6-a71d-ea250f270ca4","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9b5e3aab-8d18-4f2d-bdb2-02d4c8750c0c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有无必要，例如使用场景较少的控件则不建议做成组件。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cc235021-d72d-4405-b35e-f9a824f9dfd0","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"34003ba7-0a18-4def-b3b6-0bc3a5463634"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能否用已有组件完成，如果不能，能否在已有的组件基础上迭代？而不是新建组件"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5c013b08-472c-4d97-9563-6c0931d3b95f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"16ead217-4388-4ed8-9103-f8f472d007ff"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"组件还能用在哪些地方，尝试创造更多使用案例"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e372d4a3-835c-453a-a94f-64d2ff51e240"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"每个周期，利用"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"591bab8b-cba6-4141-ba05-25e593b3111d","cardTitle":"Figma 分支功能"}},{"type":"text","text":"创建一个设计系统的分支；周期内所有的新增和修改在分支内完成。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fddab089-1c17-4040-b954-7bf35218dd33"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E5%88%9B%E5%BB%BA%E7%BB%84%E4%BB%B6%E7%9A%84%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E6%AD%A5%E9%9C%80%E4%BA%86%E8%A7%A3%E5%B7%B2%E6%9C%89%E6%96%B9%E6%A1%88%20NjAxMTQ3NQ_20210825215140%202d009312-1ec2-412c-88d1-5fcf3b8596b5.md","title":"创建组件的第一步需了解已有方案 NjAxMTQ3NQ_20210825215140","data-internal-href":"meta://card/2d009312-1ec2-412c-88d1-5fcf3b8596b5","edited":true}}],"text":"创建组件的第一步需了解已有方案"},{"type":"text","text":"，搜索线上截图、历史文档罗列目前已有的方案，找出方案的共性与个性，打造出适用性更强的组件。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7b308705-70dd-4db4-9cc8-73ef734252a9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"组件编辑原则，可参考 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./Figma%20%E7%BB%84%E4%BB%B6%E5%BA%93%E6%90%AD%E5%BB%BA%E4%B8%8E%E6%98%93%E7%94%A8%E6%80%A7%E4%BC%98%E5%8C%96%204fe942a5-93d7-4427-acbb-50f0c4550ea3.md","title":"Figma 组件库搭建与易用性优化","data-internal-href":"meta://card/4fe942a5-93d7-4427-acbb-50f0c4550ea3","edited":false}},{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"Figma 组件库搭建与易用性优化"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f7367929-55ef-4d79-af04-bf8f340feccf"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"组件评审"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d7ae0094-c08f-4869-b14c-ab1df00fb67a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4fc02e7e-3762-46e2-9a99-5bdaec2f2d23","cardTitle":"建立设计系统的版本控制体系"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"77a41a0c-75bf-42ee-b1a8-a2131c6c3ad1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"评审可增加设计系统的修改摩擦，避免一次性的设计，控制好组件的迭代与稳定性的平衡。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fe26ea32-ce83-4c39-b568-f2e2b7742cdc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"每个周期举行至少一场会议用于评审（或可在站会中完成），主要围绕上述「创建组件前的 3 个问题」展开讨论。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"394340db-efb1-4aa1-ba32-6e0c27e495a1","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fedd4404-038a-47cb-9237-2125a07b50cf"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"38dd64de-763d-4108-a6a3-234440155479","cardTitle":"Figma 组件迭代也要做好新旧版本兼容"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"813ae816-2186-4815-8199-64eebf502958"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"周期内评审通过的组件统一推送更新到主文件，供团队成员使用。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"84a3ffb0-1450-4b56-b7d3-437fed880879"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"更新日志同步"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a2031715-358f-45b7-a3b0-b2cb54b5784f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"组件更新后需要与包括策划、QA、技术等多个职能的同事同步。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf3ec457-5bce-4041-8b60-ba9697e725fb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在每次组件的修订中，可通过 Figma 的批注功能标记修改点；待评审后统一整理更新日志，在设计系统对接群中同步更新信息。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"892807b7-699e-4e53-8d98-3c7459ee3ac8","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/98b95e14-abae-4bea-92a4-0331f2c82e58/CleanShot%202022-07-20%20at%2014.40.07.png#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"80%","height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d5863229-bd5f-4ae9-bdd0-4481ac847af2","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"应用"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2af364a1-4d90-44d7-96b6-8566d9ad3227"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"掌握基本的软件操作技能"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"80bd8c17-e853-4995-b558-81faa10b315c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在实际的组件使用中，不熟悉组件、自动布局等功能会给使用者造成一定程度的使用障碍；除了编辑者在设计组件时通过创造案例等方式提升易用性之外，组件用户也需要掌握以下基本的软件操作技能"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"23b81e27-12bd-4489-b21b-b7010c9a315c"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/file/6DZ0d8vCMfbLCyH9kQToNh/Figma-Auto-Layout-playground-%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E5%B8%83%E5%B1%80-%E7%AE%80%E4%BD%93%E4%B8%AD%E6%96%87-by-BruceWu-Community?node-id=103%3A194","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"自动布局：Figma "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/community/file/911187952265027575","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"官方"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/file/6DZ0d8vCMfbLCyH9kQToNh/Figma-Auto-Layout-playground-%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E5%B8%83%E5%B1%80-%E7%AE%80%E4%BD%93%E4%B8%AD%E6%96%87-by-BruceWu-Community?node-id=103%3A194","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"教学"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5b1a49fd-c5ac-4bba-9c02-140ac69b697f"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1UD4y1d7r5","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"自动布局：B 站视频教程"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"266919ae-d189-4edb-ac0b-c9526907b382"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Qf4y1B7LZ?t=1449","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Variants - 组件集/超级组件/变体"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2628aa70-5307-4227-8add-5e80fa662c03"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"需要将上述学习作为新人入职培训流程的一环。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1ec1d998-35d4-48da-9f6f-58a05310cc44"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"比起减少使用障碍，不如直接去除障碍"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"5ede1939-5b0d-4ca8-9cd7-056d00b168a2"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0778bfc8-de3e-4146-8d0a-07848f8a432d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最好的组件/规范使用体验，就是不需要使用"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"646d2f50-0ffe-4339-a9eb-0dffd86a4d63"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于团队形成共识，基本不存在需求/项目差异的设计模式，可以推动技术开发成产品的默认逻辑；或者在设计层面打包成一个可以直接复制粘贴到文档中的组件。从而实现设计师无需花费精力关注的效果。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fc35cb2c-64ef-4947-8d01-383f839ab83b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如浮层的弹出动效可以作为基础的逻辑进行开发；同时也可以输出逻辑描述模板，设计师可以直接粘贴到文档中快速完成设计需求交付。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"8d9b19ec-3dee-47b5-8148-70d02abde8f2","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20220720152042.png#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"70%","height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2d9a260d-60f3-4da5-9dd4-5bf914c04514"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"044cf6e7-d34b-4aaf-ba71-f4257a6096e9","cardTitle":"面向技术、QA 的自查清单"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ba4df23a-a7d7-4945-ae7b-c3ed676a8444"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于设计验收中的常见问题且这些问题的解决方案存在共识，则可以整理自查清单并与技术、QA 同学共享，减少验收环节的沟通成本，也避免验收时即将上线来不及修改导致的产品质量下降。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b2af903f-3e74-40a5-a0f0-fb53e47534d0","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"反馈"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"db406a6d-7abd-4bdf-a074-74859d96ee32"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过反馈机制促进组件的持续发展。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c2230df4-c66f-4206-9644-56168bc2cc71"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"组件上线效果跟进与优化"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2d6392ff-97c2-462b-b264-66cc9b8d3c4e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Figma 提供了组件的数据看板，我们可以借此分析组件的使用情况，具体可参考 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e3dc7184-422b-47f8-bbef-515e9ffe5861","cardTitle":"组件上线效果跟进与优化"}}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"fca37962-10d3-42e2-9215-94d720632834","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20220119145930.jpg#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"90%","height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7d3a6635-6d30-4bca-a31e-d874255da0e5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其中使用次数高的组件可以推进到下游完成视觉/UI 组件、技术组件的搭建，同步给 QA、策划等岗位。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"35afef52-3071-457b-a24a-7c3e30a5c2a2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"建立跨职能的协作群，除了本文「应用」环节中提到的「更新日志同步」外，协作群也提供了与其他职能沟通设计系统的环境。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1164c1f8-eb41-41ef-ade2-bda1fac0c29a","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"小结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"295ddb89-909a-4f63-a9b9-42c5d42f59ba"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计系统的生产重点在于团队共建，需要构建完善的分类、命名规则更好的沉淀设计知识；应用环节设计师本身需要掌握基本的软件操作技巧，此外还会总结通用的设计模式减少用户使用的障碍、推进跨职能的协作。通过构建反馈机制促进设计系统的持续发展。"}]}]}
cards.title: 设计系统是一个知识生产和应用的系统。

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f64e031a-52ff-4eb4-a459-2c198dd20c27","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"四步将方案述求转为设计方案"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2dc056d0-da2a-4df1-9fa1-2a4756fad27a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在日常的工作中，策划往往会提出具体的方案，例如「这里要加一个轮播的效果」、「按钮加一个动效」这些都属于方案述求。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"43b44a41-72b1-452d-8161-5a466dbd2c01"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"作为设计师，不应该直接按照方案述求开展设计，而是要一步步思考背后的业务目标以及更好的设计方案。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a4994f00-558b-4893-b6aa-1940f495e59e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"步骤"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"858396e2-40bb-4576-9237-41f5b13da6b1","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6a524cdd-a142-428a-8e85-bf768a54a5e1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将方案述求转为业务述求"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1a689b61-fcdf-486d-839e-0b609c6f60d6","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"160bea8e-e9ae-41a3-b3c9-2778630aed69"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将业务述求转为业务目标"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"10b10a47-c245-4a7c-a295-b4d2fa9b6fc3","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7819deed-90f3-43ed-8adc-f757f3036983"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将业务目标转为设计问题"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2c3e7a0b-fe4e-4a87-9d9b-75eb3d2e9189","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c2bcc6f9-c370-4d0f-8357-ebd2253deeab"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将设计问题转为设计方案"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ce312fef-0a9d-4630-9378-6eb92f6844b5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"接下来从一个具体的案例出发，进行描述："}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c2c556cc-b37d-484b-8b71-9167ca95774d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"需要设计一个活动，参与活动的用户有机会获得奖励，且每一天都会解锁新奖励。界面中需要展示今天解锁的新奖励是什么。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"985357ed-7fc3-4133-9a39-6870d9f25882","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/3f1e2338-e929-40c3-8c25-f3161f2df1de/image.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"60%","originalHeight":500,"originalWidth":750,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e9a15216-ff73-41cc-80fb-2b2d26c618d4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"此时策划提出建议「这里要加一个轮播的效果」。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2fe4559c-9b1b-4475-91cf-cc5fadcf5988","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将方案述求转为业务述求"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e42e6d3-5929-429a-8d2e-d48fbe1afa15"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们需要知道，为什么策划希望采用此方案，此方案解决了哪个业务述求？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ab0309cc-5dee-4ade-b531-0eba787153b1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"「这里要加一个轮播的效果」，可能的业务诉求是，存在 1 个以上的信息，策划希望在有限的空间内可以曝光这些信息。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"345d1dcc-6c2a-484e-b429-de64d603c0ab"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"好，现在我们已经将方案述求转为了业务述求；加一个轮播效果的业务述求是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"可以曝光多个信息"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9265c290-865a-41b3-b71b-e45ffac281bf","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将业务述求转为业务目标"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d0632ada-11c2-4f94-b483-9f1eba27b1c6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"进一步思考，为什么策划希望可以曝光多个信息，想必这些信息都非常重要吧？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0844cf40-2928-44ce-b710-6c234883195b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"进一步沟通后了解到，策划希望轮播每一天解锁的新奖励，目标是希望"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"刺激用户每天都参与活动"},{"type":"text","text":"，提升活动"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"dbe253e2-0d11-473b-a24e-97b4ebab3ebc"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"697180e8-2242-4218-bf70-a0c6eb6663ce"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"刺激用户每天都参与，提升活动留存率就是业务目标。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"42dfb82a-d13c-4d15-8719-55d63c0f104e","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将业务目标转为设计问题"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c8dcfb39-abbe-4545-ad6a-9342fec7dc08"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在获得业务目标后，现在我们可以反过来验证方案述求可以很好的实现业务目标吗？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e00b6c62-e8b0-449e-b84a-e4bff07099b9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"轮播意味着用户需要持续停留在一个位置才能看到后几条轮播的信息；这对于重要信息的曝光显然是不利的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4f7eece5-8197-4535-a406-dc40cb6bcd44"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"还可以有哪些方案可以实现业务目标？"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bf7cda35-3eaa-46d6-b90f-67d0fdd95951","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"82fb60cd-ae73-4ef4-acd0-d60cdc8431a0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"直接展示最近几天的奖品列表，今天的突出显示？"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f8e822bc-5460-46c6-bdb2-e4614fc24d19","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ec04db64-5f12-442b-8cdc-a6a79e36582f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"打开活动页面时，弹窗告知用户每天的奖励都会更新，并展示即将解锁的奖励？"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6b01f409-17a7-4928-9e71-b72a540e4e5b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aef251cc-512d-44f4-868c-e700792fc19c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"次日继续参与活动可获得中奖 Buff？"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"87bce52a-8e2a-44db-9a91-3ff8d1af015d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e332e9bb-de38-4c17-8016-d9cffde0e3e7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"……"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"53e0bce8-2750-4583-bc4d-cf4532719655"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这些备选的方案就是我们要解决的设计问题，到底哪个更好呢？"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b464f5bd-0b73-4dfa-961a-1a1dac8b01b0","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将设计问题转为设计方案"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a98db352-d1a9-48ab-8826-3b0b63069938"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这个阶段，我们需要从业务目标、设计合理性、技术实现以及可持续性等多个维度思考设计问题，并且选择其中一个转为设计方案。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7c8e96f0-f8e5-4aa9-9bbe-537709360adc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如对于「曝光多个奖励信息，刺激用户持续参与活动」的述求，前面已经淘汰了使用「轮播」方案；打开活动页弹窗提示？会阻断用户的主流程，显然也不合适。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa8bf912-91ed-4743-a059-61fdabc52c93"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最终选择了展示最近几天的奖励列表，并且支持点击进入二级界面，查看所有奖励。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"68206421-8aa9-4810-8194-3f9cf46f0c9d","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/3d073b30-8b74-4210-97ed-f81ab7eacc97/image.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1022,"originalWidth":2670,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d162dc61-ec0b-4f10-80cf-519d0c31dfdb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这既可以突出今天用户关心的奖励，也可以迅速获取后几天将解锁的奖励，较好的完成了重要信息的触达。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"aa822f51-4c39-4581-8452-1bac03dfded0","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b46c6d19-df4f-4ac8-925a-46a8e5072932"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"收到方案述求时，我们首先理解方案背后的业务述求（曝光每天的奖励信息），以及具体的业务目标（鼓励用户每天参与活动）；通过业务目标验证方案述求是否合理，思考是否有更好的设计方案；通过发散方案并结合业务目标、设计原则、技术实现等维度选取合适的方案产出最终的设计方案。"}]}]}
cards.title: 四步将方案述求转为设计方案

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"38caa150-3b4b-4375-a3c7-3c6636dd54c6","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"减少切换成本"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b3e19347-eb56-4355-90f4-30f3e197a5d0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"作为一款编辑器，在用户输入时需要支持脱离鼠标操作，这样减少了键盘、鼠标切换的成本；"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"da34bfb0-844c-425f-ad22-610ac0e62e2c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"硬件领域的案例是 Tinkpad 的红点，用户可以在不脱离键盘的情况下操作鼠标。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"4c3a6469-4bb7-4211-a6e7-5bef4f855cd1","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20221027202513.jpg#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"50%","originalHeight":500,"originalWidth":500,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c6ea9031-cd31-4b81-84b2-db85ca578eda"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"732d85aa-87ff-4c38-bd19-5623cc47a006"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://sspai.com/post/72987#:~:text=%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E6%96%87%E5%AD%97%E7%9A%84%E6%97%B6%E5%80%99%E5%8F%AF%E4%BB%A5%E8%84%B1%E7%A6%BB%E9%BC%A0%E6%A0%87%E2%80%94%E2%80%94%E8%BF%99%E6%98%AF%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E4%BC%98%E7%A7%80%E7%9A%84%E7%BC%96%E7%A8%8B%E6%96%87%E5%AD%97%E7%BC%96%E8%BE%91%E5%99%A8%E5%BA%94%E6%9C%89%E7%9A%84%E7%95%8C%E9%9D%A2%E7%89%B9%E8%B4%A8%E3%80%82","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Notion 的案例"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2a988aff-2faa-4bca-8067-febf719db958"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d9fb16ec-a621-4c8e-af9a-f5d7b478cd9e"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d8a9b8dc-4392-4ce3-a45d-2ab4f368e296"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"6422f894-65c1-45dc-b55b-f37d02613e7a"}}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"d286d2de-b8c6-4408-a8a4-69230c550973"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3dcd45b2-657b-4615-b95f-565360b33eaf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7f526777-0ab1-4f99-9782-72d63ebacde9"}},{"type":"text","text":"的角度思考的话，减少切换成本是因为信息在传递过程中存在编码和"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"60496aba-b042-4863-a1b5-c25a02eae7ac"}},{"type":"text","text":"的过程，这些工作都需要投入成本。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"07b57d97-ce06-423f-856d-8608732f1246"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"再具体一点，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./直截了当可以帮助用户更好利用上下文%2078e393cb-5c91-4070-a508-f7d572f0229f.md","title":"直截了当可以帮助用户更好利用上下文","data-internal-href":"meta://card/78e393cb-5c91-4070-a508-f7d572f0229f","edited":true}}],"text":"直截了当"},{"type":"text","text":"、较少切换成本的交互方式对应信息传输中的「"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./信息增量%20bc5045b5-ce32-449e-a335-8585a74181bc.md","title":"信息增量","data-internal-href":"meta://card/bc5045b5-ce32-449e-a335-8585a74181bc","edited":true}}],"text":"增量传输"},{"type":"text","text":"」，在原有信息的基础上增加信息，这提高了信息的传递效率。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"5c5cb689-03a7-4514-8353-d35c37b03ceb"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3a240799-7842-443b-bbb8-2719172a5fc9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2022-11-01：将常用的两个窗口并排显示、同时显示在不同显示器上也是一种减少切换成本的方案。"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"55607d69-b116-4fbf-b765-721c41655011","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一次提取操作会对下一次提取造成影响"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b103f484-1221-4a2e-8d0b-861a5324aa19"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"单词存储在记忆宫殿中的不同位置，有的单词彼此距离较近，有的则较远。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"797afeda-cb4e-46b7-8d35-09e872cb9115"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从某个位置提取单词后，将引发一个扩散到周围的神经活动，从而导致周围的信息提取变得更加容易。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9b375979-98fb-4e9f-b439-7c13396cec8f"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":"6489"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5f626ab4-9ceb-46a0-a378-4a810958333e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"899f5179-783d-4035-807a-53e202e19ace","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":"的依据之一。"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6db9cd2a-e6d3-4155-96a9-5605397830d2","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"启动效应"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"336e80ea-64b6-4cbe-9a22-bd335e183aae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"就像聚光灯一样，我们会关注聚光灯下及其周围的事物，也就是可能存在关联的事物(原始社会中距离代表了相关性)"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"911193cf-7ce8-4323-b826-695ab9670e75"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这是一种合理的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"注意力调度机制"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c8ea5d4e-5a70-4fb3-a377-39693f5ed602"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以我们才会像启动效应实验中呈现的那样，对事物的认知会被前面接收到的「启动信息」所影响"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"75fc71c6-a55b-46ff-ac2b-244e15759c5f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"包括"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"236681e6-a3d2-4b2f-889f-d0e56369a58d","cardTitle":"锚定"}},{"type":"text","text":"效应也是，人类会被一个毫不相干的数字影响对后一个数字(价格)的认知。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e331480c-1acf-4943-bdf7-79db59a942ca"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E7%9B%B4%E6%88%AA%E4%BA%86%E5%BD%93%E5%8F%AF%E4%BB%A5%E5%B8%AE%E5%8A%A9%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7%E6%9B%B4%E5%A5%BD%E5%88%A9%E7%94%A8%E4%B8%8A%E4%B8%8B%E6%96%87%2078e393cb-5c91-4070-a508-f7d572f0229f.md","title":"直截了当可以帮助用户更好利用上下文","data-internal-href":"meta://card/78e393cb-5c91-4070-a508-f7d572f0229f","edited":true}}],"text":"直截了当"},{"type":"text","text":"设计原则，除了减少视线转移的负担，也符合启动效应中的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"bb6bbee9-6811-4852-862d-8e2374455a19","cardTitle":"接近性原则"}},{"type":"text","text":"，同时也降低了认知负担"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d72bc49f-793d-429c-bf7a-c4e442509e1a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096","cardTitle":"《认知心理学》"}},{"type":"text","text":"5067"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"e2548284-33bf-4519-8787-dc408700d8c4"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"835a2e03-f8fc-4abc-8edc-e5ecfafc23b1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c5f07ec4-0358-488a-b4c1-ecc160b0062a","cardTitle":"情境 Context"}},{"type":"text","text":"中，因我包含更多相关事物，而让对象更容易被理解。从而降低了认知负担。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"40bc3127-2cc1-4507-a422-f40725d3eed3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2796c098-c6e5-4d9a-a46b-d2b5f11c8956"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b43fd7e6-9c21-448d-8c7e-0cd21b5c03a7","cardTitle":"《记忆》"}},{"type":"text","text":"一书中提到一个有趣的实验："}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"34f72006-0a5f-4987-9c43-4665efa6daa7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对被试说出一个句子然后要求回忆内容"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"82de84a9-ebb1-4fd8-b5d2-fc4531923ef9","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a26b1980-8eea-45ac-8a97-5cfdf02bedfa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"A 组"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dfb5e084-90bd-44ae-8045-b8770ab7f2f8","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e74d5145-d2e6-4f2e-b2d5-329c0130b782"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"收到的语句是「钢琴被抬走了」"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6d0e5c27-2356-4788-a5db-49822e306ff1","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6f5185e6-30ac-4c21-a4dd-c957314ecc0b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"B 组"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2d481e56-efc5-4878-b7d9-25398d414da9","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf4e67f1-65f9-4998-919b-54284d8831c4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"收到的语句是「钢琴被调好了」"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"563702e9-8ac9-412b-ab7b-cf00777b4057","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"752b61b6-7375-4bad-845a-90ef201ae99c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"随后试验者要求被试回忆之前听到的句子，并提供提示句，提示句是「悦耳的声音」，结果 B 组的句子中因包含和声音有关的信息，所以更容易回忆起「钢琴」这个信息。"}]}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d72bbad6-59ed-40ed-ad3c-499ddad90fb5","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"认知自动化"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8749d7e5-11b2-4814-a3e4-f7e87519e4f0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于熟悉的事物，人们所需要投入的注意力则更少；并且由于惯性也会优先注意到这些事物。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"784ba6ff-b3aa-4f29-9479-beb88f5df166"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如专注力游戏中，阅读的自动化过程更强，所以人们更多会直接读出文字而不是文字的颜色。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"61b2818e-8d70-4d4d-81d4-4edf3bdea491","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/ccd022ae-2be2-4031-8a49-a4e27ba3e872/CleanShot%202022-08-05%20at%2020.03.35.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"80%","originalHeight":369,"originalWidth":523,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d439ab96-4f98-4f1e-936c-4d3304397852"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096"}},{"type":"text","text":"2361"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"09f9d665-1d8f-4db3-980a-cedad8da94ec"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f170f9d7-0360-47e9-9746-c144e1d10be0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这也是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"86a14082-4394-4dc2-b26f-ba0099cf67f5"}},{"type":"text","text":"的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"697909cc-84ff-4302-b978-450139f15884"}},{"type":"text","text":"原则发挥作用的依据。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f13b19ce-1fb5-44c1-bebb-d5099e162444"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"来自认知神经科学的证明：专家在处理问题时大脑损耗的能量更小，处理问题更有效率 —— "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096"}},{"type":"text","text":"P734"}]}]}

"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=NDQxNDU3MQ","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":"
