22:23:18"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"61c57f1c-81d0-4ac5-8d72-ea88940b68e9"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0623bb1f-3ea8-4d6e-9cf6-f26f9029f253","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f67779cc-b117-4eb6-bd31-8d1df6bd76f5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是德国的社会学家卢曼发明的笔记方法和工作流程，卢曼使用这个方法加上自己的勤奋一生写了58 本著作。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"d48fd43f-453b-4ec6-b8fe-5e317770e885","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/03KhCY20221113152944.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":528,"originalWidth":940,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a94f1c51-3810-4d88-a77c-24248f3fb199"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"笔记大家都知道，而卡片笔记顾名思义是以卡片为单位组织卡片。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"531c0c49-b302-403c-a963-8bead1ce45d8","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/FlNqZf20221113153001.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":768,"originalWidth":1024,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1c4140bc-39ba-4c3e-ad15-5413ba6c9a9c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我自己用了两个月（2021-08-13），记了 200 多个卡片笔记，觉得很有价值，今天和大家分享一下。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"33a9fc46-41ce-4f6f-aa77-649540159d82","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/QqedPi20221113153030.jpg#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"50%","originalHeight":514,"originalWidth":564,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a5927d70-ff14-47f6-9682-a7481f3cac5c"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"89188f63-1c04-446f-8d7e-a10e523322ed","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"怎么用以及价值"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"48543896-4093-498f-aa35-117ee8cfcb0a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分为输入、处理、输出 3 个步骤。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3ac8aeb5-d421-462e-a14d-7b4d64507ce6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"（怎么操作以及这样做的理由/好处）"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4c7a3704-8853-49fd-97d5-4cc5a2ff1d2f","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输入"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"64d1dad5-03ad-4049-b05d-eaa837947930","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"标准化"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"de3432b9-a3da-4aba-bd0c-d8b68229344b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一张卡片分为这几个信息 笔记 ID：如果用笔记软件做笔记，通常都会自动生成 ID，帮助笔记建立链接（第 2 次提到链接） 标签：标记正文相关联的主题、方向 正文：书写方法下面会详细介绍 引用：观点来源，可以贴链接，如果是纸质书就写上书面和页码，如果没有可不填"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"5124c1dc-890d-4220-a7df-4bcef0c5139c","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/PGoS6B20221113153059.jpg#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"70%","originalHeight":228,"originalWidth":579,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"459815eb-6d4e-460c-947f-fd05254af78e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这种格式的好处，首先是每一项数据都有作用和意义，其次标准化的输入方法可以减少选择，让大脑专注更有意义的事，提高效率"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f6393376-6822-48ab-aa98-c418bd2b19dc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"下面进一步剖析一下正文的书写方法"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9b2abe86-1506-439f-9063-9ca4fab90e20","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原子化（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"697909cc-84ff-4302-b978-450139f15884"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"baf4b49b-700f-4775-b31e-9e6b3d0656d3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个笔记尽量只有一个知识点，这样更容易组合链接产生新的洞见、知识，实现 1+1 ＞ 2 的效果。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52856842-fc59-4b36-aebe-2b108adce50b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"链接是卡片笔记最大的价值，在后面的环节会详细介绍。 举例"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"c803ef20-239e-4f51-8667-8a7c160b692b","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/frEa7h20221113153114.jpg#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"70%","originalHeight":228,"originalWidth":579,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d8486f3d-af8a-4192-ba90-9b138fe8800d"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b036a7c2-5d67-4748-abff-e782ebae170c"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"573ad5ba-f97c-4396-812b-ba2515725a99"}}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"985126fa-f58d-4ec0-afcd-aae8ad0cd6fe","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"转述，而不是搬运"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d47a6959-c77c-4e57-a69b-c0df02c3d227"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"搬运是指直接抄写原文或干脆直接复制粘贴到笔记中、一键收藏。用自己的语言描述，用演讲的态度书写，想象自己如何向他人介绍这个知识、观点。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7f385aaf-5928-4586-9adb-b5aafc509d03"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这么做的目的是增加输入摩擦，增加提取强度，一方面检验自己是否真的理解了面前的知识，其次通过更大的输入难度，可以加深印象，日后更容易从大脑中被激活、提取出来使用。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"9e7fe6be-743a-4d5a-92b8-f8b29f56808c","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/k1YHmX20221113153248.jpg#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"70%","originalHeight":367,"originalWidth":592,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bdd8db5b-0a0e-4a34-a2eb-5120164197bc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过上述方法，我们就会收集许多的笔记，下面开始对笔记进行处理"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5221ffe9-62bf-4daa-a250-b8d898214344","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"处理"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f31de6c1-5ffe-4104-bfe5-1793672cc0ea"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"处理可以在写完每一条笔记之后发生，也可以定期统一处理。 建立笔记的关联，他们互相矛盾或是互相佐证，从而诞生新的知识和洞见 例子：（索引笔记）"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id%5C=NDQ1MTA3NQ","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id\\=NDQ1MTA3NQ"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d906115a-3ba1-49dd-9133-2fb7af38cced"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如做了几个笔记："}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"d9318d1d-fdb9-44ea-9b57-2b9b554ce0f9","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/s1lB6Q20221113153329.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"70%","originalHeight":898,"originalWidth":1140,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6e866341-9278-448f-883e-b532d12c2dbe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最后发现，他们都为「卡片笔记为什么有价值」这个命题提供了支撑，于是将上述笔记和这个命题建立链接，获得了 1 张新的卡片。下图的 MEMO 代表 1 个笔记链接，点击后就会链接到上述笔记中。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"11cfd41d-ca39-4b17-a341-9cbdcd69386f","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/JCmTKZ20221113153349.jpg#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"70%","originalHeight":719,"originalWidth":565,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4bc91da9-6a69-4135-b5d1-d5c2c625fc47"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原子设计和卡片笔记关联的例子："},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"bdc24d9d-b12a-4f1a-96ae-cbe6efbb2c14"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f23b0ae7-bc87-4c1a-b04e-e07d853979ca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另外一个例子，同时在阅读《原子设计》和《卡片笔记》时发现，他们都强调要以「原子」为单位，于是这 2 个观点建立了链接，并自己总结出：将方法抽象出来、让对象简单化的组织方式、思考方式，并且还发现其他领域，例如计算机的接口，都是遵从了这一原则。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"922ea671-99e3-4087-8562-cba18e3acd8c","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/dhqUjT20221113153408.jpg#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"70%","originalHeight":208,"originalWidth":564,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9cb7ea42-2823-4bb6-8215-91b0711d7f66"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"建立链接除了产生新的知识，还会进一步提升提取强度，例如你坐在学校的教室里，就很容易想起在校园里发生的事情，这就是教室这个场景让你联想了相关的记忆，这就是链接带来的好处，链接会相互建立索引，让你从 1 条线索回忆起另一条线索，增加知识被调用的可能性。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"db4bac24-8589-42df-92d5-5bff4b3c3551","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输出"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6c233d44-2b11-40ef-9ade-0f4ae040d1a9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输出是收获的季节，届时你会发现不是没得写，而是可写的太多，要选择不写什么。将卡片根据标签等方式进行筛选、通过链接建立线索，完成文章的书写。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cde1b903-3b5f-4905-9656-039a08e6cfd0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"本次分享就是利用卡片笔记完成文字稿的撰写。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b24c9a92-a126-4c16-9471-46b8a2d8bf95","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b7b49a23-b549-49c6-b419-323dc6eec5ac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以本次分享为例：阅读卡片笔记这本书，然后用自己的语言、原子化的方式记录笔记，笔记包含 ID、标签、正文、引用几个要素，建立笔记之间的链接，不同笔记相互矛盾、佐证产生新的知识和想法，最后梳理笔记脉络输出今天分享的内容。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ed952915-6f6b-4b55-bb1b-d3ac3a9899ef"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8166dd1b-1899-4f0f-ac7b-f28d48aa0413"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其他没有提到的内容："}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"952f1714-160f-43a7-a0f1-81fa725be53d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"卡片笔记分类：卡片笔记不分类也没有结构，只利用标签方便我们后续的整理和检索，因为结构是在认知之后出现的"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"f2ecc133-396b-453d-a422-909f41d7a86a","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CvsjeF20221113153435.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":582,"originalWidth":1080,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c300648f-c440-4942-877d-83671a3f893a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f5bc67bf-cd9b-4638-be1f-b852f953fd7e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff68d4c5-79a5-4e36-b926-75722358572a"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://help.flomoapp.com/thinking/wei-shen-me-fen-lei-bu-zhong-yao","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://help.flomoapp.com/thinking/wei-shen-me-fen-lei-bu-zhong-yao"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"54348b14-68ac-4ebf-afbc-7c60c65c9380","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fdbe8179-f8a5-4ea6-8a9a-44d45b36fd9c"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zettelkasten.de/introduction/zh/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zettelkasten.de/introduction/zh/"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"77b8ff02-4de9-4b31-bffc-f0293cd15738","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ae7b0400-729e-4a92-ae5d-9a5333278493"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"《卡片笔记写作法》"}]}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"306ad434-5a7a-4240-b6f1-da19fd0d23a8","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"加工深度"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"05c5a042-a256-4a6d-840c-7c742259ffd0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9be47ea3-af35-49cd-8c1c-8a13dd575130","cardTitle":"长时记忆"}},{"type":"text","text":"中停留的时长部分取决于处理的深度。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"526f0c05-fce6-4bc5-abe2-5a087d6633c9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"加工的深入会进行更多的分析"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3060b16f-46c2-43c8-8e8a-1f3aa6345211","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"77130812-e144-4e23-839d-ad6b017d1654"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"浅层分析"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c96a8248-3953-487c-8af0-503c59532988","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6982d450-d6c4-4f9e-95b2-6bb524a34c51"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"感觉、特征分析"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f079c47f-9f4d-436b-bdbc-73a3dbd4aed1","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8b01823b-cb52-4434-935b-2703fe173ec7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"深层分析"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"18b77302-b63d-42e5-9e0e-a4d9ce6b9f4e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"21c0cdbf-440c-4aeb-97a4-7e42af28ce77"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"抽象分析、语义分析"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c5f07ec4-0358-488a-b4c1-ecc160b0062a","cardTitle":"情境 Context"}}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f29719cb-6d63-4374-a12d-d982daf8db6a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096","cardTitle":"《认知心理学》"}},{"type":"text","text":"3809"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"4358b7a0-062f-46c5-98c0-dc978022a75a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1c74361c-d4ae-4b36-b784-b6db284f34ef"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不同类型的分析对应了"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8361867a-615b-4343-a9d8-070eb1ece272","cardTitle":"三种认知状态"}}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d992a898-2de4-43d1-9ea2-d0d60b7e75e1","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"游戏中的拟物化负担"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"761f4e23-ac52-47ef-b45c-2e506cbef5e4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"关联自： "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"18d1ddc9-6f6d-4c78-be47-3385c5997c93","cardTitle":"交互设计中的任务类型"}},{"type":"text","text":" 负担并不总是要消除。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d403a674-1f2c-4120-8eb2-c7ed1ced2fb1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如在游戏中拟物化的界面增加了阅读负担，但在界面上探索和高互动性可以带来更大的乐趣。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38ff11d7-adf8-4767-91af-c750cbf318c0"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"724c99ab-a7dc-4b10-87f7-d9e197329511","cardTitle":"《About Face 4：交互设计精髓》"}},{"type":"text","text":" p229（负担取决于情境）"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"351bdb81-3733-4c05-ad1f-5132001c0c32"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"04b8de54-d661-4334-b072-b36a5376de9a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTU5NjE0NjA","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-02-14 22:46:13"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0b858c75-e5e1-4d3c-af68-d58a6d65eabc","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"请别忘记我的信息"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d4fd8e9b-a8a7-4321-a0c7-1720a5267393"}},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"be0363e9-1a55-4bff-b433-a8cd16a9dc70","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/83f179d2-1773-4af6-b353-bd543d9ee821/image.png#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"60%","height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"19ae28ef-fb1c-43ae-ba18-c3fa1f8f583e"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0d2152e5-9da0-4f88-8d3a-10fbab94faac","cardTitle":"《信息简史》"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"37798030-9979-4afe-a5ed-87c7d86024e8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我原以为是一本介绍信息机器的历史，期望作者会从电报开始讲到现代计算机甚至智能手机，结果读到 70% 都仍然没有进入「正题」，反而转向从信息角度思考人生意义、生命本质的话题。"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"f0d1a4c2-64ca-4051-8acc-9e55d3df90bb"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"269c16ea-a2fb-42a8-91ac-cfde140c1674"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有些人死了，但仍活在人们心中。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"75354e00-1f6c-43bb-9af0-7746eac0f346"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"那是因为他们的信息留存下来，以记忆形式存储在亲人的脑海中或以符号的形式存储在绘画、文学等作品中。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"56e7400e-3ba1-4bd1-8dd3-6a31e6b6c615"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不管是大脑或纸张，他们都存在于一个媒介中。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b2f9ca33-50dd-4a2b-939a-291e14377575"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这些都是信息。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1c170421-c9e6-4e12-91b0-54a3a8d080f5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果人类由基因构成，而基因就是信息；躯体只是承载和传递信息的媒介；那么人类就可以实现某种意义上的永生。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fdac6410-9cfe-4e01-ac56-474c8ca5d564"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息永存并且能够在不同的媒介中传播、存在。就像"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://movie.douban.com/subject/30424374/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"《爱，死亡和机器人 第一季》"},{"type":"text","text":"第一集中桑尼将自己的意识转入怪兽中一样。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"0b3593ef-7b59-45ed-8857-e9e9188043cd","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/35fe0646-232a-4fd8-b172-1ee35098e426/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52d62555-c328-4e99-93c4-83092ddfb7d6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果我承载信息的蛋白质外壳消亡了，那么请别忘记我的信息。"}]}]}

，而这些介质需要具备两个特性"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e3c32346-5633-4bc2-8d7f-d130f0c1855c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7bcf6363-180e-4de9-96d1-0b6869787a20"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"介质本身可以承载所要传递的内容。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ffb28985-04d9-47c1-95b6-77de0a9addad","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"13596af4-3495-4a61-b2b3-631289cefd40"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"支持人类对介质进行编辑、输入和输出。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"906aa4e8-8130-4eac-879f-6a1ed5cd49a5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6aac7b4e-3a47-415d-afd2-2e7e4625427c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"媒介是一种中间状态[1]，在信息发送者、接收之间传递信息。"}]}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"0e878368-a62a-47a1-a8bb-e02655318204","src":"https://miro.medium.com/max/700/1*NcPekR39aO_UsEHoakKD0Q.jpeg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":466,"originalWidth":700,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"692a1f84-2864-49a6-bbd7-f802e0e21d95"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如口语的介质是空气，人的声带振动通过空气传播信息；书籍的介质是纸张和书写工具，人类通过双手填符号记录到纸张中。而新一代的介质是互联网（比特），这种介质更是突破了物理上的限制，有非常大的发展空间。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c471016f-f8c0-4ec3-ba53-24935d9497e2"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://medium.com/sheracaolity/my-vision-a-forgotten-history-67ee77e969da#5911","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://medium.com/sheracaolity/my-vision-a-forgotten-history-67ee77e969da#5911"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38d8cc20-1634-4c95-b2eb-9eebff58c854"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"[1]"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0d2152e5-9da0-4f88-8d3a-10fbab94faac"}},{"type":"text","text":" cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ddade9e8-985d-4180-beea-c648b06807df","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"短时记忆"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"21a97b83-3ef9-4469-ad5b-390ced1badcc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"容量通常为 7+-2 个"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2eb427e1-08c6-4f9c-a089-e03e5c641ff9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过组块（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9cc9ed09-e90b-46b5-ae40-bbc7dcadd71a","cardTitle":"组块比独立的个体更容易被记忆"}},{"type":"text","text":"）、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c5f07ec4-0358-488a-b4c1-ecc160b0062a","cardTitle":"情境 Context"}},{"type":"text","text":" 可以调取"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9be47ea3-af35-49cd-8c1c-8a13dd575130","cardTitle":"长时记忆"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"99d4fd21-4b95-4adb-8a69-c523bb292ece"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在测试中通过更替记忆对象的类型（例如水果、蔬菜、职业名称）可以提高短时记忆的能力"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"af32379d-83f0-407e-a22e-d1639b2e9791"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"短时记忆通过遍历全部对象的方式进行匹配。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"b49d53af-c018-4465-b697-feda4e527432"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"885a9bb8-38f6-4fa6-9274-e38c959ba785"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当我们在思考时就是从"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9be47ea3-af35-49cd-8c1c-8a13dd575130","cardTitle":"长时记忆"}},{"type":"text","text":"中调取记忆然后在短时记忆中进行思考，笔记、白板等工具扩充了短时记忆的容量和负担，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fab7e306-6fcb-46e1-a939-add1658da9af","cardTitle":"辅助思考的过程"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b98364c7-c4d5-4ca2-b579-f320d1b0bfdc"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/hHcy6/ji-yi-gai-lun","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/hHcy6/ji-yi-gai-lun"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5a9981e7-97d5-4508-938f-6583d4c665fc","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"接近性原则"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6e9f1f57-414b-4c77-93f7-ea9f29be060c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人类对于对象关系的理解，受到对象之间距离的影响；例如人类会更倾向于认为位置距离更近的对象关系更加紧密。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f6b8c44e-fcc4-4f20-a27a-facf8ceeb9ca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"处理距离的影响，接近性原则也包含颜色、形状；并且距离的影响要比其他因素更大。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7edebb25-fdcb-4217-b5b7-25bd8093e9fb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为人类对于物理的位置距离更加熟悉，对于大脑来说也更加直接。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"de167805-bbd8-437c-bd70-540b6423ef1e"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.uisdc.com/gestalt-theory-proximity-principle","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.uisdc.com/gestalt-theory-proximity-principle"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"74e79b4b-74db-4966-b869-d28db5a735ab","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/S8Ycop20220702183908.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"70%","originalHeight":1306,"originalWidth":1584,"alignment":"center"}}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9eb41afb-53ec-4609-8560-26941a91b372","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"直截了当可以帮助用户更好利用上下文"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"621cac77-8ce1-4282-afd7-d85977a07a39"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"直截了当 - 页内编辑除了减少页面切换造成的操作成本提升、影响"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3b4a2186-2158-4c35-a020-2bead3bae449","cardTitle":"心流"}},{"type":"text","text":"外，直接编辑还可以帮助用户参照页面内的其他内容进行编辑；例如 Figma 编辑文件名称时可以参考页面下方的设计内容。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"df15ae79-c21e-46e6-92ef-cd5c5ce5227c"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d434a10f-09ac-452c-9184-755ec58ae8d8","cardTitle":"《Web界面设计》"}},{"type":"text","text":" p18"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"2f1b4a94-fda7-4db8-ba32-cea73cef36e4"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e647a5ab-627c-4b87-8eb5-7e7256d6c061"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=Njc1OTQyMg","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-09-11 22:28:11"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"ed2907ad-6ada-4b45-b665-3f5d99274c69"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ef45475b-006c-4e3a-8d8f-e8e7c174e420"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"直截了当也是利用了"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"bc5045b5-ce32-449e-a335-8585a74181bc","cardTitle":"信息增量"}},{"type":"text","text":"原来，当前操作或提醒在产品的整体环境中而不是在二级页面或弹窗中可以更好的利用环境这一已知信息来减少新操作/信息需要传递的信息量。"}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e1f182e9-0297-41f6-8f10-31800643ddc7","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一种设计模板使用方法"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"560485f1-9139-4124-8158-5754a3669ce9","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现存问题"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7072adc4-f13e-4f7a-b4c0-534d41025a31"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一些成熟的设计方案会被沉淀下来多次复用。每次复用时，现有方式是复制模板文件到新需求文件中，结合新需求的要求进行修改。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"24237f15-e3ff-4dc8-9467-8a5debbdc238"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"除了此需求个性化的修改外，还包含许多通用的设计优化点；而这些优化点随着每一个需求的复用散落在不同的项目文件中，难以管理、迭代。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3bcea048-7fd9-4f36-9e9c-3c7be7ca5ee8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"此方法可以让模板满足具体项目的个性化需求，同时也能集中管理通用的设计优化点，从而更好地实现设计模板的迭代。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2fec9aea-0b5e-489f-9554-702ee593cd76","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"名词解释"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6d9396a8-778b-4175-b36b-b147bedf67e3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ca9229d0-0b01-40e1-94c9-52a13f676cdb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主干文件：简单理解的话，我们接触的大部分文件都是主干文件"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d318ad5f-c12b-4506-ae1f-1e5186f7cbd5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"be220d1a-1b4e-4889-ab41-afea451e4683"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分支文件：通过下述「创建分支」步骤可创建分支文件"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa138216-bc6f-45f2-a5af-eedb3de50b74"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"上述两种文件的修改是隔离的，但可以通过某种方式互通，具体请继续看。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"628513c4-e288-4cac-8532-f3185e9d7fa9","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前期准备"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3aea0d98-a440-4b57-ac42-ff859c142c85","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"创建分支"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e6f15732-6643-49e3-bbbb-10f272a27168"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当你接到需求时，请不要直接修改主干文件，请务必先创建"},{"type":"text","marks":[ 3 月，大疆、华为等企业位于美国发布的制裁名单中，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://finance.sina.com.cn/tech/2022-03-14/doc-imcwiwss6018997.shtml","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"导致 FIgma 限制了这些企业的使用"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"85f60ba2-5be6-434f-8e36-f7ff8cb592b8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"今年 6 月，Figma 服务器发生故障，影响持续了数小时。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"8d655c3f-616f-4ac4-a8fb-cf625d5a9a1b","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20220803171329.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"121811f2-3b0b-47a7-8ad2-68fdb8b7ca0d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这些事件导致 Figma 文件的备份进入了人们的视野。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f01dacd9-2d81-4889-ac2b-1e584b618a4f","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行动"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"900844cb-0e1e-4a89-9610-8c8384fde9ef"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"首先，Figma 的数据分为两种类型，我们要备份的就是这些数据"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9bf02126-ef47-4c02-891e-85328b7cc92f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b9294581-4e90-4737-94bd-6f3c6587f415"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"画布数据"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"19142ffc-0a0e-4350-8ad8-dec7113268a2","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"acac3708-a51d-4270-b0ab-878b70989a0b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"图片数据"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"14eece34-92d5-4b9a-b645-fee02943fd1b","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"寻找现成工具"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5f322247-2577-4a9b-9c2c-b6da0f355af4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"尝试寻找"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://moonvy.com/blog/post/2022/backup-figma/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"现成的工具"},{"type":"text","text":"进行批量备份时，发现全都是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"只能备份「画布数据」"},{"type":"text","text":"，而源文件中的图片数据均会丢失。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ea0e344e-5035-4049-ba15-fb988f520d9c","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"结合 Figma API 备份数据"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d2db32f0-12e1-4aef-a862-4efc6de84af7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"查阅 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/developers/api","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"FIgma 官方 API"},{"type":"text","text":" 发现，可以获取文件中的图片数据，通过脚本批量下载就可完成「图片数据」的备份，再通过研究现成工具的逻辑，使用了备份「画布数据」+「图片数据」。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8c102679-06cf-4d10-8e34-185b0de45b12"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"但问题是，这 2 种数据是以 .fig 文件 + 图片列表的形式保存，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"当要恢复备份的数据时，需要人工将图片导入 .fig 文件，并且手动放置到对应的位置。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"25c745cb-bdac-4452-b60f-dea9fd7b757b","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20220803172156.png#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"40%","height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a7cb0147-4182-4471-8f1a-99d3e4c06361"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这造成了大量的人力成本，再加上 Figma API 对于请求频率的限制以及大量的图片需要处理，使得备份速度难以提升。这些原因使得此备份方案也难以满足需求。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"dce91d81-e770-4e0e-bf37-f0ccc150884d","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用脚本模拟鼠标点击"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"47e56908-42e3-4b89-884a-57a75e99fff4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最后尝试使用 Python 的 PyUserInput 模块模拟鼠标点击进行备份"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7010ecbb-2fb6-457b-a317-ee4f4609e565","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e3c212a7-8e23-484f-82d8-e0491ecf0835"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"获取所有 Figma 文件（可设置只获取最近 N 天有更新的文件进行备份）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"50d6568e-5329-40b5-aa6b-320e6b9b39d9","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ea193c5a-69c8-4e3d-8d88-cabac6a7cb27"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"关闭标签：当浏览器标签数量开启达到一定数量时，自动关闭标签，避免内存爆满导致电脑死机"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e17472fb-03f2-4797-b70e-1652025c92fa","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"89f92669-ae42-4c95-82f6-23f43de6b376"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自动排除已下载的文件：鼠标点击的方式难以保证一次性可以下载所有文件，所以需要多次执行脚本，执行时将排除已下载的文件，从而减少人工检查的工作"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a9f6c282-2a3f-4ef2-a030-74a96062d9de","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"结果"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c22dbad0-9ead-42dc-bf50-21982327cf3d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"完成了 2000+文件的备份（使用闲置设备，耗时 1 天完成）。并且脚本可复用，提升备份效率降低数据风险。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c27f787b-22e7-458a-8e35-8c30893f794e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"由于备份需要先开启 Figma 文件，而开启的加载时长难以确定，机器只会在指定的间隔时间点击指定的位置，可能出现文件未加载完成状态下执行点击，导致文件下载失败。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"961c4db7-e511-4fbd-b2b1-af945745652a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"未来考虑加入计算机视觉模块，让机器人可以感到界面状态，如果已经加载完毕，则再执行点击操作。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b452b93f-5e3d-4316-92b6-13e4e80a49c7","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"afcabd4b-5e5c-414b-adef-9ea7e0a148d5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过模拟鼠标点击的方式进行任务的批量处理，可以绕开 API 请求频率等因素的限制，可以作为后续可选的一个自动化解决方案。"}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9af239e9-27c5-4f24-abb4-028a5a5d1d49","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用说明书"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6f2ada07-717b-4bd2-b5d7-e3390dbda16e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"写给产品开发团队中的朋友们"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"ed947837-4047-4d31-a450-aa465199b2ce"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ab1ff659-5a73-475f-8e82-9e3d85bab8f8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我的工作没办法一个人完成，各个环节都需要你的帮助。"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"7b70025c-eb78-444a-a828-a6e677ef5023","params":"markdown"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1. 我们要解决什么问题：
2. 解决问题的收益是什么:
3. 业务为用户打造的动机:
4. 用户的使用场景和使用障碍是什么:
5. 需求上线的话，还能用在哪些场景:"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"38d93a5e-a385-4346-9018-d2b29535be54","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"💬 需求沟通"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"02aeb94c-17fe-410c-99b5-07c0abb83cf0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我关注需求的背景，我们要解决什么问题？为什么会产生这些问题？解决这些问题带来的收益是什么？"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b5bca4d1-f2d1-4c93-9a74-e6d41c5f1e18","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"✏️ 设计分析"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2be05f39-abc9-4427-bbe3-494c648f2e0d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"基于对需求的理解，根据需求的复杂程度，会从历史数据、竞品分析、用户反馈等多种维度进行分析（当然并不是所有需求都会用到所有的分析方法）；在这一步，我会将业务目标、用户目标转化为设计目标，完成转化必不可少的是思考"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"业务为用户打造的动机"},{"type":"text","text":"（例如发放礼包促进用户消费，礼包内的奖励、优惠就是动机之一）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4b6e957b-dadc-4bfc-ae79-c37aa93e9aee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以，我希望需求方可以告诉我用户参与的动机是什么？我将在具体的设计中贯彻、强化这些动机。如果是基础功能需求，请帮助我理解用户的使用场景和使用障碍是什么。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"278f9546-d17d-4ca9-bb21-d7680d865a07"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为了降低产品的复杂度和维护成本，我还会思考以下两个问题"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"fda50fcc-5667-4ac2-846d-55bdcc0808c9","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"124b20f8-adda-4a4c-9884-7dbd94d42d58"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这个需求能否用已有功能实现：如果不能，请告诉我不能的原因以及新方案的优势"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b9ea3375-8e51-4cce-8c64-ecab73fb24ea","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"510fe9f5-bad2-4bfb-874f-43e761aa700e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这个需求上线的话，还能用在哪些场景：新方案尽可能通用，从而减少后续重复造轮子的工作"}]}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"cb23c391-10be-415d-abdf-9e63b599c321","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/ZbsbvV20221113152420.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"be66cc29-8d3d-439a-9eef-a95f129c8f3a","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🌁 设计输出"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"92fd1732-e17c-46e8-998e-7ca455363194","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"确认初稿"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fd3558c8-8c01-4715-aa48-eb74c6dfda20"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"口头沟通确认大致方向后，我会先输出初稿，你需要确认大致的方向（页面结构、关键信息点是否曝光、功能/信息优先级是否符合需求……）是否正确，不必在意过多细节。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"81b71169-92a2-4aff-aa76-b73b2e4c5acb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"细节包括但不限于：文案话术、公屏消息感知、"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0cfb3558-b30a-4b7e-b9d5-057dfca20355","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输出定稿"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"47849a6d-c77e-450a-a5d7-a67714ceae0e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"初稿确认后，我会继续完善细节（补充交互逻辑描述、异常流程等），之后基本就达到最终文档的效果了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"208b6f62-3461-4bea-984e-212cca4e8563"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"初稿主要会把功能主流程、各状态用户看得见的信息进行梳理，定稿则会补充用户看不见的规则与逻辑，以及其他非主流程的信息。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"961210ed-a040-443e-8cb6-9059dc92e212","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/RR3rTv20221113152500.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"7a31698a-051a-47f0-be41-8426dd784c30","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🥽 交互评审/技术评审"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"46d66454-b785-4ef1-8d4a-927ed386420a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"上面的完成稿，还不算「完成」。在评审阶段希望可以得到更多来自 QA、技术同学的意见，这些意见可能是逻辑的遗漏或是基于项目排期过高的开发成本，我们可以讨论并完善方案，在需求、设计、工程之间找到最好的平衡点。非常欢迎技术、QA 同学在正式开发之前对需求文档、交互文档进行分析、提出问题和挑战。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"db642eb9-e8f9-4588-b09d-8490f917555c","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🎨 UI/视觉/动画阶段"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a553d8e8-7892-4041-afa4-d89311eb2905"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我会尽可能和对接的设计师描述需求和注意点，如果没有，请主动联系我。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"cf1cca93-2268-44c5-bee0-bcc9ea08a033","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🦅 开发/测试/验收"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b61badde-1a03-4ca6-b938-0c6d7bdeca57"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"待补充"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"446000ce-9be1-4970-aabf-dbb60f743c82","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"📈 上线"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f4949fd1-72bd-4481-8bff-70529eb39a9c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们都付出了非常多的努力，我会尽量通过数据埋点、用户反馈了解上线的效果；如果可以，我希望可以得到更多的反馈，包括但不限于需求上线数据、用户评价、合作方意见。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3dd49be8-54ee-4397-86d1-26213b983d0c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最后，希望合作愉快 🤝"}]}]}
cards.title: 使用说明书

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"82acc292-bd4f-4a8e-83df-c9fc2e726797","level":1},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"697909cc-84ff-4302-b978-450139f15884","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":"原则在具体方案设计中的应用"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"66412b17-3bf5-471c-960b-023880f034f5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们之前讨论过原子设计在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.notion.so/Figma-107ea8f8359f415c98924c41bc954863","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"设计系统"},{"type":"text","text":"中的应用，还包括在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E5%8E%9F%E5%AD%90%E8%AE%BE%E8%AE%A1&%E6%95%88%E7%8E%87%E5%B7%A5%E5%85%B7%20%E2%9A%9B%20b9894cda-3a85-44c2-a711-5c8bfdad891f.md","title":"原子设计&效率工具 ⚛","data-internal-href":"meta://card/b9894cda-3a85-44c2-a711-5c8bfdad891f","edited":true}}],"text":"工作效率领域"},{"type":"text","text":"的应用，今天想分享下原子设计原则在具体的方案设计中的应用。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d7af4dd8-2321-42e7-8e4c-349dd75f8d67","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是什么"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"5d0295af-2504-42c7-af3e-b7af10430ee4"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"486c8ce7-b805-48d7-a194-ae1ff856b3c2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"少就是多"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1c947fee-ea0b-4faa-9c17-35cd123de41f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相信这句话大家都听说过，首先什么应该「少」？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff431b90-3081-4189-816f-461c1f1746f2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"少的对象就是原子，原子可以是界面的元素、功能或点击、滑动等原子交互。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"89e54d35-a49f-4129-9128-7b87020c532e","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"22f2d9ee-c19a-4a1c-98ad-78d1ea98ffcd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么「少」了就会「多」（带来好处）？以下举几个案例进行说明。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"50beadba-71fd-4eed-91a6-a007a4fd9fd2","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提升效率、灵活度"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8bfed8d3-9b58-46c4-bb27-3ec1aee66f6f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在 Figma 中构建一个圆形，至少有两种方法"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6005a50c-bd1b-4166-bab1-bf9eaad56820","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"40324e4b-1185-4710-8066-63fb5a1344af"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"直接拖拽一个圆形到画布中"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"50e1cbde-7530-496a-b26c-73f9a4e89c63","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cdf3af28-9327-42b1-874f-99761748c014"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"拖拽一个矩形，然后修改矩形的圆角大于边长的一半"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"19a06058-4f89-481f-837a-de7a6d379ad1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我通常会使用第 2 个方法，因为在后续的设计维护中，如果要将圆形改为矩形，则可以通过简单的修改圆角即可实现，而无需删除旧图形拖入新的图形。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"25287124-4427-4cf0-b9a1-34665c691fac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在这个案例中，使用方法 1 涉及到 2 个原子——圆形、矩形；而方法 2 则只涉及 1 个原子——矩形。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"1c4c2ee9-09e5-49e0-8b1d-042c9c9f5cdf","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/EXYUVB20220410185652.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b4cdd3a8-7861-4246-9b9a-6717bed70bab"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以减少原子可以提升效率和灵活度，因为更少的原子减少了相互切换的摩擦。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4413e053-b9d2-4da4-b500-7bce499ba591","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"减低用户的理解、操作负担"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d3bc7913-eaa2-4829-ae05-9e90d599998c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"图形界面的操作效率相比命令行界面来说并没有进步，甚至退步。但图形界面减少了用户操作的原子数量 ，让软件更易于使用和学习。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ac1251b9-dc05-4f57-a7b6-7d3cb99d3bca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为在面向命令行的操作中，用户需要精确地通过至少 26 个按键（输入命令字符）来控制计算机，而图形界面则提供了少的多的选择，减少了用户出错的可能。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"20811153-ecd7-4a00-b9af-fbb05a50cac9","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/DCgKe720220410185224.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c8e80e72-4128-42b6-9da6-7f6b24be202a","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"降低系统设计的复杂度"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fd538f67-2ece-4b7b-b0c7-e8ed8fa84bc2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们知道直线、曲线这 2 种线条，而对于计算机来说，直线等于曲率为 0 的曲线。通过调整曲率这一参数即可获得不同的线条形态。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"05b3abfe-409b-4322-860e-64163cf40a39"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与第一个案例相同，通过减少原子的数量降低了系统设计的复杂度（开发 1 个功能和开发 2 个功能的差别）。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"96b45bbf-8df6-4bc8-a589-d54f7ea94020","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"怎么做"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c31b37aa-ef5b-4a36-97be-3f3db14b1178"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何减少原子从而达到「多」的效果呢？通过 3 个步骤思考问题"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6843c225-fc23-4e9f-abbf-da327f74d91b","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d16172fa-0584-4dac-8821-b18ab2785aca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能不能不做"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"77f5e043-ddb6-46ba-ba12-80e42a4295fb","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"73925373-edb7-44d2-92bf-5f89a2305405"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能否用已有功能满足"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"06353b7c-5765-42d2-912a-29c341bd40b8","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4f096fd1-6f41-4ffb-bc1a-09907a1ab1dd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能否用于其他场景"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ef1e67cf-543e-46f5-8354-fc3a204df76d","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能不能不做"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"609b5dd5-527f-4e1e-aa09-df120e5277ca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"需求要解决的问题、要达到的目的是什么？具体的场景是什么？"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0812f82c-f325-4de3-8095-00cd6abdeaaf","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能否用已有功能满足"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bb51a2d4-d4b7-4cfb-9436-8f6ccde4049d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用已有功能满足而不增加产品本身的复杂度。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"02ec9b4e-3794-47d6-b113-5f9cfd0ce186","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能否用于其他场景"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e176ab9-9abb-4409-9d27-e85408c5494c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果要做，能否扩大功能的使用场景？这样后续有新需求则可以使用此功能满足，而无需增加新的功能。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"71fed444-f205-4c4d-9cb0-45e44b3588f9","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"案例"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bae839d7-20de-4e38-9e9d-065c30c60490","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Figma 字符搜索、替换插件"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9b14b312-fbe6-4576-82bc-d3c09e5e7b06"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"插件支持搜索 Figma 文档中的文本，针对用户不同的搜索场景，需要支持设置搜索范围——在选中的图层中搜索、在整个页面中搜索。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"f32e2f66-3ac9-4b50-be48-b520e14368a8","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/bUJTha20220410185749.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f0c5f9ce-fb20-407f-9dd1-b2b8401b9eca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于用户「设置搜索范围」的功能需求，基于「能否用已有功能满足」进行思考 🤔，发现可以通过用户是否在 Figma 的画布中选中图层来预判用户的意图，如果存在选中的图层则在选中方位内搜索，否则搜索整个页面。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"808ee106-2fc5-4cc2-9d8c-7094f05ddcd0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这样既符合用户的直觉也没有增加产品的使用复杂度、开发成本。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fa56c73b-3328-4db8-934c-45f68eaf8899"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://blog.dabing.one/figma_20220109","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"插件介绍文章"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9dab1dbf-3b60-4517-b9d7-6a29fc3de87d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cc621a03-9217-47d0-98ae-1b5c827b1421"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过减少原子的数量来提升易用性和降低系统复杂度、降低维护成本；通过思考 1. 能不能不做；2. 能否用已有功能满足；3.能否用于其他场景；过滤需求以达到减少原子的目的。"}]}]}
cards.title: 原子设计原则在具体方案设计中的应用

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"294c2946-2369-4b16-a2a6-3e2afb66faab","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"原子设计&效率工具"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1ac3221d-2332-401c-9b20-30251c1fef8f","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原子设计是什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5de6823b-b810-48ec-8bd4-ff16e136d0d5"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"697909cc-84ff-4302-b978-450139f15884","cardTitle":"原子设计"}},{"type":"text","text":"最早由 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"http://bradfrost.com/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Brad Frost"},{"type":"text","text":" 提出，灵感来自于化学。就像物质由原子组成分子再组合成有机物，Brad Frost 运用原子的思路组织设计系统，在设计领域得到广泛的应用。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"4bb10dde-8e06-426b-bdd5-07ee2f3f0ba4","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/l1Yfzb20220305113044.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ba2894a9-314f-474f-8f10-019be284ae19"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以登录表单为例，它由按钮、文本框这 2 个原子组成，而同样的原子，也可以组合成消息发送框。我们的设计不是维护登录功能或消息发送功能，而是在维护按钮、文本框这 2 个原子。 这大大降低了设计的维护成本同时也提高了设计的一致性。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"4c83e607-85eb-4956-ae04-4c51e7ede23d","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/dYXVNq20220305151142.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9264fbba-b5af-44ee-9622-f44930d0eb81"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原子设计改变了我理解世界的方式，除了设计领域我还发现不少工具、产品也在运用原子的思维。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0b02d319-5d0e-4d48-96df-9298c3a983d8","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原子思维的核心价值"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5e2abb5c-7287-493e-bedd-2261898e1d15"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"正如上述例子中，简单的按钮、文本框可以组合成我们熟悉的各种功能，原子的意义在于"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"充分链接后创造的无数可能性"},{"type":"text","text":"，原子不是目的，原子独立、自由从而更容易"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"产生不同的组合、链接"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8eed0fae-fad8-41c1-9b40-2aa5454de421","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"案例：flomo & Notion"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9adf7a49-0ef1-4543-b708-ec20e1398118"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://help.flomoapp.com/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 是一款轻量笔记应用，开发者为了保持产品的简单易用，克制了许多新功能的开发冲动；但这也导致部分用户的需求无法被满足。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fe8a188f-514a-4b75-a557-2396e44b3a57"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在一次更新中，flomo 支持将数据与 Notion 同步，用户在 flomo 完成简单高效的笔记录入后，可以使用 Notion 强大的筛选功能检索笔记，利用 Notion 丰富的视图浏览笔记。既不增加产品复杂度，又满足了用户的需求；"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"938bf408-f77b-40e3-bebb-60460b5aa46f","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/l2fHMi20220305150644.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c8068a81-c9df-4293-bb8d-879f32e65bed"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在这个案例中，可以把 flomo 「简单高效的录入笔记」和 Notion 「筛选」、「丰富视图」看成原子功能，通过链接产生了 1+1 > 2 的效果。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"097b0351-be45-4e4c-a991-7f30fc5e68f6","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"案例：多工具打造写作流程"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0f7972da-a7e5-43ba-8069-dfe737958351"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"简悦开发者在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://sspai.com/post/71576","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"这篇文章"},{"type":"text","text":"中介绍道，他不执着于工具的 All in one，而是利用不同工具的优势为自己服务。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ed7f833e-a224-4c0e-bdf3-e1d673e249ea"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以写作为例，他会先在 A 笔记中记录灵感，在 B 笔记中整理，最后通过 C 笔记写作输出。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"819c237c-b2d9-4166-9090-b752f50ffec7","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/SURqvc20220305151908.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"00f55c8d-27d8-4f28-ac1c-ad4fd097098f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"笔记数据通过 Markdown 这一"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"通用格式"},{"type":"text","text":"实现在不同笔记工具之间的流转，通过链接不同工具的原子功能/特性实现了高效的写作工作流。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c993e179-f162-4b9b-908d-63364c88f747","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"软件如何帮助原子创造价值"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f384987b-5f64-453c-8028-db969aa0a139","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通用格式"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f9778d2e-c2e4-4b0f-bdfd-dafde1363d29"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在简悦开发者的案例中，通过 Markdown 这一通用格式让数据可以在不同的原子间流通，为原子功能处理数据提供了条件。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"57dd586f-d5bf-4cbe-9ecb-1c77baef7ec8","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"创造服务而不是软件"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52428257-adf4-46c7-bad1-0b837a743bd1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不局限于具体的页面、客户端等载体，让服务可以触达用户需要的各个场景。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c56eb678-c66e-44e2-b80e-659f094fbfb5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Figma 官方开放了 API 支持用户将 Figma 的文件管理集成到自己的工作流中，我配合 Eagle 的写入 API 实现了"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://blog.dabing.one/Figma-To-Eagle-20211230","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"在 Eagle 中管理 FIgma 文件"},{"type":"text","text":"，利用 Eagle 的文件管理功能补足了 FIgma 的不足。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d08d3597-7f77-43ab-933a-3268a7746e99","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"本地文件"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e67e97c4-439a-4a4b-a386-2a11b3a0983e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与开放 API 相同，本地文件支持用户自由的处理、迁移数据，实现数据的自由流通。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a224bdc5-90ae-4eb9-a09c-e680003deea6","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"小结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dae7aef8-588a-4d14-b494-060df951de45"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原子的意义在于"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"充分链接后创造的无数可能性"},{"type":"text","text":"，开发者需要通过开放 API 等方式搭建原子间的桥梁，支持通用格式/本地文件为数据在不同原子间的流通提供基础条件。"}]}]}
cards.title: 原子设计&效率工具

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d2db830b-30bf-419c-8538-7e7cc8924624","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原子设计"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7bfc2fb8-5c6b-4cc3-88e0-fc12ca7b471b"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://atomicdesign.bradfrost.com/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"原子设计"},{"type":"text","text":"最早由 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"http://bradfrost.com/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Brad Frost"},{"type":"text","text":" 提出，灵感来自于化学。就像物质由原子组成分子再组合成有机物，Brad Frost 运用原子的思路组织设计系统，在设计领域得到广泛的应用。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e56ab29f-fd25-4d63-be1b-381a9e8910ca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实践原子设计理论需要具备结构化思维"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"71eb8df3-5d93-49c0-995c-124050535e55"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ATOMS 原子"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6b3dc7f8-9264-43fe-b60c-ce9213986054","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b07f5143-c8d4-4c55-851c-47fee1c91ce1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最小的、不可分割的元素"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e7871c1b-9072-4e23-a92f-084e11d312de","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4377d4f8-502c-49ab-a654-1c69e5e252fb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例：文字、颜色、input、span 等 HTML 标签"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"11b1b5f6-757e-443d-a6e1-7d53f25458fb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"MOLECULES 分子"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e29b17dc-0789-4141-bc58-f06a9ea2ac2d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a5990ca0-f4b1-4fe8-b324-033a5eefd62c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"由 2 个或以上的原子构成，结合在一起后抽象的原子就具备了 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"目的性"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"763641d9-66cd-49ba-a8aa-4bf2edcc60a3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"854e0106-cac3-4af6-908d-e69b3a14bdf7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例：文本框+按钮可获得一个搜索分子"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4610688c-f24a-4e02-84ec-22fc50c9d34d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ORGANISMS 组件"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8e0e1f36-66c8-4e4b-9f8b-0a7cdbcb5d6a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b476fb88-8231-4dad-bc67-7ce8bc767baa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"由分子、原子构成的相对复杂的元素"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"068eca81-66d3-4c59-8213-d58bafc90b42","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e0cc2697-0f56-47c0-a56d-48e667cb706c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例：头部 Tab 栏分子+搜索分子构成了页面的头部组件（由不同的分子构成）；多个商品卡片分子构成的商品列表组件（由多个相同分子构成）"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"14ceeb25-f229-4b5b-9ced-dbe2b850a511"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"TEMPLATES 模板"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"da2f6985-f40d-4e15-8bbb-e42df02a62d6","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ab00daf8-fa31-400d-878b-17ebc56ca04a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"呈现页面最终的结构，相当于页面的骨骼、原型图"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"13010bb2-ed10-4a15-85e4-304fa2e98324","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"efdbeac7-ae57-486c-a4ed-98dbd7fa2433"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例：首页模板"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1a336ad9-ca7d-413c-b853-8b7b6b0b177c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PAGES 页面"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f9955b73-4e98-46e0-a8af-0e365a1d39f6","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7d6359bb-134a-4cf9-b28d-765ce4d21446"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"页面是模板的实例，显示了实际内容；对于 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"测试设计系统的有效性"},{"type":"text","text":" 至关重要，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"创建有弹性的设计体系"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"617c5ab8-be6d-44ff-849f-0e91f8d8ad88","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a16e0c9a-a753-4ede-b38b-85d3c2a3733a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"页面需要考虑极端情况（例如空数据状态和较多数据的情况）所有这些情况底层模板是相同的，但由于数据不同会有不同的页面呈现，测试这些页面是否能正常显示，否则优化你的设计系统"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e3f4aab0-081d-468d-ad97-caf95558d552"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在 Figma 的工作流中，可以爬取外网数据然后结合这个插件"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/735770583268406934/Google-Sheets-Sync","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Google-Sheets-Sync"},{"type":"text","text":" 渲染真实数据，搭建页面"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"28a6d713-6e9c-4c67-a193-b13cbcb98a3f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原子设计的优势"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"41695bad-01b1-4e03-bc18-49b2918945f4","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"90277a81-7341-4de6-be91-bbc09937e5f6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能够在部分和整体之间快速切换，类似我们绘制界面时需要查看全局看看整体逻辑和效果，也需要放大处理细节；不是线性的步骤，而是一个结构化的语言，原子存在于每一个模型中"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d55f74a5-fe94-4595-8b58-c851560fa3f5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5ce498dd-9ce5-4095-bc8e-7e36a1e89768"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"清晰分离结构和内容"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"812dc5f5-1da1-4469-a1c4-f78b2698fd99","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/anz5dj20220507014628.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":483,"originalWidth":1200,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1a133d33-6daf-4598-9029-5113f191c025"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"\n"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"754104be-853f-44ff-ac98-6acc75b4e88a","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/1JmCvx20220507014634.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":881,"originalWidth":1200,"alignment":"center"}}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"90c2910d-26a8-4a7b-9eaf-d255dc498b86"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"67e9266d-c81d-42a0-bfd7-b1171b05c6a5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created
