cards.title: 原子设计

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3225e991-bdcd-4028-85a2-1ccb5f9c0f44","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Figma 插件开发与运营笔记 🏄‍♂️"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0761fa2f-c6f0-4566-8faf-7431139a7a4e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"近期开发了一个 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1052801241204192805/Find-and-Replace","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Figma 字符搜索、替换插件"},{"type":"text","text":"，截止目前已有 4.2K 安装量（2022-05-02）以下整理了开发、运营过程中的问题与经验。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8e56f6ca-9990-4a60-8bf6-b1555142b164","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"开发笔记"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"709efe53-e3ab-4a7d-92f1-9a08f3933126"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.notion.so/abd53d6cc7c243f98fc287bedca518d4","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"📗 flomo 的公开笔记"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a3731b18-fa16-4715-b4b3-5480c1112f5a","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"需求挖掘"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"48cddcb5-42fc-414a-9139-72c1640eb632"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"插件用户量较少，得到的反馈也较少，此时可以"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"通过热门竞品的评论区"},{"type":"text","text":"了解用户的述求以挖掘插件的更多可能性。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d3bd1ce9-8487-4cca-9230-c1b3a8873051"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如通过竞品评论区发现用户对于"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"在整个文档中进行搜索、替换"},{"type":"text","text":"的呼声较高，而竞品均只支持在选中页面进行搜索（应该是出于性能考虑），于是我很快就着手开发了对应功能，性能方面由于交互逻辑和实现方式与竞品不同（竞品使用的是文本框值变化事件，会频繁的执行搜索操作导致用户界面卡死，而我做的插件只有在点击 Find 按钮后才会执行搜索）所以没有遇到问题。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"18b82388-0cbe-4a31-915d-0b0a97da76e0","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"交互设计"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0eb71e18-53f3-4b8f-86ec-d1f71febb720","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将部分交互转移给主界面"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"389fae5b-43d5-4e07-97ce-20013f23921b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"插件依托在 Figma 的主界面中，可以将部分功能转移给主界面，以减少原子交互，降低插件的复杂度，提升易用性。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d58661fb-b64b-483c-9220-98d9fb6bcf78"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如插件对于设置搜索范围的操作，通过 Figna 主界面是否选中图层进行设置（选中图层则在选中范围内搜索，否则搜索整个页面），没有增加额外的设置项/功能。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"729ad1c0-f36a-4d40-91f7-093014be5768","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/OcEv8A20220502182800.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"42570968-c5bb-417d-aaf8-c644a6ad43a1","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"理清主次场景"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"37d2effe-784c-45dc-b3bd-fd48b12ff5e3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从用户反馈和实际体验中发现，插件在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"大型文档中搜索、替换的耗时较长，非常影响用户体验"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"6cfc15d7-f5a3-4f4d-bc00-becd050ff4d8","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/HSXPhf20220502183732.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d8413e72-b5b6-469c-9496-bc10137a501b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"首先插件的性能无论如何优化，用户的文档复杂度始终是开发者无法控制的，所以优化加载体验是必须进行的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c41f1232-fe6c-4de1-8f19-d04902571a9d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过改写搜索逻辑（异步不阻塞）避免了加载过程中界面「卡死」的问题。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"95ef90de-6aaa-468e-8bb9-94420268abd6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在加载体验的选择上没有使用进度条，而是使用普通的 Loading （用户不可预估剩余耗时）形式，因为大型文档毕竟较少（例如设计组件库）日常大家更多在编辑常规的设计稿，属于"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"次要场景"},{"type":"text","text":"，所以在反馈形式的选择上，优先考虑"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"主要场景"},{"type":"text","text":"——中小型文档；在主要场景中使用轻量的 Loading 即可满足需求，同时也不会增加产品的复杂度和开发成本。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"59f97d91-bd8b-4099-b918-cb583c963347","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/tjZ9C220220502184452.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0b0962b4-6347-4ae0-b023-72072a9c6f7d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另外在搜索的逻辑上，过于考虑细节，造成大量的性能消耗用在了细枝末节的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"次要需求"},{"type":"text","text":"上。例如为了搜索隐藏的图层而大大增加了整体搜索的耗时；在认清主次需求关系后，放弃了搜索隐藏图层的需求，使得最终搜索的**耗时降低至原来的 40%**（技术细节可"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/plugin-docs/api/properties/DocumentNode-findallwithcriteria/#docsNav","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"参考官方文档"},{"type":"text","text":"）。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3be8efa9-ba33-41b0-bbf0-79245d28d6bb","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"UI 设计"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"85a6b481-db65-4fd1-af6d-014e6afac7a1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以获取非官方的开发组件或 Figma 官方的设计规范快速搭建符合 Figma 规范的 UI"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1fa4726a-9d7f-4e1d-841f-1668bb995d56"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/plugin-docs/figma-components/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Figma Components · Figma Plugins"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"31968c8e-7d69-4097-b048-e1bf1a85f02c","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"开发"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"493872a5-e15f-4e25-973c-3fc9b167faae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Figma 插件的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/plugin-docs/intro/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"官方文档"},{"type":"text","text":"已经足够详尽，大多数问题都可以通过阅读文档解决。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f9dfa0c7-240c-417e-b5fb-3746a1ba16ac","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"测试"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dea90794-6e8e-487b-98e8-7c78656099a9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"插件在 Figma 中完成设计，最终也在 Figma 中运行，所以在测试上也通过 Figma 搭建测试模板，走查容易出现的问题。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"887ec214-30eb-4d75-b1df-8ff7498b4aea","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/8nyWAS20220502185840.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0c1bde43-bc84-41c5-8c6c-78571ac3b629"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"基于插件的几个核心功能设计测试用例，并在 Figma 中创建用于测试的图层，逐一验证功能表现是否正常；此外还在以一个页面中放置了大量图层用以测试在极端环境下的性能。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ac7a5902-16ed-4ef6-a8dc-66807d6d45b2","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"运营思路"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a58ac94c-518d-4c9e-8b4c-50d92f9d3489"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Figma 全站的插件新增量与星期的关系"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"63a49582-8e1c-4d7a-9af4-928936cb05de","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/IHwRpS20221113153933.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"17f47a5f-df17-4964-983f-5b6189b0f999"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"每周二、三推送更新较为合适"},{"type":"text","text":"，因为最近更新的插件可以获得更多的曝光，加上又是用户安装的活跃期，在此时推送更新可以获得更多的安装量。"}]}]}
cards.title: Figma 插件开发与运营笔记 🏄‍♂️

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"7205a0df-4eb6-4bc5-a7d5-5d4a58c2530c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不能单点做项目"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"15c51ee0-07b5-48d3-8eb3-b8ffa4471c4d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不能单点做项目，应该站在更整体的角度，清晰自己执行的事务在整个路线中的哪一个位置，才能更好的理解问题和方案。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"23270af6-fea5-4dbf-968d-473b4c508915"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://open.spotify.com/episode/2NdNv6pT7bIC0cFctYBPP1?siVWCAOsVURM6TwalNeFd9vw&;utm_sourcecopy-link","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://open.spotify.com/episode/2NdNv6pT7bIC0cFctYBPP1?siVWCAOsVURM6TwalNeFd9vw&;utm_sourcecopy-link"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"62382bff-637e-4b8a-b13a-032da7bf881e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6925b0e7-f4fa-4bcc-a7eb-28d91f15bfd6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=OTc5MzQ5Mg","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-11-18 22:07:41"}]}]}
cards.title: 不能单点做项目

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bc917928-a1e3-4d90-a1b0-42b8f92694c8","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"双向链接"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e8b11082-fafe-453e-a2a1-65533a0b830b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"双向链接：在传统的单向链接中，只有引用者知道自己的引用对象，而被引用的内容则不知道自己是否被引用、被何引用。而双向链接实现了双方的「公开、透明」。\n这种链接让各个原子知识的链接更充分，帮助大脑梳理知识的脉络，将网状零散的知识整理成树状、线性的文章。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"a2b99f97-691c-4ea8-af3d-2861e2a8b9f9"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58eb8ba8-5e0b-4efd-a752-842319e49cb1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTc1Njk2MzY","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-03-05 10:43:02"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"6129b427-3da9-4c9d-9650-2e7c084f9ead"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"68a6f341-0b89-42f1-b1cc-c70e4b47683b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提供被引用信息有什么好处"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7605cc36-3a06-4386-8459-42906fec4dff","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f945b7d6-35c1-4d6e-a1e4-e4f2af793cf7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"了解信息的价值，通常被引数量高则代表信息的价值越高"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"94f0a500-c04f-4de3-9c70-b724aa603b2c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e88416e7-773d-49cf-9748-0a92805c9ad0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以了解当前信息的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/ba47f356-ce76-4636-af0d-b67d7fcb6c57#0a0f5e77-e68f-4453-851c-dc85a1541ad5","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"后续发展"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4fcb0d5a-2398-4c17-bcc9-e59f4c1beae1","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"886e96e4-54ca-482f-b002-5cda7eef9fff"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"促成"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1a187bdb-4015-4f18-a47e-dda30c57f876"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ddb455f5-372f-4831-a441-8ca2308bb58b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ef8c494b-5fab-4743-bc37-06dacd4f451a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e915ff1c-2850-4891-8375-173303a41118"}},{"type":"text","text":"认为双向链接保护了原始的知识传承，避免信息数字化导致其丢失了原本在印刷媒介中应该获得的报酬，因为单向链接很容易断开。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6bd2db94-9ac2-49d8-8003-caefa7a020bd","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5ac5b575-e4bc-4b32-badf-9dfd4de98839"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这也是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8ec47316-790d-4226-91e0-6b62cbb3c786"}},{"type":"text","text":"这一跨版权系统被创造的目的"}]}]}]}]}
cards.title: 双向链接

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"920f48d4-9395-4693-9bd9-e9dae1e602e2","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"创造的 4 个阶段"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ef53b20d-9574-457c-98ab-4e012c38c17c","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"831b4c9f-f403-46d5-91d6-b90d74959630"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"准备期"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"22e50f91-b9a5-457a-b966-78a592c8dbe4","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6a920c51-0037-4bb0-a3ab-9eec30578033"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7","cardTitle":"卡片笔记"}},{"type":"text","text":"的积累就是一种准备"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e92880bd-745d-41dd-8966-68b64e31cd54","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ec044c40-d0e2-46e4-8670-ccb9377f944f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"酝酿期"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dae6d69f-636c-4f51-8c83-8b98d043b642","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"12c5e315-cf17-499c-912f-fdbeea04a3e6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"暂时抛下准备期发现的问题，开始做其他事情"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"12724c68-f273-4fae-81a1-fa3e7840b0a4","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fb29e682-fd0b-417a-abaa-2847690d9fb6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有趣的是很多突破点都在酝酿期完成"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"08adc219-a9c5-4a92-820a-f2f42667a84e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"51c21f7c-bfb8-458c-af90-dc690eae9320"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一种说法认为是因为酝酿期占据了我们更多的时间"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7a534518-fad3-45f1-9a50-3833a94c4b16","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"103dfd78-1465-40c3-9a99-d483e729253c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另一种观点认为酝酿期让我们"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"放下了错误的想法，让大脑可以重启"},{"type":"text","text":"，从而有机会找到正确的方向"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bdca38f2-bf62-4de9-985c-b9b65813427a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"74a8112c-d014-4e94-a46d-809783a48816"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"灵感期"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6fe90810-9412-4905-9c1c-c1d65b6010bb","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f509b05-259b-451e-94f0-cb650ee412a7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当灵感来临，一切都被点亮"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"849028ab-2c05-4d52-8b2b-586d878a900d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8de3da49-9217-424d-b2bc-c379d7e29245"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"f3416b6c-0432-4db6-be73-86c3261101cf","cardTitle":"灵感/真理"}}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1550d739-a592-4ef1-9226-e425d86bb5cc","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4e20cb36-8de6-44cb-bac5-41044d9e2cf6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"验证期"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dc84b9b3-15ef-428d-8c04-50b1a346e437","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dc2d7459-aaf5-4303-aeb4-5ff40ad3816c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"验证灵感是否可靠"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9330056a-e218-4c0f-a704-5b9a90efb17f"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096","cardTitle":"《认知心理学》"}},{"type":"text","text":"P701"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"061fddb6-483a-4672-9a63-9876cdee45e6"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fc9bace5-14b3-4b0e-a456-88dcbf1b1743"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"许多案例只着重于描述灵感期的灵光一现，例如牛顿与苹果，缺忽略了准备期和验证期所付出的大量努力。从另外一个角度说，可能由于"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7fe0bad5-f569-4b9c-aa4e-e799e3112bb8","cardTitle":"幸存者偏见"}},{"type":"text","text":"这类戏剧化的故事更容易被人们记住、传播。"}]}]}
cards.title: 创造的 4 个阶段

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5d159b2c-3c69-450d-a51a-7e30e5c8bf14","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"文本相关度分析助力学习与笔记"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"81aa30c0-19c3-415c-8a31-f8dc94586861"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"项目地址："},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://github.com/draJiang/flomo-linker","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://github.com/draJiang/flomo-linker"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"ff0d8eb6-08aa-4854-adb6-937084e1dfce","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/s%27s%27pai20220221000701.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5b3c0f6c-bb7c-4fe5-8448-a67ba59f0c7a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"文本相关度，顾名思义，就是可以对比两段文本的相关程度。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"93416beb-cf7c-46db-97a6-4ad32f4effa7","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/NfvAC220220220224554.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"349fbcb3-feba-401f-a91b-33bb39319291"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"接下来分享一个案例，介绍文本相关度分析在学习、记笔记场景下的应用。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"378401ba-cfd2-4932-b050-bb9857ec138c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"41a08b63-6b7a-4346-a6f7-70f8e240e065"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7","cardTitle":"卡片笔记"}},{"type":"text","text":"快 1 年，实践下来感受非常不错，帮助完成了许多启发和学习收获，但过程中也存在一些困难。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9cde268e-9138-4f01-98ce-707f08cd6e36","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"S 情境"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cce895c1-94f7-4eb1-b245-4f6b8603a33a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"卡片笔记发挥作用的关键原则是建立卡片与卡片之间的链接（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2ffab447-a5cb-41e1-b790-4047343c038f","cardTitle":"双向链接"}},{"type":"text","text":"），新笔记（新知识）和旧笔记（已有知识）链接，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"新知识加入已有的知识体系才算真正的理解并在未来有机会辅助实践"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5360233b-c48a-4250-8b6f-dd72a238caef"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以每次"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"新建笔记后，与已有笔记完成链接是一个重要的环节。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d6271a39-543b-4d00-a4cf-072c906d30d1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目前的流程是靠大脑回忆是否存在相关的笔记，而人脑由于记忆力等原因，总是会存在缺漏。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"64adfd75-94b6-408d-b1c9-a85c5dbc8ddf","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/%E6%96%87%E6%9C%AC%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3%E5%BA%A6%E5%88%86%E6%9E%90%E5%8A%A9%E5%8A%9B%E7%AC%94%E8%AE%B0%E4%B8%8E%E5%AD%A6%E4%B9%A0.00320220220232203.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"899a4519-4146-47b9-b6ba-3a8b092c97ea","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"T 任务"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"92067900-ba58-42b5-b285-cb352d1eced2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"受到"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://sspai.com/post/71093","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"少数派文章"},{"type":"text","text":"的启发，思考能否利用文本相关度分析做一个工具，在新建笔记之后自动推荐一些相关笔记辅助链接的建立，由于在用 flomo 践行卡片笔记法，所以要基于 flomo 搭建工具。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"a9503eb5-b7bc-43c4-bf2e-c8da2a0a9aca","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/%E6%96%87%E6%9C%AC%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3%E5%BA%A6%E5%88%86%E6%9E%90%E5%8A%A9%E5%8A%9B%E7%AC%94%E8%AE%B0%E4%B8%8E%E5%AD%A6%E4%B9%A0.00420220220232233.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"91bebe60-09c2-4a5f-bb95-a86d2ff82c53","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"A 行动"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1126f445-477b-49f2-9d1b-ac5193d1dd31"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前端部分，利用 React 框架和蚂蚁组件快速完成了交互界面的搭建；为了防止意外造成笔记数据的丢失（写到一半浏览器奔溃）异常，本地做了实时的数据存储，让笔记记录更有安全感。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"cc02033e-c762-4c9b-9b4f-3b23eb06f81f","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/%E6%96%87%E6%9C%AC%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3%E5%BA%A6%E5%88%86%E6%9E%90%E5%8A%A9%E5%8A%9B%E7%AC%94%E8%AE%B0%E4%B8%8E%E5%AD%A6%E4%B9%A0.00520220220232302.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fd247a75-1108-49d9-ba23-99d7ba257cf7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"后端部分，由于 flomo 没有开放的 get api 所以通过爬虫获取所有笔记数据，再用 Python 的 gensim 插件构建基础数据用于后续的相关度分析。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"62749d4d-6c67-4ee9-9095-cadb73204423","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/%E6%96%87%E6%9C%AC%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3%E5%BA%A6%E5%88%86%E6%9E%90%E5%8A%A9%E5%8A%9B%E7%AC%94%E8%AE%B0%E4%B8%8E%E5%AD%A6%E4%B9%A0.00620220220232310.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9ebaac43-e020-446a-96c8-3f80aadb9926"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"gensim 的功能可以简单理解为输入两句话，它将分析相关度，并以一个 0～1 的小数显示，越接近 1 相关度越大"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"8555609f-13b9-4a9e-aac8-cda368bc108d","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20220221122525.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"14acd931-a2c0-42cb-84cd-61af4f11f1e9","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"R 结果"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f76c4c34-2bba-4e99-81f6-2681e29d3e8c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"完成了一个简单的卡片笔记关联工具，在输入框输入笔记后下方将显示可能存在关联的笔记，帮助用户完成线索的链接和思维的发散。日常已经在使用，的确可以帮助笔记之间完成链接。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"f19c3f3d-e239-4a47-bad9-638a510e5b45","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/nfzojy20220220223345.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ec88170e-c247-4e2c-be39-67dc69d75574"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"关于工具的忧虑，和以下网友的相同："}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"1096ccbb-47d8-4616-9f3c-c24dc0761adb","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/zmyOuz20220220232743.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6284e48a-2f42-4bc0-a483-afe976e0bc97"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"担心依赖机器算法推荐，更难去主动做一些复习和整理。不过先用着吧 😄"}]}]}
cards.title: 文本相关度分析助力学习与笔记

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"71f2919d-1436-4bf1-a46d-7fed99b6895e","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Find and Replace 插件"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6a641c5d-f961-407c-a5f6-e250b67807cd","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"背景"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1b35d26f-0ba1-41da-8f54-e162878e301e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用 Figma 进行设计时我们需要处理设计稿的文字信息，尤其是对于交互设计师来说，需要撰写大量的业务逻辑描述。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"c7031130-196b-417d-814b-1db96db4f197","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/aZAZEg20221114100828.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1d9ed935-59c9-4f7b-b279-15cd97c318f1","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现存问题"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9f9ca68b-2cbd-42d8-9dbf-18d0e4230ce9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"借助插件可以完成字符的查找与替换，但目前的插件存在几个问题"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"105210d0-ad62-4c2f-9624-de4a351699cb","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5bfb5ae8-2393-4576-af2e-551d2c21888f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"无法设置搜索范围"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"df7b2f43-9130-4400-a6bf-8b1e12aaf81d","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b740c02b-8638-4cac-adf6-23d6315f5b44"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"定位不能精确到字符级别"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f21d1f6e-9443-48d3-818b-312239b59b3b"}},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"e211983e-2bc4-4468-9363-3889a844682d","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/4soik620221114100833.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"53ebf6b4-6316-4453-91d7-01c628d56f88"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设置搜索范围，可以在文档较复杂时只查找、替换一定范围内的字符，避免改动到我们不希望改动的地方，使用起来更有安全感。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ec047ea-977b-4420-b93a-2e3c0b97d4cc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以字符级别的精度进行定位可以在大段文字的场景下获得更好的聚焦体验。（市面上的插件都只支持图层级别的精度）。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c3b0b96b-c540-4707-b958-6abb19aee99d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目前还没有找到同时满足上述功能的插件。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"285db5f4-19ce-4d41-84d4-bb8934626781","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"解决方案"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c82af956-b57c-4095-848b-c7bcd2f28b72"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"于是便开发了今天介绍的插件 —— "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1052801241204192805/Find-and-Replace","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Find and Replace"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"f1deaa6a-260b-491b-863b-42a6d4461951","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/ad5842ea-f8c8-40b6-a63a-b349cc36e5db/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9f442b5c-494a-44dc-b887-e97ebe8d2f88"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在搜索范围方面，它会根据你是否选中了图层决定搜索范围，有选中的图层则在选中范围下搜索、替换，否则在当前页面下搜索全部图层。也是为数不多支持全文档搜索的工具。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dff4462c-2408-4496-89ec-e63e119a62b7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"点击搜索结果支持以字符精度进行定位。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"18ae9b25-ec6c-4d1c-a4df-819038f02664"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strike"}],"text":"目前还无法解决的问题是，对于富文本样式的文本图层，替换文字后无法保持原来的样式，还需要关注后续 Figma 官方 API 的动态进行跟进解决。"},{"type":"text","text":"通过优化实现方式已解决此问题"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"75ae352c-2712-4d3f-94f0-034582ee9ab9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"欢迎大家使用、提出建议 :-)"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a0b1b340-aa46-4c1f-8ca3-370f5c975f01"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1052801241204192805/Find-and-Replace","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"安装地址"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7d2ff21d-630d-499e-99b1-0b3f9346f5f4"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4feb6e24-7fd9-4ec6-8d14-858a17de6828","cardTitle":"Figma 插件开发与运营笔记 🏄‍♂️"}}]}]}
cards.title: Find and Replace 插件

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6f655d02-5990-408b-a741-2f0c3c49a905","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Sketch 阅读体验优化"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eb824f19-c1b3-4ca1-bcab-96e1f8f44c89"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🐞 最新版本的 Sketch 出现了兼容问题，插件暂时无法使用"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b95aadb1-2ceb-4a75-b6a6-74d24e31c1be"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"项目地址："},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://github.com/draJiang/marketch","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://github.com/draJiang/marketch"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1911fa9b-ce1d-4d3a-ade1-38c9c820c3c9","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"S 情境"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a19202e8-9717-4110-867b-b9116bba0d4c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Sketch 是一款主流的用户体验设计工具，但对于交互文档的支持较弱，阅读体验存在提升空间。主要体现在导出 PDF 时，没有站点地图"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"627ec0ab-481d-46fa-99d7-c68ef3137925","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2c8914dd-9dae-407b-b2f0-5999fdafb9d1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"阅读者无法快速浏览文档结构，无法高效把握整体内容"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f5b28477-7e38-43d0-97da-81b5c615bd5e","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1357699e-13a9-404d-bfe4-faf8eae3640e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在不同页面（功能模块）间导航体验差"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d53f00cc-f571-4e1f-a93e-6a984d50e532","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"T 任务"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"44aba233-49b8-4387-a246-b2e24e9d3894"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"寻找是否存在插件可以解决上述问题，若无考虑自行开发。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"889bff0c-2ea8-46ee-a603-1fd17a479b9e","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"A 行动"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ddbfc681-09ae-4592-aa48-c230956db002"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"发现了一款名为 Measure 的插件"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f993fe1d-6467-4570-b2b1-b2d766c58818"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.uiunion.cn/sketch-measure-free-download-974.html","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Sketch Measure V3.4.1-Sketch 74.1最新版 一键导出标注和切图插件Sketch Meaxure 支持macOS Big Sur系统"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7d8847b3-39fd-48dd-b18a-ae2ee147a44d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"插件拥有简单的站点地图（只支持一级目录），且大部分功能针对 UI 进行设计，对交互文档阅读体验的提升有限。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e856d57f-a73f-4754-b7e4-e3d1ad9e9d0f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另外一款名为 marketch 的插件，虽然仍然面向 UI 设计稿进行设计，但在站点地图的导航上更加友好（支持二级，页面+画板的层级导航）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e9b6791-1c2b-42f6-9845-9ba365834e48"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://github.com/tudou527/marketch","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"GitHub - tudou527/marketch: Marketch is a Sketch 3 plug-in for automatically generating html page that can measure and get CSS styles on it."}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"fc95aa67-2c69-467b-ae88-7efa88eeaab9","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20211117122302.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"91dbc872-dc79-4fcc-a651-e017b7005186"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"图片来自 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://github.com/tudou527/marketch","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://github.com/tudou527/marketch"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0fe908cc-ea07-475f-9220-1b57cb0cb49b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"marketch 在 Github 开源，于是决定进行二次开发，进一步提升交互文档的阅读体验。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fe233e87-3e92-4c70-a81b-53128ba32880"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"插件的逻辑可以分为 2 个部分"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b7787ed2-a6e4-4728-817f-dc0f4c35b6ed","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"364fa938-251f-4b06-80d7-000d10c899a4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与 macOS 交互：决定导出前的设置项"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"681cd2e4-a5ff-4fd8-a66e-49f9e83d1990","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4265b8fa-ab18-4105-883d-7b6fe9dc29ff"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前端 HTML+CSS+JavaScript：决定导出后的样式、交互，是核心部分"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1d1cf8a4-2380-4de3-be4f-af0f716c6f58"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与 macOS 交互部分，需要使用 Objective-C 开发，对我来说是一个完全陌生的语言，比起相对熟悉的 JavaScript、Python，语法也非常的「怪异」，废了不少功夫查看官方文档和第三方文章。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"16320e92-182f-4b9e-ac95-11ed2ec66fa6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前端部分，核心逻辑全部在 index.html 文件中，阅读整体代码基本了解了各部分的逻辑；后续介绍的「拖拽查看」功能也通过阅读 Measure 的源码进行模仿实现。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b451b90f-7422-4a4c-9d9b-753132add4c8","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"R 结果"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"11d037cb-652e-44e2-b7ec-215ba6d980fb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从第一个版本到最近一个版本历时 3 个月，期间完成了 17 次提交，完成了至少 12 个优化点。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"871e6341-4e57-4a7b-9e22-8b3b55e2fe5f","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"画板预览图"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b4553c37-c533-464c-bb5e-59278bb554a3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"灵感来自 Axure 的编辑模式，设计师可以通过 hover 站点地图的某个项目快速预览页面内容，方便在复杂文档中高效获取页面下的信息，快速导航。我将此功能也融入导出的文档中。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"224bb3fd-52b0-46a4-9199-929517a1b0f2","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/20210220101824.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5108dd15-a3fb-45c2-bb19-24a58856a044","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"识别文本图层中的 URL"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ea0be1ff-c313-4031-b99d-7a06907de6b8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"交互文档经常会引用其他模块的文档，或者第三方 API 等文档供技术参考；之前的插件需要选中图层中逐个复制链接再粘贴到浏览器中访问，此功能实现了 hover 图层时自动识别，点击直接跳转，提升了查看链接的体验。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"ef716c64-e2f6-4a3a-8f11-235e73bb9e91","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/20210220102125.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"11464631-5b98-4d0a-908f-d6b286ea1a7d","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"优化导出文件的目录结构"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"02b593bb-a563-4029-b73b-1eaf9b8d615a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"插件原本导出后，会将所有画板 PNG 全部显示在一级目录中，导致寻找文档的访问入口（index.html）的效率低下，通过修改导出逻辑，实现了将 PNG 图片收纳进文件夹，简化了目录结构，更加清爽、访问文档更快捷。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"cbb75a96-45a1-42d0-92a4-615ff336ce5a","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/20210220102642.png#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"50%","height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a0f0b4f9-6806-4dd0-b5eb-13faae88a3e4","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"支持拖拽浏览"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7c972f71-226b-45f6-85b8-17b699d2f4fc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"按住空格可拖拽浏览，提升浏览体验。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d1dfca4d-6f6b-48e2-a2b4-8b705763f1ca","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"优化侧边导航样式"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"26ff74c4-46e3-41db-8c97-818997048fa1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"优化后，层级结构更加清晰"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"eed7b86f-cfd8-402d-9078-b2e5d1eb2060","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CrOD8Y20221114101355.jpg#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"80%","height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"120bd644-c897-42ca-aa66-730ea2b36c37","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"支持突出显示某个节点"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4bae350f-7cec-4f25-adcd-d994e491c3b7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当某个画板更新后需要提醒合作伙伴关注时，可在 Sketch 中在画板名称尾部追加符号 * 则导出后突出显示此画板提醒阅读者关注"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"c6cea1bd-05ab-44e6-8797-ace2b4d47fba","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/a8b18b65-e007-4c1c-8cce-cc0ec45fd33c/image.png#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"30%","height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"64100251-6217-464b-96a2-fb52d2742dab","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"支持设置默认显示比例"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"45244931-1435-4bd6-937c-4004b32fdb4e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用户中有使用 1 倍也有使用 2 倍尺寸进行设计的，若使用 2 倍设计，则阅读文档时使用 50% 缩放比例会更加合适，故在导出时增加了设置项。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"d0614136-81aa-4310-8646-3d946b9384d6","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/f1570e3b-d36e-4944-a82e-1a4bea7d5b78/image.png#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"60%","height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0c58e079-6324-4c76-9548-0c4d9e687df4","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自动设置页头信息"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6cc782d3-9db1-4fcd-b41b-718368c8003e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"观察到有同事会在每个画板头部显示画板名称，部分小组将此列为文档规范，每次手动填写比较繁琐，所以通过插件读取画板名称，自动将名称添加在页面头部，省去手动操作的成本。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"59dc9274-a0e7-4d42-ae6b-91b36f1e4dc4","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/sGIwW020221114101454.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6fe8a0a2-0c4a-4837-acf8-a5e2d334d5b8","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其他体验细节优化"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6f0d1712-380e-4da6-b85f-fbe976440990","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c4033785-ba96-405b-9969-b8b8066ab424"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"支持通过链接打开特定页面"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c3949d35-79bf-4f41-bb4f-553b842338a1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"旧版本：通过链接只能默认打开首个画板"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ca95be18-48a1-4cd9-ad28-aedfbd907e83"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"此版本：通过链接可以打开复制链接时所在的画板，方便通过链接分享文档"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ef2e3427-c540-4346-960e-200bff07afdb","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"26c055f2-6cda-4d2b-a952-d0138453b464"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"点击侧边导航，默认定位到页面顶部"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6f9a4f34-e65a-4435-bea4-1a5c1da1377c","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8f19a800-ef27-468b-884a-b6763be8a9f1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过 Cmd/Ctrl+加减键放大或缩小图层"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"84b6e6d1-860f-43da-959f-4c6a3b959a07","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a58a31f3-8280-4401-8c3c-e2bea944a409"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"浏览器标签显示 cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"008e67a5-9750-4155-986d-19c2f76ced30","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"腰/寸铁"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"64b64252-d154-4c22-a6aa-3ebbd21caf13"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是我最爱的乐队，没有之一。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"5f15cfc4-0bd0-45d5-9dbb-9b6205ad5900","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/ioKizD20221114204653.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":181,"originalWidth":278,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5d8775a6-a730-4627-a5c2-33c76cc19cc4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最喜欢的是《相见恨晚》、《他们说忘了摇滚有问题》以及早期的《unknown》。"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"3e426b3f-29b6-4fe7-b83d-db106077b7f3","params":"html"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"{HTML}\n<iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/pAYC59qnpgk\" title=\"YouTube video player\" frameborder=\"0\" allow=\"accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share\" allowfullscreen></iframe>"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b42306d2-b522-451e-b71f-0977de38c084"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"他们塑造了我的听音体系"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"23cc2489-928f-4cef-9e4f-c511089fea0c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"85c5dca8-39d3-489a-857f-f69e6694327a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"表达"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"35801483-d9b2-48d7-bc08-624bd9bf390c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f035d4e8-a5f6-473b-b17a-049c83a0e1e9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"摇滚乐是一种表达方式，所以我最看重作品要表达的精神，这也是我更多听国内音乐的原因（歌词容易理解）"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8175e29d-974d-4416-b22f-4ffa146ab1d5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4f964f5b-37cf-414f-9260-d573f34e0fe8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"旋律"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1be771fa-572d-4260-a006-c24d8db51d32"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在初入社会时，腰的作品帮助我保持敏锐而不至于变得麻木，不成为「只有钱才能影响到情绪的臭傻逼」，很庆幸多年之后的现在，我依然爱腰、依然勇于比出那根中指🖕🏻。"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6265fd86-cd30-4706-bf6e-bb5d39144c5e","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人类进化的四个阶段"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3bf3b402-d8ff-4090-b120-a39dc20bef6b","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"09428e3c-304f-42ba-ad3a-1c48c1427b9e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"操控概念的能力：下意识、直觉的概念，例如在狩猎返回的途中，团队中有人需要观察四周防止禁止对手和其他危险；此时"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"媒介"},{"type":"text","text":"是肉眼观察、声音传递、耳朵倾听。"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a6d77b39-f3d2-46b0-ba7e-79037e511946","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf60f93d-9738-4934-830e-22229eda7113"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"此时人类具备了"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"70b811b2-3a07-4e7a-a2e1-2e71e0b33e10"}},{"type":"text","text":"的能力"}]}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6324665f-662e-483f-898f-088ca8403311","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5a95ec30-dc4f-40bb-93e8-7eb77b996b0a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"操控符号的能力：可以将概念用符号（不一定是文字、数字）的方式进行思考和表达，例如结绳记录数量"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f19f33ca-4897-4531-97ba-7811832c12a0","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e62ace21-1c95-44cc-92ec-d0ab353c483a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3d7a3f8b-8570-43fd-ba39-8c96607dca6e"}}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6c9aa240-8019-4046-bb0f-4b892d5458fe","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"34ca4769-0242-4c82-9b84-15174e8257a7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"外部符号的自动操控能力：利用计算机这一"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./MjA0OTIwNjU_20220405201837%20fb740c7c-4130-435b-85ab-1f20463607ff.md","title":"MjA0OTIwNjU_20220405201837","data-internal-href":"meta://card/fb740c7c-4130-435b-85ab-1f20463607ff","edited":true}}],"text":"动态媒介 "},{"type":"text","text":"、自动化等手段完成对符号更灵活更高效的操控。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b21d3345-3a75-4d1e-afe3-9ae650bc6e97"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"来自 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"de914081-b034-4c80-9a3f-4d8bcf3338be"}},{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://medium.com/@yang140/computer-history-doug-engelbart-6cc9896677a9#:~:text=%E4%BA%BA%E7%B1%BB%E8%BF%9B%E5%8C%96%E7%9A%84,%E5%9B%9E%E8%B0%83%E5%92%8C%E8%BF%90%E7%AE%97%E3%80%82","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"参考链接"}]}]}
cards.title: 人类进化的四个阶段

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2675867b-c76e-4b73-969e-e4cd40efb8de","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"符号"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f5dfa57c-faef-4712-9964-311c4bb9b2b7","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"什么是符号？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ad1b774d-b8f9-4992-85ad-a39223d074b2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们会接触到各种各样的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9ec64347-616e-46ae-aa3e-e90fcbec367c","cardTitle":"信息"}},{"type":"text","text":"，包括语音、图像、位置、色彩、符号等，符号是信息的一种表现形式。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"63443c53-8d80-42fd-8093-6a06b3005248"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"符号是共同经验的产物，而共同经验来源于互通性。人类的群聚生活方式、大规模协作催生了符号。"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"de914081-b034-4c80-9a3f-4d8bcf3338be","cardTitle":"Douglas Engelbart"}},{"type":"text","text":" 提出 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2d4daee8-61b6-4a60-b717-689c2d8b3956","cardTitle":"人类进化的四个阶段"}},{"type":"text","text":"，人类先拥有了操控概念的能力，随之诞生了通过操控符号来利用概念的能力，例如通过结绳记录数量，使用印章符号代表身份。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dc77bfc7-41a4-4a20-8ebc-caf0b8bdcf7b"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d0a1af6b-78da-47f4-b398-59be13c0cd74","cardTitle":"符号、媒介与输入方式的关系"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ae97b68a-b3a5-4519-a181-5c8a660d79b8","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f6206500-a200-497a-9c95-af8560f03f83"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"符号借助"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"cf8f9036-26b2-468e-a884-4ed1e9baa78e","cardTitle":"媒介"}},{"type":"text","text":"承载，包括纸质媒介与计算机这一"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fb740c7c-4130-435b-85ab-1f20463607ff","cardTitle":"动态媒介"}},{"type":"text","text":"。并且"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fe0a6b37-330d-4c9e-afb4-a8c3b47b0a80","cardTitle":"符号需要符合媒介的要求"}},{"type":"text","text":"，例如文言文……（西方文字也是如此吗？）"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d208e18c-47cc-48f2-8465-d903e671b1f3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"符号是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7f526777-0ab1-4f99-9782-72d63ebacde9","cardTitle":"通信/信息系统"}},{"type":"text","text":"中被操控的对象"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"71feb18a-b62f-4a43-a9c1-7ba2048d1127"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"593d8439-16cb-4a47-b9ce-38cc672406da","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ec1d65be-0eb6-4d2c-bcab-da49af931dc5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息是一种概念，符号只是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9ec64347-616e-46ae-aa3e-e90fcbec367c","cardTitle":"信息"}},{"type":"text","text":"的一个子类"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5102af83-eec7-4bfa-a1af-863f3193e807","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b0ec4c90-2525-4a42-a552-b353b7642924"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"91e63f3a-5731-422e-9450-8adc454b58b5","cardTitle":"震动、音效是一种对概念的非符号表达"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c7d9a181-c6fb-43f3-99dd-561f0eee0a4d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b21d5773-41c5-48fe-bb05-b5406020aead"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以符号是一种概念 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e4fdb382-b893-48bf-9434-fa495264b8a9","cardTitle":"符号/语言表达概念结构"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2ab84340-fd94-4f6a-9fe6-bfd996b31b75","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"25cebc1c-ee28-4073-bccb-1d6d3986173f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"符号从何而来"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5fd85419-0d78-4e5c-ab4c-b963951a7f60","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e4756550-31a4-4539-89de-7cd98f8c7556"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a7782781-2244-473d-9934-c429eaf235d7","cardTitle":"词汇是共同经验的产物"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ad952f40-d3f8-4a0b-9ad5-abb4eaf436fb","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a5885f39-6e22-46c9-8b7c-01829f1b1d8a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"364519a0-136c-42b4-936b-25996f578abe","cardTitle":"概念帮助我们对事物进行研究和探讨"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1a694bbc-d38d-4c0d-b013-2a1c78c25b4b","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"46d4b19b-b9b6-42bd-a2e0-75f46a13b7a9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"符号受到输入工具、承载媒介的影响"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6eb62f0c-31fe-4719-badd-ea4560ed21f4","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0001b2cf-9af0-4f96-8bd8-41e79eb629b6"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d0a1af6b-78da-47f4-b398-59be13c0cd74","cardTitle":"符号、媒介与输入方式的关系"}}]}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b0582d72-789a-469a-b635-b2236e80660d","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"符号的意义"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"03427b19-44a3-478e-ab3f-0010879de574"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"符号帮助人类思考："},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"41bdc291-4294-494b-b464-9b1ccb16b278","card 个阶段需要实现人类自动化操控符号的能力；"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%E5%AA%92%E4%BB%8B_MjA0OTIwNjU_20220405201837%20%E9%9C%80%E8%A6%81%E6%8F%90%E4%BE%9B%E4%B8%80%E7%A7%8D%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E5%8C%96%E6%93%8D%E6%8E%A7%E7%AC%A6%E5%8F%B7%E7%9A%84%E8%83%BD%E5%8A%9B%20596c4bfd-f678-45fa-96d4-b4c7b9e20dbd.md","title":"动态媒介_MjA0OTIwNjU_20220405201837 需要提供一种自动化操控符号的能力","data-internal-href":"meta://card/596c4bfd-f678-45fa-96d4-b4c7b9e20dbd","edited":false}}],"text":"动态媒介_MjA0OTIwNjU_20220405201837 需要提供一种自动化操控符号的能力"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"05b59da8-68d0-4e52-b9da-f33c1622ab8c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"工具和方法论相互影响"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c7819c2-9f53-43be-b729-747fee0a3483"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个工具在被创造时会携带某种方法论，在工具传播、被使用的过程中同时也在传播这种方法论；方法论的进化反过来也会提出新的工具需求促进工具的进化。——"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"de914081-b034-4c80-9a3f-4d8bcf3338be","cardTitle":"Douglas Engelbart"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a01d1d31-13c9-4bdc-aa2f-de5c834a8975"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5ef50ecd-d239-4c66-b3b0-af0b10c71305","cardTitle":"工具对方法论造成影响"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8650de55-dbda-4c8a-89d9-9bc25e209f04"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"bb20a72c-a7bb-4c43-8b43-d3d033a74d15","cardTitle":"主动思考工具背后的方法论与使用场景"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f0a1e7ea-9d89-4bc7-85f8-2e590d7485d0"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c2e1f159-5ac2-4294-b3db-4cd287bb0625","cardTitle":"网状知识需要网状的阅读工具"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2df3f4d2-f0ee-4b35-a0ae-3e893815f38a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"6e685cf5-1779-418e-9dd9-8a0999a14786","cardTitle":"工具促进方法论进化"}}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d5b5e1ac-d3af-4f25-8635-db9476b7ff59","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"工具对方法论造成影响"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ddf4bbe7-76e9-4558-9d52-129cfafe414b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过 FIgma 的组件、自动布局、布局约束来设计响应式 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3817ce7c-8204-4563-8aad-848d6d474dc9","cardTitle":"响应式、自适应的区别"}},{"type":"text","text":" 交互非常方便，因为 Figma 本身的功能就非常符合技术的构建思路，这减少了设计和开发之间的摩擦。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"185709c7-68d5-47f3-9072-b9369f0202b3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以上是一个工具对方法论影响的案例("},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d2fd2337-393d-4245-a988-ee12637b3084","cardTitle":"增强人类智能的 4 个方向"}},{"type":"text","text":")"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"a2c8ad63-8fca-446f-a1ed-8dfdeab5098d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c5d2a7fe-a650-4efc-beba-104043f8b61e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MjE4Mjc2Mjc","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-04-20 11:05:27"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"25b1cc1e-7dd2-4aed-847e-475c9accd59d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"觉醒"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b81a5641-2e63-49de-9f48-c754a4e4c7ed"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有一段时间对于各类熟悉的名词充满了好奇，开始逐个对这些名词进行思考、重新定义；于是迎来接二连三的领悟。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4ca5c004-136f-458e-a173-3b63180b0f9f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"be28fdfa-e5b8-470b-bab6-42f25109a531","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":"角度理解，这是由于某种契机在心智中建立了某种模式，而基于"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"eaedfa86-3aa3-4ea8-9818-68be66c05cb2","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":"的原理，外界需要事物得到匹配后进行关联形成了前所未有的认知。"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5b1fe0b1-2f70-4efd-bd49-1934a998fd97","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习要搞清楚输入和输出"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"903de049-de2a-4166-bf97-0016640b8711"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为学习是建立"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8b5219f7-66f3-4ef5-8479-5543929eaf77"}},{"type":"text","text":"与"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d7f9511c-fe15-4a6f-a832-6d51eca7cce2"}},{"type":"text","text":"之间的关系，如果不知道输入输出是什么，就没办法找对应的例子（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae404370-513b-4424-b696-b3cd03b7a9be"}},{"type":"text","text":"）进行训练提取出解决问题的通用模型"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ad656456-02af-4080-8e55-30209804379b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1976e93d-8d4f-481d-85e7-5e2f37f3cec0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"但是这个"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3eb247a7-9306-4e3a-a118-5d69e0ffd795"}},{"type":"text","text":"的案例似乎没有明确的输入和输出但还是获得了知识，怎么解？"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6d7413ba-9af0-409f-8000-6f996480d142"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例子：学习做菜"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c980468f-69d9-40d3-b8c0-0332ba75ebf6","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8d50b13a-5cbb-4a6a-88ad-f623d383c0c3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输入：各种食材"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"72ef0854-a8cd-475b-8efb-cdd568362855","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"957b2fab-9a8e-422b-8496-4ec2811c6251"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输出：美味的菜肴"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"839ac7ea-c792-4562-be2f-d726f9eb69c3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"525db9be-20a4-41f9-b073-6d8f586b7984"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"知识就是处理输入与输出，研究怎样的食材应该使用怎样的加工方法，从而让食物更加美味。"}]}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"468c5482-d525-4526-b1fb-e3c84ca2a184","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/fdbd4125-3307-4c76-a3a6-477df330cf2c/image.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"70%","originalHeight":240,"originalWidth":376,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5f29e649-a33c-4971-96c7-b6f62144ab58"},"content":[{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/cl4zh80o48f2101o3e2iv849s","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/cl4zh80o48f2101o3e2iv849s"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"bb993476-1d8b-402a-82cc-173cf4d8a6f5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"256d51b5-b364-4987-990d-b635cdbd8714"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"发现自己一直思考的输入和输出都只是信息/知识的来源和加工方式以及自己产出知识的载体（文章、笔记……）"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5a97d1bd-43ee-497a-a201-d6fb6d3be578"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b7a9bb90-2406-4c3c-8ca7-2ba4c15b0d03"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"那么现在做一个练习，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"be28fdfa-e5b8-470b-bab6-42f25109a531"}},{"type":"text","text":"的输入输出是什么？"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3d9e9cdd-909b-4334-85b2-3c14d547b06b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"39b5faf4-013c-4cd0-8e4b-7454042c449c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输入：用户面对的问题和目标，例如学习英语、高效开会，设计到的内容包括"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b58328be-cd3e-4984-ab35-0a51e23802d5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"750e6e22-27ae-464b-80f7-3cb3ea6fa3cb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"记忆"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3e883d6f-874f-4772-815e-7be2916bb888","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a1e96eb1-129a-4f71-97c9-5e2e8c28f7fb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"沟通"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5317b17b-a40f-4ee4-9eff-5579a19ec29f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dfe17793-b8a8-4ba5-8650-feb100cb83ba"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"……"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8628da25-eef2-4032-8d41-16ff4ab29481","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d1582929-eea5-4741-bf98-aacb36a22074"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输出：创造出帮助人类更好记忆、创造、思考的工具"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0e0a4487-9d8e-49d4-b600-520bd348e897","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9742e502-9ebe-47bb-82fe-574552bbf8fe"},"content":[{"type":"whiteboard","attrs":{"whiteboardId":"1034f587-5b02-4b0c-9108-e13b51b4b94e"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"95c8acc0-20bc-4ca1-a77e-6ec4e03bd18d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7cff8f0d-7642-4665-b32b-e920320289ee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"知识：人类如何记忆、创造、思考、理解对象"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"27ec7b07-c5be-4f87-af8b-ac37f695d8ee"},"content":[{"type":"whiteboard","attrs":{"whiteboardId":"ec52a447-72e6-4204-9944-d4ad94c833f1"}},{"type":"text","text":"呢？"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a7450dd2-6cdc-4f33-a51c-c765930d61fc","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9ef852d4-b37f-4cf4-8aec-64a6cf110126"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输入：同样是用户的目标与业务目标"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"577d3de1-23cd-443f-8df1-f25c469a7496","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0f1b0061-6c70-4178-a079-07753a9787ce"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输出：一个能满足目标的方案"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d73761cd-d8b6-4981-a91c-fd0882a1c7a7","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d49bb875-3d76-415e-a144-26b756224ce9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"知识：对于设计材料的理解（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"32e038a0-493f-4652-abca-5c8e1724f052"}},{"type":"text","text":"）、对于用户的理解（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"be28fdfa-e5b8-470b-bab6-42f25109a531"}},{"type":"text","text":"） "}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"5593f4c6-e6d6-410d-b33a-0e11f598bacc"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1bebfa57-10a7-4bbb-8223-487ecdb30fd5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输入、输出是指"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"实际应用"},{"type":"text","text":"时的输入和输出。"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b698c43b-0e01-4acf-94af-182bb5253641","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"知识是对有限案例的抽象以应对无限的新情况"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d016c456-4166-4162-b529-5773e8f2c317"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有限的信息，可以通过记忆学习，例如九九乘法表，但大部分信息是无限的，一方面无法穷尽所有信息，另一方面也无法完成记忆。例如计算闰年，年份是有无限个，但通过一个简单的函数即可得到「是」或「否」的结果。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8682d438-f6b1-4a32-92bc-f6851d96228e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"而知识就是在有限的已知例子中寻找规律以解决许许多多未知的问题。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"ba661508-76ee-4508-af3c-ccfafd86c908"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3f5ee41c-1fc8-4eee-ac4b-d1c66e1d66a4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"案例"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d7956c1e-5d9f-4c16-b9b8-74ecb22ba65a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"06e18ab1-3ba9-4f57-9bae-3b5ae577ee82"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3eb247a7-9306-4e3a-a118-5d69e0ffd795","cardTitle":"抽象"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cdba6d88-7d07-4d57-ad0e-82816e681c9a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"470bfefc-c19d-42ad-9b63-c4717f7f2852"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4e3e0b7d-4ce2-4550-a53e-b5f7598d08c9","cardTitle":"设计模型"}}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"b48a9e7d-fbe2-470d-ad4c-dcb9a605cab3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0de38f1d-5ffe-44b2-82b3-5312189b651a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096","cardTitle":"《认知心理学》"}},{"type":"text","text":"P719 中称之为「泛化」"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8c64209e-88e3-44ec-a4e6-cb3cf5aa13e7","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"组件迭代旧版本兼容"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3c4613d1-8689-474d-bafa-2e14d16876a0"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"86a14082-4394-4dc2-b26f-ba0099cf67f5","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":"的意义之一在于，构建了一个共享的知识系统利用团队的力量进行持续的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"迭代"},{"type":"text","text":"，迭代过程中我们需要注意新旧版本的兼容性问题。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"95f3a6bc-8eba-41e2-9a1f-369c164e784e","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么要做兼容"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1c424047-799a-4303-94dc-f57bb40aaf6a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当组件推送更新时"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"若新组件的图层与旧组件不同"},{"type":"text","text":"，则会导致设计稿中已编辑的变体、图层文案"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"重置"},{"type":"text","text":"，造成设计资料的损失。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e2c1f6a7-a436-42ea-9ab3-f9e29cd09867","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"怎么做"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d1d571a7-d660-45b7-8f85-199e9844fe0a","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"尽量使用已有图层"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3ff6046e-ca0c-46e8-aa5e-11db320e5fce"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当你修改 1 个图层时，例如修改 1 个文本图层的样式，则建议直接在已有图层上编辑，而不是删除旧图层创建新图层。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0642b593-ccb6-411c-885d-505df041a6ff","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"隐藏旧组件"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a7bd6d60-1918-4c6b-bb21-a637a96f56c4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当组件修改较大时，难以避免要对图层进行删除操作，此时建议创建一个全新的组件。旧组件不删除，并将名称添加 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"_"},{"type":"text","text":" 前缀进行隐藏，并提醒团队成员减少使用。例如将 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"弹窗"},{"type":"text","text":" 修改为 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"_弹窗"},{"type":"text","text":" 。拥有 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"_"},{"type":"text","text":" 前缀的组件将在下面这个列表中隐藏，但团队成员仍然可以在组件文档内看到组件、复制使用。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"d597fe8d-1d98-44df-b4e9-b47ba4415c74","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/3471e6a5-24c3-48ee-92d1-26accf8f92f3/image.png#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"50%","height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8e557d69-3cb4-432e-a49f-0450b867c81f","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"编写修订说明"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"44669629-13d3-4da1-b8de-cecf30a9d58a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在推送更新前，请说明本次修改的内容帮助组建使用者判断是否要进行更新。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6c7b846e-ae72-4773-af68-b0195def779a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在下方的组件列表中，只勾选你需要更新的组件，避免将编辑中、未开放的组件推送给团队成员。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"16ba7af5-f835-4a9b-87c8-8359efe7f958","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/d5946fa5-ea0d-4606-8116-7abad71eda1e/image.png#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"80%","height":null}}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8262ff6c-e28f-4d0e-b69d-9ac8fa9994c4","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计系统"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fbe7aa72-b39c-4d0f-94b5-96c469706911"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5455717f-e4c5-48ba-b3d9-1d183c6a45fb","cardTitle":"设计系统的分类"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"27964c7e-8a96-404c-be72-8d979523d3b3"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"582b7189-fefc-4ef3-9671-8353c7426536","cardTitle":"创建可维护的设计系统"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2dedb595-b3a8-491e-bd27-5b5eaeceb667","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b03afb0c-36de-4718-a3b5-00b3de12efea"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"页面不是衡量工作量的方式，衡量的方式是功能和组件的数量"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1d2b0fbb-8ab9-49c0-9d61-2222603d5861","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b13115c8-3439-4cc1-b02a-9ff2bac1c0b2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们不是在设计页面，而是在设计组件系统"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"90f14c41-6684-46cc-9159-67854ae870f8","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"50c4fa4a-c38d-4fb8-83cb-02bdf8462dcf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计系统应该原子化，例如按钮是 1 个分子，由颜色、文字 2 # 语法？配合 google 构建"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"124b9a56-39bc-4135-a1f7-95466a3ae9ab","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a10ab2ec-f1f9-4909-8a73-31f7a0405121"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计语言"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5fcc48a2-2ff3-4029-a17b-b88c0309a95a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4b5761b2-f9ad-4cf5-b7a0-eb830f949079"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"组件库"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"75ca6538-69b0-483e-8eeb-457feb33fed4","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7dec63fa-9eaf-434c-ac94-eb3a462a1ae6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"品牌指南"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cefa7ef2-7db3-43d5-980f-26eefe9f0ce0","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"23e6602b-c7c4-413b-a6ae-d6327fdac5f8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"语态和语气"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"58b10b8c-5ecc-46d4-9481-b5b57ee2fcc2","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"18a7cc47-86e6-433c-bade-780182e6deac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"写作风格"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"469574e9-23d6-4d71-b7f3-9899c4e22e72","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8a99461c-3ff5-4eeb-95e3-22380b545288"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"代码样式指南"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a4a78209-88e2-4691-a9e2-a567eee5a5c4","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cd75a03d-02fb-4b01-838c-0484f5270001"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"组件库"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"edabd637-e252-4dd6-8ad5-827f26702b55","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"09ff305c-bd83-4c55-9e6a-219a35fadffd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"名词解释"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"06871f18-a7b6-49ff-9d41-9a8ea8305992","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b3f0e45b-0c6d-4f5a-b7fe-a9e6d2a16484"} 提供了组件的数据看板，我们可以借此分析组件的使用情况"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"bc677251-860b-4930-b87d-3b8bd719987c","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20220119145930.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"42ec53b7-4cf2-44b2-809f-1e41fb753c0f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"数据查看路径"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"d0d3d19e-7432-4cba-b096-dc506455075c","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20220119150202.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c487fac4-8bc9-4976-b22e-3543a9fdda8b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"官方使用帮助："},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://help.figma.com/hc/en-us/articles/360039238353","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://help.figma.com/hc/en-us/articles/360039238353"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3697447f-4a71-428e-b1b0-5e6ac5f5b583","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"评估组件分离数据"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8f399479-e3e1-443e-b690-851ec413c989"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"创建组件实例后，实例的编辑将受限，当用户希望自定义编辑时，通常就会分离实例，Figma 支持查看组件的分离次数"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"f5b40c45-73ea-4038-90c2-81e704ecc58d","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20220119150627.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6d54cbaa-b68e-4593-869a-9dd9f2854c09"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"组件的分离次数是评估组件易用性的关键指标，通常用户会在以下情况分离组件"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"69061f26-a665-4bbe-9985-3172d38495cb","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2fa730ed-1393-445f-9d49-ab291368d55c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"组件本身兼容的场景较少：提高场景的兼容性"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"945bc4fc-71b2-48d6-b30f-c3335bb10fe2","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eb4a95d2-cc6d-4946-82a1-5917fc967588"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用者不了解组件变体或使用了不符合规范的交互方式：一方面优化组件的使用体验，另一方面宣传规范和组件的使用方式"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"89687d6a-1dae-4346-99b5-1e4148d12ce4","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"跟踪组件具体使用情况"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"289e33cf-664c-4db3-8fb5-326fdfa8faa9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"针对分离数据较高的组件，可以查看组件在哪些文件中应用，并分析、优化"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"9a593e71-cd3d-49b0-bc74-3806ed5ad006","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20220119151458.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}}]}

PDF 在模拟纸张，播放器在模拟唱片机。一方面这是受限于人类自身限制与市场普及要求所做出的妥协，必须基于人类已有的心智模型一种新的技术才能得到普及，而心智模型会随着时间逐渐转变（iOS 拟物化到扁平化的转变）"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"03b6b7f9-6424-479c-a2a8-125600089d4e","cardTitle":"故事版借用了电影领域的方法"}},{"type":"text","text":" 另一方面，如果有一天可以突破旧的心智模型的影响，将计算机的潜力发挥到理论极限，必将推动人类社会向前迈进一大步。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9315c5cd-8387-4141-9cdd-47ab5967e853"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://medium.com/sheracaolity/my-vision-a-forgotten-history-67ee77e969da#5911","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://medium.com/sheracaolity/my-vision-a-forgotten-history-67ee77e969da#5911"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7f01ad4f-2791-4359-b3eb-ec9076c7ebde","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"39c4cc72-7aa5-4d43-97da-83a7aa3049fe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相关链接"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"625dae5d-980f-4904-9b9f-097061508b65","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"48c126a3-1408-4153-9de2-138519b76597"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"77c03fee-f971-4b7b-9884-278ee7718657","cardTitle":"现实的隐喻"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"96b3f8a2-1711-47a4-862d-d5447faadab8","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"404e0841-16cf-4c59-9190-7710d00e6288"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"839acc1d-e384-455a-bab8-74abae1c6c12","cardTitle":"文件夹的隐喻"}},{"type":"text","text":" cards.title: 我们仍然在使用动态媒介承载旧的内容

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4fcc3484-6b56-46a2-abde-532ef9a24a66","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个新媒介的内容，必然来自旧媒介"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"be60c602-7914-4bed-b9b6-77ee6b00530f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个新"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"cf8f9036-26b2-468e-a884-4ed1e9baa78e","cardTitle":"媒介"}},{"type":"text","text":"的内容，必然来自旧媒介"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b24f52d3-19fd-4d3f-a6a0-7224595d228b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如用于书写的纸张来自口语；印刷制品来自书写……（乔布斯或许就是因为这个原因一开始不愿意使用触控笔作为输入工具）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38468ff6-3045-41d4-859a-eb3409e2e56a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"联想到汽车诞生之初也被套上了虚假的马头面具，人们对于新事物的接纳总是迟钝的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a6692a9c-d517-4b52-8060-ae2e4b17212d"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://medium.com/@yang140/computer-history-alan-kay-2-2-2706b3717d6b#:~:text=%E9%87%8D%E8%A6%81%E8%A7%82%E7%82%B9%E6%98%AF-,%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E6%96%B0%E5%AA%92%E4%BB%8B%E7%9A%84%E6%9C%80%E5%88%9D%E5%86%85%E5%AE%B9%E6%B0%B8%E8%BF%9C%E6%98%AF%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E8%80%81%E5%AA%92%E4%BB%8B,-the%20initial%20content","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"link"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"56cb51ff-96a0-4fb8-bc09-ce7484021ddc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个新媒介出现时总是不被人接受，而承载人们熟悉的旧媒介中的内容有助于新媒介的传播，如果新媒介存在价值就会在传播的过程中被人们发掘其真正的价值（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"6e685cf5-1779-418e-9dd9-8a0999a14786","cardTitle":"工具促进方法论进化"}},{"type":"text","text":"）。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ce731d0-8f4d-4fc0-a614-d5e868ccd4fe"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/56925316","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/56925316"}]}]}
cards.title: 一个新媒介的内容，必然来自旧媒介

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ff0273ad-f2f9-4a09-b224-e0b933ccfd4a","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现实的隐喻"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"289cafdd-17a2-404b-a2e6-577777045f18"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"完全复制现实的隐喻 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fedbe769-cd9e-435d-b779-c35b0127f06d","cardTitle":"隐喻的几个局限性"}},{"type":"text","text":" \n也不总是好的，例如纸质日历每页显示 1 个月的日期，但到了软件世界中即便没有纸张的限制，人们还是沿用了这一设计，影响了跨越浏览的用户体验。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f52271ae-8f95-4114-a5e9-498dfe9cd617"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这是不遵从现实隐喻的负面影响："},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"839acc1d-e384-455a-bab8-74abae1c6c12","cardTitle":"文件夹的隐喻"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"88be4f03-77b8-407b-b0df-65b6906467ed"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不遵从现实隐喻的正面影响："},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"696eba3f-6281-4f70-960d-e1df6e16a15d","cardTitle":"元宇宙中的负担任务"}},{"type":"text","text":" 综上所述，遵从现实隐喻可以带来更低的上手门槛，但也会限制了软件这一动态媒介的价值发挥。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"119b7aeb-e3fe-402f-ae8d-83306eb0fe99"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"724c99ab-a7dc-4b10-87f7-d9e197329511","cardTitle":"《About Face 4：交互设计精髓》"}},{"type":"text","text":" p237"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"a496901b-781f-4dee-94d1-0e73f4f39657"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"69be387b-755c-4911-96ed-1e6c4c715043"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTg1MTU5Mjc","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-03-15 12:21:35"}]}]}

任务"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e650eac7-6291-4810-9b7d-8234aaeb8224"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在此情境下我要解决的问题、要达到的目标是什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"88e8bcfb-ea92-4f7f-8647-f8a3e5978914"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是否存在一种更高效的用户反馈分析方法，除了检索关键词获取功能反馈外，可以做到发现问题、创造机会？"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"67960a21-3909-43ac-b895-d6fdbb860200","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"A 行动——解决方案"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a7e1d4ac-9100-4d09-8cee-60de97e70ebd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我采取了哪些行动、制定了什么方案，为什么采取这些行动。如何开展这些行动，遇到哪些问题，我是如何解决的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"39c1cd07-f606-4c88-9438-3cf6f6d685f2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"请教用研同学后获取了一个可行的方向："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2eb8cfc5-c620-413f-bc69-1d195bc10266","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3342aa1a-dd40-4b48-995c-aaab358cbd70"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对反馈内容做拆分单词处理"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d1105db6-021d-450a-91a7-7bbb9179b8cd","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f29c830a-28c2-4951-9469-199a73e116f2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对单词标记词性 🌟"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"fffa43b0-101f-45df-8fc4-31eaa4b47f47","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a490efed-29c9-4936-b923-708adf1c380a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"筛选核心词性 🌟"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"57e3e150-df4e-408c-aa5c-f973338d5028","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b5b04451-3340-45ca-b9d7-92d8b47ec5b5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"统计单词出现次数"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2a2067dd-6b52-4ce9-9af2-2e8fec83459e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"95fb253a-0c25-4ea2-aa9b-16e85de5a493"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"根据出现次数获得用户反馈的核心讨论点"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dc534a0c-29ca-4400-97a4-979818f07b41","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cbd3b6e0-9108-4b0c-a724-ea78ed5aa531"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在数据中检索核心讨论点"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6e32b9ca-69cc-4930-b175-8f10c0472928"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"举个例子："}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"60358e76-54a2-4834-9c18-e3e6e18a9607"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输入语句：今天天气真好啊"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8cce1d9e-811c-47b3-9a11-056428e5a44b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"拆分单词：今天 天气 真 好 啊"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"11ffee35-5bfd-4123-a2b4-40fc84cc467b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"标记词性：今天t（时间词） 天气n（名词） 真d（副词） 好a（形容词） 啊y（语气词）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"050df7de-43b3-4715-bda8-a4a4103420a7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"<aside> 🎮 尝试一下，删掉尽可能多的单词，并且尽可能保留原意"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e2d4760f-3941-4768-b4df-197f87cfee23"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"</aside>"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"038e3b16-213c-4f63-bec1-661f8361893c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"然后对词性进行筛选，只查看关键词性——名词、动词、形容词，例如上面的例子中，只保留名词、形容词依然可以保留大部分含义：天气n好a"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c486f27f-b52a-4848-9ba3-4df4da2dd0d5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"方案的优势"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0ea53a31-2fe4-433b-9b39-f20b2697ca50","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"69c47384-6c01-4f9d-816f-0eac381b9e1b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"拆分单词并标记词性，剔除了助词、语气词等无意义信息 ，降低了信息的噪音"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f43e6d8d-78c2-4e95-b4e4-e9e2bd0dc186","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4fead847-ab36-4cd8-be74-82ad75497e7e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"拆分单词，细化信息颗粒度，使得讨论的主题可被统计分析。"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"8693d5f6-1ee5-44c0-891d-b312b312cdc8","params":""},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如：
今天天气真好啊
今日天气真不错
在单纯的重复次数统计中，是完全不同的 2 条反馈"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"857491c2-7bba-4eeb-a094-efe40910389a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"听到这里，可能有人有疑问，表格的去重、排序这类操作比较容易，但拆分单词、词性标注要怎么实现？需要借助 Python 的 Snownlp 「插件」，需要一点点编程的能力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eb5a1b90-8ee7-428f-8184-45035a359621"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://github.com/draJiang/customeFeedbackAnalysis","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"GitHub - draJiang/customeFeedbackAnalysis: 使用 Python 分析用户反馈"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b6a29064-b009-4c4b-b312-6b9532ae0e9d","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实际案例"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"31bad9d0-faf2-429e-a8f6-38d34acb142d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PC 客户端改版，希望通过用户反馈发现一些问题和机会，于是获取了近半年的用户反馈数据进行处理。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"ca39950c-695c-4cd7-af65-88189fe1d07a","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/5272222a-cb83-42fa-8ed4-6ddc7a869f2c/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":911,"originalWidth":1306,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6acff0da-ab08-4af3-90c6-6035405cdf58"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过 Python 的 Snownlp 「插件」就可以获得单词词性，存储到表格中，获得了这样一个表格"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"d873a3e6-f8f6-4097-8e9d-0a2b14ea570c","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/392d1a13-2a04-4788-9668-5b1a333b4f75/image.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"20%","originalHeight":603,"originalWidth":147,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"20fd0a9a-6e88-4a9c-beda-fd7758a422ad"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"筛选只保留名词、动词和形容词"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a72f3706-04ad-40fc-b319-64a0aec25c0d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最后用 Excel 的公式统计出每个单词出现的次数，排序后就能看到哪些单词出现的次数最多"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"cfe11253-e61c-46bb-90cd-725685c4ae53","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/9d109505-0bda-493b-a043-b2a675c3cca5/image.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"20%","originalHeight":720,"originalWidth":220,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"14618c48-02ce-4df0-84c7-d51aa56a70cf","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/5f9d10bf-3a6f-40d6-9c20-b82528a6343a/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":476,"originalWidth":584,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8d71a0f0-8c64-42a7-9e35-43d9535397cb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"发现「登录」被讨论的次数比较多，定位到了核心讨论点，在表格中筛选关键词「登录」发现了一个比较集中出现的问题：用户在登录游戏客户端时，PC 客户端会自动弹出，对用户造成严重的干扰。后续会进一步了解用户、讨论解决方案。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"b4c8a53d-6b1d-43b6-9a5e-1d63225e1b77","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/1406a956-c5c9-40cf-9522-be3fa86928b1/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":459,"originalWidth":1209,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dc650ecf-735a-4e84-970b-c0da33eead90"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果没有此方法，很难想到、发现还会有这样的问题。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2b3deaad-3885-4608-8068-4c7c9e97e6ae","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0c5a4407-5b85-4c08-a7e3-d275fb0cee40"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以上就是分享的全部内容，我们来总结一下，用户反馈分析的核心步骤："}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dbd8e652-4a5d-42dd-94eb-465886f5e746"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对反馈内容进行分词 > 标记单词词性 > 根据词性筛选关键单词 > 统计单词出现的次数 > 根据出现次数了解核心讨论点 > 在数据中检索核心讨论点"}]}]}

1-458a-9247-e905b17a5d44"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"共用元素的图层名称不同，文本值无法继承："}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"ff3845b9-865a-4965-ad5e-b75cf392633e","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20210923103207.png#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"90%","height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"223811ef-4480-496b-a663-ef32251e84cf","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"数据渲染"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e77d24b-23ee-43ce-adc3-3271bff71508"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过
