attrs":{"id":"867cce86-6949-44b7-8383-4ef6cd485cb3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1a65a23b-9fb8-4f09-ae8c-119c0227de83"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"997ca912-c29b-4be4-a256-cde1e84e0823"}}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"dbb5c3bb-a2d6-43ed-b64b-8a721d6516f0"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"82f3facc-2057-411a-b87f-2e0c1f41053d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这个模型也非常符合"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c741f5f8-9f2d-48bb-98b7-31c9891e4eb3"}},{"type":"text","text":"的概念，动机和担忧对应「动机」，障碍则对应「能力」。从福格模型出发，还可以进一步完善此设计模型，就是加入「提示」维度，如何让目标行为与用户的习惯行为作链接。"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bf98ffa5-bb8e-4b6a-81c8-56c04dbe4f78","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"撤销"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6bd39409-977c-4d91-8b12-c753e2774904"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"允许用户撤销先前的操作。但目前存在一些问题，例如执行顺序 A、B、C，但想要从 C 撤回 A 时，不得不牺牲一执行的正确操作（B），回到 A 之后还需要再次操作 B，造成了不必要的牺牲。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"36e973c6-7cc8-46f2-8604-af3f22276fbc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"FIgma 中我也经常遇到这种问题，此时在撤销前我会先复制希望保存的图层到剪切板，撤回到目标步骤后再粘贴回去实现有选择的撤销。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"16bdf779-0b35-408a-bb24-26710df25d9f"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"724c99ab-a7dc-4b10-87f7-d9e197329511","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":"P298"}]}]}
cards.title: 撤销

直观"}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8ce872de-9f57-4ad9-a3ea-5338cc18a168","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e1203024-399c-4ca8-9992-d10c5b7b3a86"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"三段式框架"}]}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"502277a7-0740-48a1-a852-f22224143682","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"747b5504-9af1-460d-9acd-7411c784855e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"舍弃与主题关联不大的内容"}]}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"45146f3a-3ab7-4ae2-a04b-41bd95d2b76b","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"85749ad8-f887-48bd-a13c-a11b76ac55be"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将生僻且非核心的概念舍弃或更换名词"}]}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a5c8f2cb-62a0-4d1f-8c0a-8a49ce908830","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"869981ba-6a22-4fd2-877b-88e703d13e59"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"让内容变成故事"}]}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"14c295b2-6cc5-4d38-b353-d0ef0d93849a","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1c4ca18e-bd8c-4896-9d65-e681eff2e33f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"幽默、有趣"}]}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5b37b5a5-29af-4057-926b-c3b8701a5ace","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0f0d3eca-b8b8-41b9-a564-1f5e89ceaeb6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"引入典型例子，可以用现场观众举例，调动注意力，加强互动"}]}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"27075a50-bcf8-4877-b1d7-45f1531da495","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7f249553-cdc0-480c-a1c5-9e37bd88f95e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"加入图片、视频、演示（演示注意准备充分）"}]}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8ce417ce-937e-4d5e-a5b3-6583d7eef964","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dd551921-f639-49cb-b266-ae09bff5ff6b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"内容是否存在不严谨的问题（特别是数据分析相关的）"}]}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2affe5de-3d3e-4807-b6e7-cee69ec2c8cf","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9987891e-30d1-4988-8d7c-b4f4f244a7bf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"加入小结、总结"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"65064b5e-015b-4af6-b598-23e3e1a57424","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c38a8bda-f975-432a-9f9b-cd2fb0b2eca9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"↔️ 互动"}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7d06a727-a797-45fe-8584-971e7a0349b6","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e4050da-03f7-46ab-bca6-133ada2813ec"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"观众可能有哪些疑问"}]}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3b8966b5-eada-4294-9e14-34a2fccb38c6","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"28c41186-5c33-4c73-9039-8c16112b3865"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"向观众提哪些问题"}]}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"8a8ddd6c-f77b-42a8-b511-1467409e2aff"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ede59f86-f326-4b41-94c1-7e756d40afb2","folded":true,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58a15ab8-3e5b-430b-b9e1-3d0163d8fdc0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"草稿"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b39326ae-beba-4711-89a5-723c0a78ec8e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"了解观众是谁"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b9c93abd-73ee-43e9-b72e-aaacd3a4f8ed","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9279e39d-f0b5-4476-8199-59592de39090"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于即将讲的内容是否具备相关知识背景，如何让这些人理解问题和价值"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7c1a9d3a-9677-4959-8b9a-312ee5e7ab92","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b2a56662-653e-4463-b497-37377cca9ea6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于本次的主题，观众最关心的是什么"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b7300c71-e2b0-4ba8-b8d2-be9620ea74d2","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"854aff2b-3d5d-4877-8918-95d0a3301055"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"针对内容，观众会有哪些疑问？"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5441d75b-66d9-4213-81bd-eba68d272c77"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例子是否可以用现场的观众举例，可以调动观众的注意力"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3efdb4c3-a712-44c1-a158-cf9894787011"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"演讲时长预计是多少，内容量会不会太多没有充足的时间传递？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bd5968d3-8f10-43d2-b853-204c76146c6e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"内容是否存在不严谨的问题（特别是数据分析相关的）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2a5ce379-8786-4cd8-a243-60fc73c1b194"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有哪些点可以加入互动的？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9eb098a6-87dc-4297-bc4a-687fbe2f7bb7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"内容过于复杂？可以增加小结、总结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d0a2a3c6-a30d-4a86-8291-9eae0e4eb064"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例子是否足够典型易于理解"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d3f0dc93-c8a8-4082-98d9-e38fbeb3a6fe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能否让内容变成一个故事"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"798da9a6-158a-411a-9799-7061c9f7869e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"演讲内容有没可能变得更加生动有趣、幽默，特别是演讲开始时"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b2d0b8a3-4465-4e2a-944c-fb4bf88a896d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是否将内容进行视频化、图片化，让内容更加直观（特别是软件功能演示时，实际操作>视频演示>图片演示）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"af829bfc-24eb-40f8-a593-b3843f2f7961","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"41e00c8b-7c45-49a8-901c-1e22f91d20c5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"演示非常具备难度，要有充分的准备时间，注意设备问题、网络问题等影响因素"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"23cf404e-148f-412d-a54a-0475d75d9335"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"紧张"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"07f142ae-dd52-4aeb-b6fc-1b69c3cd9b7c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9f545c79-dafa-4a8a-abcd-b2311befcc11"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"上台前主动交流、发言"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ca8dcd7a-3d3c-4b15-8b1b-a2acabcb3380"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"舍弃与主题关联不大的内容，让核心更突出，降低观众的理解难度"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"347c93c5-8c05-4aeb-9140-aec112ffb9cb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"进行中"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ea9e161f-9fbb-49d4-8e1c-28202f7768c0","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4625df04-9baf-416d-891d-dbfb3b4e9f1b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"控制节奏，不要让观众无限制的讨论下去"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"57a5acee-3f98-4832-88e6-4fc1890bf47e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"231f5c6c-e05a-4d45-9f45-9d81dec04779"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"比较有争议，讨论比较激烈的点，要整理下观众的疑问，尽量当场回答，不行就承诺回去后讨论"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3228706c-af6b-4831-9c08-c6e440ad5ab0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能通过观察观众的反映临场的调整节奏是最好的"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"da8308fb-fbc4-48e4-95ae-8710655a5292"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"节奏太快"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6ada86b1-9085-47e4-a2d6-09a60fe6a7b8","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a9bc6cb8-19f7-41e8-83db-debb36a5b951"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"检查是否有生僻的概念，生僻部分换成通俗的语言或者干脆舍去"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e28d8ad9-c3b3-4c48-8d76-871e27b8ea65","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b8fe3023-53fd-4726-80bb-8ccc9807cc7e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"检查重点信息，增加文字量，多举例说明"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38ee1a10-b784-494f-badd-42e71a0397b6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"结束后"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ce6f1f77-87ee-4041-8888-5b44105d8b82"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提问，观众不提问则主动提问观众——准备提问内容"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 演讲自查清单

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2147e680-8ed5-415b-9da8-8975451b7192","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人机共生"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ffa6facc-ea43-4410-86ca-9fc708ddddf6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"计算机就像一个能力巨大的猛兽，设计师要做的就是帮助人与计算机完成沟通，帮助人类利用计算机实现自己的目标。这需要设计师了解人类以及计算机，还包括商业环境中的营销、政策等多个因素，这些多角度的信息可以形成"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/764cbfa7-d40a-463e-a4ee-8048a85d1114","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"正交"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a110a6dd-d3d3-47f7-8cf6-c5c3b8183e21"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://medium.com/@yang140/computer-history-j-c-r-licklider-7490d8df7c26#:~:text=1960%E5%B9%B4%E5%8F%91%E8%A1%A8%E4%BA%86%E4%BB%96%E7%9A%84%E5%BC%80%E5%88%9B%E6%80%A7%E7%9A%84%E8%AE%BA%E6%96%87%20%E2%80%9CMan%20Computer%20Symbiosis%E2%80%9D%20%EF%BC%88%E4%BA%BA%E4%B8%8E%E7%94%B5%E8%84%91%E7%9A%84%E5%85%B1%E7%94%9F%EF%BC%89%E5%BC%BA%E7%83%88%E6%8E%A8%E8%8D%90%E9%98%85%E8%AF%BB%E5%8E%9F%E6%96%87","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"人机共生"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"9cac4371-37b4-4752-a675-d7cf95b8b139","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20220509100249.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":382,"originalWidth":694,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cca35f0f-ef8b-4165-acf5-b92d92b09b1f"}}]}
cards.title: 人机共生

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b3591845-1130-470e-a245-2de032b486f3","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人类利用机器的可连接性"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"09f3199a-9d10-4178-9e24-46ca365b7cbb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人类为了适应机器的可连接性，需要将对象进行原子化"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"em"}],"text":"（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"697909cc-84ff-4302-b978-450139f15884","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"em"}],"text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7","cardTitle":"Invalid card"},"marks":[{"type":"em"}]},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"em"}],"text":"）。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2fc66361-4386-4af2-8477-ecd9804e68bf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个案例是 Romresearch 支持链接到块，将页面元素拆成多个原子进行链接，机器适应了人类的习惯，让链接发生在更多场景。（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"795cd3e4-cc55-427c-81e9-7b693e9f4bd4","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]}]}

cards.content: cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8774f4ab-5937-4efe-b26b-f1bfea8decb1","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"企业中最大的成本是人与人之间的沟通"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"23699510-7a0f-4ff3-bf8d-c055bf32b3c5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"企业中最大的成本是人与人之间的沟通。降低沟通成本就是降低企业的成本。同时也能使得团队工作流得到完善，促进团队输出的高质量标准化。#Project/设计系统\n就是一种降低沟通成本的方案。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c6ef116-4aaf-4269-b6f5-64518d1a2d57"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://open.spotify.com/episode/3BNIXZatl6by3cHihUbHI6?si=ZC8Pj0ehQvyOJPtRoVb5Rw&utm_source=copy-link","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"spotify"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"879f439a-a404-488f-bfb6-f323a0229c0d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ae11c9bf-f1da-411b-8738-ee94502e2bc9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTA1ODk0MzQ","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-12-01 09:45:56"}]}]}
cards.title: 企业中最大的成本是人与人之间的沟通

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1ebd93d2-c3b9-4502-881d-185430e2ff04","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"标准化"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3ca47485-6239-4e93-b706-1144c8f0669f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"标准化可以带来许多收益"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"087eba5d-5443-4be6-97f9-c9ea26ead56f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1acb19d3-0565-4afa-9d7a-e3ac057b65df"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d3c7b588-aeb6-4db0-850e-454e53e4b6fc","cardTitle":"团队输出需要标准化"}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e85ada1b-f055-43c5-8c83-3e4b612090cc","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6ed17cdf-a9ff-4b49-abc8-0ef521a4a5dc"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ab5c76f5-6147-4f74-8a47-18ba9bfb7dff","cardTitle":"标准化带来高效率，工作流程也是一种标准化"}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a3f9de5c-ca2b-419a-9f27-d24dac8c2231","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dc63792a-2107-4a3b-aeaa-047c573356c5"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3309e1a5-8ffa-4009-924b-5cf55c7558c5","cardTitle":"模板"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c9188cdd-5819-42db-846b-39f093dba973","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"80f5f1c3-3599-44b2-963d-41aeae0f4fd4"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"f6f01bd5-62db-4ab9-9fbe-cc4010a3d8e2","cardTitle":"标准化有助于数据互通、协作"}}]}]}]}
cards.title: 标准化

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ce5a7a73-77bc-48c3-9749-d584ae334509","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"模板"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"218dcfed-1f77-433a-b637-878a65af8f1d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"月报模板、工具内模板（飞书、Notion 等）都是提供了一定标准化（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ab5c76f5-6147-4f74-8a47-18ba9bfb7dff","cardTitle":"标准化带来高效率，工作流程也是一种标准化"}},{"type":"text","text":"） ，提高效率。也能帮助用户更低成本的起步 ，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4385220c-3af6-425d-9a79-214121411744","cardTitle":"帮助用户进入心流状态"}},{"type":"text","text":" 。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e16dd3f-d8bc-4903-8bdb-9dbe8ac02dfc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以规范团队输出，一方面提升团队专业性，另一方面降低输出物消费者的上手门槛和消费体验（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"68d4d1ce-3ca0-42aa-a1a7-2640d7a6872c","cardTitle":"提升文档阅读体验"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e6f7c587-1826-4a9f-bd20-b6b3c653cd33"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"同时也要注意平衡模板的灵活性和稳定性，增加修改的摩擦（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"de25cf83-d572-4a7a-aa03-b607dea2b927","cardTitle":"增加设计系统的修改摩擦"}},{"type":"text","text":"） 特别是在团队协作中，原理与「锁」"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"6ff2b130-ab38-4f20-a0e3-22368baf7019","cardTitle":"锁"}},{"type":"text","text":" 相同"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"411e5084-3064-46af-b4ee-c665e0a5223b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"beacd4d2-88a5-4fa6-b9f8-c656fa6d64fc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=NTYzNDkyNw","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-08-17 21:49:02"}]}]}

-4b67-9360-d88226a60141"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"被操作的对象就是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ea736105-6cdf-480a-9fcc-9e31fb6d1004"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4aec4997-261e-4494-9ac2-cb11104b1cb6","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bde26743-fcdb-404f-b3e2-1583b41e7ca5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"合理的编码可以降低信息的不确定性（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"da444e38-c184-43fd-8d55-ccde391f7829"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"adce8da9-4743-4c59-bde6-42e5511e4783","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"29e4ccf6-8a75-43db-9f39-4ca7b478a0dc"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fb740c7c-4130-435b-85ab-1f20463607ff"}},{"type":"text","text":"具备强大的模拟能力（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d0a603ce-db99-4145-b8b8-37518d68e94f"}},{"type":"text","text":"）可以对信息进行强大的编码。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"58d93a0c-d115-490c-97f0-26a5235f054a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d694e5b2-c048-4441-8e1e-3753bd192dd8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信道：传递信号所使用的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"cf8f9036-26b2-468e-a884-4ed1e9baa78e"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7486110a-a0f9-4520-a087-1c67e76741c5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"848a38d6-b2f2-4de7-a026-32f73261a476"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fb740c7c-4130-435b-85ab-1f20463607ff"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"77a9ec87-93da-4db4-947e-1a1f5099794e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"17622441-1c4f-437c-bfd5-e0576de83e28"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d19501c8-cddc-4d87-b7f8-2e5810bafae4"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2b3529ce-9c9c-4217-83ea-726d14d56ad5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3af08589-81ec-46 cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"273146a6-5fb9-4878-848b-0c665837fd0c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"了解人类自身"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5fa34c92-a9db-4fe5-8a6c-9996057822a9"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"795cd3e4-cc55-427c-81e9-7b693e9f4bd4","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":"，产品设计需要让机器更懂人类，那么设计者本身就要更加了解人类自身。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"107f63f2-efa5-433f-a5c7-c715d9daf336"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"了解人类的习惯是什么，机器如何去适应它们。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"7f4e9f70-e8a4-4aeb-8c50-b6dafcb21210"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a20c0bee-10d6-4799-b7f8-c6f77699941d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以才需要学习"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"be28fdfa-e5b8-470b-bab6-42f25109a531","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"782f632c-9c26-4da1-ad63-6ae0ddd92ff1","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"解码"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"424beb8f-c7ec-4a6b-b610-c96febe03dc4"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7f526777-0ab1-4f99-9782-72d63ebacde9","cardTitle":"通信/信息系统"}},{"type":"text","text":"中，接受信息需要完成的步骤。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c79d625d-2dab-4a3a-bc9c-c606eafa488a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"指将信息通过某种方式转为自身"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"64d59b4a-6fc0-4608-85e0-c3bed84d03dd","cardTitle":"图式 Schema"}},{"type":"text","text":"可以理解的信息。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4671409e-0daa-4507-9540-81157202c178"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"be28fdfa-e5b8-470b-bab6-42f25109a531","cardTitle":"认知心理学"}},{"type":"text","text":"中从"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9be47ea3-af35-49cd-8c1c-8a13dd575130","cardTitle":"长时记忆"}},{"type":"text","text":"中提取信息的过程也称之为解码"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"aa1598b9-74a4-43d5-b925-1828ff17e7f6","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通信的基本问题"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c2d79792-ba42-404a-b597-35b3f3a1fae2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在一个点精确地或近似的复现在另一个点所"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"选取"},{"type":"text","text":"的讯息。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"aae279c2-20d3-4564-9f09-b3abd0f4c478","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0b43369b-e450-4382-a755-4798bf3d34da"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"动态媒介拥有强大的模拟能力，可以更加好的复现信息（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d0a603ce-db99-4145-b8b8-37518d68e94f"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ccb35eda-9a66-4179-be28-8788e316d735","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9beb5a12-7169-4046-8f91-5dc31108450a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7a89df48-e8af-48d8-bccd-bf9e56c2b26f"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"17da4eeb-49af-4f8f-b020-2fa50c4ba780","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"75830366-b268-48d9-a60c-a0dc74bcef76"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"产品设计其实也是一个通信问题，将对用户场景的理解（一个点的信息）在产品上体现出来并反馈给用户（在另一个点复现）"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ea0595f-33b9-4bd9-96c9-cde93ffdfe4e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"点是指两个信息位于不同的位置。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"04a8b411-42fd-450b-bb12-726387d3b02f"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0d2152e5-9da0-4f88-8d3a-10fbab94faac"}},{"type":"text","text":"4297"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"df5eec82-c1a5-494f-9015-09f4a985b3b3","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所见即所得 WYSIWYG"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4c22034d-5b87-4e24-b129-10584c52ce60"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所见即所得是指在一个编辑界面中用户所见与最终发布出来的效果相同。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2513b8e5-bb0b-4586-a72a-74f09da6ee39"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所见即所得降低了用户在不同状态之间切换的理解成本 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c0599d03-acb3-45d9-a9bb-1173dff99b76","cardTitle":"减少切换成本"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f8cc0043-fbfe-418f-a583-7a285cf8f63d"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e915ff1c-2850-4891-8375-173303a41118","cardTitle":"Theodor Holm Nelson"}},{"type":"text","text":" 认为 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"261bb5cf-5099-4641-b985-39a0be1ffdf4","cardTitle":"所见即所得限制了计算机的潜力"}}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"192ec46d-a2ad-4b82-bd3d-c2943bd4a72a","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所见即所得限制了计算机的潜力"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fd985a5f-168c-4c86-90ac-d69e2dcad2e2"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3ae41a4f-dffa-4688-9281-e4021b2e75fe","cardTitle":"一个新媒介的内容，必然来自旧媒介"}},{"type":"text","text":" 软件设计中的「"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"6422f894-65c1-45dc-b55b-f37d02613e7a","cardTitle":"所见即所得 WYSIWYG"}},{"type":"text","text":"」即是在模拟传统纸质媒介的特性，它限制了"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fb740c7c-4130-435b-85ab-1f20463607ff","cardTitle":"动态媒介"}},{"type":"text","text":"的潜力"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"89f212d3-a92f-4ac7-af30-ed707b4ba44a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"来自 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e915ff1c-2850-4891-8375-173303a41118","cardTitle":"Theodor Holm Nelson"}}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1b968bd7-1ef9-4d14-b9bd-a58f941db887","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习”学习”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"de36e982-7403-435e-aab4-f1858c5f3fdf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最近学了《"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/ckx8eb99w000501l2ewyt2kto","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"断墨寻径"},{"type":"text","text":"》才发现原来一直在学习但是一直没搞明白学习是什么，下面内容由学习笔记加上与已有知识的链接整理而成。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"4f437af7-fad4-4bf1-8ab4-8e2a4a075d23"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"71960cfb-9715-49e8-a060-52ddb8172409","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目标"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"acba1cc8-ca2d-4e1f-829b-7093221f9dea"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3d6ecc45-06ad-467f-a057-bb8e7bb6e4bf"}},{"type":"text","text":"分为重现和泛化。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8f0f80f8-8381-4288-8f12-98cf873faa4f","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"重现"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d23c96f4-b92a-4fe8-8f2c-d487ce2bf541"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在需要时可以重现知识即可，例如当同事说「老地方开会」时可以根据记忆提取出「老地方」对应的具体会议室。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6583bebb-7b78-4d7e-bc05-ae17bb16d597","level":3},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"70b811b2-3a07-4e7a-a2e1-2e71e0b33e10"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"69b7af51-f802-4c7d-8f7e-45cb87f35b28"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"根据有限的材料、经验总结归纳通用的规律，从而预测新的情况。例如设计前辈总结的这个"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4e3e0b7d-4ce2-4550-a53e-b5f7598d08c9"}},{"type":"text","text":"就可以在未来会接触到的新产品、新需求中应用。"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"1f05b185-6668-4710-a012-ce843493c4dd"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"433e5ce9-41ed-400e-8d01-a2cdf9fc340a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"业务需求分析"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"edcf9ba5-b35b-4432-88b6-1abdb11bdf50"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"动机：用户凭什么要用"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f5a32278-d5f9-4db8-affe-3f6cafe1239e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"担忧：使用此功能用户会存在哪些担忧吗"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff28ffea-41a1-4746-bded-01925940db86"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"障碍（负担）：当用户准备使用或在使用途中会遇到哪些阻碍"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"10818f30-f601-4ec1-9f56-e6f06fe7b82d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"找到学习目标非常重要，因为不同的目标对应了不同的学习方法，以重现为目标的学习有"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"217a65c9-9df9-431d-aaa5-301db4a9ed2d"}},{"type":"text","text":"等方法，而本文主要讨论泛化相关的方法。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f1adb06a-0f4f-4776-a4b1-2a739fa78a06","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"类型"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e50d7d4b-067d-4d0a-81e2-2923c45c042c","level":3},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a75e5b70-b25f-45b0-ba39-9057b547cea3"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bcfb6933-101e-4b01-ba3d-08aa36dc0277"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如学习数学公式、定义就是一种指令学习。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3c30af65-fcca-4ab3-b279-716e5c00dd91","level":3},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2fe67758-8048-4468-a604-bd90e71a3144"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"061696df-2fa8-4415-80a9-4f6210e168d5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过学习"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"12b13faf-70a0-4440-aa65-512315810084"}},{"type":"text","text":"总结归纳的学习。在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096"}},{"type":"text","text":"中存在一个"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"dc47e1fe-1bca-497f-9708-f453d0b70abe"}},{"type":"text","text":"的案例，人们对于杯子的识别拆分为多个几何形状/属性，例如有杯口、无缝可承载液体等等。通过将经验中遇到的杯子抽象出核心的几何形状，我们归纳了识别杯子的模型，在未来遇到不同设计和形状的杯子时都可以完成识别。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7410b962-36e8-48f3-a7df-a123c21daf62"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在归纳学习中有一种叫做"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"227b8b9b-4f8c-46b7-9b5c-e93dba2c43c1"}},{"type":"text","text":"的学习方法"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"066d604b-9f69-4a0f-ae2f-c908283fdc2f"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9b0fc7ad-bd02-4585-82a9-095213ac33b6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当你在学习一个知识时"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3cc61fd5-9998-444c-b4f6-988dd756f422","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"33ecbb6f-df8b-41c2-a685-3bdcd2500909"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"先阅读一次知识的定义"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"85294806-805f-4be1-af63-10e7166fb17a","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c9f0210b-99ab-43ab-a389-86bd4230d9c7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"找到与这个知识有关的习题、应用实例"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"17f53e53-6964-4c30-90cc-fbe55d235c34","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"323ada41-f556-4a4b-bb3b-7b9d1dfa91d8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"找到第 2 个习题、实例"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f65f831c-0010-4f9f-8887-b4a38c8abcaa","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8adb324a-1781-46f7-acc6-b4add3e0a47e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对比两个习题、实例，观察两者的相同点、差异点"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4fc86a9d-b27d-4327-9a55-75c505de3a72","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7f420a47-9f52-471d-adbf-5d2206ee0f77"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"寻找新题、实例测试自己的理解、并以此调整自己的理解"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1a1d57c1-59d5-41c4-9349-2cdfa4ed8b9a","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a096d57c-544f-48cd-880a-031f39666258"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"循环 1~5 步"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"900c5b38-7072-45b5-9a62-90ee65c8afcd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在学习过程中，我们可以先通过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a75e5b70-b25f-45b0-ba39-9057b547cea3"}},{"type":"text","text":"阅读一次知识的描述和定义，起到把握大方向的目的；之后通过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2fe67758-8048-4468-a604-bd90e71a3144"}},{"type":"text","text":"寻找大量案例对知识进行深入的理解和总结归纳。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"13892a89-1de9-4da2-b3a7-ae09edbb9eb4","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"材料"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8590773b-16ca-44e8-80be-ccad522fd131"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习需要材料，材料分为"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"91e5e064-87ab-4361-8669-eda59378b4ec"}},{"type":"text","text":"和"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"12b13faf-70a0-4440-aa65-512315810084"}},{"type":"text","text":"，面对不同的材料有不同的学习方法。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1140206f-b222-43ca-9f49-8b4f437ebaca","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"指令材料"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c7ca3e98-0eb9-49f0-aa22-a761d4e16297"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以理解为是一段对知识的描述。例如「偶数是所有可以被 2 整除的整数」，这里就包含若干个指令："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3125b3bb-47ca-47f0-9b15-29cb2df893e7","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"75c6c936-b97c-41ff-94a5-5eff0237dc55"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"整除"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f558f528-8428-4591-bc8a-73f8f88507fd","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c50f90fe-f543-4609-8aee-b5064ff6d693"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"整数"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d792264c-7ced-4f2a-8f29-853656904d80"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习指令材料需要搞清楚指令中的每一个名词的含义，否则连描述都没搞懂就谈不上学习了。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"de644f64-b1d9-4424-a25d-8eab64680905","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实例材料"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d3c7197b-4349-4f09-9688-ad8b2da5a9e4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我理解为具体的例子。相比"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"91e5e064-87ab-4361-8669-eda59378b4ec"}},{"type":"text","text":"，人类发展史中更多接触实例，从而更容易被大脑接纳。一个好的实例材料需要同时拥有问题和答案，因为我们依赖寻找问题与答案之间的规律获取知识实现前面提到的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"泛化"},{"type":"text","text":"的目标。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"daec551a-99e8-4474-a223-abde3f7d4a37","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"存储"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4b0ccb3b-aaa7-4a88-831d-d900eed0d162"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"你是否有过看了书、做了笔记但是根本无法应用甚至想不起来的情况？那可能是因为知识没能完成存储。只有将所学知识存储在大脑中将来才有应用的可能。通过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"be5e13f3-0b60-4499-be3f-f8f62b1287ca"}},{"type":"text","text":"和"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9961054b-dfb2-460b-9bc8-4d1aea1e5621"}},{"type":"text","text":"促进知识的存储。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"fb772ac4-f187-4f13-9602-6d0459efe72c","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"精细加工"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6073249f-4bd7-4c06-a9e7-6bf877b4d774"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"首先需要"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"输入更多实例"},{"type":"text","text":"，帮助我们验证知识是否可以验证各种实例。比如「偶数是所有可以被 2 整除的整数」，为了深入理解它，你需要代入不同的数字进行验证，2、3、4、5……13、14、15。这些例子还可\b以帮助我们构建规律，例如你会发现无论是 2324 还是 12398，这些偶数都是以 2、4、6、8、0 结尾，当你总结出这个规律则只需要阅读最后 1 个数字就可以快速判断而无需进行计算。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1fce7320-889b-487b-8d1c-fb23c4405c46"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其次需要"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"建立新知识与已有知识的链接"},{"type":"text","text":"。"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096"}},{"type":"text","text":"中有介绍一个实验，分别让被试通过以下 3 种方式处理单词"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4f3e2d1d-6644-4de1-8f2a-9743bda31c53","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"82f8d3fd-6d4d-4c53-af12-84a0dff5c8bd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"特征：大小写"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"69d670f2-21db-4086-8143-57ada0513c1f","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1e605e78-c4e7-42b0-9c9c-d00742ec591f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"读音：和另一个单词是否押韵"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a0f9b1ec-09b6-46ed-8e64-9cbec34e773a","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b3c516ae-fd54-4a68-9242-7e487993be66"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"语义：是否可以填入一个特定句子中"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c0b8f1ea-11bd-45d7-81b0-3d204001b1eb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实验证明，经过语义加工的单词记忆的更加牢固。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bd7ec53d-f806-4f1f-bed3-061e225ffaf7"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7"}},{"type":"text","text":"也提到过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4bce1c0b-73e0-4517-bd63-2d777514ab30"}},{"type":"text","text":"的概念，知识通过链接比起孤立更有被激活、从记忆中提取出来的可能。在我自己的实践中，新知识记录成笔记后会寻找与哪些旧笔记存在关联，积极地建立"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2ffab447-a5cb-41e1-b790-4047343c038f"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58d7ed45-4d17-4af4-9244-f2126dff15ef"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"除了通过链接来提升存储的强度，还可以链接概念和案例，达到前面讲的「输入更多实例」的目的。（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c6799c5a-1e02-4fd4-b1bf-c227882d474d"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fb686cf7-20e9-468e-bb57-e118a459ee3c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如我曾经记录过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5949d37d-e98d-4016-8b06-98116f6d0356"}},{"type":"text","text":"中，通过在拼装的过程就让"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9ae28abf-0291-44d9-9d08-68bdd0381384"}},{"type":"text","text":"更及时的传递给用户（错误的拼装方式一定无法成功拼上），不至于等到用户最后才发现由于前面的错误导致后面的部位无法拼装上去。这种「唯一解法」消除了用户可能存在的歧义。这条笔记和"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5059fa9c-4c4e-42aa-b4db-1419f5fc7a26"}},{"type":"text","text":"这条笔记链接在一起，成为了这个观点的实例。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"26bba8d8-84e2-4890-ac0a-250d13f3a259","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有效训练"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d0b7e7e0-d4c5-4c7e-9965-16d6166fbcee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"需要实际执行、答案反馈。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"913f0380-3da5-4571-a504-df25f50ced1c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实际执行相当于预热，刺激大脑相关神经元做好改变结构的准备；答案反馈则是告诉大脑应该如何更新结构。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"785c0970-7936-4af9-ae6e-a8b4b555563e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如在广州多年，我的粤语听力就通过输入问题（听到语句）和答案反馈（对方实际的行为以及用普通话沟通后验证的答案）让我学会了听，但在讲方面因为缺少实际执行和反馈，所以多年也没有学会粤语。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"cce2ceac-5bdc-4254-86a4-3de123b3f3ba","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"验证"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f785a44a-c652-4c24-8705-2967e293bc38"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前面我们已经搞清楚了学习的目标、材料的类型和不同的学习方式，并将知识存储到大脑中，之后就要验证自己是否真的掌握了所学内容。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0405c5b6-1e98-42e9-8ca8-c37275369db8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在学习的初步阶段，我在做笔记时除了转述知识，还会"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E7%AC%94%E8%AE%B0%E9%9C%80%E8%A6%81%E4%B8%BE%E4%BE%8B%2050f6f3ee-8b8c-4442-a1a2-aaac5cd597cb.md","title":"笔记需要举例","data-internal-href":"meta://card/50f6f3ee-8b8c-4442-a1a2-aaac5cd597cb","edited":true}}],"text":"思考有哪些教材中没有提到的案例"},{"type":"text","text":"可以证明所学的知识。例如在学习前面提到的「有效训练」时就联想到了自己粤语能力的案例。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eac5dda9-2064-4a5e-8b96-88366d7a6267"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在学习的后期，通常具备比较系统化的知识体系，此时会结合"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"989780e5-5139-4c22-bc7d-49e368cc88ad"}},{"type":"text","text":"输出文章或者口头与其他人分享，以教别人的态度验证自己的理解程度。写出这篇文章就是一个验证的方式，如果我没理解，则无法写出来，可能你也发现了文中存在不通的地方，那说明我的理解还非常有限。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e2b06379-bf0f-4eea-9dda-6fef280c0799"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae404370-513b-4424-b696-b3cd03b7a9be"}},{"type":"text","text":"，上述两种方式其实都是在引入「新情况」。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"355b3c17-51a5-4faa-8884-d60b3b503af4"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b10f98ea-f87e-4ec3-8386-dcda99ad86d0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考资料"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8e914e54-8a09-42d2-b127-a35a2796f714","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"db8a75c0-6d10-456f-913a-b7aadcc59264"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/ckx8eb99w000501l2ewyt2kto","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"逐构-断墨寻径"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5f2435a7-4428-4188-b629-c4679b4cd9ce"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相关文章"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ea8270a8-c0f1-4863-a800-79836ff148fd","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4137aa04-a2fa-4c1f-920f-7b289be2d3f4"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d5682a77-56d4-4c65-bc22-87bfec50dbd1"}}]}]}]}
cards.title: 学习”学习”

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"98374781-0e8a-4d74-9953-86d669acc623","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习的目标"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1b1a0e52-6f6a-4093-904e-9f46c3947fac","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52c00745-ca84-44af-9357-c088a8dc8d0a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"重现：在需要时可以重现知识即可"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bcb79a64-0c88-4dac-a3ef-4351baab723f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf73d273-7fc8-4eb0-9fe5-59b795084fb3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如记忆数学公式、记忆一个科学家的名字"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3ccef846-9632-49b8-884b-e07ac5bfbcbc","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"35a0db03-beed-4f91-aa12-1cfdf1192737"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"70b811b2-3a07-4e7a-a2e1-2e71e0b33e10"}},{"type":"text","text":"：根据有限的材料总结归纳通用的规律，从而预测新的情况"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"06bc86f8-2a03-4b0d-8be4-1ce59a6d5c16","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"35208601-2770-4b37-a4ee-bd169f33bbe1"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae404370-513b-4424-b696-b3cd03b7a9be"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e65a6a70-704c-41b8-9b94-b0e397bddaf8","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8adad3b9-5055-4128-ab75-65fd5cfe2c2b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如理解学习目标的概念后，可以用来判断不同学习的目标是什么，从而采取不同的学习策略"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dcd53d1f-9dbe-421e-aa34-a4c877614a43"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/ckx8iqz7a000b01l21i3f1dcb","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/ckx8iqz7a000b01l21i3f1dcb"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3198b0db-2e64-4503-b1a2-d359507f162d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"间歇重复"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"465baf2f-6fe1-4ecc-82f6-a63414f6c06a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"德国心理学家赫尔曼·艾宾浩斯发明的记忆方法。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"78b6bcd4-dcbc-4152-8c00-9a2e405077c4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在对记忆的研究中，他开创性的通过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7b4d7be7-f123-4db0-93a5-25fa646601c4","cardTitle":"控制变量以开展研究"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d035f7d4-72a5-4b11-9ba6-5a019a02f249"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考资料："},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://ncase.me/remember/zh.html","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://ncase.me/remember/zh.html"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6d09cb95-ae2c-46d7-82cf-45519e62229f","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"控制变量以开展研究"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4e0f133a-e05f-45f9-be95-d4f97a46828e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对应记忆的研究中，过往的方法是从已形成的记忆中倒推形成的机制；而艾宾浩斯反其道而行，从源头探索记忆是如何发展的，这样才能做到控制变量。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"bf6401eb-9caf-4dbf-8c32-6b6a510669a2","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20220826132754.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"50%","originalHeight":454,"originalWidth":533,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"679dd56b-ce0c-47e4-add2-0d592b64a2bb"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096"}},{"type":"text","text":"4245"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1a26225b-f8d0-4ac9-8d55-ca2403e83d34"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e1664817-79d2-44ad-b395-1928c213853a"}},{"type":"text","text":"中对精确性的要求。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"61f93874-288b-4067-befc-6a36395bfeec"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另一个案例："},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c7f303aa-d095-4c91-9ac7-176ec47a76a0"}}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"dd830a56-c2da-4d89-bba0-43b496317306","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"科学的三大要素"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a6853114-fbbb-4b17-aead-403c6616aadc","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d088c368-66af-4552-9b30-5c9508826282"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可验证"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"25de597a-5ff8-47a5-a4c7-1c67d9864a16","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff067247-50f2-49d7-9eb1-012c99309230"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可控"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0e7bcfed-b464-45b9-801c-1d972fc79e29","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c5e4440a-5100-401c-a6b9-f52b4ea47c76"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"精确"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f2f43948-d425-4cfc-9573-89de97a06259"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e1eb5746-af0b-4362-b48a-6184fb8e6286","cardTitle":"《学会提问》"}},{"type":"text","text":" 2038"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"31c1e550-0831-4bf1-bf6e-1a494e0ea034"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"96078cf1-a5f1-4bb2-850a-6a4f21ea7296"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MjAzMTQ3MzQ","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-04-03 17:38:27"}]}]}
cards.title: 科学的三大要素

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"27dfedc2-8735-431c-ab89-450172fb2d88","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息科学对心理学的影响"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fdc26cb7-3797-459e-ae46-dfbe90f252ce"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息科学的研究为心理学提供了可研究的实体。让原本看不见摸不着的心智得以被机器模拟被人类观察和研究。"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0243e73d-f5c3-45e0-87fe-8b858f15a620","cardTitle":"信息科学与心理学的羁绊"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0a72f8db-6dd9-42ce-8eec-4e9d1290b58b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这与符号对思想进行可视化的作用相似 —— "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"659fb7b3-effe-4e50-8e18-b0e7ded26eeb","cardTitle":"文字赋予人类反思的能力以及复杂信息的传播能力"}}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"bd442c3c-0c6c-473d-a522-da8ec77badfc"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d82d044c-ac0f-490d-8e7f-cb9f9456e754"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0d2152e5-9da0-4f88-8d3a-10fbab94faac","cardTitle":"《信息简史》"}},{"type":"text","text":" 4937"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 信息科学对心理学的影响

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"758c7ea1-a1fe-40b5-96a0-9caa677799f7","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"《学会提问》"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d9b96ef6-3698-4efe-ac3d-2d77b86c5489"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"作者: "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://book.douban.com/search/%E5%B0%BC%E5%B0%94%C2%B7%E5%B8%83%E6%9C%97","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"[美] 尼尔·布朗"},{"type":"text","text":" / "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://book.douban.com/search/%E6%96%AF%E5%9B%BE%E5%B0%94%E7%89%B9%C2%B7%E5%9F%BA%E5%88%A9","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"[美] 斯图尔特·基利"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3cd685a6-32c7-4da7-9f06-98aa97c0594c"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://book.douban.com/subject/20428922/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://book.douban.com/subject/20428922/"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"08d64be2-19aa-44bc-9d0c-e24a0f4f9791","src":"https://img1.doubanio.com/view/subject/l/public/s24939868.jpg#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"60%","originalHeight":804,"originalWidth":562,"alignment":"center"}}]}
cards.title: 《学会提问》

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b0982997-a369-40a1-a875-97eda472c2d6","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息科学与心理学的羁绊"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"21af20a3-98c3-467c-8ecf-4776a12fc8d5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现代软件开发过程中，设计与软件工程相互影响。其实在历史中它们也存在非常深的渊源。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"715e3bde-3b52-479f-85db-fb477b9d19ce"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在更早的时候，心理学研究的「灵魂」、「心智」都是看不见摸不着的事物，科学家无法对其进行研究和分析；后来诞生了信息论，它尝试创造可思考的机器，例如齿轮模拟大脑思考，这让心理学家发现如果信息可以被观察，而拥有同样信息处理逻辑的大脑为什么不能呢？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fb27fa85-2a91-49f5-b6da-fccd65c7abd3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"于是开展了许多研究。"}]}]}
cards.title: 信息科学与心理学的羁绊

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2e2b2249-0322-475f-8f7b-058a97fd832d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"文字赋予人类反思的能力以及复杂信息的传播能力"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"13a93ed2-1d55-4a0c-80ac-922c09a1df22"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过将信息可视化，可以帮助人类更好的处理信息 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ef35f4be-0849-4de2-9322-cf09b644363f","cardTitle":"机器不会降低人类的智能，而是和人类一起合作更好地完成工作"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5e443556-7676-48e0-aa1c-34cab2a895aa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息的传播将不受限于作者肉体的存亡"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3137613e-21d7-4a00-9dbc-99ea1e30f887","cardTitle":"符号给了信息以超越时间和空间的能力"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ad8a900-0f2b-404a-a713-11d1d6251b67"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提高了人类接收信息的渠道和效率。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"579e5b8e-0e9c-48ac-a003-108d803848be"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0d2152e5-9da0-4f88-8d3a-10fbab94faac","cardTitle":"《信息简史》"}},{"type":"text","text":" 941"}]}]}
cards.title: 文字赋予人类反思的能力以及复杂信息的传播能力

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1be9ac9b-7d3c-47e5-8122-cb468890be09","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"机器不会降低人类的智能，而是和人类一起合作更好地完成工作"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1cc16c7e-70f6-4fe3-9d56-86082e03214b"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8625888a-3134-4bca-b68d-068e0b95c581","cardTitle":"人机共生"}},{"type":"text","text":" 这一点和《简约设计》中的观点一致——人类擅长创造，机器擅长精确的工作和记忆，应该用「转移」的方式让大家做自己擅长的工作，从而更好地完成工作。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"ff584370-f1ff-4ab2-938d-d9bfab02d27c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e884a52-cc1e-41e9-9bf5-9f1f925a28c2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=NDE5Mzc4NQ","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-07-14 09:38:13"}]}]}
cards.title: 机器不会降低人类的智能，而是和人类一起合作更好地完成工作

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b0f38288-50d7-4948-b42c-6062e9e3ae7d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"符号给了信息以超越时间和空间的能力"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d9e146bd-edd8-4f7b-bbf9-d169431b2b22"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不再依赖于符号输出者的位置与存亡即可交流信息。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"40f814c2-a051-4f28-b575-276b7a83886a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0d2152e5-9da0-4f88-8d3a-10fbab94faac","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":" 670"}]}]}
cards.title: 符号给了信息以超越时间和空间的能力

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ccdf527b-f1d2-400a-a884-94538ec91ba5","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"指令学习"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"87f66493-3732-4226-b7f5-e4231f4df680"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习材料是指令、定义（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"91e5e064-87ab-4361-8669-eda59378b4ec","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7a3a5124-1d21-4a8f-9c18-9a24c6ced83e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如学习数学公式、定义就是一种指令学习；而学习英语则不是。"}]}]}
cards.title: 指令学习

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e0ee3658-da18-43e0-b10c-33246f66bd9f","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"指令材料"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fdaa1a02-c356-4fb1-843f-3daf55430e99"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以理解为是一段对知识的描述。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"64585d71-2091-4dc7-abcc-a8e63d3d2aee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如「偶数是所有可以被 2 整除的整数」，这里就包含若干个指令"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"26a93bf4-43db-421c-a0de-5811218a4455","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"064dfe60-4356-4773-9fdf-7b15c08a14e9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"整除"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4c82ceff-7699-4f5b-a80e-9aa3ea577bb9","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2755bcdb-a076-41a1-8861-6de1bd89611b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"整数"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"589f5e51-de79-46c7-b689-d51967cd95b6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习指令材料需要搞清楚指令中的每一个名词的含义。"}]}]}
cards.title: 指令材料

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6a5ea8de-0cd1-4739-a9a9-80ecf3d09c62","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"归纳学习"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c1b31fc0-2775-4905-bfc5-272a00f8454b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过学习"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"12b13faf-70a0-4440-aa65-512315810084","cardTitle":"实例材料"}},{"type":"text","text":"总结归纳规律的学习。（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae404370-513b-4424-b696-b3cd03b7a9be","cardTitle":"知识是对有限案例的抽象以应对无限的新情况"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"82a93a62-f3ec-4773-85f2-673614a3a73e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"归纳的目标在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096","cardTitle":"《认知心理学》"}},{"type":"text","text":"中称之为泛化，既使用通用规律预测新情况。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a03c447b-27e0-45e8-9915-f6f81aabaafd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如竞品分析就是在归纳不同竞品对同一个目标所采取的方案。"}]}]}
cards.title: 归纳学习

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5a2c6282-05c4-41ef-a0cf-2ee0d91ce5ae","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实例材料"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a0d60d9f-e658-446d-b269-f97dba2cb9b1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实在的例子。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ded7e5c3-225b-462e-9d2d-53e99780e0b9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人们通过实例材料进行学习，相比"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"91e5e064-87ab-4361-8669-eda59378b4ec","cardTitle":"指令材料"}},{"type":"text","text":"，人类发展史中更多接触实例，从而更容易接纳。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9fc268db-d7a5-403d-8b03-7a55b8892229"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实例材料需要同时拥有问题和解答，因为我们依赖寻找问题与答案之间的规律获取知识（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae404370-513b-4424-b696-b3cd03b7a9be","cardTitle":"知识是对有限案例的抽象以应对无限的新情况"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"48b07270-7e78-4c85-b43a-0c080a001252","cardTitle":"学习要搞清楚输入和输出"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"81f9c0c9-4004-4d99-a53a-85ea1eca239d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如告诉你修改文档后没有通知上下游合作方，而不说造成的结果（导致信息不对称而影响了项目）就很难从问题和答案之间找到规律（保持信息对称可以让项目进展更加顺利。当然这种规律不一定只需要 1 个材料就可得出）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"37668fa4-c81b-4496-be3a-3e062191b61c"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"dc47e1fe-1bca-497f-9708-f453d0b70abe","cardTitle":"几何离子"}},{"type":"text","text":"的案例中（也就是现实世界中）就存在大量的实例材料，例如我们知道了大量杯子的实例，并提取出诸如有口、可承载液体（甚至固体）、可握持等离子特征进行学习（掌握关于识别杯子的知识），当遇到新杯子时就可以进行正确的识别。这种现实案例就包含了问题（几何）和答案（用它喝水）的组合，甚至进化出只要如何几何条件即便不是杯子的容器也可以用来喝水的知识。"}]}]}
cards.title: 实例材料

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"29fb6c85-dbc5-402c-ac13-5d15a9ce21bf","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"几何离子"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"90e5f918-af8b-440f-8c45-0b1d8ef09f06"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们基于复杂图形的理解是将图形拆解成更小的离子对象（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"697909cc-84ff-4302-b978-450139f15884"}},{"type":"text","text":"）。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ba248300-3b9a-4c81-ba1c-9759fdd902ed"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如，一个笔记本电脑有几个矩形拼凑而成。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"67937293-106e-4388-91cb-88db02478cea","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/1314d81e-87d9-4248-98d7-7844fd59c8b0/image.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"100%","originalHeight":1006,"originalWidth":1038,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa9f388b-c941-4296-8243-390de5c5aa84"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"eaedfa86-3aa3-4ea8-9818-68be66c05cb2"}},{"type":"text","text":"中，虽然我们没有保存那么多的杯子模型，但是基于离子模型的组织也可以完成匹配工作。"}]}]}
cards.title: 几何离子

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"75778045-1c78-4b7e-bd3a-994238eaf2c2","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"双例对比法"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a7170836-a814-410a-ac69-85111d43a3d9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2fe67758-8048-4468-a604-bd90e71a3144","cardTitle":"归纳学习"}},{"type":"text","text":"的一种方法，操作步骤"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"42d39718-b805-4d67-a71a-41a2ee9a13cb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当你在学习一个知识时"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e4c82806-fe11-4258-bce4-f256a678af5f","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"da45c91e-7a4a-4c0c-b6e4-d9748b36b3c1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"先阅读一次知识的定义"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d1a8f7a0-53ad-4717-90d6-6f028dda5ab7","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"78763947-93e0-4f15-b624-90745bbf13ff"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"找到与这个知识有关的习题、应用实例"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"901a6845-e104-4fe0-810b-4d77546059c0","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5c6c257c-d291-4668-9488-28edf2757d31"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"找到第 2 个习题、实例"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c1dba8d1-a0b9-4e73-aceb-8638806ee6e5","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c8ac8cb1-4d31-4d04-9941-8c76b0f6cd68"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对比两个习题、实例，观察两者的相同点、差异点"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f74a0dda-b5fc-4eb2-ba76-1ecea420db9b","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f2accd62-cb7e-43d7-8ffb-0d2bb56370e9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"寻找新题、实例测试自己的理解、并以此调整自己的理解"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a3fa3856-3cf4-4445-8c57-b230bee1920b","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"13718784-16f8-4841-a275-c567cc02cea2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"循环 1~5 步"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"967e3590-ba21-404e-abea-3c719762a20e"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/ckx8itiir000l01l2avezagzt","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/ckx8itiir000l01l2avezagzt"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"42f7972d-f83e-4c41-944e-ceb3cd60da25"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7ce9cd5e-8e43-41f2-9303-639cd87b25dd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"认知心理学原理"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"11e4bc0e-c460-4851-b4ab-59e3b8e417d9","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8645df97-134e-4e65-beb0-9fa51869bb3e"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"44d81bc3-7a03-46db-9391-689bf63ec3be","cardTitle":"寻找联系是人类的本能"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b0f26153-0e29-4a78-8759-d070706e8b8a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"过往的案例"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7ae71a95-3986-435f-807d-a62ba805b373","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f0f1cfc0-7e82-49b1-891e-f8d92934b2a0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"产品竞品分析就是一种双例对比"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"05f9fab8-455c-46df-acfc-6db5edea50d8","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8979c074-d521-466b-aa5e-bef14389cf1e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"获得一个问题（例如设计一个搜索功能）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f7b50c4c-3b20-4c8b-851f-04b741f3e61e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dcf1dbf1-f2d9-4d37-bba5-866f5d38be12"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过观察多个竞品开始寻找规律"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8a865139-77f2-4fb8-92bf-3909bd3a73ad","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"28d819d8-fae5-48a1-ba22-1120e96b65e8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总结相同点和差异点"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"89220193-9d2e-4363-82b1-0acc18d78289","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7c228a1a-8dda-43ae-9acd-eff56a4dd5e3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在更多的竞品中验证这种规律"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b7e818d9-240a-4b41-aac1-146cfd16062b","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a1e5182d-f9ac-4346-8033-ba4cb314719e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在自家产品中应用"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"21f3d68a-7ede-4b59-80fe-95cede22b7ec","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"15b8f241-0002-490f-b99e-d67ee372c07d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计学原理课的案例也应用了双例对比 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9e5a93e5-2f87-4279-8358-632be8dec6b8","cardTitle":"设计研究方法"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1bd745a2-fa01-46d3-97f0-cdc1417c3ac9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"完成一次"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2ffab447-a5cb-41e1-b790-4047343c038f","cardTitle":"双向链接"}},{"type":"text","text":"会不会就完成了一次双例对比？将新知识与旧知识进行对比，从而完成归纳学习。"}]}]}
cards.title: 双例对比法

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1b4b46e1-4dd6-4a67-ae45-e85eaf6c6dc3","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"寻找联系是人类的本能"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0676486a-47d2-48be-a406-0a2b98a7f14a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人类容易受"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"899f5179-783d-4035-807a-53e202e19ace","cardTitle":"启动效应"}},{"type":"text","text":"的影响，从启动对象出发，在内部的模板中（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"eaedfa86-3aa3-4ea8-9818-68be66c05cb2","cardTitle":"模板匹配"}},{"type":"text","text":"）进行认知、寻找关联。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"cd4dbb24-176b-4652-abc1-6e6252c5e334"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b6300453-8f37-473c-b459-5b2655bbb588"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另一方面，人类的生存需要使用知识预测新情况，而联系有利于知识的形成。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ad78f84a-b1d8-4b57-ad61-3d062a5bc6fd"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae404370-513b-4424-b696-b3cd03b7a9be","cardTitle":"知识是对有限案例的抽象以应对无限的新情况"}}]}]}
cards.title: 寻找联系是人类的本能

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2508c5c2-5028-4559-a32e-157a47eb77ff","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计研究方法"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"40af56e0-7750-4b8a-b556-615d265841c9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对比两件设计的功能是否相似，在相似的基础上才好展开后续研究"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b32c79ce-7d36-4e76-88ce-b6198342388a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"79ff57b0-d78a-43db-bc0e-8ad5d4bbfb7e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分析两件设计的表现层特征和差异（例如甲骨文、楔形文字的风格、形状）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4d73bce4-2bc5-45a2-9f53-e8c080abc398","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eaf3ecf6-d069-4354-a506-28f4d9b82fbe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分析造成表现层差异的内部因素 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"88fcf5ce-9638-4b2f-8ed9-989e386d1f48","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"597581f4-e2af-41d4-9245-7e944d4aebcb","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8b114bd6-397d-45d7-86d1-8aa75d3c6122"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分析造成内部因素差异的外部因素"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"48083637-bf1c-4620-ad4f-6aba3f9265bb"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8b4231bb-be06-4c3b-8c84-b6e3ee0ae9d8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MjExNzAxNTc","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-04-13 08:57:17"}]}]}
cards.title: 设计研究方法

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f80e3e38-d74f-465e-aacf-f50e1ab9a966","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计中的内外部因素"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b3109258-9f5f-4052-a7fb-089394ab0578"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"内部因素：形式、材料、技术、工艺、色彩、成本等设计师可以直接、间接影响的因素"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ca1d6de3-dfe0-4665-949a-b058808e06b8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"外部因素：政治、经济、环境等不参与设计构成但对设计造成重要影响的因素"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3a64bdb9-1124-45b6-a927-8af732f45080"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计师通常更多关注内部因素；需要更多思考外部因素带来的机会和限制，选择机会、限制交集的最优点。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"37aadd13-6c29-4c37-b04d-2bf5a8f75b8e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计的内部因素是否适合外部因素是评价设计质量的重要指标。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"39d5d363-0ec8-4d69-9f68-d84b99d88f83"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.xuetangx.com/learn/WHUT13051001371/WHUT13051001371/10321787/video/17360973","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.xuetangx.com/learn/WHUT13051001371/WHUT13051001371/10321787/video/17360973"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"cd74600e-90c5-4dd3-85bf-63ff45d62bf2","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20220506134840.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1247,"originalWidth":1200,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"81c480d1-c2c2-402a-bbb0-0598ce9d30b5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"988528f8-ea49-49e2-a682-775333acdee7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MjExNjg3OTY","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-04-13 08:41:44"}]}]}
cards.title: 设计中的内外部因素

cards.content: itle":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/ckx8iz1bs001a01l2dypxfm8p"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"76cc78a8-4073-4a87-a15a-97243799c2c2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如学习语法后需要查看大量的例句来建构语法规律，同时新语法可以与已有的语法、单词进行关联造句，从而提升记忆强度。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0fbc3c13-90b9-4690-a455-a4e95a3a6812"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"星荣的英语教学方式就是不断的重复和制造大量的例子，同时也加入了过往的旧知识一起造句。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"952489f1-9616-4011-922a-6f345845db79"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自己的日语学习方法也是不直接记忆，而是通过大量阅读和听力输入例子，并通过与已掌握的语法、单词一起造句加深印象。"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a2f81862-3a4f-40c9-9c0b-a06adef655b1","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有效训练"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"84a2adab-bc42-48c8-a389-b1af5dc19658"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"需要"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"实际执行+答案反馈"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3c6d841b-e37c-4f41-af5c-306f98233bc8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实际执行相当于预热，刺激大脑相关神经元做好改变结构的准备；答案反馈则是告诉大脑应该如何更新结构。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d5a77939-275b-4a04-a9ae-ba68a6608a30"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/ckx8iz1bs001a01l2dypxfm8p","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/ckx8iz1bs001a01l2dypxfm8p"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2e47f70b-82c2-46a0-ba01-07fec804552d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如粤语的听力就通过输入问题（听到语句）和答案反馈（对方实际的行为以及用普通话沟通后验证的答案）让我学会了听，但在讲方面因为缺少实际执行和反馈，所以在广州许多年也没有学会粤语。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4fbbfef0-bc18-4e05-a9a6-91887f15db89"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相关链接"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8e9b3ddc-907e-44f6-9c01-9900636232d2","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a9506e95-4323-4c1d-805b-255debd90188"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"989780e5-5139-4c22-bc7d-49e368cc88ad"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8e36c340-d39e-48e3-84d1-b3323781ed7e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e67a601c-2f94-414f-bef2-57326a6149a0"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d5682a77-56d4-4c65-bc22-87bfec50dbd1"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"070dfee0-a83a-47e6-af8b-2977285778a3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8da9b35f-471e-43c2-8d03-111b17de3fd3"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2d999816-4aa0-4a9d-a831-1b75c3af45ef"}}]}]}]}
