cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"21784253-0208-478d-b5bf-ef93547d56ac","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"非自愿记忆"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2986ea87-1785-499e-a03c-a4116ef853c3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在人脑中因为某些线索而被动触发的记忆（应该是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9be47ea3-af35-49cd-8c1c-8a13dd575130","cardTitle":"长时记忆"}},{"type":"text","text":"的一种）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8e8763b9-35de-43c5-89a4-e78f00e388e1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如坐在教室（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c5f07ec4-0358-488a-b4c1-ecc160b0062a","cardTitle":"情境 Context"}},{"type":"text","text":"）里容易回想起校园里所学的知识和发生的事情。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6031c1f6-f3cf-4067-86a8-53112e7a0676"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"卡片笔记强调在笔记之间相互链接，以达到触发记忆的效果，比起死记硬背知识更有效。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"90f1b0b6-6ed1-4a5f-97d6-c9a72193223b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"| 《卡片笔记》 p167"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"bbac1a2b-7d80-4696-9bcc-3f6b2e09e13d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"25b9ad0e-d11e-4f6a-ad5b-de88c80433b4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=NDUwMDE0OQ","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-07-22 09:22:26"}]}]}
cards.title: 非自愿记忆

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c3b20e53-6366-4403-8186-7e220237b78d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2ffab447-a5cb-41e1-b790-4047343c038f","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":"为知识积累例子"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7665cc60-5f49-41c3-9523-ea1f35e4b639"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae404370-513b-4424-b696-b3cd03b7a9be","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":"，当我在做笔记完成一个双向链接时"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2df036a0-edc2-4703-bb52-7e41eb1a8f97","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"105ce54b-b7fc-40d6-be0f-c0f446fabb7e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于当前笔记：新问题可以拆分多个小问题，其中一些小问题引用了历史学习到的知识，使得复杂问题更容易得到解决"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e2899d28-34de-4386-bfde-dc2423a8b935","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4ba663bd-458b-4c8c-9812-89540e487b66"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于被引用的笔记：当前笔记就是它应用的一个例子，这个例子会验证所学知识，也在未来想要分享时形成一个新的例子方便受众理解。"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 双向链接为知识积累例子

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"392168c4-30fb-4c7d-9f44-301c05f25348","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"反馈"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ee95cd30-2340-466f-bfa7-99dcd08d924c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"反馈不一定是针对用户操作后的直接回馈，也可以是广义的对系统状态的呈现，例如文本编辑器在角落里显示当前已录入的文字数量。"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"72944930-9c42-46ff-b674-0df96bfc1c86"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ce59833f-001a-42d4-ba9f-960c7784b5a6"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"724c99ab-a7dc-4b10-87f7-d9e197329511","cardTitle":"《About Face 4：交互设计精髓》"}},{"type":"text","text":" p208"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"dce53b67-7b11-4fd7-bdea-9ba7768301e6"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff093aa5-7079-43f2-9331-b4eecfd57137"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTUyMTUwNjM","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-02-05 22:52:04"}]}]}
cards.title: 反馈

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1c088ad8-d72e-4fb4-9f06-a050ffb01845","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"沟通最最重要的是消除歧义"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"81267d99-0fb1-45be-ae2c-a6883c28b7b4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"沟通 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a2ae38af-7efc-48ae-88f4-6dbab3c7420d","cardTitle":"企业中最大的成本是人与人之间的沟通"}},{"type":"text","text":" 最重要的就是消除歧义 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"76516539-60ec-46ed-8cdd-ba6faef9d520","cardTitle":"在线文档有助于消除沟通歧义"}},{"type":"text","text":"，减少因为歧义而造成的额外成本。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c10c3d28-d8d0-4184-ac87-632b0f63b07d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提供标准共享的文档是实现方式之一。（所以 设计系统/组件库 需要扩大共享范围才能让价值更大化 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c7e22bc3-879a-406e-9f90-8c39fc0ff857","cardTitle":"梅特卡夫特定律"}},{"type":"text","text":" ） "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3bdd6aa9-7c17-486b-bff3-2359be6c5e08","cardTitle":"和合作伙伴一起践行循环式工作流程"}}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"8b7c8af7-5a6d-4e66-8627-fb6af1b8bd1b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"67f12cdd-ddd1-4e9d-9e50-067361e5bf1d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTU5NDkyOTU","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-02-14 20:02:33"}]}]}
cards.title: 沟通最最重要的是消除歧义

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0fcb4eb0-f2d9-49f0-bd18-45a104ffcb0d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在线文档有助于消除沟通歧义"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a4c5bfc2-812c-4fd6-97ee-d38a99fdeb8b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在线文档的一个原则是， "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"保持所有人看到的内容都一样"},{"type":"text","text":" 。这有助于消除沟通上的成本 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a2ae38af-7efc-48ae-88f4-6dbab3c7420d","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":" 、解除沟通的障碍。（SVN 则存在阅读不同版本时造成的沟通阻碍）"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"56e0d7f1-e3bd-4535-a21e-4d95b9892149"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c50f2464-cd52-4bec-ab56-8d8f4a052ad4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTYwMTE1NTQ","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-02-15 15:15:33"}]}]}
cards.title: 在线文档有助于消除沟通歧义

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"031c384f-2138-4007-8180-4d196a001a2a","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"梅特卡夫特定律"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e8ca66dd-faff-4d0c-8720-b1c59f6c8d63"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"网络价值和用户数成正比。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0903cd78-0de1-4536-9007-8770f0f7267e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如 1：卡片笔记的卡片越多，整个卡片系统就越有价值（可以产生更多的链接）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8e4d1587-cf18-4be5-bdb8-80f80ed956de"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"但设计系统不是原子越多越有价值，此定律只针对那些数量越多越容易尝试群聚效应\n"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%BE%A4%E8%81%9A%E6%95%88%E6%87%89","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/群聚效應"},{"type":"text","text":"\n的对象"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"3ab96b5d-cad4-4102-8e04-2ddd77c35110"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"87444584-6bea-435d-b08a-157dfc38fc2f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=NDYxNzc3Nw","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-07-25 14:11:20"}]}]}
cards.title: 梅特卡夫特定律

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f6ede8a2-51fe-493b-9f02-1afb379d7fa1","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"和合作伙伴一起践行循环式工作流程"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ab3bc186-4177-4e23-9f7d-d3f146854769"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"循环式 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E5%85%B3%E4%BA%8E%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E6%B5%81%E7%A8%8B%E7%9A%84%E4%B8%A4%E7%A7%8D%E5%BD%A2%E5%BC%8F%E2%80%94%E2%80%94%E7%80%91%E5%B8%83%E5%BC%8F%E3%80%81%E5%BE%AA%E7%8E%AF%E5%BC%8F_MzQ0MDI4MA%203c5ab261-e1b5-47d0-8ec9-15a1a8fe5d97.md","title":"关于工作流程的两种形式——瀑布式、循环式_MzQ0MDI4MA","data-internal-href":"meta://card/3c5ab261-e1b5-47d0-8ec9-15a1a8fe5d97","edited":false}}],"text":"关于工作流程的两种形式——瀑布式、循环式_MzQ0MDI4MA"},{"type":"text","text":"\n工作方法除了自身使用外，还可以推动其他同事共同使用。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"67725925-8e1c-4355-8ce9-580c844a7c81"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如验收技术实现成果时，可以在提测前就介入，遇到一些问题可以及时修复，减轻后续验收的压力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d8efe1db-fa96-47c8-beff-a3f465a59b21"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"| 在男人装活动中的实践"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"32f16539-37e6-4979-a47c-352026428aaa"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7dab026b-2f4b-4f10-b410-316ee19e9432"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=NDUxMjkyMQ","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-07-22 14:30:21"}]}]}
cards.title: 和合作伙伴一起践行循环式工作流程

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"49f82adc-e37a-41e9-ba0d-cf1244acea9d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"笔记需要举例"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"731305cb-8098-421e-9f55-64dced82c812"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"笔记（或者对我来说就是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7","cardTitle":"卡片笔记"}},{"type":"text","text":"）就是将其他人教授的知识进行复述与转写，这固然有一定作用（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4348348e-b6c0-490b-af1f-22bb0b3bc5eb","cardTitle":"加工深度"}},{"type":"text","text":"）但还有一个问题要解决：除了用自己的语言描述，如何进一步验证自己是否理解？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c7d961fd-1be2-40b4-8d7d-65bde70f7d79"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"答案是举例（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"12b13faf-70a0-4440-aa65-512315810084","cardTitle":"实例材料"}},{"type":"text","text":"），举老师没有说过的例子。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"643361c1-1071-4c97-8811-6630a8f5f403"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae404370-513b-4424-b696-b3cd03b7a9be","cardTitle":"知识是对有限案例的抽象以应对无限的新情况"}},{"type":"text","text":"，我需要自行举例（"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"列出新情况"},{"type":"text","text":"）来验证知识的理解与应用，这与"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"989780e5-5139-4c22-bc7d-49e368cc88ad","cardTitle":"康奈尔学习法"}},{"type":"text","text":"原理一致，但更加轻量。"}]}]}
cards.title: 笔记需要举例

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"84a3961b-6e28-4106-ae33-d90418715de8","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"泡泡玛特小屋设计"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8fb89678-bdb8-4f81-b2b9-cce8760825de"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"容错的设计非常不错，拼装只提供了一种方式，避免用户用错误的方式拼装到最后才发现错了，此时就需要拆开重新拼装。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"81ffef5c-0a46-4da5-9a45-6c191f9841c8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在软件世界中，置灰按钮就是这样一种设计，让错误不会发生，而不是在发生错误后进行反馈。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f30eae55-6986-43f9-b1a5-c905c8910381"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5059fa9c-4c4e-42aa-b4db-1419f5fc7a26","cardTitle":"沟通最最重要的是消除歧义"}},{"type":"text","text":"，人机交互也是，上述例子中，只提供了唯一 1 个正确的解法，不存在歧义造成的错误拼法。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"15af419c-c7c2-4f9d-840d-10b281332c78"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f2e3bca9-4cc7-4ad1-971c-f9aec2110af4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在拼装的过程就让"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9ae28abf-0291-44d9-9d08-68bdd0381384","cardTitle":"反馈"}},{"type":"text","text":"更及时的传递给用户，不至于等到用户最后才发现由于前面的错误导致后面的部位无法拼装上去，甚至发现多了一颗螺丝。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a5f34338-f80f-4b8c-9acd-e6cea05cc362"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9961054b-dfb2-460b-9bc8-4d1aea1e5621","cardTitle":"有效训练"}},{"type":"text","text":"中提到的反馈，进一步的话可以分为实时反馈、不实时反馈，目前来看实时反馈相对更好一些。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"24e1346a-45de-4e68-ba20-e731a5569c8d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dbb396d5-fcf4-497e-97d6-1fba5d435429"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这种拼装交互的设计也是用"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d561cccf-7bca-40fb-ba3d-552e6351a960","cardTitle":"容错设计帮助用户学习"}},{"type":"text","text":"，通过零部件的契合程度来避免错误拼装的发生。"}]}]}
cards.title: 泡泡玛特小屋设计

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e85fe21b-bb14-4735-8598-558fdad8a17f","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"费曼学习法"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a76144a6-8a5a-4526-b84a-365360d33a12","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0cc947c6-9aab-4e80-b66e-26d1c12314f5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"写出一个概念"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ab9e58d3-d2ad-4276-abbe-d4a22937f569","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fdb524cb-78df-4783-807e-37755c985b5f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用简单的语言描述出来（或和真人分享），检验是否掌握"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e770f447-a3a1-494f-9f68-1c9e05f63e81","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"061148b5-39a9-434a-95e8-0bbc4bf4db06"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a84b1daf-24b2-42f2-bb04-70df800a0018"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ad3c32bb-e2bc-43b5-afee-d099ba0655f5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"24a2e2a8-425c-45c7-9c4f-6d1a58ea9157"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"找出问题继续学习（针对分享、复述过程中难以解释、简化概念的地方）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"21364618-34a4-4b58-90fe-43960101cc6f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"98d2c5c1-6e1a-4cc4-8ee6-e5ba02487ed7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"再次简化"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f624b06b-04aa-4e32-9412-8410fd666820"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://b23.tv/erSV1Pt","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://b23.tv/erSV1Pt"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"7c1639bb-4da9-4662-a70b-88f287309ade"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dbff7794-a526-41ae-9a98-f458a44c7a48"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTYwNTIzMzI","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-02-16 00:40:09"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"c06c6272-6c4c-493a-bb3b-9307f16bd789"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2387379d-817b-4a26-bb4c-eca04a850e65"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae404370-513b-4424-b696-b3cd03b7a9be"}},{"type":"text","text":"。而以教代学就是将知识应用于教学对象的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"新情况"},{"type":"text","text":"，从而验证知识是否可用、易用。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"89bea633-27a4-4128-883f-21dba07f0f9e"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/cl4zh80o48f2101o3e2iv849s","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/cl4zh80o48f2101o3e2iv849s"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3a5e4ec5-f221-4995-bf99-af71ec2a405c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1ee4a631-894a-4ed4-ae42-333d76a03c95"}},{"type":"text","text":"就抽取出了不同项目在维护上的通用方法，并且在多个项目中进行使用，也通过写文章分享了这些方法，知识得到了验证。来抽象一下这个方法的子知识"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"07811832-5d3c-4a92-8258-20fe5076f631","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"43876811-8aeb-43cc-a755-d52113c91cfc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分支、主干是什么"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c975da68-8efb-4209-8a73-bf0a3d7938cf","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ba36e37b-3314-4eb4-9112-969915a772c5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分支与主干的关系"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"32502722-d7d3-4b4e-96ed-105cf18bc5d0","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d1cc75fc-2ebd-4647-9ecd-5db108faaa03"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"判定需求修改的类型"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f6ca64cb-decf-4d9d-959a-69d018fd8a3d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"而这种使用方法就是根据上述的原子知识来判断在哪里编辑文件、如何更新以达到高效维护设计模板的目的。"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"963ac868-4899-41a4-b647-7b14cbe73f82","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"离开网易"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"75943878-7712-4966-a5e8-a8c44f2aac88","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/ysI3Ii20221231175740.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"59904805-c7e9-452f-9b94-5d4e6a0aeafb"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://music.163.com/#/song?id=27538248","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://music.163.com/#/song?id=27538248"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b9aeb584-3131-46e2-b646-07d78f659041"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"10 年前，我还在使用当时份额非常低的 Windows Phone，因为用户量少不被厂商重视，同一个厂商的应用，在 WP 平台的体验要明显差于 iOS、Android 等主流平台。而网易的产品却为 WP 平台提供了和其他平台同样优秀的用户体验，甚至很用心的按照 WP 独有的设计规范进行产品设计。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"403fc980-5c5d-43c4-b9d9-5208312b0475"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5 年前成为了网易员工，没想到能有机会进入这个优秀的团队，在这期间真的获得了非常多的成长。从刚进公司时没办法完成一次合格的分享到现在产出了非常多的文章、演讲分享，而且真的有影响到其他同学，从一开始会犯低级错误的新人成为了被其他同事信任的、可以独当一面的设计师。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"92277d63-19aa-4705-81f7-69571d1fbe53"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"离职的原因也不复杂，我是因为热爱手机和数码产品才从一个外语专业的学生成为了互联网行业的设计师，我一直喜欢消费类电子产品，但直到去年开始，我越来越清晰的知道，原来我最喜欢的是「工具」，而手机、电脑就是这个时代最重要的工具之一，如今面对一个个念参数的手机评测和无聊的产品，我想下一代计算平台的机会来了。具体的思考和愿景在这里👉 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"32ee5ebe-b846-4be0-85e0-5dda2ff9cc89","cardTitle":"我要做的贡献"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"36132d59-00fa-4cea-bb7e-5cbb9e30d3b7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"离职前一个月，因为疫情原因居家办公了一个月。每次居家办公因为节省了通勤来回 2 个小时的时间，开始有时间研究一些东西，比如 2020 年第一次居家学会了用树莓派搭建私有云，去年居家研究了 Figma 的自动布局、组件；最近一次改用 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"08d9a517-f7eb-4bdf-8ee2-ec23d60471d3","cardTitle":"PARA"}},{"type":"text","text":" 管理信息以及将博客改造为"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ab437229-34b9-4ae4-ba2e-ec1bc233710c","cardTitle":"数字花园"}},{"type":"text","text":"，并且自己动手完成了开发，期间学习了许多开发的知识（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b81a2f54-ec5b-4de0-9e97-ab841c0e18f9","cardTitle":"使用 Heptabase 管理数字花园"}},{"type":"text","text":"）。每次都有巨大的收获，接下来准备利用这段时间好好学习一下。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"387f0d20-53a8-49a6-b928-7627b480913e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习英语，在工作中我总是要被动或主动的接触英语，例如只有英文版的软件界面或者某篇冷门的英文文献。隐约觉得这个世界牛逼的东西绝大部分还是由说英文的人创造的，而前段时间获得了一个数据——全世界的互联网的内容中 60% 是英文内容。如果说英语进步后我最想做的事情，一定是阅读几位计算机先驱的文章。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"50dfad66-9c6f-40f1-8329-5b90277a7024"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"要学 UI 吗？这是最近在思考的问题，之前学习过但是一直没有实践机会也就荒废了，但看了许多 AR 相关的设计岗位，很多都需要同时具备 UI、UX 能力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8b309592-f6df-4ab3-bf6a-29f950bf4865"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"看书，作为非科班出生，书籍是很好的获取系统知识的途径。"}]}]}
cards.title: 离开网易

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a120c041-870b-48bd-822f-f38ddeb41c1d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将大问题拆分成小问题"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"99882c75-8683-474e-9060-b2e8d556c33b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"准确说是将大问题需要搞清楚的任务进一部细分，得出所需要掌握的原子能力，通过学习原子能力来解决问题（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"697909cc-84ff-4302-b978-450139f15884"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"19c0b419-5bb0-42ff-b696-3706a9cbfa44"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一方面拆分问题可以让每一步"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"更容易完成"},{"type":"text","text":"，让问题变得更加简单；另一方面掌握的原子能力也可以在未来的新问题中得以运用。以及更快地解决小问题可以带来更多、更及时的反馈。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e2e58bc9-0e9e-4304-964b-e3c43720c906"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/cl4zh80o48f2101o3e2iv849s","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/cl4zh80o48f2101o3e2iv849s"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"b1241764-8df7-407f-a554-6cd095f59da2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d592d6b4-264b-471c-9e49-ba03e352e8de"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"想起来一直以来做的工具少有对原子能力的沉淀与思考，导致一直进步不大，今后要开始写技术博客了，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"34a1c52c-6a09-4805-bc30-8dc0e1dd896b"}},{"type":"text","text":" 就是一个案例，拆分构建一个数字花园所需要掌握的能力"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"16e5f7b8-4646-4e42-91bc-f90d7bf4213a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"29e45a57-37af-4d00-9e60-42b63645a61a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"路由"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9a5d3528-0933-4488-a628-27b024a28f14","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"44edf01a-1aeb-4614-b894-c5d86963f5df"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"数据渲染机制"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"04b6f8ce-1c29-4a5d-947f-ca41781bf28b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"354765f6-124e-4755-9523-7b79c13072c5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"md 转 markdown"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a2ce3774-f310-4f6e-a038-85101c206a13","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ef3277c7-23bc-4c1b-83ed-e669c1621451"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"……"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b1c2aad1-649b-4190-bb7a-b83102177739"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其中有一些知识是在开始前就已经明确需要掌握，另一些则在过程中才发现。"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2d854133-b4bf-448b-88e0-d02a48e80789","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Projec Xanadu 上都计划"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"00f66031-7dda-47be-9352-e78a8c8836bf","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"261d29ed-df35-4a55-acc8-cda871b18f9c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是上个世纪一位计算机先驱 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e915ff1c-2850-4891-8375-173303a41118"}},{"type":"text","text":" 构想的超文本系统，愿景是超文本可以形成"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"orange"}}],"text":"可视化"},{"type":"text","text":"的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2ffab447-a5cb-41e1-b790-4047343c038f"}},{"type":"text","text":"，以及拥有版本管理等特性。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"510b44e2-dd5c-4c23-9e56-0f3cd657c35e","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/docuverse20230105002309.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"50%","originalHeight":1612,"originalWidth":1250,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"55c560e8-2482-4f82-b8f7-6b75d5ebf3d8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其中不同颜色代表了不同的链接关系，例如橙色代表引用的原始内容"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"41713255-8090-4b01-b2e8-a8bed46f4b59","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/085a285c-d212-4f28-8553-5bd025b565dc/oxuShot.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":800,"originalWidth":1230,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"654ec74c-b461-44f6-84ec-a75c8a70eb4a","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e7d1534f-67c7-4af4-80d1-1ac45533326f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"尼尔森认为跳跃式的链接而给人不安全感，不知道点击后会前往何处，来回的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/c0599d03-acb3-45d9-a9bb-1173dff99b76","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"切换成本"},{"type":"text","text":"也比较高，所以提出了"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"orange"}}],"text":"视觉化的链接"},{"type":"text","text":"方式。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f508e274-8ad2-4681-9194-614c56e586f8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"视觉化的链接依赖于另外两个特性"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d8b3f5eb-7e32-45e1-90b7-2a06c579d471","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0118baa9-7f35-4b8e-a310- cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"84ca3120-d6ef-4181-90cf-6913c76549c8","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"模型的重要作用是预测"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5db5cfc0-b5f1-4e42-a6ed-fa8ecc7b8b93"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"模型是一个过程，它的一个重要作用是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"预测"},{"type":"text","text":"。（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae404370-513b-4424-b696-b3cd03b7a9be","cardTitle":"知识是对有限案例的抽象以应对无限的新情况"}},{"type":"text","text":"）可能类似于"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"eaedfa86-3aa3-4ea8-9818-68be66c05cb2","cardTitle":"模板匹配"}},{"type":"text","text":"机制。因为预测在原始时期对于个体的生存有着至关重要的影响。例如预测到危险以及食物的所在地的能力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a20e60a7-f584-4037-af0f-c4147cd75555"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果一个人在档口排队，那么很容易预测到一会他会端着食物开始寻找座位。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6e105b48-ecdc-4203-8148-9fbe6cb06a4b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"预测可以让我们更好的进行决策，加速我们的工作效率，减少工作摩擦。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"70cb0377-ff92-4f32-9648-f06f22160e01"},"content":[{"type":"whiteboard","attrs":{"whiteboardId":"6108fe00-da61-412b-9207-a6c2e7855970","whiteboardName":"🌊 交互设计工作系统"}},{"type":"text","text":"也是一种模型，提高了我们预测的能力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"04e0464c-c2ac-419f-ab66-88ddbf0e6981"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096","cardTitle":"《认知心理学》"}},{"type":"text","text":"619"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d6f815fd-bec7-4307-ae92-371ca8880216","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计思考可视化"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"672dbef1-d356-42e1-a3ef-40b651892c40"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在设计稿中进行思考，并且做一点简单的排版将思考可视化，一方面构建个人品牌，另一方面也让合作方更尊重设计方案，对方案的推进更有帮助。"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3fac9112-9716-4a72-99fc-a89368699b90","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a645710d-828c-4191-8e80-a2cffab903a1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不用花太多时间整理，大致看得懂整体思路就行；另外很重要的一点是让需求方、技术知道我们背后的付出和思考，而不是一个工具人。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"98bfa29f-d0f2-4c9d-9442-542662d37bf2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"364ede87-99f1-49f8-8acf-7d2b0944b0ae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTc5OTgyMjE","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-03-09 21:48:11"}]}]}
cards.title: 设计思考可视化

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"cd9f1471-72fb-4698-a0f7-388153c59249","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"保存设计过程"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ca958fb-6934-413f-ae6a-48c1176c68fa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"移动端娱乐直播间改版前期分析耗时过多，但研究的方向经讨论不会执行，此时从结果上看会觉得输出和研究匹配不上。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ad38276d-e3b5-4809-97df-48736e374f38"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"面对此情况要保留旧的方案，其次也要控制研究的投入，限制时长，避免研究时间过长 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"造成投入产出比低"},{"type":"text","text":" 。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"4ed2ded0-f0ac-485c-97d4-321ec82ca074"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1cb7a8d7-100d-4aa8-9c45-aafd8e89eebf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTk3NTgwNzY","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-03-28 16:19:03"}]}]}

cards.title: 模块标题标注组件的设计

cards.title: 交互设计输出需要描述逻辑概述

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"854ff757-30ff-4e5c-957c-c5b3ad3e4191","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"横向布局有利于预览页面状态"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"24a1e7ae-ce2f-4935-80bb-dfedfabcbfe6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计输出中，文档的开头应该描述框架信息，例如页面包含几个状态，帮助阅读者了解业务逻辑。参考书籍目录的编辑方式"}]}]}
cards.title: 横向布局有利于预览页面状态

b-e1b61bd07190"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"87e6bcbc-adb6-4cb5-9544-61f46ac91f95"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这些文档类型有时并不是独立存在的，会有相互组合生成更复杂文档的情况。例如"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"86a14082-4394-4dc2-b26f-ba0099cf67f5"}},{"type":"text","text":"就包含了解释类文档和参考指南。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ea634297-464d-42ea-8b8f-a1dea4de526c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这些文档类型经常"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://documentation.divio.com/structure/#the-tendency-to-collapse","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"被人们混淆"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"548bd62a-9ecf-460f-8ca3-f88e9b91ce5b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"35252cf5-1755-4fb4-9007-b99a36157d4d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"教程、操作指南都关注步骤"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1f0ebece-9327-45ad-8f6f-d773aa476f34","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"acee8d64-ecd5-4042-b86f-5f5ad3d1ffe4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"操作指南和技术参考都"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"在具体工作中使用"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c138552b-fe23-4a42-8e04-0113e9efe610","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7471fccf-4f84-4f82-9063-c636e6983164"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考指南和解释都涉及理论知识"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6e46bcf8-f730-425d-9f19-5f6a075e0b35","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"28807cbd-888f-4d4f-a57a-7b13059b5a4e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"教程和解释在我们学习时有用，而不是在实际工作中发挥作用。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f53d0b20-b372-4217-b80e-ad76976fcef7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"认真思考不同文档类型的面向对象和目的，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"专注于目标"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a014bf0a-1a2b-42e1-bb40-83115a221976","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","te {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1efbc7cb-3c30-4b46-817b-fc6f376fd82c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考指南"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3575cb7c-cc6f-4ae5-988d-907c620e9b62","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f214cde5-460b-4e2c-bdbc-446e2a15aebd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"面向对象"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4f6e8808-56ed-4df5-a73a-c1a0f3784695","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"01c7cb3c-590b-477a-9186-1f428709b7e9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"想了解特定事物相关信息的用户"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cfb5966f-abf7-45e2-af4a-2048e74922a3","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2d661468-7310-41b0-8347-b72bf112bc3d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目的"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d670f9e1-d3ac-40ba-9862-319e33b900a3","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ec207d37-7050-4743-92e8-d5c58def762c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"帮助用户了解信息，而不是教用户怎么做。"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b385cb36-b69d-41d2-ba57-7bd98aac4867"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"类比烹饪的话，就像虾的百科信息：高蛋白，但可能会让部分人产生过敏反应……"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"95268877-d308-4460-8bef-449f1867bc20","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计原则"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9ec3d4c6-e677-42f6-821a-7bd28c433709","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"07f86b87-2b54-4582-9678-17d957b2b45e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"基于产品构建文档"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1737daac-305f-4d5a-a91d-fdb1a1cd82a1","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cf3848a2-d119-48ed-910d-c14440c3c821"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如描述产品相关名词的文档应该按照产品的信息架构进行描述"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5d449643-01bd-4969-b8c1-54ee297bf33c","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8ed686cd-033e-49de-9c06-8597019ac52f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其他案例："},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4d2b1778-d9e7-4664-ba63-2ffa7dda4144","cardTitle":"交互描述需要结构化"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"22ee273f-4cea-44c4-8fc5-582caf2240f9","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"87e1bdc9-bf77-4e0d-971b-e0d19a060816"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与产品相同结构可以方便用户在了解产品时查阅相关的名词解释。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8c7d513a-bfc1-4f98-b8b3-f59826c27228","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3fa08816-f048-4e3d-9bfc-f738bd48de9a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"保持格式一致"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"900968e0-85a5-4152-90ff-4d80b9814bce","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"23b81dc5-95b1-4363-9a62-0e9367eb508b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不同信息应以统一的格式呈现，帮助用户快速获取信息"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"30e42bbf-a6b9-4da4-bc88-1917e901494f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"096ee2c5-f2a6-4a2e-9a9a-db3bddd92012"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9d9e3cad-8c9d-4239-9ca3-f510f19bed68","cardTitle":"模板减低沟通成本"}}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"72fad7f3-da7f-4e81-bfd7-b81280155b87","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff756253-24e2-4682-b54a-d29370f4a1f1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"什么都不做，只是描述"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2e2a3e01-7591-47e7-bbf3-946303dae848","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c2577dd-1042-4372-b6e0-d915b421df22"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考指南的唯一目的是介绍对象相关的信息，而不是教用户怎么做（它是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a0b90923-73c5-4ccb-b4aa-ffbe29199cad","cardTitle":"操作指南"}},{"type":"text","text":"的工作）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"52ec6743-d9ab-4b00-8695-ccec8b0a2102","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b6d4f580-f5a1-469f-adf8-f3da595fdb4d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"避免其他信息对指南造成干扰"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"74055df8-591c-40f4-9cad-0973fa67fd23","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c3046772-f682-4b66-847b-8232c88a72a1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"准确"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a8cd6c71-7cc9-4090-b694-b64324e8e83f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7b50f296-b97d-4c50-89c3-5ff163496f32"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"确保用词的准确性以及及时更新信息"}]}]}]}]}
cards.title: 参考指南

cards.content:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"dae4059e-67fb-42b4-90f8-70580fe059b9","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"操作指南"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"892de46f-b769-4cbc-81fd-d8e0f753b46a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"393882fc-3839-44b4-bf94-d5020a9afbcd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"面向对象"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b5fb1465-9a0b-4f4e-bc9f-c622e96e461f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3eff24ec-dbb9-404c-b67f-d5f18041a23a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"和"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"f39bb1bc-c2f8-4e6a-a9e4-febef98f8940","cardTitle":"教程"}},{"type":"text","text":"面对的初学者不同，操作指南假设用户已经具备一定的基础。可以类比为食谱，你没办法要求一个初学者可以按照食谱完成烹饪。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"da66cf90-3bd2-4e6c-ba57-660ee3305143","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"669c95c4-ec6a-44c0-9b43-3d558573a1f0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目的"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"673093fa-2b7c-4c49-93a9-58407f775b16","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1f0d2464-74da-413a-9e93-9282dc36fe43"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"解决一个具体的问题"}]}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"73be20ee-e7a5-4451-ad53-417aab559107","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计原则"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"324cded6-18ee-44fc-9eb2-e54cac40dcb2","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ea4827b2-5f69-4145-97d7-3427dafff589"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"切实有效"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8f717e1b-90b8-400e-9bf3-5ae9df156d31","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e326e901-35f8-484e-9399-321673471f55"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一种验证有效性的方式是完成教程后自己按照步骤走一遍，很容易发现其中有很多障碍需要清除。可以避免"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c6f1031b-200b-42e4-a8de-a60f0f2d7f48","cardTitle":"知识诅咒"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"06668dce-bb2a-450c-9363-b3b7be831b09","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0d62c772-1c6d-4fb1-b04a-9b388f70b945"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"解决一个特定问题"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"68902aed-d7c5-4e0f-93c5-94afd874a83b","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0eb7da31-9880-4c8f-95ab-efd2e9f879a7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"操作指南的用户知道自己需要什么，而"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"f39bb1bc-c2f8-4e6a-a9e4-febef98f8940","cardTitle":"教程"}},{"type":"text","text":"则需要创作者把用户需要知道的都告诉对方。一个是用户主动寻找答案，另一个则是用户被动接受教学。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"fa22c4b2-2ff9-4fc3-9e6c-2235c7e83d3b","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f47e8e5b-e3d5-475c-87d8-da4d284c336e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提供一系列步骤"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"90f4afcd-38fe-4f25-a9cc-66229b0bae30","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b320366f-43e0-4d70-bdf3-9fd407cf9031"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"关注结果"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b923391b-5e4f-44f3-9fae-3117c47041df","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c3f063e-c1f1-44c6-86ef-c49c216925e2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"操作指南要解决具体问题，所以关注结果非常重要"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b368e800-1d43-41e1-91d1-86613d2781eb","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"39583d83-02b9-472b-9a71-f5f540354e76"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"可以在开头就提供结果的预览"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4e170fe1-51ad-4a07-ad0c-fc975c50d164","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"08799823-8c42-46be-88b7-61ea8edaed89"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"帮助用户了解是否为自己想要的结果"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3e0a51e1-db09-4572-9661-0a26f7129943","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"438e5b83-7324-4229-a739-d868148ee9f2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不要解释概念"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b8dac606-e182-4b1c-b2ad-d07a7e2a54db","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"25f15204-f50a-485e-8d42-373d5f68fed3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"操作指南不是解释概念的地方，如果需要请提供超链接"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"730d70ba-0a7b-4124-abad-f11dd25dd761","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf856f5c-7cc2-4d1a-a197-13116556c03c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"允许一些灵活性"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9739863b-5911-4c03-8423-69e921ab5cfe","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"11f6d403-eb53-4a9e-85af-62083862de68"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"允许用户将操作指南运用到与指南中所提案例有所不同的问题上。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d2179a12-24a8-4562-8011-ad6d1ed525fa","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"55049583-20e3-4bbe-9f9b-bd1d78f685a7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这要求指南具备一定的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3eb247a7-9306-4e3a-a118-5d69e0ffd795","cardTitle":"抽象"}},{"type":"text","text":"能力"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f194d073-1a27-4920-ae58-224bae007317","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"804d85b9-24b4-4ffc-8bc7-a5a77537bfcc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如网易登记工时机器人的操作指南中，用户可以参照此方法做其他需求的配置。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8e1382be-b52b-4fea-b7d4-423893143014","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"35b72230-4b35-4b06-bb69-52acf46d8976"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实用性比完整性更重要"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3b25d9fb-1d7f-4657-9536-78899f2f4056","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cc0c34f4-96a7-480b-80fa-93339341a445"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不要为了完整性让文档变得复杂，关注要解决的问题。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8f2c5c5e-f1fb-4011-b770-8e03f0e62b85","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7fd18c47-5d6d-4e90-b8a4-08aec80769eb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使名称具备引导性"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9f6f24b2-b5bd-4152-80ac-c274a6af4825","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"144365b1-b395-4793-8099-5cf6c902c0f8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如标题可以清晰的说明要怎么做，这样用户可以选择性的阅读细节描述，从而提高文档的阅读效率"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"02bf984e-4a42-47fe-9648-5bbc7619081d","params":"markdown"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以工时登记机器人为例
- 打开 POPO 反馈后台
- 找到「定时回调函数」
- ……"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a39b145f-ee4b-456c-916a-ce5074748aed"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://documentation.divio.com/how-to-guides/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://documentation.divio.com/how-to-guides/"}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"433dd66f-9ccf-4d4d-8837-200120fbf1cd","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"教程"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"06f1026c-bc30-4375-895a-2e5f12fdb67e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过切实有效的教学内容（输入）达到让"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"初学者上手"},{"type":"text","text":"的目的（输出）。可以类比为教一个孩子做饭。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"183c5f52-0978-46df-822b-ce352c4d7966","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9ee8cfc4-f134-4fda-9911-1e4be60a569f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"面向对象"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"70ce98cb-5c3b-4b29-a170-ebd9628d701a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"64c283d3-b3f6-4f9e-9f2b-edb2bc81f6ff"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"初学者，通常没有基础"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b5ca528e-776b-4c45-9b14-599bd8a25295","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"73c9d233-05b1-4f83-b391-652d2358e6cd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目的"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"63194719-3204-4832-911a-e4766124f037","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c6ab06c6-c739-4899-943e-8c6ee749e2dc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"让初学者可以上手做某件事（而不是成为专家）"}]}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4fb10bea-c848-4c63-9a3c-7f0e6a2052fe","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计原则"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e0902c39-e22d-4f72-949e-b4976ae99b73","folded":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6382a4e0-3cfb-4218-9189-4a2d6d3ae317"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"允许用户边做边学"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5645563b-bbbd-4151-9be0-a42ebf9dd093","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"274fd3d3-926b-4c0d-ba01-91fe41af1c9a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"描述"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"79fa97d3-0517-4886-9495-5fbfa0599f74","folded":false},"content":[{"type":" "folded":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b6946c7a-bec4-4cf7-acb8-8881181a0cf0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"让用户开始"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b1889657-ac48-4d02-a0b9-70c3ceafad0d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5f611a62-8ef2-4921-b4a9-d60da2df4d38"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"描述"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"30e69699-3273-4ffb-b1c3-e4489db5d6ed","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"802375ca-dbd1-4c85-8dd2-71fc505b0d66"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所谓师傅领进门，修行靠个人，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"教学的目的是让用户开始"},{"type":"text","text":"，而不是让他们到达终点。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7f08342e-2407-4ec9-af60-f6579b20716d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97e6d206-4691-4a79-84b3-e7ce52e035fe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相关链接"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e71861a6-e028-46f4-8be9-bc9ab32bf91d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"506e3f9e-2493-4f84-9269-97b73a3770d9"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7d7d411f-d394-4913-954f-595789ce5b79","cardTitle":"先让一件事情开始，而不是一来就要求完美（就像研究方法一样 发展性研究 ）_MjE5OTU4MjM"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f2a144f0-935d-4915-9bbf-0905e40e34f2","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ed783013-c67f-437e-8014-2db066ee124e"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b2fdf7f2-184c-4fe2-b42c-d6924b2741b5","cardTitle":"先开始写，而不要等到思想完善"}}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9ffc031d-b9c6-460b-bde2-bf0c0bbcb206","folded":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7bdef13a-6458-42bc-a2e1-cfcbd7867e2e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"确保教程有效"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"fa4172f3-e301-4c71-8bd6-b38bc6e07c64","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7fc9e886-d21d-4d46-9e3a-28919cafabbc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"描述"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4df39a83-4a5e-4664-8a2f-a54a3a9e1152","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"96a972c7-47d9-4d7d-83f8-4bd2ff1f474a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"教程有效是根本。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"348eac56-e8fb-46cf-8256-88745d795b53","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0776212c-07f7-44b4-8216-79c7cfefb1ae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原理"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"357fc013-3571-44e1-bb9b-3bf871f10949","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e3fa269f-5d3d-4bac-977f-449aa2ceed8f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"暂无"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e3118b0d-451e-413b-8834-d7f995c401c0","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"68702cb8-99da-4484-8049-e3e2997fc90f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相关链接"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b1312bd7-140a-4ad9-b761-7cccac32e945","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"600094a5-1500-48ee-a40f-d144a5cd6695"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"暂无"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d5775461-ecc2-4794-8025-bdfea87ab572","folded":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"362f929c-894d-4887-9f1b-7fb1c2e3dc0b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"确保用户立即看到结果"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"07b7b92f-7005-44d5-8b45-2577b5dfd7e1","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"96cbf759-3079-4bc7-8e55-3cba45eab80b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"描述"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d65f7cf6-8eb0-4c1a-aa81-f5ddb1a39cc3","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4a91bfd1-fae4-4602-8c2d-def6c00ec651"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于用户的实践应该尽快提供结果，而不是提供两页纸的说明后却没有给出具体的结果，这会让用户迷惑。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"317730c9-0009-485e-b4a5-111261f0a0aa","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d96e5a50-93ac-488d-a08e-ecd999b90de0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原理"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6cbdeef7-4ef0-4b3c-8035-670fed73cb6e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"efe35549-af97-4be3-a66a-cb436a974a6a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习是在输入和输出之间寻找规律，如果看不到结果（没有输出）则会阻碍用户获得规律。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"652696bc-57a5-42b5-b8ba-4f9fe9f5c97f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"462eeb20-14a7-494c-91de-1eaaf42a49cb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相关链接"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b2bc1f9a-d43c-469c-b6dd-461198d53293","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fc2de393-699e-405f-8ff1-1e05a047ea76"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae404370-513b-4424-b696-b3cd03b7a9be","cardTitle":"知识是对有限案例的抽象以应对无限的新情况"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d472da27-98cc-4fd6-851f-bfb34def0c01","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1b1b4be1-af3f-4eed-8411-032a7cc6f8af"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"48b07270-7e78-4c85-b43a-0c080a001252","cardTitle":"学习要搞清楚输入和输出"}}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"105d2d6c-700d-4fc3-b71c-ba085601e158","folded":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"72a77076-0311-4b38-90a6-3302465c0a3d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"⭐关注具体步骤而不是抽象概念"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"159fac59-430a-463b-8fa1-41966f17dcd4","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9b359207-d60f-4459-afb3-d1b8292ccb79"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"描述"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cf729a3c-e0b8-4949-a70e-a93353a63f54","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3d6d3a66-6021-4997-9473-849ab4c6468d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不要引入与步骤无关的概念，或者使用通俗易懂的语言来替代专有名词。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2f515e1e-b269-42f8-8118-cab2b4abadc1","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f081f660-ea4a-4ec6-ae81-c64acaf7bb37"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"还记得之前分享"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7","cardTitle":"卡片笔记"}},{"type":"text","text":"时，使用了「增加提取强度」这个专有名词，造成听众的疑惑，其实完全可以使用「让记忆更容易被唤醒」来代替。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3589e522-90c9-49f2-8934-6f28fceb2e19","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"899722e5-3128-4079-8060-5920f950cb59"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2513a1f4-bd7e-4dfd-9fa1-0b0e44e11f89","cardTitle":"演讲自查清单"}}]}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"14f82712-b61a-439a-8f67-b2dd82512ebd","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d1ccf691-bd3b-40c4-9867-c3ac952b3073"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原理"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bc50cf55-89b5-4d34-84a7-7b4d28855fbf","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7fc660cc-f922-4cd3-83b4-672700d3b64a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"关注核心目标，减少无关信息的干扰"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f6a2f31b-03a1-4841-b14f-746051780eb4","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"33331e11-8b5d-4f2d-bff3-3850d520c41d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相关链接"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2ddca101-730b-442b-8198-9ffeea78fc91","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"28e8b48b-18b2-4cfd-b163-6998e2a62fc2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"暂无"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"29ebbc4e-d50e-4b1d-8709-acd02e472240","folded":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1386f87d-ca87-4c22-9639-eb7de8e84c93"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"只关注用户需要采取的步骤"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cb9c4b1d-4b72-4899-ae03-dfc144c6a6c2","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"091a233c-ae0b-4f5d-8aeb-5ad11a2287e3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"描述"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"77c08465-2543-4c91-92ca-e12613e78bfa","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"04c024e6-d68c-48a3-a150-37c986129fa0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"和上一个注意点一致，关注用户的核心目标"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dc6949d0-4ad8-4e05-abe1-465ef2668003","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5cfe7ead-92df-4805-9aa5-8590f91e6df1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原理"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8d3880f7-c496-476a-b766-9468cddef730","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e3c5feb-3405-4269-a169-4b953bdca33f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相关链接"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"462fd987-4857-4e0c-a513-256dc9f71e18"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://documentation.divio.com/tutorials/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://documentation.divio.com/tutorials/"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5a8d4d55-617a-40aa-9587-2b3581e62fdf","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"模板"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"43e08ced-82cb-4b22-be63-5d6dfb5217e8","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b0f71516-ac71-4d58-94c8-be7bba7c21bd"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"934e87e5-1bb0-435c-b0be-f9845e147ee6","cardTitle":"是什么为什么怎么做"}}]}]}]}
cards.title: 教程

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"92a0bbcb-e811-4d4b-a4e0-d6f6814e5328","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"解释"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"053d5e32-35e5-4c6e-a19e-6337247b955c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"文中介绍的「解释」更像是一种从不同维度、更高维度去讨论事物（例如从技术发展的角度看待烹饪的发展历史）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"74fd5bed-46a6-41c7-907d-3af00532c338"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"「解释」不应该做其他任何文档类型做过的事，做好自己对于某个主题的讨论即可。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9fdce227-19dc-4873-9399-8842c8353cfb"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://documentation.divio.com/explanation/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://documentation.divio.com/explanation/"}]}]}
cards.title: 解释

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"03ecd1b4-5ab4-4884-8b47-b11a4b985f73","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提供完整的鼠标或键盘的支持"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f645c409-f848-4228-baa0-a2d1084bd9d3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"帮助用户完全使用鼠标或完全使用键盘进行操作。这样可以减少用户在不同设备之间的切换成本（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c0599d03-acb3-45d9-a9bb-1173dff99b76","cardTitle":"减少切换成本"}},{"type":"text","text":"）。同时在部分极端情况下，可以帮助用户操作设备。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4633f5cd-668b-4ea8-854e-5e4f263c2580","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"07470920-c1ed-4a9a-a507-6f50ab2c1a2c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如在公司的临时设备上，不方便使用鼠标时可以临时使用键盘完成所有操作，而无需中断任务去找鼠标。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"22342bd2-11d2-46a3-b09c-40606de368d6"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"724c99ab-a7dc-4b10-87f7-d9e197329511","cardTitle":"《About Face 4：交互设计精髓》"}},{"type":"text","text":"P381"}]}]}
cards.title: 提供完整的鼠标或键盘的支持

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"62d59f7c-da0b-4066-9891-cc50e419a52b","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"验收埋点"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e2837adb-56bc-4eee-8340-e1557ff1f464"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提埋点需求后还要验收 DM 的埋点设计文档，检验是否满足后续的数据分析要求。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"f6df43e2-883e-4a66-9ce7-7fc54214558e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a59e138a-3c0f-46b8-a027-6835ae8ff92c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTU5NDgxMzY","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-02-14 19:45:09"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4abceb95-3c67-4142-ab7f-0792cdb683f7","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"规范化设计输出"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"75951d81-2096-4e5a-98db-315645b1ce63"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计输出也是数据，只有数据可被观察、分析，才会增值（带来更多的价值）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c603b3ca-3d2f-4ba7-8e93-42c14b0d7fe9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"需要让工作和学习产出具备群聚效应 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c7e22bc3-879a-406e-9f90-8c39fc0ff857","cardTitle":"梅特卡夫特定律"}},{"type":"text","text":" 这样才能实现 1+1 ＞ 2 的效果，要求对输出进行规范化沉淀 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d45070ad-5008-4209-af24-4bdb818a88ea","cardTitle":"积累设计素材帮助实现设计智能化"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"08884f79-ea98-4566-96fe-4dba711e983f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"---"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff5c5fdb-0da8-4d3a-8e35-5f1213baff14"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如 flomo 的数据就可以爬取/导出分析\n"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.notion.so/jiangzilong/2021-aec4315aede5437697b8a3b6079e1d01","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.notion.so/jiangzilong/2021-aec4315aede5437697b8a3b6079e1d01"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"e96d7772-f1c5-4a9a-acc8-c08e36ca997f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d0d03795-88a2-4bc6-93a6-2d9dc1acef1a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTQ2ODY5Mzk","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-01-27 23:15:26"}]}]}
cards.title: 规范化设计输出

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c9a1713f-0519-464e-9aef-2c98004cc3dc","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有效的设计原则"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"77c8765f-ad36-43ce-b377-c3334d69be3c"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.zcool.com.cn/article/ZMTE3ODY4OA==.html","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.zcool.com.cn/article/ZMTE3ODY4OA"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.zcool.com.cn/article/ZMTE3ODY4OA==.html","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}},{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":".html"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1010db3d-ce5a-49ca-88f4-fa12d8070187","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ccd3e048-87ca-4650-b3b1-8449d2c9eb14"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不能太宽泛，例如设计要清晰准确这种基本的原则不用单独拎出来说，需要进一步剖析，例如「消除歧义，让用户有信心的去看，去理解，去行动」这里的「消除歧义」就是可操作的"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e4947fb1-42c6-467a-821a-26131e652181","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"60ad31c1-e5cf-4b56-bf87-49388c3d585c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实用可操作，需要举例，例如 iOS 人机交互指南「通过反馈来确认操作并展示结果。原生的iOS应用对用户的每个操作都提供可感知的反馈。点击可交互元素会高亮显示，通过进度指示器来传达较长的运行状态，并通过动效和声音来清晰反馈操作结果。」"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"28258076-1fc4-46b3-844e-b5074c89ff2f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另外还要"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"可用于判断设计是否符合原则"},{"type":"text","text":"，例如不能说「要简单」可以说「必要性」，通过需求和场景判断功能设计的必要性来避免复杂"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e427ea7f-f141-436d-941c-8c684ba49b07","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bd211497-cabe-4cb2-a3c0-151284faaccf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有主观观点"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"19d34a1f-be33-4b22-aeb1-9db69ed61d08","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"32c26b08-9ae8-4b07-a775-8de70d5801ef"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"揭露本质，容易产生共鸣：让团队成员更易于记忆，更愿意使用"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e4b5f169-3006-48a7-9060-d7c193cd7eff","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c3802d06-d388-4576-9edb-a25dacadd8e7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"区分优先级：当不同原则冲突时，需要根据优先级处理"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"45148f78-4df0-44bb-8040-6bd86c1088d2"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/31465217","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/31465217"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"a84d6458-66f8-4fca-b21a-d44ee3b99ff5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"845361dc-d665-48f7-a582-c7f8264ca3fd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=NDA1OTY0NA","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-07-10 13:57:01"}]}]}

天都在记录卡片（年中才开始记录）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"be8c5bcd-72ff-4f33-8450-579f35ee4680"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过卡片数量折线图可以发现，起初时热情较高，随后逐渐趋于平稳。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"aa4f80eb-89c6-491b-8d79-50da54ebd129","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/e14bf348-7e2e-403d-b154-edaab7994734/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":678,"originalWidth":1390,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d8cf59f5-d260-4a2a-b4e1-41a9f4fa7602"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"更多在 Web 端上记录笔记，主要原因是读书笔记、工作思考都在公司内产出，使用桌面设备完成记录。34% 的移动设备记录主要发生在通勤途中、家中。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"ddb5ce86-ee01-491f-b961-2b2e3829315f","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/44091a11-2060-4ecf-b0f8-73ac73548ead/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1156,"originalWidth":1390,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"f3f79c27-dbd2-4ce1-ab8f-e83a11b35a69","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/f4866220-6903-4ead-b8f6-b3623fb24373/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":619,"originalWidth":1390,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3c912bab-355f-48bb-98e6-b97afbffbafc","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"领域学习成果"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"217125ef-04a6-4399-9084-157b7e745880"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以下是卡片数量最多的 领域"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"f9b437b5-afb9-43e6-8f9b-a1c17f2949cc","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/f1c2585f-2d8a-4bb3-a137-e82c15fa2e69/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":807,"originalWidth":1390,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0447f309-0378-4fcd-860a-d04cd6aab9bf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"工作流程方面，梳理了《交互设计工作手册》的雏形"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"27e65bd6-a9ec-43c6-8ae6-48f6bf811026","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/cec1c0dc-dcd4-4b83-936f-dad81c0cdd49/image.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"40%","originalHeight":4749,"originalWidth":1390,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"506901eb-f965-4fce-97d5-c265b031d2d9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"完成了卡片笔记的学习并投入使用，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./卡片笔记%20d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7.md","title":"卡片笔记","data-internal-href":"meta://card/d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7","edited":true}}],"text":"还完成了一次分享"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"8443966b-1077-4573-bae5-9db4f434ad17","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/d7932d91-5768-4029-8965-54b8de37a4a4/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1115,"originalWidth":1390,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8c682966-5056-41b8-a2ff-347be0a46bc8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计系统、原子设计方面，带领团队建立了 Figma 组件库，并分享了"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./Figma%20组件库搭建与易用性优化%204fe942a5-93d7-4427-acbb-50f0c4550ea3.md","title":"Figma 组件库搭建与易用性优化","data-internal-href":"meta://card/4fe942a5-93d7-4427-acbb-50f0c4550ea3","edited":true}}],"text":"组件库的搭建经验与优化方法"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5838c3a2-5ed5-4405-a530-867705f2fa9a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"此外，年中从 0 到 1 开始使用 Figma，截止目前已产出 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/@jiangzilong","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"4 款 Figma 插件"},{"type":"text","text":"，结合插件的开发，学习了 React 框架，对于设计、技术领域的组件思维均有了进一步的理解。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"74ee38aa-a333-4a2f-86fe-ba3a56600409","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/59c1817f-e378-4da3-87f9-539243e07c98/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1029,"originalWidth":1390,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7e682130-1e32-4624-9c91-74f645655780"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"演讲能力方面，共复盘了 23 场知识分享、月报内容的演讲，并总结输出了"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2513a1f4-bd7e-4dfd-9fa1-0b0e44e11f89"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"75869ab1-fcaf-4597-bede-4c16e9f48ee7","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/503b4a2c-48ca-421a-881b-c852924144d5/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":892,"originalWidth":1390,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"7a7f856d-486a-46c1-a400-c8f40789f258","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"下一年计划"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e98f46ed-c22d-4682-bfba-bc8285c084cd","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dad0ea47-5122-415f-b6b7-794de413c8d0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"继续沉淀笔记，其中工作相关的内容梳理进《交互设计工作手册》，设计系统相关的方法论也需持续思考更新"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ed37624c-b18e-4d0e-a8f1-888acde01671","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6de5b46d-5896-44cb-9723-bfa219696847"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"更多的复盘、总结、输出与分享，并提高演讲能力"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c027fdc5-b6db-47c3-9dbb-0f66ef5b6b0f","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f656fcc-8fc2-4b02-8d81-e1ae8745e7cc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"系统学习 React 框架，可以开发更复杂的 Figma 插件"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d0b2d582-a06d-424d-b2ac-bead8fc8e696","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7464b49a-bf65-472c-84be-16ed54e3b675"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"基本掌握英文资料的阅读能力，扩宽知识获取的渠道"}]}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"88d00070-00cc-45c9-a801-55df1b70c416","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"魔形智能编辑器项目总结"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"661e9d64-13a9-4ab4-89fc-a671ff0f30f6","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"魔形简介"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a26439b7-fb6c-4d72-a905-4cadc5478301"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"魔形是一种基于主视觉自动化生成周边延展资源的智能编辑器，旨在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"提高延展资源的输出效率，降低设计人力成本。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"0dce8975-6eb2-434f-98c3-c1a3c64dbdcb","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/1f4e0a7b-f553-44ec-a96e-c09e88162791/20220624202633.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"fd0547d2-85da-4ca7-8736-c40f8f991350","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"项目背景"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a0ea2572-966c-4f5a-a0db-f336c6516067"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"产品会配合节日或赛事推出活动，需要设计活动的主视觉及其周边的延展资源（例如 Banner）"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"bed9140b-fdac-4b38-9f7a-6d126108c9f7","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/18379559-f7ce-4b5e-9c6f-0f96b621dad2/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"87900499-9360-49ac-81a8-93b881f91434"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"延展资源基于主视觉通过简单的排版完成输出，属于「劳动密集型」的工作，难有创意发挥的空间。"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dd40285c-10b4-4020-9784-eafab4883067","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7caf86c8-1fbc-4cfc-b838-0c7aa0abaed0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"延展资源的需求多且要求快速响应：目在运营工作中存在很多需快速相应的美术相关业务（如热点时事物料输出等），针对该环节设计往往需要投入较多时间，无法满足运营诉求"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"caa3aca5-68fb-4000-a8af-fbca3e7aff69","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6ae27cfe-7e65-45be-9a0e-2b4531b23570"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"投放渠道多样，消耗人力：一般情况下，美术部门设计输出业务所需的 Banner 为标准尺寸，但实际投放需要针对渠道的差异，对同一个 Banner 制作数十个不同尺寸的需求，较为消耗美术人力"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"359c9dcd-08d2-4efe-8f2a-196f1956190e","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"预期效果"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8943caf0-ff1f-4e1c-a603-0f38747b11d1","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fca98091-6012-4dac-b45e-77de92a26e57"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"节省人力：预计节省 0.5人天 / 物料延展"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6d4e4cb5-940b-4ff2-b06e-77179d3f5d29","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"00ff8daa-73c4-47d2-a887-226b870b31cf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提升运营物料响应速度与质量：业务方可半自主快速&高质量产出美术物料，提升运营投放效率"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2d37afee-cc92-4a1f-a4c7-46c47c5164ee","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我的行动"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6baddbfe-c35a-4b75-9124-06de6e9b27ac","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"制定产品目标"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"12b9ef08-d2b5-4db6-952c-09b9c4bbd57b"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"合成算法"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"89ebd9fe-bec2-434b-85a0-7ec1364c8a7d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"正如项目背景中所描述，产品最重要的是提高设计输出的效率，从而节省人力，所以合成算法是产品需要完善的核心体验。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fd4dbc1b-1f9b-4204-bec5-0e1d61dd982f"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"编辑体验"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"21f1da52-c58d-4fdd-bef3-c2d6e8ab04be"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"算法无法做到万能，此时需要通过人工对合成后的效果进行微调从而达到预期目标，所以编辑体验也是非常重要。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a1f9be96-8fec-4470-9671-49879f7aad6d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我在制定产品目标选择设计方案上"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"犯了 2 个重要的错误。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52af66bb-8836-4b4b-8247-6834d14109fd"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"犯错一："}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f6028817-d3d8-4228-8e8f-48e78188c045"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"合成算法方面，采用了「人肉智能」（而不是人工智能）的策略，通过自行观察、与视觉设计师讨论的方式总结延展资源的设计规律，并将规律数据化提供给技术同学用于开发合成逻辑。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0f734b7e-c0fd-40df-beb3-b0337a44ee18"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"采用了固定、死板的算法面对简单场景时还能胜任，但测试过程中逐渐发现难以应对真实、复杂的场景。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cc5e8c80-aec4-45da-8299-c23fe075535b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"发现问题后，我向公司内部申请了人工智能的技术支持，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"全面将合成的逻辑交由机器学习完成"},{"type":"text","text":"，为未来产品的质量和适应能力奠定基础。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7403989f-78ba-4bd6-8974-45ee9004bd26"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"},{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"对于技术、设计材料需要有完备的知识和应用意识。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8b5e9083-295e-4ed7-a5c6-ca27bca1bbed"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"犯错二："}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3ca594e3-5e08-4aaa-8f36-9c30009d6794"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前期将精力集中在合成算法上，忽视了编辑体验；在第一版上线后效果不尽人意，通过反思发现，合成算法的优化属于"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"长期目标"},{"type":"text","text":"，短期内难以达到合成后可以直接使用的效果，所以重要还是要依赖编辑功能实现用户目标，所以"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"短期目标"},{"type":"text","text":"要以编辑体验为主。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9ec1fa65-1e4e-4137-9f0f-0c2493eff862"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"意识到产品重点的设置错误后，随即调整了方向加大编辑体验的投入力度。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fbb04fb8-f63e-416e-a2c0-7e3c2c56611b"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"},{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"长期目标固然重要，但不要忽视了短期目标的实现。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bd05f5c0-9c52-41f5-a7a2-53ae56bb7b52","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"交互设计"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"96f84393-8d43-46ad-b169-ca250a45328a"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"梳理前后端数据传输规则"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eab8f278-0397-4ae4-8608-4d40cd273c2e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"产品需要解析 PSD 文件用于后续的处理，前后端使用不同的库处理 PSD 文件，需要制定统一的数据读取、解释标准用于后续的数据交互。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52186754-fbf8-4c63-b69e-b46da46e14c2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"和技术沟通了解到前后端分别使用的 PSD 解析库后，我了解了对应库的逻辑，并安装试用库的基本能力，结合对 PSD 文件及需求的理解，梳理了前后端数据传输规范，协助技术同学完成开发。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"fd69fb09-e139-40e8-908d-d5ae2b3bddd5","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/4121ebfa-f57f-424d-a2d5-81ae59e210f2/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d894d05e-026f-4c81-adc6-dbb459c40206"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"使用蚂蚁组件快速搭建"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b6119ee4-929b-4d49-9347-09f58555d397"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在主体界面的构建上，考虑到投入产出比以及产品定位，使用了"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://ant.design/components/overview-cn/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"蚂蚁组件"},{"type":"text","text":"完成快速搭建，节省基础交互部分的设计投入、研发成本。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"684311c8-b035-4fc8-a101-1c43e683c9ff"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"可用性测试"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3502b46c-522e-4a42-91f9-813f1e3716ad"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"由于产品的目标用户是设计师群体，而在公司内部非常容易接触到这类群体，于是进行了小范围的可用性测试；通过 FIgma 输出简单的可交互原型测试目标用户对于方案的理解，测试设计模型与用户心智模型的匹配程度。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"94ad1513-9dda-4f86-849b-5442c7e6a5db"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在产品编辑的流程中，用户需要对人工智能合成的方案进行打分（打分帮助算法进行迭代），在可用性测试中发现用户对此流程存在疑惑（打分是产品需求而非用户需求），产生包括不知道要打分，从哪里打分，为什么要打分等疑问。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"01d73cbf-b271-48d6-85aa-ce9db7b6aa7c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"基于上述发现完成了方案的优化，清晰了打分的指引以及整体流程的感知，帮助用户了解产品的使用流程。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"a503465d-5828-42ba-8978-2d31f82fff41","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/441e3b31-b86c-4c52-8cbe-5bc356065a6e/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9354ed4d-0cff-4029-90b1-51e0ec5e0da6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"方案概览："}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"fd60ad43-6078-4881-8f8b-2a8e1da388bb","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/a5976d20-22ad-4b45-b19a-3af639aa0613/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3a721a02-3c63-4812-a49d-07057489d5ef","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"推动落地"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1953c583-dcef-4bf1-b0c4-2b0ee840b01d"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"邀请设计同学进行测试反馈"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c07779c8-c332-4f75-b062-986f6acd246b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"初版上线后，需要用户基于真实的使用场景进行使用，持续与用户沟通了解问题思考优化方向；另一方面用户的使用反馈对产品团队来说就是很大的鼓励（我们都希望产品被用户使用、喜爱）。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8121cbd2-02e1-4f88-9995-ab71e728504e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"经过内部协调后很快安排了 PM 与视觉设计师同学参与试用，制定了 100 个 PSD 的使用计划。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e7b7d834-2fb0-42bb-89c2-3da424079637"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"过程中我们发现了许多可用性问题，梳理了问题清单；持续与用户沟通，并且以天为单位在项目群中同步用户反馈，最终将 100 个 PSD 输出的 400 多份延展资源作为产品首版的试用成果，鼓舞了团队的士气。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"da7f7aad-1f7b-47a0-82c4-06567010facc","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/f22bf9ff-dbb7-4447-9201-67cad6a35768/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8217f6d3-51e4-4ba5-85a9-97c13ec676cf"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"通过数据推动方案开发"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf8e1a3d-02f5-4ab3-8c7b-aa947c703d5b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PSD 中存在多种图层类型，包括文字、群组等，需要工程师针对不同类型进行适配。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"63418a3f-0fdd-4e72-9dd3-36d01580affa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其中就遇到了由于 Group 类型的图层未进行适配而导致的 PSD 文件上传失败的问题；由于不清楚此类图层在实际设计场景中的使用频率，技术工程师对于适配的价值缺少信心。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"78ab930b-5930-4129-b7b2-2c2e632a521f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为了更好的验证解决问题的价值，我通过 Python 分析了团队一整年的设计源文件，通过 Python 的 psd-tools 模块读取了 PSD 中的图层类型进行统计，发现 Group 图层的占比并不低（18%）。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"f3d1fff4-29e0-4763-888c-b02e1fd34d0c","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/58dc6895-d0ed-4b67-beae-a22d52824044/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5361d556-9284-4007-a89d-316f4dd7d0f9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"基于客观的数据，最终证明了解决问题带来的客观价值，和工程师一起解决了这一问题。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"11480533-682c-4b35-8942-d48781d95452"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"最小可行性"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ced27955-07b1-4570-89b5-676df91342c6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"由于团队本身有主线业务需要支持，魔形编辑器的优先级相对较低，在项目推进过程中总是很难获得开发资源。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"493cb7d0-63d3-4f81-9f95-9075bd5462af"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为了推动项目，帮助工程师可以利用主线项目的间隙进行「碎片化」工作，我先后将产品规划从季度一直细化到天为维度，从功能模块细化到每一个 Bug、优化点的优先级。通过拆解任务，一方面让整个产品的开发难度看起来简单了一些，也有利于提升产品的迭代速度（以小点为目标，而不是以大功能为开发目标）。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ecf7dc1d-7faf-47db-a496-adbfa772fd23","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1b7373c1-7c6f-4da6-b9f4-cd6f7b755173"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相比交互设计工作中思考「如何让体验更好、如何实现业务目标」 ，在主持魔形的产品开发过程中，会更加侧重开发资源的合理利用 ，更多的思考如何让项目更快推出「能用」的版本。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d04d9191-6ba6-4c88-9224-0f51e2411fb6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"过程中也出现了"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"前期按照交互设计思维设计尽可能完美的产品"},{"type":"text","text":"，到了开发阶段从产品角度开始"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"砍需求让版本迭代速度更快。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3ea433f6-bfd8-4205-b0ed-b5246a0954cb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这是一种思维方式的转换。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"566aaa08-04f9-4578-9597-eee8846734b7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于后续工作的启发是，需要前期提前规划好需求的必要性和性价比、优先级，避免后续再砍需求造成前期的投入浪费。此外任务优先级尽可能拆分的细一些，例如先分不同版本，根据需求优先级放置到对应版本中，同一个版本内再细分优先级，通过这样的方式最小化、再小化的降低项目推进的阻力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cbbedaea-2de7-424d-9af1-425f7eb224e2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最后，感谢这么长时间一直挤出时间来支援产品工作的各位同仁以及提供各种支持的同事 🌻"}]}]}
