cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8f248d5f-89fb-46a9-aa59-6eb42c380e68","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原子设计在具体交互方案中的应用"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7c1b48aa-88bb-468e-92bc-9dc3b039ea2a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们之前讨论过原子设计在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./Figma%20组件库搭建与易用性优化%204fe942a5-93d7-4427-acbb-50f0c4550ea3.md","title":"Figma 组件库搭建与易用性优化","data-internal-href":"meta://card/4fe942a5-93d7-4427-acbb-50f0c4550ea3","edited":true}}],"text":"设计系统"},{"type":"text","text":"中的应用，还包括在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./卡片笔记%20d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7.md","title":"卡片笔记","data-internal-href":"meta://card/d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7","edited":true}}],"text":"学习笔记"},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./原子设计&效率工具%20b9894cda-3a85-44c2-a711-5c8bfdad891f.md","title":"原子设计&效率工具","data-internal-href":"meta://card/b9894cda-3a85-44c2-a711-5c8bfdad891f","edited":true}}],"text":"工作效率领域"},{"type":"text","text":"的应用，今天想分享下原子设计原则在具体的方案设计中的应用。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d6c7bdf0-616e-47e9-9023-0a5466344503","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是什么"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"0dd04030-ea79-4955-bb11-fb427680c140"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ac140c72-75db-4902-9666-f89c16931dff"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"少就是多"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"039dec37-0ff3-425b-850e-9bbe33e24572"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相信这句话大家都听说过，首先什么应该「少」？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7bee9d16-0cd7-4ab7-ab48-2ec82ea58f58"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"少的对象就是原子，原子可以是界面的元素、功能或点击、滑动等原子交互。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8dadf9c1-2ad9-47b4-b9b6-5413e3087cf7","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"46f328bb-9e2a-4d13-8fb6-d81dedcf394e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么「少」了就会「多」（带来好处）？以下举几个案例进行说明。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"cebebd90-7679-47e5-b46b-c04fd0b31700","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提升效率、灵活度"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2a95640e-a9ae-4d45-a379-171ba361fc0b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在 Figma 中构建一个圆形，至少有两种方法"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"07d558ec-e898-4b7a-b29c-784755c4d369","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b0a5c5aa-8d5d-40db-a4d6-71dd9025922b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"直接拖拽一个圆形到画布中"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c1b14e88-1a6a-4d87-8dcf-cab82d0a785b","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f6bdb0ca-1a5b-4106-b105-701b20d56153"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"拖拽一个矩形，然后修改矩形的圆角大于边长的一半"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9325a992-d518-4b51-a0ea-549ce032ca47"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我通常会使用第 2 个方法，因为在后续的设计维护中，如果要将圆形改为矩形，则可以通过简单的修改圆角即可实现，而无需删除旧图形拖入新的图形。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"665db458-3538-4a7c-99aa-04cf3a32c5cf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在这个案例中，使用方法 1 涉及到 2 个原子——圆形、矩形；而方法 2 则只涉及 1 个原子——矩形。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"68d057b4-eff7-4969-8b80-14c95d1deff1","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/41004fcd-d0ba-447c-8e4f-0bb87f853605/image.png#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"70%","height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e9c154e-5cdb-4625-89ec-b6b0a6929aa1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以减少原子可以提升效率和灵活度，因为更少的原子减少了相互切换的摩擦。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"152e5be6-a38e-492e-824b-6052b303b420","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"减低用户的理解、操作负担"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5dfe06fe-a495-4eae-888b-0caa1b6fc6c8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"图形界面的操作效率相比命令行界面来说并没有进步，甚至退步。但图形界面减少了用户操作的原子数量 ，让软件更易于使用和学习。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e4dde1ec-2933-4c20-adac-1b030df6fe98"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为在面向命令行的操作中，用户需要精确地通过至少 26 个按键（输入命令字符）来控制计算机，而图形界面则提供了少的多的选择，减少了用户出错的可能。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"cc22fe23-efc7-4647-af4e-9a0a7f7f15ee","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/ed8f7c1d-83f2-4478-b29f-f5688cf6e80a/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"13450b2a-dea6-4667-90d0-1081a1c5ca3c","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"降低系统设计的复杂度"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"79838037-a9ab-4a01-9edf-f2d799025eb8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们知道直线、曲线这 2 种线条，而对于计算机来说，直线等于曲率为 0 的曲线。通过调整曲率这一参数即可获得不同的线条形态。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9313db19-0b04-4f9f-94ce-a846f98dcad5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与第一个案例相同，通过减少原子的数量降低了系统设计的复杂度（开发 1 个功能和开发 2 个功能的差别）。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"dc529b36-90ff-4f5c-85eb-1ab88fab1a58","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"怎么做"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a98f7b85-00cd-4dac-a3de-063d890c5031"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何减少原子从而达到「多」的效果呢？通过 3 个步骤思考问题"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e199d811-53fa-465a-85b9-24f7eb861785","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"07e59149-5f81-48b3-886f-ab6a09186df3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能不能不做"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"aa5fa1e1-40d2-42b4-a77d-86433326d00c","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"37a86eff-2f3c-493a-9a80-ae41f18dd90a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能否用已有功能满足"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a6e8b6d1-5a19-43c6-9206-9bad625a0834","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"63b36341-2078-4875-b221-d5eb61c9535c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能否用于其他场景"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"06013bab-ff32-4427-91d6-39b365977228","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能不能不做"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2359236f-2618-4abe-b44e-ce8868ba0540"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"需求要解决的问题、要达到的目的是什么？具体的场景是什么？"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"cbfc7c64-8279-4241-ab1e-3ac451e8408a","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能否用已有功能满足"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e8c6ff43-ed3a-42d8-8e34-6f78929255f6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用已有功能满足而不增加产品本身的复杂度。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e0479741-d295-44cb-a02c-62b728c17971","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能否用于其他场景"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9aec6963-b199-4c04-a1ff-2d60e1fb24c7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果要做，能否扩大功能的使用场景？这样后续有新需求则可以使用此功能满足，而无需增加新的功能。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4e69e5be-e7a6-4c8d-bf7e-564abbd79a12","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"案例"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2c2e7c3c-6b1b-4978-9bef-ead335f23427","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Figma 字符搜索、替换插件"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"91561e87-2d05-4222-a5d8-98da3236633c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"插件支持搜索 Figma 文档中的文本，针对用户不同的搜索场景，需要支持设置搜索范围——在选中的图层中搜索、在整个页面中搜索。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"d378334a-920f-48bc-9f3e-e07a51ec5bac","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/3238415f-30f3-4f39-8d35-9f71731a5ef3/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4d6a95d7-4b0c-48ed-8328-b6fed410aac8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于用户「设置搜索范围」的功能需求，基于「能否用已有功能满足」进行思考 🤔，发现可以通过用户是否在 Figma 的画布中选中图层来预判用户的意图，如果存在选中的图层则在选中方位内搜索，否则搜索整个页面。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f4b7ab69-a49a-401a-9de4-8ee09e394324"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这样既符合用户的直觉也没有增加产品的使用复杂度、开发成本。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"950d6ab4-a9db-4566-9999-f56f22c64449"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/1052801241204192805","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"插件地址"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"70fc65ed-2d2c-4896-958e-3c4e53b6265d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f250779e-4042-4ff1-b1e3-83125288ae6b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过减少原子的数量来提升易用性和降低系统复杂度、降低维护成本；通过思考 1. 能不能不做；2. 能否用已有功能满足；3.能否用于其他场景；过滤需求以达到减少原子的目的。"}]}]}
cards.title: 原子设计在具体交互方案中的应用

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"fec5f1a2-fb9e-4a71-a84b-0bea317d73c2","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"数据整理自动化"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"87b76fa2-5816-4be8-89ca-30902bc51a2c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"数据分析可以辅助设计决策"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e918e699-8653-4f84-ad58-ddc08280f7ab","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"S 情境"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"54a0d23a-ee7a-489b-8bed-c98e864ff3a1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是什么、遇到了什么问题"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ada43c31-17ae-4133-b1aa-8572c0e15cde"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从数据到可视化图表，经历了 3 个过程"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"d73f046e-2a6c-4acf-94f3-1d94b4a45a18","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/9fJj0z20221116213729.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"615be620-7057-4087-baef-38712724a5e8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"本文结合公司内部的数据工具，着重围绕「数据整理」环节描述现存问题和优化方案。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cc018823-1111-4ab3-871f-cd72d7c47cab"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这是获取到的原始数据，它距离分析并产出可视化图表、分析结论还需要经过「数据整理」环节。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"971bad6d-8ced-4b7e-8f67-fc779d731f17","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/vRUIbu20221116213740.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e22780f6-c2c8-4c0d-b72e-8679c342d6dd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"数据整理包括"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"56cfd051-8e53-45ea-a8fb-3f4775312674","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e143f95c-e927-45ea-874a-107a84397786"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"根据数据 ID 匹配事件信息，包括事件名称/对应位置"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"78d27845-f661-4159-af73-2c2b9e93e43a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a175dd7c-eb15-4c0b-bf59-0bf2e6f42487"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"日期数据格式化"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"470b1393-48fa-45c2-8f29-5fcf96731482","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"根据数据 ID 匹配事件信息"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e6c0a921-22b7-4421-92af-4fabf301e98c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原始数据只有数据 ID，无法明确 ID 对应产品的哪一个界面/流程，所以需要将 ID 与事件信息进行关联。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"ff265e76-00d7-44c7-93f2-b10852fbb060","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/2227d8c8-dbcc-4f11-94cb-a7d4eac3d85a/image.png#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"70%","height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"30c7e9dd-1af5-4ab4-907e-3e02fa71d1df"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在原有方案中，需要单独保存一份 ID 索引表格，通过函数进行匹配，每次需要手动操作，比较繁琐。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"66811573-11db-4018-8920-e9ca81791b93","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/syhezT20221116213802.jpg#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"50%","height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9e907203-9756-4016-a644-655b69b207e9","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"日期数据格式化"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ce70306-6620-46b8-84b9-0e29842249cc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原始数据中的日期，看起来是日期，但格式其实是「数字」，「数字」与「日期」在 Excel 中是不同的数据类型，如果使用「数据」类型生成可视化图表，将导致显示问题，影响分析。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"4850629c-1c13-4fd8-bc55-8084ec8351ae","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/qcPmXJ20221116213824.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"41524bb5-cef0-4ab6-a818-355eed59563b","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"T 任务"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ca788ea9-44da-44c4-84b9-820cab8cb8de"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在此情境下我要解决的问题、要达到的目标是什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"efc6ce1c-9eee-4c7a-8b26-46f4238f1135"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"上述两个问题需要人工处理，且出现次数频繁，影响工作效率。可以结合 Python 自动化完成。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d38eb5cc-7bd1-4579-822e-ceca2ba4cfa3","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"A 行动"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ef08e11a-f9f1-4f4d-a8ae-a12cea40ac77"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我采取了哪些行动、制定了什么方案，为什么采取这些行动。如何开展这些行动，遇到哪些问题，我是如何解决的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"66e9a6ad-7c89-47dd-b7b5-5c19bedc2599"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ID 匹配事件信息方面，抓取了事件信息数据保持到本地表格中，定期更新，避免每次使用时都需要获取数据影响处理效率。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"92e6d7d6-3beb-4a44-bc84-131e3b7480f2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"日期格式化方面，通过 Python 的 openpyxl 模块读写表格完成格式化。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"10f986b5-612e-4983-8110-4a798c454069","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"R 结果"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cd6a0fc6-ddf1-45b6-af11-89ee1df2eed5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行动的结果如何，是否完成任务。从中学习到了什么有哪些收获。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7a1699bc-ca07-4d7b-9d88-1a4874a92b93"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自动化匹配 ID 对应的事件信息、自动化对日期进行格式化，节省了人工处理的时间，提高了数据分析的效率，降低了分析门槛。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6c69d905-db12-475a-bdbd-f1f7683c51c4","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"案例"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a8b53ef0-d956-4f51-b950-bd2183614c8a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分析快速发言的使用情况"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"60f307dc-6ce9-4f70-9e0d-2f2f21ad3433"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"首先从后台导出数据"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"a9907139-9659-43bc-9044-12161a74bdc7","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/537e8e75-2a58-4f41-a1b0-bdf21a8a16e4/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bc21d5d8-dee1-44ca-b5fb-860163dcc693"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"默认的表格数据只有事件 ID，无法了解具体的事件信息，日期也没有被格式化"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"8f1ec63f-079b-41d9-adb3-3c97234bde3e","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/e68ccc17-8a19-4cab-b45c-3535d8158dad/image.png#center","alt":null,"title":null,"width":"90%","height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6540ad66-41e1-444a-bec1-0b53056f00a7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"运行脚本，自动整理数据"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"1428dec3-efc6-4743-9c93-139a58b91da2","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/375500a3-8532-47d2-b910-35fcd97a7371/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ba53b264-c55a-451b-8e52-0dd25de01f4f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"处理后的表格新增了「分类」、「具体位置」、「事件名称」信息，帮助了解数据含义、进行后续操作"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"3ff8913e-9fb8-4b17-8a2a-03aa8962864f","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/1f0fcea8-d91f-4cc1-a756-054e6cc0d643/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2f3a6643-6a26-4079-b255-1284f79e249d","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"更多可能性"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"80cef942-88d5-44b5-995b-cef0b744f58b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前面只介绍了「数据整理」部分，其实整个分析流程中还有很多可以通过自动化提高效率。例如通过 pandas 实现自动可视化，快速预览数据概要。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7ac85c04-f27a-4f4b-a5d5-de81c8c122c1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"接下来将学习 pandas 库，进一步提高数据分析的效率和质量，让数据更好的为设计服务。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"7a618597-203b-4e5a-9fc5-31a6caea11da","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d50485f2-639c-4854-852b-31d08d131d79"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过 Python 可以替代人工做数据整理，提高数据分析效率；未来计划学习 pandas 进一步提高效率和质量。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"8fa84c45-1b7f-414a-8494-630f452d6e85","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/4f1f2c7f-77e3-4502-9004-cd49bc0755e4/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"68c451b5-b439-4df5-b540-45bbed11a33b"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"edd73757-ed22-4924-82e6-2bbfebe16c9a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a0f838e3-0f14-4330-901a-8d11af06e875"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"演讲自查清单"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"441c9fa6-39ce-4fcc-9836-92893f35c6b1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🗒️ 全局信息"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b9b52617-a356-4e16-8f30-04721f54d700","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f9a448b2-5da7-49d4-a4c8-ac1907d929cb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"观众是谁：同事，有一定数据分析的了解"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"91683cfb-c899-41f9-a6a7-e6a7cecc2349","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eed64608-eab9-422f-8d79-2ddbfdf1733b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"演讲目的：宣传提高数据分析的方法，可以和有兴趣的同事做进一步的沟通"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"69f3ee17-7126-42a7-91dd-7870cf94db83","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"437bc448-a619-4742-a9ef-4b22e222a50c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"预计时长：5min"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3aa4f152-69f6-40ef-a0bb-c1edec425efa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🖼️ 直观"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e1e452fd-cf6d-4fe6-85bd-00f3f5f93771","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d4a7d619-e81a-4217-81c9-94a14be8a994"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"[x] 三段式框架"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"85cfe82f-ecca-4c94-9378-1f8a732b1457","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"51724418-c368-493d-b1ce-2c2a0375f560"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"[x] 舍弃与主题关联不大的内容"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a2788cce-bf1c-40b7-9c24-7a21c4cfe221","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a649c424-f61d-4124-83cc-5600f99159ac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"[x] 团队，他们彼此协作。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f9e4915e-7447-4e3a-9762-2fb69cf56198","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8b7096eb-2b35-4b61-898a-cb7af1fe35a3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最近看了一些 知识"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e253cbd8-0584-4a8e-af04-3a2b03dc8f98","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a52a1bc9-2878-44f1-aa8e-a1fc7ce4ff31"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./使用%20Heptabase%20管理数字花园%20b81a2f54-ec5b-4de0-9e97-ab841c0e18f9.md","title":"使用 插件项目等等"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4098182c-d811-4df3-95a0-350e9661d64f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2c84799a-9c5c-4276-8bf6-ce952f002b06"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实际工作中，如果我专攻 UX 设计，我可以"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"03ebb92c-492a-4989-9bd5-5dd096472679","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ff7fad4-fd2b-48c2-835b-214fe5d5fcfb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输出更加清晰、美观的交互设计稿，提升输出质量"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d91e81d0-0533-4ecd-a699-b662c2ea4d65","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9d233694-f579-494a-a725-144bd3607ff0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在过往的经验中，交互设计稿的布局对于 cards.title: UX 设计师需要学习 UI 吗？

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e4da468a-7044-4d9d-94f4-1cc55a733c97","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习需要实践土壤"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c8d5db0c-7cd8-4ddf-9178-02cd0d17e4d7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"除了研究多领域来促进知识的联动（ "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1be2b4a7-1371-4bb7-9240-37e024fe0ad9","cardTitle":"从多个领域切入学习更能发挥卡片笔记的威力"}},{"type":"text","text":"）可以尝试在学习理论知识中加入其他相关的实践，例如 Find-and-Replace 项目的实践就调用了大量过往的理论知识，辅助实践同时和产生了更多的连接实现了知识的复利。缺乏"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8f5a1330-0ed6-4fea-a5c6-84c7cec89df4","cardTitle":"实践土壤"}},{"type":"text","text":"甚至可以停止学习的投入。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"923d3df7-3ee0-4acd-b1ad-bce08c6d3c22"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2b07216b-3ad2-45bb-8baf-ef0d14c07f65"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTc0NDcxNzY","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-03-03 21:45:52"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8413cc1e-d73c-47c6-affd-4ec72d51ca04"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ce5f21e3-6f55-4a91-b32f-ebfdb6958e33","cardTitle":"动态媒介可以拉近理论与行动的距离"}}]}]}
cards.title: 学习需要实践土壤

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f5c47624-31b7-4f47-9fa8-b2b64b1ab8de","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从多个领域切入学习更能发挥卡片笔记的威力"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"03a620e7-97f8-412d-89b5-214d38e185e0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"写作或学习等事项，可以尝试同时研究多个方向/领域，更能发挥卡片笔记的威力——让不同领域的知识发生碰撞和链接，迸发出新的洞见。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4f98ccb4-f1ac-434d-bf78-4aa5786b6c32"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"事实的确如此，我在同时研究卡片笔记和原子设计时产生了大量的联系（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3eb247a7-9306-4e3a-a118-5d69e0ffd795","cardTitle":"抽象"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"326a510c-7db2-45f6-b09f-49159aa911e3"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7","cardTitle":"卡片笔记"}},{"type":"text","text":" p217"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"661a1f6f-1591-4e8c-a2eb-8800df9ea779"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"721d942a-8312-4d34-ac12-37d969caf110"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=NDU2MzIwMg","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-07-23 19:12:36"}]}]}
cards.title: 从多个领域切入学习更能发挥卡片笔记的威力

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b291c46d-ff4d-47c1-ba0a-f072d4dffb59","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实践土壤"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"104cdb9d-7e7c-4d00-a618-ae2ca5949279"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果所学知识缺少实践土壤，可考虑暂停投入。因为没有实践，知识没有影响决策和行动则无意义（不过对于未来很可能用到的战略性投资也可以考虑） "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"03528472-08df-4893-a1d8-3743e8702fcd"}},{"type":"text","text":" 。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"debc76c4-3a16-4007-86a6-a8aae3a391cb"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/9A_XLmUTRAYRKtfnow3_Rw","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/9A_XLmUTRAYRKtfnow3_Rw"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"1b30a161-467c-41c5-b9bb-84139ea418bb"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9d91a760-07d1-4eaa-91a5-246a64001137"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTQ1NzY3OTY","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-01-26 14:56:23"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"d3b8c379-ae7c-4835-9a54-7b44919ef1de"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"31655f48-0185-49ef-a840-a66d6c085e4e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另一方面，根据「用进废退」原则，没有实践的知识很容易遗忘导致投入的浪费。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"c46410f4-4c2f-4cdc-b78b-d1d4e7c63999"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"df9543b9-7221-472c-8303-04fae7c694bb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"发现"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/d7894f5a-90fe-494d-85af-2a8803c5ca4d","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"工作强迫"},{"type":"text","text":"和"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3875bd51-3dbc-4408-9913-cd3da3ea9d4e"}},{"type":"text","text":"都是符合实践土壤的方法。"}]}]}

16","cardTitle":"知识是对信息的链接"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b1f762a7-f7cb-4750-8393-b2c883d1c138","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8f0f8480-5465-4646-ab8b-c8a13b0c13f0"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"eaedfa86-3aa3-4ea8-9818-68be66c05cb2","cardTitle":"模板匹配"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"809711c2-bc83-4463-8cc3-edbe51c2ca8f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5aec838d-9789-4efb-a25d-a48b915c014d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"拆分知识"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"014b8d26-4da8-4f3d-8820-8d3d0c40cd85","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7d3904f7-f402-45a4-b0da-d88efd916523"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b8189498-d208-4048-b538-77f4e46e27e4","cardTitle":"知识网络模型"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"21997bf4-9d5f-4956-a76e-729c60000325","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"60350b11-24b5-40c3-8810-9c7e42814b0a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b8cc4607-6474-4da6-bf09-7c7946448c3f","cardTitle":"将大问题拆分成小问题"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"745bea01-807b-4bb7-9c5a-daef3952fda4","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"573acace-98dc-47b9-ac0a-f24df45a42a3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"验证知识"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"784419fc-8b8a-4ea9-ac59-759f16fa63e6","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cb8c8583-3655-47af-b16d-4b4b7563ede3"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"989780e5-5139-4c22-bc7d-49e368cc88ad","cardTitle":"康奈尔学习法"}}]}]}]}]}
cards.title: 学习原则

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a68dce97-1a1d-4e74-8595-edf0e52a537d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习是一个过程"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"106beb65-fc27-4564-bd51-8d70e98246ae"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"58663cdc-6f17-4e67-a652-c616f1a87fe9"}},{"type":"text","text":"，其实学习也是，不能要求自己当下就掌握学习的内容。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0c129bda-090e-4dba-ac9f-b5b2222b4862"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为大脑在学习新知识时需要改变自己的神经元结构（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae404370-513b-4424-b696-b3cd03b7a9be"}},{"type":"text","text":"）而这个过程在睡眠中完成；另一方面由于材料不足等因素会造成欠拟合和过拟合的问题（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1ed2806f-7a14-477d-8320-dabef96f331a"}},{"type":"text","text":"），需要输入新材料进一步加工完善。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"80e9f76d-4bcd-4c40-8c39-d61eb07e9005"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/ckx8iy4bl001501l204sz05x3","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/ckx8iy4bl001501l204sz05x3"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bbd9b8e1-567b-42ce-9d40-25a022dbd160"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ab437229-34b9-4ae4-ba2e-ec1bc233710c"}},{"type":"text","text":"这种以过程为导向的写作方式与学习的过程相符。"}]}]}
cards.title: 学习是一个过程

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"582c1c16-52d2-4b3e-bb8e-d9939a85e556","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习其他领域知识优化自身工作"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fffb1de8-7458-4da3-b122-dd160d8591f3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不但有利于合作的沟通，还可以借鉴其优点（具体说是心理表征）反过来优化自身的工作。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c2a0fa82-2e12-4c91-9031-7232e2d7f034"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考："},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"46cc0007-62cc-4f14-a393-1dfd8f41db4e","cardTitle":"回归测试思路在设计中的应用"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"66f47650-d352-4b57-8c5f-b871ea533b92"},"content":[{"type":"whiteboard","attrs":{"whiteboardId":"6108fe00-da61-412b-9207-a6c2e7855970","whiteboardName":"🌊 交互设计工作系统"}}]}]}
cards.title: 学习其他领域知识优化自身工作

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a13017e9-e94e-4cc0-a7de-c4dfc9978d97","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不要把事情复杂化，专注要解决的问题"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5898dc8a-4550-4102-b1b8-03b5617933f9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"美国人试图解决在太空中因重力问题造成的圆珠笔无法使用的问题，发明了用氮气推动墨水进行书写的「太空笔」而俄罗斯解决的方法是用铅笔 😂"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bc6bc456-726c-4bc4-926e-bbf9b977a63e"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"f20defc2-8e3f-49c6-92a2-c4f4aa94f4c7","cardTitle":"《卡片笔记》"}},{"type":"text","text":"》p68"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"a0c373f7-55d5-45ee-b94e-b52bd412f0f1"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b8d0c1c6-d5e0-44f9-af5b-6a7edcf25a54"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=NDQzMjAwNw","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-07-20 12:17:17"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"902ee003-51a1-4b7b-87f4-8989a779c35f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa278d98-8a36-428e-bd78-8661467f3300"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"后来从《"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":null,"color":null}}],"text":"三傻大闹宝莱坞"},{"type":"text","text":"》得知，不在太空中用铅笔是因为铅笔容易折断从而带来安全隐患。"}]}]}
cards.title: 不要把事情复杂化，专注要解决的问题

模型"}}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9a840520-e315-4df2-af27-cc47b1d8e9db","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自主"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ec308495-a476-42db-82b6-8ea5b69f5606"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自主需求是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8c11b800-aefe-4a89-ae77-50507f88b434","cardTitle":"自决理论"}},{"type":"text","text":"认为的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"核心动机之一"},{"type":"text","text":"，指可以自主作出决定，掌控自己的生活。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"414b07ce-f403-4b87-80e1-e49317b5770c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如更多的业余时间可控时可以提升个人的幸福感，996 剥夺了人的自主性。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"65fadb02-9e3b-442c-b055-29bf35617a7e"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4136d5fd-b0ec-4a81-9110-bca19716f884","cardTitle":"《动机心理学》"}},{"type":"text","text":"P56"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"97a5d45a-fdf1-401b-acaf-adf1077e489d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"205bd07f-5a9c-40a8-ac91-f559f326274b"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"98513d2f-0ce5-495f-9723-db9b13cdc402","cardTitle":"控制自由优先于即时反馈"}}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"df8dcf77-627d-41fb-a7fe-ccfa9f933889","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"科学介于「真相」和「描述真相」之间"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c8375ef2-aba8-416b-889e-31d8adaca82a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f559795e-194b-42bb-b9f9-3b31e324a96a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如我们可以观察真实兔子的影子，并可以用双手描述一个类似的影子，但实际上与真实兔子的影子还是有些许差异（真实的兔子有圆圆的尾巴）。这也是牛顿万有引力理论存在的问题，比如水星的公转轨道就不符合牛顿定律。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"e2fef6b4-7690-4f19-98ef-5455bb5bc373","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/90ad34f6-5201-4960-b79b-b5698bcbe027/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":858,"originalWidth":1252,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"e4335c8b-1908-4d02-bcc6-43dd8fd7acf7","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/e6e99406-ea0f-4c55-803c-593c63013c16/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":341,"originalWidth":341,"alignment":"center"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"52e5e765-6259-4e9b-8329-087d6ff11d6a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eb4a0b28-8e45-4119-9540-a043af09fcd5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"来自"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d"}},{"type":"text","text":"的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.notion.so/jiangzilong/Alan-Kay-The-Center-of-Why-3541eade5b7b4a538b07cc8bc513fd4c","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"文章"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 科学介于「真相」和「描述真相」之间

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d75b1b3e-3467-45ba-8b33-1aa8207619c8","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们创造的事物都可以称为艺术"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e26e3712-fe69-433b-ad2d-3e39eb4028ba","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b1b8cff1-0865-4f68-bf78-5c6d697c26a7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"科学、技术也可以称为艺术，只是表现不同而已。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5e1daab9-e836-4e23-921d-9013ba0faf48","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"098297d8-f0a4-4366-a498-62811c8dc324"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9d018b86-829f-4a52-bf69-ed098d6afd2d"}},{"type":"text","text":"，创造可以反映实际情况的理论。科学不容易直观地表现，因此只能借助数学的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ea736105-6cdf-480a-9fcc-9e31fb6d1004"}},{"type":"text","text":"、计算机等非自然的产物来揭示。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"dc386f1d-4b63-4d4b-a44e-dc117d0ab734","src":"https://limboy.me/posts/the-center-of-why/2.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":580,"originalWidth":828,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"627a2f4d-bab5-402a-b0c7-ff10b0243557","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7b4e99cf-2808-4496-b213-e07cae0a8694"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从图中可以看出，技术是处于科学和艺术中间的产物。并且技术处于人文和自然的中间地带，难怪说「站在了科技和人文的十字入口」"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"61e7e8e4-4068-45fd-ae12-d8978fab0f4e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7a134939-ca79-490c-a3cb-0d16a71212a2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"来自"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d"}},{"type":"text","text":"的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.notion.so/jiangzilong/Alan-Kay-The-Center-of-Why-3541eade5b7b4a538b07cc8bc513fd4c","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"文章"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"da167312-ff0e-401f-b230-73f06c6cb095"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5bff146b-5633-4550-91e3-1757972261e0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"慢慢理解"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fb740c7c-4130-435b-85ab-1f20463607ff"}},{"type":"text","text":"对于揭示自然方面的优势，例如可以通过计算机程序进行游戏，让孩子了解加速度。动态媒介让这类教育变得低成本（例如可以无限复用的教学材料等资源）"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"adb0c3a8-b328-4d29-b748-6e7d66720d22","src":"https://limboy.me/posts/the-center-of-why/9.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":406,"originalWidth":1242,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"50288810-2357-460a-b481-42d18beefb94"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"可以说"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fb740c7c-4130-435b-85ab-1f20463607ff"},"marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}]},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"可以缩减我们与真相的距离。"}]}]}
cards.title: 我们创造的事物都可以称为艺术

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4bc66a57-466f-458d-b9bf-8c57b221df08","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"五类结构化"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"21462387-9942-40b1-9539-e427b6231e9e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"afaee025-223d-4c84-889b-2ea832e0fa07"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"心理结构"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5f88ac35-4914-4f87-9ede-4638539bd3db","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f562973c-fc15-4710-9305-d12679a794b3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"概念结构"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6d26f1ad-c2f9-4787-89d0-25f007fb5dbb","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"300ec208-303c-4fc8-b27c-5388a6e8e351"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"语言/符号结构 4 个方向 MTc3ODUzODQ_20220307190748","data-internal-href":"meta://card/d2fd2337-393d-4245-a988-ee12637b3084","edited":true}}],"text":"人工制品"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e96f6c4-0767-47a5-8387-3c8e9213286c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当遇到问题时，人类需要将问题中涉及的概念进行符号化，再通过一定的流程结构、借助人工制品解决问题。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0b9f291b-0c85-4c09-89c3-870af3150bf9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这几个结构 —— "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"de914081-b034-4c80-9a3f-4d8bcf3338be","cardTitle":"Douglas Engelbart"}}]}]}
cards.title: 五类结构化

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b74ae187-7dba-4c85-99cc-e27f1082c5bb","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"计算机拥有快速地"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"模拟"},{"type":"text","text":"任何描述的能力"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ae7e6649-90b7-46d7-ae14-13d10a07571d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d4f8f694-b465-4dac-9e34-4e971ef2ce8f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"除非孩子们能够以这种媒介带来的新方式进行学习、阅读、创作，否则"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"真正的计算机革命并没有发生。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2073a3e4-2ebf-4f5d-b339-4d028fe1e2bf","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b9c290fc-22f2-4fd5-9ee2-f30ef8a67a5a"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/47488956","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/47488956"}]}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"b0150801-c440-4c82-8f0c-8a8eddef7adc"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"68f9a99b-ccfa-437c-91e6-c6d5ace37dcd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fb740c7c-4130-435b-85ab-1f20463607ff"}},{"type":"text","text":"的模拟能力，模拟出最适合人脑理解的信息。例如可以实现让儿童学习微积分的效果（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7fbd0a7f-60c3-4812-bc93-15d48fbcd75b"}},{"type":"text","text":"）。这是利用了"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"edc84b9f-e4fa-485e-8232-b7cbad0518f8"}},{"type":"text","text":"原理。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e750c93-35f6-4dd6-9e34-3abb80435ade"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"模拟能力是一种重新"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c72936bc-ab5b-4f6f-b93a-bcc946c7d5df"}},{"type":"text","text":"的能力，将理解成本高的符号转为理解成本低的方式（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c0599d03-acb3-45d9-a9bb-1173dff99b76"}},{"type":"text","text":"），以增强学习的能力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"61f89837-b9c6-4af8-806c-4e5349a0947e"},"content":[{"type":"whiteboard","attrs":{"whiteboardId":"ef954852-b8ea-4b5b-96da-2bd594cd815c"}},{"type":"text","text":" 提供了新维度的模拟能力——模拟现实物体，这又进一步增强了动态媒介的能力，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"这是 AR 的核心价值之一"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4db692b3-4161-4526-8e4a-d4df03b24f5e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"By "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d"}}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"a1ff1ee8-c020-4cda-ba3e-43203a583409"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e1613b11-f208-4ad0-bdc5-65c14a1c1aee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在模拟的内容选取上"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"529568d0-f09c-4630-933c-627576d2ab15"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]}
cards.title: 计算机拥有快速地模拟任何描述的能力

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a800b238-1670-461b-bbf2-849ef693ef63","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"真正在意软件的人应该拥有自己的硬件"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0bba7b47-7135-4aca-9f28-d2526ce0d1d6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"观点来自计算机先驱"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d","cardTitle":"Alan Kay"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"598fd40a-586f-42cc-b39e-c5a78c9586b3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"只有自己的硬件才能最好的和自己的软件进行协作，不受控的硬件无法更好的为软件提供支持。例如 Smartisan 的「闪念胶囊」按键就让快速记录的体验得到了大幅度的提升。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7dfba8d0-df60-4b7c-9548-cf7151e84e05"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另一方面，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/ad529f9e-5d51-458c-b5ce-99b5acf89250#c28a8b77-a841-4f44-aa1e-b649e5e5dea5","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"硬件相对软件更难以被复制"},{"type":"text","text":"，有利于维护创造者的利益。"}]}]}
cards.title: 真正在意软件的人应该拥有自己的硬件

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"50c6398d-7fa6-4e2b-8fdc-b57b54362c78","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"计算机具备可交互性"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4f326b3a-d2ce-497c-9a78-e4dfb60b9670","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d7460187-eca3-4ebe-8b5c-0163785f78b2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"传统纸质媒介记载"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ea736105-6cdf-480a-9fcc-9e31fb6d1004"}},{"type":"text","text":"信息，而研究表明人类在 12 岁以前对符号的理解能力有限，但其仍然可以理解微积分等高级数学思维，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fb740c7c-4130-435b-85ab-1f20463607ff"}},{"type":"text","text":"支持与用户交互，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"让知识用直观的方式呈现（而不是符号）并且允许用户立即用自己可以理解的方式上手交互，这"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./动态媒介可以拉近理论与行动的距离%20ce5f21e3-6f55-4a91-b32f-ebfdb6958e33.md","title":"动态媒介可以拉近理论与行动的距离","data-internal-href":"meta://card/ce5f21e3-6f55-4a91-b32f-ebfdb6958e33","edited":true}},{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"拉近了实践与理论的距离"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"，从而提高教学的质量。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97fdb069-2335-4c46-813e-5701a72ab514"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"　"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/56925316","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/56925316"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a427ac00-0bee-4269-ab85-ef778d24f5d3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9a50912a-b2d3-46e9-83fc-0848e16b0460"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如下面这个勾股定理的案例，通过移动集合图形可以让孩子自己动手证明勾股定理。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"edc1f1b3-5927-4241-b64e-a04f689a5cab","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/e7e7bb99-1870-4a83-8947-d293ed51d9ca/CleanShot2023-01-3102.50.28-2x.png#left","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"80%","originalHeight":438,"originalWidth":862,"alignment":"center"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d5faa727-dc44-436e-9d3e-f4ffafd962f5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"70ec55b2-a8d0-4019-b30b-10d50a533cc5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我在学习编程时的习惯就是直接尝试某个函数观察输出的结果，通过反馈来理解函数的作用和用法，而不是直接去阅读长长的函数说明书。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9187ceb1-11e8-4868-8575-0d6b9f3dfd10","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"090ad6fe-dd74-4526-a377-cf552e540ba9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在交互设计的原则中，也是鼓励设计师利用动态媒介的可交互性鼓励用户自行探索，并且利用"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./撤销功能帮助用户探索%20fb55329f-7ac6-4894-b843-080a710764b1.md","title":"撤销功能帮助用户探索","data-internal-href":"meta://card/fb55329f-7ac6-4894-b843-080a710764b1","edited":true}}],"text":"撤销"},{"type":"text","text":"等机制打消探索危险性的顾虑（例如搞坏软件、丢失数据）。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"eaa7f116-efad-4948-8dbd-65511483609e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9215662d-21cd-40a3-b166-fa3015c2dbf3"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d"}}]}]}]}
cards.title: 计算机具备可交互性

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"cd778095-05e6-4e27-bbd1-283099987f9e","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提升学习知识的能力"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"71d86d82-24dd-4308-a4a0-1aec537d45ed","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"559c2d43-d424-4157-ac35-9b31bb629944"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.ted.com/talks/alan_kay_a_powerful_idea_about_ideas","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"儿童可以学习微积分知识"},{"type":"text","text":"，但是没有任何一个儿童具备发明微积分的能力。现在知识的奇妙之处是在教学和写作的帮助下，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"许多只能由天才发明的知识可以被普通人所学习、消化"},{"type":"text","text":"。但是即便对于天才来说，知识也不是凭空出现的，即便是达芬奇也很难发明汽车引擎，因为当时所处时代的技术水平和知识还达不到条件。许多成就都是在前人的基础上创造的，也就是我们常说的，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"「站在巨人的肩膀上」"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"a8d3bd04-1d6b-4176-821f-c70a62e724c1","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/aac3bc7e-9325-4534-940b-88a8b5ac2c27/CleanShot2023-01-3103.57.06.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":482,"originalWidth":647,"alignment":"center"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7fde595a-0a1d-43db-aab5-42359aa8db0c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"607ce7d9-af2b-4716-8fb4-67a3fb897453"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果我们可以"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"提高人类的学习能力，就可以提高我们社会的进步速度和质量"},{"type":"text","text":"。动态媒介的特性可以帮助提升学习能力（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"eaa5f279-3304-4e01-ab85-10a309cf9ed7"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ee1daa49-3be9-4fb1-9fcf-14c24a130952","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52d8e12b-b46f-4491-8152-2571901e9c90"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/56925316","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/56925316"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 提升学习知识的能力

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1605a451-61e1-4cc5-bf39-acc29ceca668","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"教育是帮助人们看到自己的局限性并教授如何看得更清楚"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e98f3042-cdbd-420c-b4b1-f6ecd94c129f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"62b4cc4c-894f-4124-acf9-8b7112d10743"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"来自"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d","cardTitle":"Alan Kay"}},{"type":"text","text":"的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.notion.so/jiangzilong/Alan-Kay-The-Center-of-Why-3541eade5b7b4a538b07cc8bc513fd4c","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"文章"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"448efc7f-2ec6-4640-b661-197b85dfceb9","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8b1b171f-7247-42a3-a315-a562fb27e17a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原始视频地址："},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.ted.com/talks/alan_kay_a_powerful_idea_about_ideas","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.ted.com/talks/alan_kay_a_powerful_idea_about_ideas"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e76de53e-61f3-47b9-a641-9c3bf81ce69d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"009d903f-34ab-4f44-9628-f1a2dd9bc094"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相关链接"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dcf4d708-b25f-4e36-9de8-62f660c6d2d1","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2039fac5-4a4f-44a0-abb6-bbee3638d3f3"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4136d5fd-b0ec-4a81-9110-bca19716f884","cardTitle":"《动机心理学》"}},{"type":"text","text":"也提出人们拥有"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"931b7340-2c2c-4e41-989d-80310c7b70d3","cardTitle":"自主"}},{"type":"text","text":"性时可以更大程度创造动机"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a278cd73-0883-4634-a330-efdb3ebc957b","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b76e75f7-cc00-41e9-b01d-992e0b012775"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"阿德勒在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e00fcb4b-1bcd-45d7-bb48-e8631268f539","cardTitle":"《被讨厌的勇气》"}},{"type":"text","text":"也提到，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b51c9e20-e595-414c-9e99-a71648881f12","cardTitle":"你可以自己做选择"}},{"type":"text","text":"，要由内而外的影响自己和世界。"}]}]}]}]}
cards.title: 教育是帮助人们看到自己的局限性并教授如何看得更清楚

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9bf2004e-76b1-4c4a-b7a1-1b5d40884192","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"《被讨厌的勇气》"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4778202e-b8da-479a-a76d-e43a7fb714aa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"作者: 岸见一郎 / 古贺史健"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ca1a05db-4ae6-427a-a349-2b802012912f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"出版社: 机械工业出版社"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e348879f-bdba-44fe-998a-64390bbbf479"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"副标题: “自我启发之父”阿德勒的哲学课"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"703218b9-27db-4635-b385-3a783b900dd2"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://book.douban.com/subject/26369699//","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://book.douban.com/subject/26369699//"}]}]}
cards.title: 《被讨厌的勇气》

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5dcdaeff-654d-4500-94a3-b1f38c05b4dc","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"阿德勒的幸福观"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e01e66d5-88c8-47ab-bdd6-85fd11aafe1b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"72b49b01-a538-4654-9368-d9f168a7c573"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"低级幸福"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ef466a3c-b894-4da2-8d0a-f6cf13cfbd0c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"029869aa-056e-4a3f-ba6a-e8bdadcaf6d8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"来自于与他人的比较"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"eabba9a8-5cff-440e-99a7-bd66e2e1e27d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b2cf0637-5b3f-4e46-8581-e506fb418018"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如比较工资、职位等"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f8e3d455-c426-4ec4-affb-1a096f584a7c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"144e058b-7b84-43d1-b729-056e1db58a77"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1e1de97d-7a97-498f-8dc0-78bc404b5568"}},{"type":"text","text":"中提出，比较也具备一定的积极作用，当比较是向上比较并且难度不大（可以实现赶超目标）时，可以给人们提供较好的向上动机。。"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0a487119-95fa-42f4-9842-cf0d68538a68","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"964c4688-edaf-483d-bb38-ab9be2b887d4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"高级幸福"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d49590db-9140-43a7-b772-bf67d8691df4","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6f4c0708-2ef2-457d-8436-34ebcc423ad5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"来自于与群体的「共同体感」"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c6109cd8-242a-4234-be8d-73aa8df4ca6d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"51c33b31-3df0-4aee-86b7-42dd886dbaa4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如在工作、家庭中为其他人创造的价值"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"19dd0357-e24b-45c8-947c-8dcd663a1490","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f93bb0d-ed1c-48fe-a6b6-4647a8117493"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9beec7c9-90f5-4473-90c6-97a604147325"}},{"type":"text","text":"中的自我实现、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8c11b800-aefe-4a89-ae77-50507f88b434"}},{"type":"text","text":"中的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"cce8a953-9092-40ca-a3c9-fe6c5bdeb97b"}},{"type":"text","text":"需求类似。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e13ecf48-8ae1-4b0e-8f98-a188ac5e6a2a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e95ebf11-2808-4037-bc29-3aa8d545b8eb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这也是为什么许多富豪在退休后仍然在参与工作/公益的原因。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"34ad1391-6b8c-486a-982c-cd1055cc0a96","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"be8899dd-05cd-4450-9c67-e85866220a48"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这种幸福仍然和他人无关，阿德勒不赞成为了贡献他人而牺牲自己。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"47c80dd0-27dd-49c8-a871-5ca147320900","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bca9310d-42d9-45e7-9aec-e68c6f0ec2a3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在幸福观方面，阿德勒仍然受其核心思想——"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b51c9e20-e595-414c-9e99-a71648881f12"}},{"type":"text","text":"的影响，一个人的状态和幸福不应该受他人影响。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"53e69cce-3fc4-42d5-9683-5e58b90f7722"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e00fcb4b-1bcd-45d7-bb48-e8631268f539"}}]}]}]}
cards.title: 阿德勒的幸福观

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9fdce523-86d6-46ee-83a1-c71026888c07","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"把自己的课题和其他人的课题分开"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"93e73d32-0eb6-4579-af35-9e38de7bc2e2","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c2b7c79e-3dc7-4dd4-a106-66b4b0dcba56"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"阿德勒认为人的烦恼与幸福都来自于人际关系，烦恼则是来源于没有分离自己和他人的课题，对他人的课题进行干涉。判断是否为自己的课题的依据是，看看这件事的结果的直接影响对象。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"39ea676c-0a32-41fe-b6a5-5c55593f88e9","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e1165b0b-a292-479e-b571-7bb7faa077e1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如孩子不好好学习，直接影响对象是孩子自己。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e638fe72-df3f-49dd-8059-8724868b7413","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b4b5d37a-52c1-4ad6-8b40-45920cfae39a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"但这不意味着不引导孩子的学习，而是当孩子明确提出需要帮助时提供支持。这就要求引导孩子学习的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"931b7340-2c2c-4e41-989d-80310c7b70d3","cardTitle":"自主"}},{"type":"text","text":"意愿"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"adede786-203d-4767-92eb-c5c23a2a08bc"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e00fcb4b-1bcd-45d7-bb48-e8631268f539","cardTitle":"《被讨厌的勇气》"}}]}]}
cards.title: 把自己的课题和其他人的课题分开

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"77bc471e-0a9d-43ea-a6c9-aa508fccde98","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"你可以自己做选择"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3c6987e9-de4a-4b2c-95f4-fb3c12c68b8c","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6eeaf8eb-40c2-412c-9a81-7107c8cb5579"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"阿德勒"},{"type":"text","text":"的一个核心思想。主流观点认为一个人的性格、行为都受过往的经历所影响，例如一个内向的人可能有一个有控制欲的父母等。而阿德勒则认为"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"一个人的表现完全由自己的选择决定"},{"type":"text","text":"，与他人和过去的经历都无关。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d0850adf-6151-4023-b6f8-f894f4a42601","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0f815fdf-776e-4261-86ff-1918dbb5d568"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当我们认为自己的问题是由过去的经历造成时，也就有了"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"逃避责任、举步不前的理由"},{"type":"text","text":"。这是通过牺牲"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"931b7340-2c2c-4e41-989d-80310c7b70d3","cardTitle":"自主"}},{"type":"text","text":"性来换得内心安宁的方式。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"62f8a253-17d2-464c-9271-63ce24d39d82","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"51483f84-af75-452c-8d21-9a2c5ee58feb"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e00fcb4b-1bcd-45d7-bb48-e8631268f539","cardTitle":"《被讨厌的勇气》"}}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"1cecb9d8-5cb9-45e4-94a8-54dbc91927eb"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2553ce0e-8336-414a-b544-1dcc915bdfdc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这个观点相当于给了我们"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"931b7340-2c2c-4e41-989d-80310c7b70d3","cardTitle":"自主"}},{"type":"text","text":"选择的选项和能力，让我们迈开步子去争取自己想要的事物。"}]}]}
cards.title: 你可以自己做选择

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"538cb070-9f60-4eff-aaed-3e56c0aeb011","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"真正的自由是有被讨厌的勇气"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2dd2bdda-fb20-45cc-9a97-5499705b06eb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当然"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"被讨厌不是追求的目标"},{"type":"text","text":"，而拥有被讨厌的勇气是一种自由生活的状态，至于他人是否讨厌我，那是他人的课题。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6ee73c45-1df3-4f06-bd27-58a34c5b0a13"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e00fcb4b-1bcd-45d7-bb48-e8631268f539","cardTitle":"《被讨厌的勇气》"}}]}]}
cards.title: 真正的自由是有被讨厌的勇气

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c4e80413-57c8-4627-8818-31c2d0b4e4d6","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"教育的目的是让所有公民都参与到已经发明的思想的对话和辩论中"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"783be0d7-9438-4624-bf24-19a2d697ea34"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们的成就"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./提升学习知识的能力%207fbd0a7f-60c3-4812-bc93-15d48fbcd75b.md","title":"提升学习知识的能力","data-internal-href":"meta://card/7fbd0a7f-60c3-4812-bc93-15d48fbcd75b","edited":true}}],"text":"建立在前人的基础上"},{"type":"text","text":"，所以需要针对已有的知识进行讨论和扩展，从而推动人类进步。更多人的参与讨论可以降低少数个体的错误、偏见的影响。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ef66c831-a2a6-4f13-afbd-0c8f9a204ff2"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d","cardTitle":"Alan Kay"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d2fb7eb1-9713-40ed-b39e-757affbfe2fc"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/56925316","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"参考资料"}]}]}
cards.title: 教育的目的是让所有公民都参与到已经发明的思想的对话和辩论中

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"dc23f10c-c976-482f-969c-017d81057dee","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"容错设计帮助用户学习"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a55fee0b-af8f-400c-a503-f6ee188bf3fa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自行车辅助轮无法帮助用户学会自行车，因为学习自行车最重要的是平衡，而辅助轮很可能让用户不需要去学习平衡。—— "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"02117d90-b38c-451f-abea-e9d22c62cfab"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"辅助轮要做的是避免新手犯错之后摔倒(造成损失)，减低试错成本。而不是代替用户完成目标。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"10d8439e-0485-42ea-bbcb-ec008fa8bcbd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"运用到产品设计中，可以提供"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b0b4df12-f10b-4197-92d7-e7e84086d90e"}},{"type":"text","text":"等容错设计鼓励用户大胆尝试。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"4fe5e6ca-d70e-42e4-8eb7-388facd3ae3c","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/6fe4c04e-3b09-43ff-951a-327e5bf7ba7c/CleanShot%202022-09-19%20at%2020.09.04.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":470,"originalWidth":649,"alignment":"center"}}]}
cards.title: 容错设计帮助用户学习

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"460d8382-7101-425c-bbb3-d6b8c6953afd","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"回收站"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b9fda2cd-1378-4cb9-9937-6e25ffa1dd22"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"勇于删除过时的内容，可以使用回收站的方式，降低删除的负担，从而使得核心内容更突出、更加精准（而被删除的内容大概率不会再被使用了）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cbf2ed9b-c6f4-4dfe-9b31-a107ff8a0c94"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以一个应用的回收站机制非常重要，不过又带来另外一个问题，回收站是否需要清空呢？"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"3add56c4-d65c-4d48-94fa-b5fbd09c7385"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"17f89b1b-ddde-49de-a787-c200da321350"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=NDYxODcxMQ","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-07-25 14:39:39"}]}]}
cards.title: 回收站

cards.content: cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"85a09454-f232-4e78-8bd1-97726901cee6","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"反馈延迟"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b2bc07b6-d0ca-4e31-9116-1d8148321039"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一些系统的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9ae28abf-0291-44d9-9d08-68bdd0381384","cardTitle":"反馈"}},{"type":"text","text":"不是及时的，当反馈不及时时我们就要放慢节奏观察反馈再做下一步行动。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6851ac22-cf40-4389-a641-1839a32f08fe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如美国在上个世纪和苏联进行航空竞争，苏联取得成就后美国开始焦虑地资助大批高中生进行理工研究，但高中生距离毕业工作还有好几年的时间，但在这期间美国没有等待而是继续投入，结果造成多年后大批理工生找不到工作导致更少人愿意学习理科。这也从侧面证明了及时反馈的重要性。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4b22cb61-8fae-42ad-9cd1-43e8a11a04e1"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a8dc2455-af12-4e32-8f41-1450f9fa4209","cardTitle":"《系统之美》"}}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9a920d0e-34d5-4c13-bdef-ea5ecd3eb605","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"思维的工具"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b9a68f6c-d464-4ef0-bb25-67263232c8bf","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52bc4607-9ff8-453d-b897-afdb5d6ab861"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一种公共的帮助人类思考的工具，例如语言和写作。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"00b9f535-f446-43c1-aad8-0f0c35838a76","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e38d2cfd-5b8d-4836-b643-2d8d66b6c5a9"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"10c84a17-b8a4-4d86-b12b-9f3c307ae38c","cardTitle":"符号为逻辑与概念的讨论提供了工具"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5c1e37bd-37f7-42c8-9f78-5b734160b4a4","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4b58f5f4-3026-4a5f-acca-9306c7fa6277"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8ab0a936-2679-4f51-9df9-68a087f54f50","cardTitle":"我们不止需要符号，还需要其他信息辅助大脑工作"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c28a8b77-a841-4f44-aa1e-b649e5e5dea5","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4ee62bcf-65c1-4134-8db1-a75e34b96977"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"许多公司都在致力于开发品牌性的工具（不是公共的）例如 Adobe 的设计工具、谷歌搜索，开发公共思维工具非常困难，因为软件的创意非常容易被复制，这损害了创造者的利益。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c78050e7-55df-4c34-803f-bdf54e220bb3","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4b8d6a08-40b8-46da-9b32-896df160c539"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"思维工具需要深入实际生产环境，而不是作为玩具和教育工具。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8463e760-0243-4c8c-ba16-9118fae704ae","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8bacdfc1-f011-4036-ac88-7955dc817d02"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们缺少强大的思维工具。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6a5e932a-8ec9-4241-9177-dc3fbd753548","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e587718b-0e7d-4b17-a663-331f55b14123"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/86657258","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/86657258"}]}]}]}

cards.title: 100LS 语言学习法

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"fed2643c-7e28-425a-b654-c4e97f5cf19b","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在哪里使用就在哪里学习"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"890ba1c8-646b-4cb0-989f-13f787f7728c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"英语属于运动类学习，没办法通过记忆和意识进行控制。所以训练需要在实际场景中进行，这样可以"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"依靠上下文更充分的理解含义（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"33d2d4c8-4a1f-451c-a702-c387154d8e5a","cardTitle":"情境之所以生效是因为提供了冗余的信息"}},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"）"},{"type":"text","text":"。不在实际场景中就相当于一直看中文字幕看英文电影，看 100 部也不会有进步。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f3ac3d9f-3a64-4362-96a2-37fa33a9fae4"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1GV411S7Cb?t%5C=8.6","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1GV411S7Cb?t\\=8.6"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"55764139-f6f4-4ef9-8f91-8f1807a6e275"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"32ac0084-7cc5-450a-8659-fdb4aa651842"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这和"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d561cccf-7bca-40fb-ba3d-552e6351a960","cardTitle":"容错设计帮助用户学习"}},{"type":"text","text":"的案例类似，自行车的辅助轮就像英文电影的中文字幕，让学习者无需学习真正需要学习的内容。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4a4827ff-b8ad-4af6-afae-e0e9dfaab148"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4b7c6612-3432-4f6e-8c73-2dce271f5f1b","cardTitle":"100LS 语言学习法"}},{"type":"text","text":"也要求塑造实际使用的情境（通过电影情景）并只在头几次观看时阅读字幕理解含义，后续观看则观看字幕进行大量的输入，训练大脑的运动类知识。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6e1cb22c-5ed5-4123-a60f-552623d4df93"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"咨询 ChatGPT 学习如何使用 ChatGPT 就是一个例子，学习的环境就是在实际使用的环境。"}]}]}
cards.title: 在哪里使用就在哪里学习

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6ac96091-c92d-4ae4-80d0-ccb90d61f554","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"情境之所以生效是因为提供了冗余的信息"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1e33bb93-075b-4bb5-b17b-c4d3c90df92d"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E5%9F%BA%E4%BA%8E%E6%83%85%E5%A2%83%E5%AD%A6%E4%B9%A0%E8%AF%AD%E8%A8%80%202c2353af-d4d7-410c-9d34-3d37b66dc437.md","title":"基于情境学习语言","data-internal-href":"meta://card/2c2353af-d4d7-410c-9d34-3d37b66dc437","edited":false}}],"text":"基于情境学习语言"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"352837b7-e4fa-46c7-ab3d-bb6a683fdb73"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"86fcabdd-a9bd-47a0-ad4a-296fbd89a9fa","cardTitle":"通过加入情境、视听信息来强化符号的记忆"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1e7943a2-7e11-451a-937d-7427f0f5165d"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"33a0e061-f146-4e5b-bc9a-79a3858d31c4","cardTitle":"计算机需要输出情境信息"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ac0787b1-bdf1-4238-8320-f5ecd7c646ce"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"情境之所以生效，是因为提供了冗余的信息，帮忙接收信息者消除了歧义（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"906c4f60-5825-4089-85a6-3b380d3fdd9e","cardTitle":"沟通中加入冗余信息以消除歧义"}},{"type":"text","text":"），使得信息更有指向性，未信息的存储和加工提供了便利。"}]}]}
cards.title: 情境之所以生效是因为提供了冗余的信息

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"cd8f2637-562a-49c2-b6fa-782242c92e09","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"计算机需要输出情境信息"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"13d552db-68cf-4d8a-80c0-9f17b1c385b5"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a995549c-2230-4613-8538-347d182061d0","cardTitle":"计算机需要获取情境信息"}},{"type":"text","text":"，这是输入方面的。另外在输出方面，也需要提供给用户以相关情境的信息，帮助用户理解。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ba7031ff-4578-4f06-b32c-538002e6f856"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"892977ce-af32-464e-b3b3-e554cc3bed28","cardTitle":"电话在输入输出上的优势"}},{"type":"text","text":"，通过语音沟通增加了情绪等纸张较难传递的额外信息。"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ecab9530-208a-4194-9e53-378942bc098c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"电话在输入输出上的优势"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9ae3904b-d5e5-4e4b-be6d-79cd8012202f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"电话输入方式上更贴近自然，因为"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c72936bc-ab5b-4f6f-b93a-bcc946c7d5df","cardTitle":"编码"}},{"type":"text","text":"的过程有机器代劳。输出的方式出来信息还包含情绪等更多信息。"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"b07683b3-2a31-4a5b-a3e9-aed93076c813"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"01c503b5-9ea4-4059-a1dc-5f5fc0956f12"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0d2152e5-9da0-4f88-8d3a-10fbab94faac","cardTitle":"《信息简史》"}},{"type":"text","text":" 3684"}]}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9bca75dc-787f-49dc-a199-14079eed5234","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"新人设计师会出现无法认识项目优先级和紧急程度的问题"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"80be940d-ccfa-4765-a732-bc08f5a3579c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"新人设计师会出现无法认识项目优先级和紧急程度的问题（需求方说今天交付就真的执行，不去思考合理性），解决方案"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6b8417ff-4da3-4f1a-8f73-0252f78c6c71","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0cd835b4-99ed-4153-8279-90ce00001adf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"沟通预计上线时间（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"402d3c01-c4c2-407e-81e2-aff58529988f","cardTitle":"根据项目排期设计方案"}},{"type":"text","text":"） 、开发人力的接档时间 （"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"eae8ac46-b4b8-4f4d-8203-65d64241c68f","cardTitle":"参考下游人力的投入时间制定设计交付时间"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8e31a4bc-fe98-42fd-a19a-d6aa7d734020","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1f7dafc3-d6c0-4474-b6b9-59489a574219"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"若是修改和完善确认是否由策划造成，若是就不背这个锅"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"46ea13f3-1bfe-4b4d-968c-656eec10cb0d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9648fbd3-8aa2-4f9d-8667-3342c46a730b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果时间协调不过来需要找导师沟通"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"bdb7c535-6cd4-4b6d-a8a3-367ff0824742"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b62c7355-6a39-4e31-95d8-e2c9ba3021c2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTgyMDQ2ODM","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-03-11 22:26:24"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4b6d6d30-d0f8-4b4d-93a0-adb07c4414f0","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"灵感/真理"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"36ead210-6dd7-42af-afd2-00167d39f25e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"黑暗混沌的空间中，两盏钨丝灯忽明忽暗，伴着机械轴吱吱呀呀的声音中循环转动，好似灵感孕育的过程"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0b6a9dda-f1b5-44df-a6fe-8a359484cdd9","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"98efc783-83c8-4eff-827a-6a705d3a9f05"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"两盏灯代表的是左右脑或者某种二元论"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"313aa702-ab28-4882-a8c5-5abf7d0d09fb","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0eac435f-d8e8-455c-9a98-9d2e9c73a926"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"它们是机器，像机械的齿轮"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c29969ac-14fe-4dc5-8769-0d2ffc4f2f64","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4e08a70f-9442-48b1-9389-437771c78fd4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"它们是数学、哲学吗"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"f4e31591-adcd-46e5-a0e3-185d499acf85"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e385b6ea-0b5b-48f1-9a6b-ff64700efa47","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a5f755a3-1f61-401e-b8b2-7f4cb9619c54"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"灯的转动代表了灵感产生的方式——神经元的链接"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"03e538d0-a87c-4bfc-b33f-e822b3c92c5e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f939d774-b749-47a7-93cf-c9515837c273"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b06a887a-d1ef-401d-bb95-5b8068f015b8"}}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a12b6104-903c-4ead-bd1a-9ed3005cea3a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"又让人联想到有智慧的灵魂在昏暗的世界中的美好"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"d594620a-d878-4d25-98d7-ab433b14e368","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20220823215228.jpg#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"90%","originalHeight":3000,"originalWidth":4000,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"2411d5be-ae58-4dd2-b2fd-1d3ce9d31bc4","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20220823215253.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":3000,"originalWidth":4000,"alignment":"center"}}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f07c9e4e-8695-4ce1-bba8-0fa6d0924a4a","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"世界是由数学、哲学组成的"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ed0f8b69-e86d-4d52-b8bf-831823aaf9d3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"越来越发现世界是由数学、哲学组成的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"924098e8-5804-46da-875f-7f863fbab955"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"be28fdfa-e5b8-470b-bab6-42f25109a531","cardTitle":"认知心理学"}},{"type":"text","text":"等科学都在找到数学证明后得到了正名，而哲学也在指导着科学的发张。"}]}]}
