cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"52f8a230-fad2-484a-ae33-8f647993e3aa","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"精神熵"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2f1bbe3f-d9e6-454e-aa95-a8bf814423d5","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff745749-ef50-4321-80dc-186dbce3c445"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"借用了物理学"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"30467f2e-b84e-49fa-b205-a90e2d6cd2a8","cardTitle":"熵"}},{"type":"text","text":"的概念用于心理学领域"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"acc43515-8c5a-45ec-a3fa-ad823746ed9d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"037378ae-76a5-441d-b7c5-ea6a0c0a2f42"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"指的是精神的无序状态，当大脑变得无序则会让人焦躁不安。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c4e2cd5e-dc61-4c21-8d29-3e1a243e4f0d"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"048c6703-f8d0-4cb4-8c4b-71bd99b3b8ff","cardTitle":"《心流》"}}]}]}
cards.title: 精神熵

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b7aba2be-165b-49d9-9845-41c8f96bdf85","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"熵"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e4886551-5788-4a2f-a019-c74dc843408f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4dde3eea-c64e-49e4-902d-be407739371e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"代表的是无序的单位"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6bebcece-ea58-4228-aad0-ff587bfe2f36","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3648fa6b-b377-4166-b370-beb1d5cd30ce"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"热力学第一定律"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"69a2be5d-0cc0-41ac-88c4-164fb332ebec","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a9a2c247-0f03-4b3b-96ae-f8440e9efdb4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"根据能量守恒定律，自然界的能量不会增加也不会减少，只会由一种能量转为另一种能量。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5b48a8a5-c78a-4d3d-a563-5a60e70d6c8e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"136b5754-d316-4e0f-a1b9-47a83c2868c2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"热力学第二定律"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"acb53e94-43ad-425b-88e7-0819a9233333","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2df50580-1f1b-4393-aed7-1deac5ce0490"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"热的物体总是会向冷的物体传递热量，在传递的过程中会损耗一定的热量。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0accb1d8-0bd5-4551-8d7c-70f1bed0896b","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"162fc4e7-c398-4b90-9c98-fd5a5e459d27"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"又例如隔离的两个空间的冷热气体，当隔离带撤离后，冷热物体会逐渐融合、混杂。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0055f7da-8170-49d5-93c1-9b84051671d8","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e40df2ff-05e9-4aeb-a534-8e9a8e254573"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"是一种由有序向无序转变的状态。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6d4b7ec6-7396-4598-b75b-8a9e1f530e8a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c8cd2f97-6369-4707-a77e-e971652d0431"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以在物理过程中，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"熵总是不断增加的"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 熵

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f1957674-56b7-40a2-adb5-1a7b825acd9f","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人机交互的下一个实质性进步是为每一个学习者提供一个老师"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"41a83332-cf89-4608-9887-9802926bcf8f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以深入地帮助学习者定制化地学习复杂的思想和学科，而不仅仅是大多人都遵循同一套教材，学习最低标准的知识。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9517a07f-fd59-43ce-9a4f-5d314e579059"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/326848978#:~:text=%E8%BF%98%E5%BE%88%E8%BF%9C%E3%80%82-,%E7%94%A8%E6%88%B7%E7%95%8C%E9%9D%A2%E7%8E%AF%E5%A2%83%E4%B8%8B%E4%B8%80%E4%B8%AA%E8%B4%A8%E7%9A%84%E8%BF%9B%E6%AD%A5%E5%B0%86%E6%98%AF,-%EF%BC%9A%E4%B8%BA%E6%AF%8F%E4%B8%AA","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"参考资料"},{"type":"text","text":"——"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d","cardTitle":"Alan Kay"}}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"eab44978-733a-49cf-9dd8-e11d8f5b813f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e9fbd029-5551-49de-b19b-5e30f6e357d3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ChatGPT 就是一个非常厉害的老师、助教，并且是可以为每一个人提供个性化的服务，而不会像真实老师一样有教学数量的限制。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0104c94b-6baa-4c3c-bfad-b0fd396a12e4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们每个人都有许多标签（结构化/原子化）例如高中生、成绩中等、文科，根据这些标签我和其他拥有相同标签的人分配了相同的教程、班级和老师，这可以带来"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./标准化带来高效率，工作流程也是一种标准化%20ab5c76f5-6147-4f74-8a47-18ba9bfb7dff.md","title":"标准化带来高效率，工作流程也是一种标准化","data-internal-href":"meta://card/ab5c76f5-6147-4f74-8a47-18ba9bfb7dff","edited":true}}],"text":"效率上的提升"},{"type":"text","text":"，因为同一份教程、老师就可以服务几十上百人，而无须为每个人定制，但也正是这样造成了忽略个性的问题。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"957fbaa5-254c-4a5e-b5d5-b48eb1374392"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在信息论中，这是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"54f74a42-98c9-40ce-98df-da4a84f07eda","cardTitle":"信息的原子化"}},{"type":"text","text":"造成的信息损失。使用相同的标签可以理解是一种"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c72936bc-ab5b-4f6f-b93a-bcc946c7d5df","cardTitle":"编码"}},{"type":"text","text":"方式，它减少了传输信息所需要的信息量（课程设计的投入、老师数量），而传输过程中信息的丢失就是失真现象。类似的例子也会发生在数字领域，例如使用 MP3 对音乐进行压缩时就会损失音质。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"632d5d5a-a3d7-469b-9d10-3151cfe66770"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3b7cfb45-402f-4a7b-a4af-0f467b72f77a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"795cd3e4-cc55-427c-81e9-7b693e9f4bd4","cardTitle":"未来的趋势是机器更多的适应人类"}}]}]}
cards.title: 人机交互的下一个实质性进步是为每一个学习者提供一个老师

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4b5adaf6-acc9-49df-bb0b-f32e5795137c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ChatGPT 的强大是在于对个人需求的定制化回复"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"26ad76aa-f31d-4a74-937d-bfc55963e8c0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有别于搜索引擎，它在搜索大家都容易遇到的通用问题时更有效。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d7532108-e299-4c95-aa28-a8cdd03ed5cf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过 ChatGPT 获得案例来理解概念，我可以针对不了解的概念向它获取案例（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae404370-513b-4424-b696-b3cd03b7a9be"}},{"type":"text","text":"），这本身也构成了一种从具体（具体的案例）到象征（抽象的概念）学习，也就是 Alan Kay 说的，使用图像（具体）创作象征。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"3bbfbad8-f5ed-4525-b14c-f156dba4ae9f","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/ab5bfb5f-1299-405c-9a1f-48b6fd1a637c/CleanShot2023-02-1122.04.49.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":842,"originalWidth":805,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e9c1648-6021-4b51-b940-c28de8beee97"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"96d18947-6dd3-4aa0-b3ed-7e63c42694b4"}},{"type":"text","text":"，从目前的体验来看 ChatGPT 的确可以强化大人的学习能力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"65d05984-ff81-4b94-9f49-feb5d37103da"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"但是切记不要让工具变成自己的假肢，而是要"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"73e8d138-256c-452b-83a8-c35b94fa1c55"}},{"type":"text","text":"，增强自己本身已俱备的能力（例如理解、研究、思考的能力）。"}]}]}
cards.title: ChatGPT 的强大是在于对个人需求的定制化回复

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e33a6db6-69d4-470f-b1b1-e2548ce5ef98","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"动态媒介可以拉近理论与行动的距离"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3efcc02d-378f-4956-88c6-82cea0110917"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们学习书本上许多解释性的描述，我们知道了某个知识但是没办法通过书本马上进行应用，这影响了我们学习的效果（理论与实践之间存在的阻碍较大）。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf260143-57ec-4f2f-b42f-037156ee2d6f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这位作者创作了许多"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://distill.pub/2020/communicating-with-interactive-articles/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"可交互书"},{"type":"text","text":"，在过去我认为这利用了"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./动态媒介具备可交互性%20eaa5f279-3304-4e01-ab85-10a309cf9ed7.md","title":"动态媒介具备可交互性","data-internal-href":"meta://card/eaa5f279-3304-4e01-ab85-10a309cf9ed7","edited":true}}],"text":"动态媒介的可交互性"},{"type":"text","text":"，但现在发现其实不充分。因为这些互动"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"仍然距离所学知识的具体实践较远"},{"type":"text","text":"。而"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d0a603ce-db99-4145-b8b8-37518d68e94f"}},{"type":"text","text":"，这种能力可以构建贴合我们实践情况的环境，或在真实环境中标注理论信息，缩短理论与行动的距离。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5f1bf67e-2cf1-4707-939f-df10fce43f8c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Figma 的官方教学文件就是很好的利用动态媒介的案例。例如在教学自动布局时，解释性文字就在练习用的控件旁边，用户在看完介绍后就可以立即开始实践操作，而实践的环境就是在 Figma 内（和真正工作的环境一样！）。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"c5efe099-af86-4a18-87eb-13bcfd86f4a3","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/592bee93-bf49-4958-8b43-ded12795d3f8/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":821,"originalWidth":1456,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b550e2e8-3ed3-46e4-ba83-d2ca6d844562"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考资料："},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://novnews.substack.com/p/381?utm_source=twitter&utm_campaign=auto_share","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://novnews.substack.com/p/381?utm_source=twitter&utm_campaign=auto_share"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"4840dad7-d66d-4a0b-9e6b-59502d84f09d"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4b59921f-8009-430e-902f-d51af940e4ee","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38c4b5b9-8b36-43c0-bd55-a4ea3b756f43"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"be28fdfa-e5b8-470b-bab6-42f25109a531"}},{"type":"text","text":"的证明是我们更容易理解直接相关的知识（减少了"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./通信!信息系统%207f526777-0ab1-4f99-9782-72d63ebacde9.md","title":"通信/信息系统","data-internal-href":"meta://card/7f526777-0ab1-4f99-9782-72d63ebacde9","edited":true}}],"text":"通信系统"},{"type":"text","text":"中编码、解码的成本以及中间的噪音干扰）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7b1a1980-b3eb-4f30-8f48-0fe9213b1bf5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9643cd8f-2337-4ad5-b668-a84fa3c81538"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"30ef25c0-9800-423f-896c-1f9d91db9bc3"}},{"type":"text","text":"是在一个点精确地或近似的复现在另一个点所选取的讯息，拉近理论和实践的距离就是提高复现信息的效率。（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"6e224b76-22d5-48af-b607-c26de837dfd4"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1b69a1a3-18d9-423e-b96a-9a57b7fd0c1a"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"21d35901-7870-4d14-acf5-b23c61f20ad9","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d7d10c30-d2d4-4521-9f83-80c339f12327"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实验"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"aef3eb95-121e-4f6a-963e-f0a919b41e2a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fbd0eac5-dc42-45fb-9fd6-4ef26b133ee2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"研究人员让参与者学习驾驶汽车"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9b65f7fa-3467-49ba-bffd-ae3de10f90e8","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cd91c1f1-5674-495b-b5c3-6b644561f28b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"A 组，通过模拟驾驶游戏来学习"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5ed24363-09c9-4fd2-a159-b0658f2279f2","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"68495b20-eab8-45c2-a363-ed1b544ba13c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"B 组，通过阅读解释性文字学习"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6ef04290-e711-47fa-9877-d940af10b93b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"526da63a-3d90-4818-b54c-9882642b373c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"结果模拟驾驶的参与者更容易记住知识，在实际驾驶中的表现得更加熟练。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"15c4eaad-bec7-4580-a60d-1e8f988da69b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6b76e735-519e-4512-b640-d444cbbb934c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"来源 The Picture Superiority Effect - Allan Paivio - 1969"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3a2fe415-a081-4717-8397-ccbeb26d2240","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c446c833-56a9-4031-a170-0a5f83dc053d"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8e001bb5-7e3f-43c7-a8a5-114cfcda05db"}},{"type":"text","text":"，通过将理论放置在实践环境下，大脑可以更容易发挥作用。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"37cd73ab-7f3b-4980-be11-3c0371081f21","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"894ce1fa-139c-42ad-92a0-7a3313418e3b"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"6e224b76-22d5-48af-b607-c26de837dfd4"}},{"type":"text","text":"提高了解码效率。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"20372018-59f3-4c3c-8a2f-dc34dd238d73","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eeab9fa9-80e0-44de-8f6a-4c6c9bccd2a0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目前的媒介构建的环境只在平面的界面中，难以模拟物理世界，而 "},{"type":"whiteboard","attrs":{"whiteboardId":"ef954852-b8ea-4b5b-96da-2bd594cd815c"}},{"type":"text","text":" 则可以模拟更多环境，从而提升计算机这一媒介的能力。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3376d098-c6c8-4490-8039-c069234373eb","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4db16afe-f043-4d21-a9ea-7a4389a81bce"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e4b0b1de-fd3a-4fe8-9609-1f2c2b69a19a"}},{"type":"text","text":"，通过拉近理论和实践的距离可以促进「感受」与「图像」、「象征」的协同工作。"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 动态媒介可以拉近理论与行动的距离

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9c9cd8eb-6b68-4382-b4db-2a1105b6559b","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ChatGPT 的意义在于他是一次成功的人工智能工程化"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e288c08d-6a62-4fa9-acf9-d4b1fc4e6886"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其实人工智能早已有所应用，例如个性化的内容推荐与广告以及鹿班等设计生成工具。但是为什么说 ChatGPT 是一次成功的工程化？需要满足以下 2 个特点"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ea5906b2-b145-42fe-81e3-4a52f0a7817c","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ea1859c7-563b-4225-9f3e-980b3904b0c1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这项技术需要被人感受到，使用到"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1570a563-690e-4cd9-ac04-ccdf5553a278","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2d611f1f-5e06-4c35-83d6-2ea935d3d99d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"拥有足够大的用户规模"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"df73d1c6-1d2d-4b21-8aa8-744c076687d8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"个性化推荐拥有足够的规模都是很难让人感知到，鹿班等工具只局限在电商或设计领域，影响范围有限。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a87eea91-2490-4187-8212-7a400022d272"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"而 ChatGPT 用自然的对话形式让人真的感知到在和一位机器人对话（甚至怀疑是不是真人在背后）。并且他可以解答非常多不同领域的问题以及帮助人们写作等通用的技能，这让他成就了一次伟大的人工智能工程化。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ba7de047-7048-4cdb-a02e-d5cb0c64325d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考资料："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"926ff246-1dac-4a7a-821a-25d8f8673259","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f49f05a7-f2a8-40bb-8a07-7d3f22139593"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://sspai.com/post/78289","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://sspai.com/post/78289"}]}]}]}
cards.title: ChatGPT 的意义在于他是一次成功的人工智能工程化

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ac786baf-ccc9-4b83-aeb2-5bafac7a881b","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"善于在两种模式中切换可以帮助你更好的思考"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"19c61102-42e7-4eb4-a376-38543c7bd0ce","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ac11b4aa-68c7-416c-bc76-cd66acea6117"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"两种不同的思考模式"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ba0e7cdb-0841-4769-8fa7-b66760bce94e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c4257b34-0e9e-4636-8cc0-07316e91d384"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"专注"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a07c011a-d794-44a3-9241-4e7bfff134ec","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e4b237d1-ef05-4e84-9a8f-3c8f178bfb4b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"发散"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5a76d658-7e0d-4b0c-bdb3-49f6c15d74f8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"爱迪生的思考方式是在学习一段时间后进行休息，放送地坐在椅子上然后手上放一个滚球然后开始发散思考，回想之前做的事，当爱迪生睡着时滚球就会掉落唤醒他，他会带着发散时的点子进入专注模式。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"e328b6ef-5b4f-4b63-bd41-b491b3c63d31","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/431ab9d6-1dc2-478d-8dc4-1f82b8a378d4/CleanShot2023-02-1310.41.10-2x.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1072,"originalWidth":1912,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cf449ac1-dfab-4524-8792-c4edfd46d752","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c055e4b3-651d-4b82-be93-9cf29444351d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"就像用水泥、转头砌墙一样，需要休息时间知识才能得到巩固，不停的输入只会变成填鸭式的教育。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"8b2467a3-87df-492d-ba81-e9e7b5c30552","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/9c3222a3-a7a3-4326-ab76-d869dadebc20/CleanShot2023-02-1219.21.40.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":561,"originalWidth":1000,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6428c9c2-caf8-487e-b4a6-5847620e2320"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/learning-how-to-learn/lecture/3YLAF/practice-makes-permanent","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/learning-how-to-learn/lecture/3YLAF/practice-makes-permanent"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8208b8bd-9463-438c-84c1-5b26b012b0f5"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/learning-how-to-learn/lecture/GVacn/using-the-focused-and-diffuse-modes-or-a-little-dali-will-do-you","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/learning-how-to-learn/lecture/GVacn/using-the-focused-and-diffuse-modes-or-a-little-dali-will-do-you"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"4db020bf-05c6-486b-9cc5-e10a4f1610ad"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2cf32f54-d06d-4372-a708-931516b3f183","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa871346-78a6-49ff-a3a5-ef0090224428"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"认知科学的证明是，在不同模式间切换可以激活不同的脑区，从而提高思维的多样性和灵活性。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d1b71967-ea7e-430f-827d-1e727adcf04d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c0a32f2d-4ca0-4ade-a645-3301fa37ecde"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这类似"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"550def8c-aa49-4661-b0b8-8a64ebe42cc2"}},{"type":"text","text":"中的酝酿期和灵感期，需要给大脑搭建神经元链接的时间。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2c3e0773-3714-4e09-b632-b2b6aaa7afd8","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3f6dfad6-543e-4817-8e3e-e9b3e0ad90d9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以学习后的大脑发散时间还是很有必要的，那是否意味着不能听播客了？而是要完全进入思考？"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5e1a6926-8af0-4d03-a997-57c43c51c971","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4c673b83-db61-4af8-9e6d-d4127ac0f132"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ChatGPT 的回复是可以，这可以让大脑休息以恢复精力。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"06312a59-d79d-49af-9651-b16edbd82623","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6a3f72c2-ad58-4b66-a9a3-4b8b8203ce1b"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"217a65c9-9df9-431d-aaa5-301db4a9ed2d"}},{"type":"text","text":"就是将重复的时机间隔开来，给大脑提供消化的时间。"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 善于在两种模式中切换可以帮助你更好的思考

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"19fc5271-a078-4d20-a080-2518d5f5054c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"三种认知状态"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3cba3fbe-d86f-47ae-ac36-58725e633534","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d49b249f-d7c8-4578-98dd-554929a01821"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"感性（Enactive）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"de56b9d2-2837-40c4-95b5-3b38820cf862","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"67630677-e9b7-46f5-879c-5bbc93e65f10"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人类感性学习的过程，涵盖了人类与环境的相互作用，以及人们通过"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"体验和实际操作来获得知识和技能"},{"type":"text","text":"的过程。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"da8342ed-b448-4a9d-8f39-0184134acef3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"20d8969c-f8f8-487a-bab1-de5d4f473a55"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"知道自己在哪里"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a8eb7170-71eb-464d-8bc5-8cf9f859c919","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0c225c79-5c67-47e0-93e3-4f8ef29c3c4c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何控制周围的东西"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"330494bb-0f9d-4487-b4be-7f212adc89f4","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"64b1afbc-20ee-4b12-9e48-bc630cac27da"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如鼠标和导航功能"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"1ca31f95-d817-48be-b44c-fd8f01f9f2e7"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1f6f15b4-266d-4c75-915f-e076dbd63106"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"eaa5f279-3304-4e01-ab85-10a309cf9ed7"}},{"type":"text","text":"，通过构建环境和提供互动能力来提升人类的学习能力进而提升人类智能。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e6861444-8ec5-4d8e-b680-fe66d5c33839"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"f2e00817-e281-4891-8a66-33333d5ae9b5"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3df163fe-abb3-4148-8292-3445a447c8b6","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ea256790-61de-4f2e-bbfe-17b85ade662e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"图像（iconic）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"11bdffce-465c-4579-bd4f-0459d5d429b8","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"28e3cae1-3ab2-4ecd-8a5a-a52e0f3fbe27"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以图形、符号和动画等方式表达抽象信息，这种表达通常是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"具像化、直观的"},{"type":"text","text":"。它可以帮助人们理解抽象信息。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"547ba69d-0e96-4edb-ae7c-4b4384d8e0a9","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a98bbfc7-c94d-43a0-acb1-642b8a9df0dd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如通过文式图来推导对象之间的关系。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"feccc97d-4758-4bc0-abb4-e7a26cac08a2","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f0bbba1e-0ecf-41ca-b5b6-93a16cc03790"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过白板的布局表达不同思想、概念的关系。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"25146133-d8ce-44dd-92d5-fc584de14445","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1fe4e432-2e14-424f-a1dd-43a99c8ece95"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用于识别、比较和管理具体的对象"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6aaa0874-e81d-4270-a414-cc6409488cb3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9f04554e-e432-4afc-aa92-e8104369dddf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如图形界面中的窗口"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"42315c87-b0c4-4d6b-9c4a-11d4e38831e3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"96d3b3f4-0c63-4e64-9fc2-2094773edb98"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"象征（Symbolic）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"da52ede7-9201-4536-b25f-0556ef7d8510","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5f4fd604-c5d5-4d8b-965d-5749d3ee6db0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以符号表达抽象信息，这种表达通常是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"抽象的"},{"type":"text","text":"，不能和物理世界产生直接的关联。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"609e59c4-61d9-43f1-843e-d227283d3515","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e33d1e18-30f8-4881-b24e-a72d60df0e50"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如使用数学公式来表达电的传输效率"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4e810926-318f-425f-ab24-6a8fe528f993","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3676c256-e842-4c08-b402-3e9b6512a93e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"语言的符号表达了抽象的事物，例如思考、灵魂等单词。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"eb2d1864-d8bc-4bd7-97c8-6640697478e9","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b95404fd-1235-4dd3-810f-ace45e3250fc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如“≤”和“≥”就是一种抽象符号，表达数字的关系。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9fff4104-b83c-4dc0-9f3d-a2ff71eb6ccb","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"44d4478d-fdb3-4e5b-b32d-a60cd9b66000"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如奖杯、勋章就用来表达某种抽象的身份和荣耀。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"511aa4b5-03e8-4def-b8da-03f8e1d8d269","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"42b0bdf6-0e3a-4896-a557-3dadb25cbf76"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"看来符号可以是具体的，但表达的事物是抽象的。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dde9174c-25af-4350-b6c5-1f87fa743510","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"93c86078-8762-4adc-a04f-1dc539cbea84"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如通过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2ffab447-a5cb-41e1-b790-4047343c038f"}},{"type":"text","text":"抽象对象进行深层次的思考"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4287ba8c-6b6c-4aca-88d7-0122ccd77af7","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"14b50c5c-903f-45fe-914e-5d2693feabf2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"关于推理和概念的抽象。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2c9d16a0-04b4-42d5-985d-3c78f866924d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"db21986f-4980-45a0-b882-7f106cc74a37"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"三种状态个有利弊，例如"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4d3c16d1-6834-4685-9533-e2891415a493","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0941939e-80c1-478e-bed3-ea2a9dc6c4c8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"图像具备创意"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"50d2df1a-70eb-413a-95e1-be2cd267f409","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e66d089b-826c-47c5-9de6-97565cd61655"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为它不容易在想法之间产生阻碍，有助于释放创造力，但是由于比较发散，注意力容易分散，所以难以解决具体的问题。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"34ae3e4c-43a8-45e2-ab7a-6e6d3e374b10","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9411a4c0-307c-45a2-b5bb-13ae93042690"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"白板工具的也是利用视觉化来梳理脉络、发散思维"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ac475011-56a1-4c0a-93b7-0f311e4e3b09","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0f11f759-fed5-440d-a619-f1222c4b8b54"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8e001bb5-7e3f-43c7-a8a5-114cfcda05db"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"13e6a1d6-89a6-4dea-b0bc-1cac142a0718","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b5cea9c2-50dc-4c50-bc22-1a74fc52b7d0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"象征"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"08e3dc79-b334-448e-b7b8-d27f76a350af","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8c7b32aa-1979-4b6a-beed-b881d3c33fdf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以帮助人们更好的解决问题，因为它让人可以关注一个单一的环境，但很难有创造力"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"605d388b-cf04-4541-bab4-120caad6e73c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"12559201-b970-4f29-b8ff-a2a3b2129a49"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"越是抽象的思考（图像、象征）越是可以提升"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4348348e-b6c0-490b-af1f-22bb0b3bc5eb"}},{"type":"text","text":"，提升记忆的强度。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4b41de38-e7f1-4e3e-adc9-7fe2fb6b5a63","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"21bf149d-fa02-45d9-8f75-84382c59efa9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为没有一种状态是我完美的，所以"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e4b0b1de-fd3a-4fe8-9609-1f2c2b69a19a"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4986a92e-f73d-410f-9902-b83d79d1ba62","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7da69704-ffac-481e-abf1-1165adf93d83"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b08180b2-0245-43d4-a13b-350103dc585d"}}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"83337d86-a0cf-4ef6-a49e-dfba47e27feb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考资料："},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/105395612","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/105395612"}]}]}
cards.title: 三种认知状态

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1acbf1c3-0447-41ec-aa43-1cd4b3f93248","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人脑识别、理解、存储图像信息有更高的效率"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"84ef0a17-6388-4965-b0e3-e56de4324103"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为图像信息可以直接作用在人的感官上。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"efb007aa-6572-4128-a86b-0526f425371a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这也是要在环境中学习的原因，有更多的信息可以"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c72936bc-ab5b-4f6f-b93a-bcc946c7d5df","cardTitle":"编码"}},{"type":"text","text":"进进我们的大脑（包括直接感官和抽象概念）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c1573274-6f31-4c2a-9a02-c5334902ec7d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b9d5b6fb-2734-4a88-a48f-7338c1570a84"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"认知神经科学的证明：大脑在处理图像时激活了更多的脑区。"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"62c28449-9998-4a26-a5dc-f4b75a25ae9d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2046063e-84f1-4f34-ab99-486d6b51b78e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另外在悠久的进化过程中，记忆回家的路线、食物的位置等空间记忆比起记忆姓名、数字有更多的生存优势，所以记忆视觉、空间信息就成为了我们进化所迭代出来的强项。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/aCS7N/shen-ru-tan-suo-ji-yi","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/aCS7N/shen-ru-tan-suo-ji-yi"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e38ee3bc-e82e-4d36-a3b8-e9e073667795"},"content":[{"type":"pdf_card","attrs":{"pdfCardId":"d8949389-2372-4f54-b532-70285482f663","pdfCardTitle":"生存加工优势效应研究总结_金媛"}},{"type":"text","text":"中也提到，人类会对生存相关的信息会做更多的投入。"}]}]}
cards.title: 人脑识别、理解、存储图像信息有更高的效率

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d5054caa-7295-44ef-a969-8d503ce9ebb7","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用户界面的目标之一是让不同的认知状态可以协同工作"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d1f721d5-c67a-440a-844b-b052348cd50e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为不同的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./三种认知状态%208361867a-615b-4343-a9d8-070eb1ece272.md","title":"三种认知状态","data-internal-href":"meta://card/8361867a-615b-4343-a9d8-070eb1ece272","edited":true}}],"text":"认知状态"},{"type":"text","text":"俱备不同的优缺点，例如本能、具体的认知具有发散性，具备创意性，但比较难专注于问题的解决，而抽象的认知则更容易专注解决问题，但缺点是比较难操控，认知成本比较高。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d1f43c78-e79e-4c45-b4a8-2ba8776d2703"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一些实施方案"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bb9e23e7-fc2e-473e-9964-c2e198abe095","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"043bab78-4fee-48ea-999d-b2c8ede135c3"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b08180b2-0245-43d4-a13b-350103dc585d","cardTitle":"使用图像创作象征"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5f577bd2-3b10-45a0-b8db-6cf8fd9a9278","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0c0e8765-e3ea-4bd2-a729-1e5869fcc72e"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"aeea2c56-4050-4252-81c2-af84f8140412","cardTitle":"Heptabase"}},{"type":"text","text":" 等白板应用就通过视觉线索来促进更加深入、抽象的思考。"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 用户界面的目标之一是让不同的认知状态可以协同工作

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e15e5b26-c25d-40f8-b0a5-3e01ddb0928d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用图像创作象征"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b7d5d3a1-62aa-40f5-9098-dcf6ac07f5d1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从使用本能的感知方式接受具像化的信息，到使用后天习得的符号来创造抽象的概念。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4a0aaa29-b648-44f3-b76b-f8faefab6227"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"它使得计算机用户可以操作图形用户界面来创造和传递抽象的信息。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7cd8cab3-3b99-4574-9baf-925d740efc30"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考资料："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4e1359e4-91b0-4078-82cf-801eeb421140","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f4148110-21b7-48cb-a389-4882857f243b"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/105395612","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/105395612"},{"type":"text","text":" —— "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d","cardTitle":"Alan Kay"}}]}]}]}
cards.title: 使用图像创作象征

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b4a9bc92-a53e-4470-bc63-f2d78b796632","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"计算机帮助人类思考的方式"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a9f93adc-ceb0-4168-b724-b5811efc5fbe","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"daf9cb83-919c-4750-b874-d9fc9f58a2c6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过记录笔记将调取"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./短时记忆%207e0ff3c8-f768-4bd8-b003-efec2a5cef3a.md","title":"短时记忆","data-internal-href":"meta://card/7e0ff3c8-f768-4bd8-b003-efec2a5cef3a","edited":true}}],"text":"记忆"},{"type":"text","text":"的负担从人脑中转移（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7de148df-9b26-4093-8e54-7ebf359abb83","cardTitle":"简约式设计 4 步骤"}},{"type":"text","text":"   ，因为"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"41bdc291-4294-494b-b464-9b1ccb16b278","cardTitle":"人脑是单线程的"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"599fdd6b-533f-449b-af39-a7e391d13880","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b622dd4d-cb0d-4ba5-b222-9622961be27f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2ffab447-a5cb-41e1-b790-4047343c038f","cardTitle":"双向链接"}},{"type":"text","text":"创造知识的联系挖掘新的洞见，让人类专心在思考和创意上，而不是在记忆的读取、追溯。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4d190f71-f5e3-4708-8965-9c3932bd9830","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7d7f376f-12f8-43f2-a3d9-5a9ea99f4a22"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1d0f1335-ab00-429f-9c2b-01673fbed905","cardTitle":"卡片笔记通过双向链接提升提取强度"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"57dcce83-3307-42d0-a8b1-f0e9020f0f34","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa40c1b5-f85a-464b-9a69-74c3178f8409"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./计算机的特性在于拥有能够快速地模拟任何描述的能力%20d0a603ce-db99-4145-b8b8-37518d68e94f.md","title":"计算机的特性在于拥有能够快速地模拟任何描述的能力","data-internal-href":"meta://card/d0a603ce-db99-4145-b8b8-37518d68e94f","edited":true}}],"text":"计算机的模拟"},{"type":"text","text":"能力缩短理论和实践的距离。"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"99b9fdaa-7cfb-4bec-8c0f-5f0096e060b9"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ae0d0340-f8de-4842-86e4-f3ad0bb9b3f8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created cards.title: 计算机帮助人类思考的方式

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3f68f555-9fab-4643-b5b7-ab983dbac6be","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"书面语言是人类有意识思考的前提"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d6ed7dc5-801c-460a-a0b3-6892fc85d631"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"记忆是灵感之母，只有掌握足够的信息才能在网状的知识中编织出新的知识和概念。而记忆又是有限的，所以才需要利用其他媒介来记录、展示信息，从而增强我们的思考。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b26be174-d5cb-4f7a-973a-0550566f951a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们可以利用"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fb740c7c-4130-435b-85ab-1f20463607ff"}},{"type":"text","text":"来"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E8%AE%A1%E7%AE%97%E6%9C%BA%E5%B8%AE%E5%8A%A9%E4%BA%BA%E7%B1%BB%E6%80%9D%E8%80%83%E7%9A%84%E6%96%B9%E5%BC%8F_MjI1NzQzMTk%201482718d-b151-409b-af14-cbfe0e30c3f9.md","title":"计算机帮助人类思考的方式_MjI1NzQzMTk","data-internal-href":"meta://card/1482718d-b151-409b-af14-cbfe0e30c3f9","edited":true}}],"text":"帮助人类思考"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"bc61c8d6-1149-4115-8dea-60a44399c4f1"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e138c916-471d-4564-a7fe-598feebe9de2"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0d2152e5-9da0-4f88-8d3a-10fbab94faac"}},{"type":"text","text":" 759"}]}]}
cards.title: 书面语言是人类有意识思考的前提

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1ffc44ae-173e-4ff3-b53a-56549bbaedfc","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息不是创造出来的而是选取出来的"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bdec36ec-319e-407e-8537-21d45aee2fb0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"就像从一组牌中选择一张，信息是从我们已知（牌组）种进行选取并传递"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c8105896-6b0c-4b10-b818-5ae221d49653"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0d2152e5-9da0-4f88-8d3a-10fbab94faac","cardTitle":"《信息简史》"}},{"type":"text","text":"4297"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"ddbf1eeb-488c-4f50-9f81-53903666b323"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1d1fc01f-c40c-481a-8a72-e93aca7ff31e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以才说通过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7","cardTitle":"卡片笔记"}},{"type":"text","text":"法写作时，重要的不是要写什么，而是不写什么。这就表现了一种对信息的选取。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8232fad9-c373-4229-a90d-83ca4fd7d402"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是否可以将提高信息的选取效率作为一个努力方向。（没有信息爆炸只有过滤失败）"}]}]}
cards.title: 信息不是创造出来的而是选取出来的

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d73039c2-a96d-4731-a7f9-a578e7f5921f","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Dynabook 的设计策略"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"aadd51a7-eb62-46e4-af11-d911d145e59a"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e3a28798-47bd-44cc-98de-9e96e606ad2e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不仅摆脱了书本的静态，也摆脱了电视的被动性"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"18bc4a94-86c0-45dc-b40b-d3582dc2db28","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ccd9dc9c-851c-41c4-8499-07403a4959ff"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计与规范：需要用户根据自己的需求进行规划。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0e90fbc3-d1cf-42dc-927b-dfd10f8e4e77","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"edb27797-ad60-4247-9daf-afd36083fbf5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人类需要具备使用工具的意识和方法论。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bd9f659f-2ac6-4c8f-a925-6e211aae39cc","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"91697803-0695-4ee8-b315-53500b879cb3"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1296e822-cff0-49bf-aa12-80007e608018"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3bcf53da-fa84-4e56-86f6-f5a0081cd5f2","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b8e77f05-47ae-4aa3-9ae2-8644e63cef8a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5043a2a5-62cb-458e-96e5-0e9a8255165e"}}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e2ca763f-6eec-453e-944f-97bba4a14222","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b0387c10-55e5-471b-8e34-efdb1e6d66f4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"动态模拟：需要计算机为用户提供足够简单但又强大的工具集（就像乐高积木），用户可以快速上手，并且工具本身包含强大的可塑性以及预设功能（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3309e1a5-8ffa-4009-924b-5cf55c7558c5"}},{"type":"text","text":"让用户不需要从头开始搭建）支持用户实践自己的设计。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4bef0203-9074-4be9-bd33-b7e07486e266","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5c404684-e434-414e-b5df-68f3e56c8ce2"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"68e2d9f9-d2cb-440b-8d97-b5becdcc4afe"}}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c13d7c04-7e30-46e2-8aa9-809933fea128"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/95075816","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/95075816"},{"type":"text","text":" - "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0cac81d2-e250-48da-bb98-92d6a04dbca0"}}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6a365129-6618-4766-bdf3-9507ce5c2179","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"编程是一种解决问题的方法"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38b83cb5-edbf-4e8a-b5ef-2035ad7b39fe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"编程不是学习的目的，只是一种工具，是一种未来解决问题人人都应该具备的能力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"01e4c289-2d60-425d-a38d-c6d2250de8fd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如 魔形 项目中，为了说服技术解决 group 类型的图层无法上传的问题，通过 Python 的 psd-tool 模块导出图层数据，用数据向技术说明解决问题所能带来的价值。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"11da7a44-db6c-4b17-ae19-f8e53fda0195"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4eb68a80-1d7e-4714-a559-67b015b7f24f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTc3NzM1MjY","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-03-07 16:43:44"}]}]}

，如同书写、纸张的意义，掌握编程与软件拥有同等重要的意义"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"64445b5b-3928-499c-8df6-fa50b348a40f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c5b4ba7a-2a54-464e-8c08-2c4d2f5a2770"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"编程可以构建"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fb740c7c-4130-435b-85ab-1f20463607ff","cardTitle":"动态媒介"}},{"type":"text","text":"的可连接性特性"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bb272fd4-62f2-4d57-b0c6-ffe67e908975","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"89191cca-bf74-4b6b-a3b8-bf2cb7203c32"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"重要的不是编程本身，而是学习背后的方法论和工具意识，这样即便不会写代码也可以很好的使用动态媒介"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"3c6876cd-bb24-4b63-9f5e-e0ec54e6b1cb"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2b4efe3b-cfa7-4d5a-8760-ac3b94c239af"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b9752cf7-cfb2-4646-ad2e-226a67e22056","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"赋予用户自己构建工具的能力"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e94abb7b-3dba-441a-a717-d210b42b135c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为不同智力活动领域的用户提供基本的通用功能，他们可以从中构建符合自己工作流程的功能和能力"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2484cb55-0dde-4d5e-b1c1-126b863ad5d7"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.dougengelbart.org/pubs/augment-3906.html#2","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.dougengelbart.org/pubs/augment-3906.html#2"},{"type":"text","text":" 5a4 —— "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"de914081-b034-4c80-9a3f-4d8bcf3338be","cardTitle":"Douglas Engelbart"}}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"4de33583-b1b9-458a-9063-84ab068d7c32"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d1d2334e-8fcd-46fb-afe7-11a73efaf10b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一直以为"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5043a2a5-62cb-458e-96e5-0e9a8255165e","cardTitle":"编程可以更好的使用动态媒介"}},{"type":"text","text":"，但其实真正重要的不是写代码的能力（毕竟有 Notion 等非常多 No-Code 工具可以使用），而是理解计算机这一动态媒介的特性，理解人类的需求并依此构建工具。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"6545b959-bbba-4bfe-9a1f-6253316e6350"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0e5c75f4-20ec-48b9-8f4f-a7cfca1e5b31"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ChatGPT 也赋予了人们构建自己的工具能力"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a7e74034-90a5-40fa-908e-a02c5dc2e99f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"57366f85-bdc5-4ad5-b205-1bd763eabdc3"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"525448a5-5898-40cb-81e8-ef318f6c7275","cardTitle":"使用 ChatGPT 辅助学习——为自己找一个老师"}}]}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"7e240434-ce34-4c9d-8294-652ba40f3851","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"锁"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d6c40657-5b0c-455b-abaf-b11b40a314da"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"遇到"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./助推：预期到自己会犯错时思考如何阻止%202af47c76-d5a8-46a3-b166-6beaa4cf91f2.md","title":"助推：预期到自己会犯错时思考如何阻止","data-internal-href":"meta://card/2af47c76-d5a8-46a3-b166-6beaa4cf91f2","edited":true}}],"text":"这个问题"},{"type":"text","text":"，可以使用《设计心理学1》中的「锁」功能防止错误发生，例如防止学习过程中分心的应用让开启 APP 变得更加困难，就采用了锁的功能。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"82823fee-8672-4b06-8346-81ef5bfa9a1b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b752789e-0450-4866-826a-18921c74ba3b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=NDE1MzcwMA","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-07-13 08:50:27"}]}]}
cards.title: 锁

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"862b2261-5716-4594-9bf0-dc519bbd4d73","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"助推：预期到自己会犯错时思考如何阻止"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6ec6e516-c18b-4f32-8367-1572a2af5bce"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"助推里面，第二个很重要的理念：当你已经明确能预期到自己会犯错（Expect\nerror），有没有什么微小的改变，能够阻止自己不要走上这条错误的道路？"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"155bf56f-dc80-4b77-b6a7-ca79f5c154e9"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"271cabda-6be7-4665-b523-101e2b6c926b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MzI5NTY1MA","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-06-16 01:22:27"}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8772eaba-db16-4ff8-bbae-814c278af7a9","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"帮助用户进入心流状态"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3719499b-f046-444d-be24-2780b4e7c75c"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"724c99ab-a7dc-4b10-87f7-d9e197329511","cardTitle":"《About Face 4：交互设计精髓》"}},{"type":"text","text":" p207"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6ecf4ef2-6ad7-4445-b3e4-a04c3e06fb01","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"147b061f-5411-403a-83c4-d1b2747cba4c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"让工具/功能触手可得有助于帮助用户进入心流状态，因为可以避免打断工作去寻找工具。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"75caeaa7-af54-4938-825a-6cc0b536a3ac","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dc51699a-ade1-4dcf-a060-cf9ca451bbf9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./非模态操作让用户体会到控制感%20b6a5b6aa-4bf2-484e-b7dd-e73fb4f52a38.md","title":"非模态操作让用户体会到控制感","data-internal-href":"meta://card/b6a5b6aa-4bf2-484e-b7dd-e73fb4f52a38","edited":true}}],"text":"非模态反馈"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"30506e32-ef78-4a27-88c8-57d43a014bc9","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2bd7d5a5-be64-4878-a1eb-7079588ab37f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"考虑概率，不要为低概率的事件打断用户；例如误删除文件，不应该每次都用对话框进行二次确认打断用户，因为误删除可能发生但是是低概率事件。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e9e2e44a-44c9-4859-b3a8-72aec930f79d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"230f211d-ac8a-49ce-b7a5-ff34d28a4ac1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"系统状态可见性"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"336f3156-722e-46fb-b85a-6491a4896092","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"43d9a28b-7969-4ee3-8e87-621a97a8d5a6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"避免空白状态：让用户做选择题而不是填空题；在空状态时提供一些初始设置，让用户在此基础上按自己需求修改而不是从零构建。从空白开始很难，而在别人的基础上修改则要简单的多。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f5ad3176-ff43-408c-8e17-1e2e45f46014","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"169c17ab-6700-42b8-af9f-2db7a4a3f58b"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"30f1be97-8419-4855-9743-a8f977a9a27b","cardTitle":"允许延迟，但要优化响应速度"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2d6fd4a7-2af3-48a7-903d-4b11def14cae","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ca671856-3608-4373-be05-02b6228a6392","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"解决问题最好的方法是改变问题陈述的背景"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"be369a22-e021-42c7-9631-9aa0f1d0c941"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们需要从多种视角观察一个事物，有很多好的概念都是多种领域的概念结合，例如"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"697909cc-84ff-4302-b978-450139f15884"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5885e16c-a684-4f85-970a-62a81619ff9a"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7569c321-419f-4f3f-90ce-c54f0bc56f4b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8e0767e1-9b45-4dba-b549-5f8bfa18d3bb"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1be2b4a7-1371-4bb7-9240-37e024fe0ad9"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"77db3ac4-f38d-4645-9e32-c2abb1a4857a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3869c31f-0da7-4c73-9445-3201ec54d7a3"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"34173bfa-a7bf-41e3-89cd-3f801c9fa9ca"}},{"type":"text","text":"也可以提高自身的竞争力。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4986743e-522d-45ca-84ba-db533f721b78"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这是 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d"}},{"type":"text","text":" 在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/101554619","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"这篇文章"},{"type":"text","text":"的观点，背景是真正的计算机革命还没有发生，我们不能固执于当前已知的环境和信息，应该从不同背景、情境下思考计算机的更多可能性。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ac645362-913c-4dc6-8f88-a18536c770c6"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7"}},{"type":"text","text":"发散地寻找链接也是一种修改陈述背景的方式，有助于创造新的知识。"}]}]}
cards.title: 解决问题最好的方法是改变问题陈述的背景

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ca2e1403-f084-4400-a10b-663b6fd1437c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"创造未来不在于我们如何学习而是在于我们如何遗忘"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ed9c2094-54a2-43d2-bc9a-3fb77ecf0754","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d12ede60-29cd-4286-a769-ebe968159046"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"73d3d3da-c552-41aa-a074-e336323957a9"}},{"type":"text","text":"意味着要抛弃旧的信息，通过更多信息来构建新的认知模型，就像我们的大脑在构建神经元时做的那样。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"00c6928b-41a5-4974-ab17-7893f089c4f7","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e9156ee-90d3-4a8d-85db-6aa4e8cf7660"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/101554619","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/101554619"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"32001b8d-ef1e-4998-8619-17e5778321b8"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1bd5cafc-0bea-4eed-b97e-506e52ece07a"}},{"type":"text","text":"，遗忘也是在放下旧的背景思考新的可能性。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"79407b06-6b80-4581-81c3-50a655615ec6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以学习底层理论，绕后绕过中间、最后的表层信息思考出更好的解决方案。"}]}]}
cards.title: 创造未来不在于我们如何学习而是在于我们如何遗忘

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0136cb8f-9bb4-4680-89a1-c559561c4c30","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"遗忘"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"21637cb1-8142-499e-b632-ec4f1507e85e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d8d92875-ec3b-468d-8418-cb820cc51970"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"描述/表象"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"31994966-3f2a-488f-8914-54a55d492938","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5a851094-6290-4cf2-a1d9-a59cab51eae6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大脑会通过遗忘来筛选模型"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e12c6010-9267-4f8f-b87b-8d49d6fd4d43","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e6175e8-26f2-4e46-827d-f5c3d5130303"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原理"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ee952004-9f79-4223-9165-3b0f09c7330d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ecd3e927-6974-4755-aa82-1fd4f6634fa8"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae404370-513b-4424-b696-b3cd03b7a9be","cardTitle":"知识是对有限案例的抽象以应对无限的新情况"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2912380c-a1d9-4aa9-b1d1-fecb3848eba5","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0a25f137-9855-4753-bc95-14cc75432082"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其中需要通过输入案例来生成模型"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6c0a48a1-3dfc-40e4-9fcb-671362d53f0e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"073fcdd5-4cd0-443f-af56-88f49286f868"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"而我们没办法获取所有案例，只能从部分案例生成模型，而这难以避免会产生错误的模型"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2bf053c2-b1e2-4b3f-80b3-a7010b3caaf3","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"470792fe-6ba2-49ea-a9c2-9da2f05edc3a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"而利用出现概率到的案例生成的模型错误的可能性更低"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9842d243-5f4f-4a84-8bb8-f8aed9536fa6","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bbd4e945-ddc6-4bf2-b0f0-4a63ab73dbc1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以我们更容易遗忘比较少见的事物"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"41a29969-1e5b-4202-808c-dcdf05e659e1","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eb6f89bb-924b-46c8-a8e9-2e539ca78494"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"更多案例"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8cb570c7-f3c2-49e8-848c-8d0883415f45","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fd5862b6-dca6-4ba9-bc7e-3ff17b84eb6d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如学习英语中就需要通过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"217a65c9-9df9-431d-aaa5-301db4a9ed2d","cardTitle":"间歇重复"}},{"type":"text","text":"来对抗遗忘"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"fe749715-a03f-4876-b9e9-ddda8f17e8be","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f12f24bf-6786-4573-8f42-acbd7089dcfe"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4bce1c0b-73e0-4517-bd63-2d777514ab30","cardTitle":"非自愿记忆"}},{"type":"text","text":"通过网络联想来提升记忆的提取强度"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2130e7e1-12e1-4cda-8e7f-a3dac68fcc5f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"203a9419-bf6f-410a-82d4-9ffc4dd581d7"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1d0f1335-ab00-429f-9c2b-01673fbed905","cardTitle":"卡片笔记通过双向链接提升提取强度"}}]}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2929d763-da3f-47a9-8d8e-5b1e688a68bc"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Q4411K7MX/?spm_id_from=333.999.0.0","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1Q4411K7MX/?spm_id_from=333.999.0.0"}]}]}
cards.title: 遗忘

cards.content:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"de2a8d0c-0f70-4e7a-9f81-49653ec59d97","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我对 PARA 的理解与实践"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f7780dd7-e87a-4841-8eac-2e34481ab374","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"背景 "}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9548ce22-6e1b-46a7-8b2c-ff83af5873c5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用了两三年的 Notion，期间因为信息组织上的问题更换过几次组织结构，这是最近一次的结构："}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"e203bf28-bfe3-4774-9fba-cf73a5b3eb15","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/87d43004-5fa7-4b0a-9d46-62bc99ca4a64/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0975f72c-6390-406e-a9aa-9797078ac80b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这样的分类方式很容易产生矛盾，例如网页剪贴的文章可以放入「剪贴」有时也可以放在「信息」或「问题与方案」目录，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"这种模糊性使得信息输入的成本增加，更重要的是让信息搜寻的效率降低"},{"type":"text","text":"，于是便有了这一次的迭代。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b8d18644-5aa5-4efb-95f4-8bcdca8f062d","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"什么是 PARA"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1a3e5b07-842e-4d31-91dd-66f8de5db788"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"08d9a517-f7eb-4bdf-8ee2-ec23d60471d3","cardTitle":"PARA"}},{"type":"text","text":" 的作者 Tiago Forte 是世界上最著名的生产力专家之一。其名称是由 4 个单词的首字母组合而成："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"255fa47d-65fb-41d1-9bed-5ef11a5c9f03","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bea712df-7afd-4682-997b-3137fc69f8d6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"P（Projects）：项目"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3cda1f4c-3dfc-4c2e-ad8e-3cbe0405624e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"93575539-d57a-477d-a92c-2623cc1fad53"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"A（Areas）：领域"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d4b6c4dd-b4b1-4a1f-8aee-9ca23e268ec1","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"422cb083-c4f1-43a3-a8a1-9dbcb1b88b49"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"R（Resources）：资源"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"488f3f78-69bb-4fb2-afa0-8f6680e90651","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e56b7756-5c1b-4e7f-b501-a7381a0d5b04"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"A（Archives）：归档"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5ee57b30-1148-4029-8ae5-f588a4226cca"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"Areas "},{"type":"text","text":"是你长期关注的事情，它没有具体的结束时间。例如「服务设计」、「语言学习」对我来说就是长期关注的领域，可能我的一生都会持续在这上面投入精力，也不存在一个明确的完结时间。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"723aebd4-9f9a-4a4b-a09e-3e7b78f6c98f"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"Projects "},{"type":"text","text":"则是拥有具体的开始和结束时间，并且另一个和 Areas 的不同之处是 Project 有明确的目标，通过这些指标可以判断 Project 的完成状态。例如「使用 Anki 背诵 1000 个单词」就是「语言学习」Area 下的一个 Project，我设定的目标是 2 个月后完成。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a58bb5ef-d22b-4ec4-baa5-605223d1eb58"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"Resources "},{"type":"text","text":"则是你感兴趣的内容、笔记或者剪贴的文章，它们可以帮助你发展个人的兴趣或者促进 Area 的发展和 Project 的完成。例如我收集了一些关于「Anki 使用方法」的文章以及阅读了《100LS》这本语言学习相关的书籍，这些都都是作为「语言学习」Area 下的 Resources。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d3143297-bf8b-4bd4-9f2e-36709ba3838b"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"Archives "},{"type":"text","text":"是在上述类别的信息失去活力、不再关注后用来归档的类目，归档以减少对其他重要信息的干扰。例如在离职后前公司的某个 Project 我就不会关注，此时就可以归档。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"245890d3-2363-4420-9cd6-c627497b9500","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Bmli7m20230216112322.jpg","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f3845dda-0f6b-4de1-bcd7-0b9aba271e03","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PARA 的优势"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9831f748-2cfe-4efb-9767-f453bcf596a7","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PARA 提高信息的流动性"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"84b06482-7fe2-418d-9710-1f22e10ac60e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PARA 很重要的思想是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"强调信息的流动性"},{"type":"text","text":"，既一个信息不一定要自始至终属于上述类别中的一个，而是可以自由得流动。例如我的个人网站的开发起初就是一个小 Project ，有明确的目标和截止时间（1 到 2 个月内可以实现编辑和显示图文信息），但满足这些目标后很快就有了继续优化的想法，包括自己学习 SEO 并落地到网站的代码中去。于是这个 Project 就失去了「有明确截止时间」这一特点，并且个人网站也可以作为陪伴自己终身的工具，于是将其从「Project」更新为「Area」，这样我在后续就可以拆分各个 Project 进行版本管理了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6cde2f4e-a5e9-47ac-80dd-b8463b9dc356"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这种流动性不但"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"降低了分类的焦虑，还促进了信息之间的连接，使得信息的使用率会大大提高"},{"type":"text","text":"。例如我在执行「使用 Anki 背诵 1000 个单词」Project 时，通过 Notion 的关系数据库功能可以看到相关的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":" Resources "},{"type":"text","text":"信息，可以提醒我有相关的资料可以使用，促进我更好地实现目标。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"81d59bb3-b586-4580-a50f-0bd878b11ba8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"但要注意的事，在迁移后原本类别的部分属性值会丢失（即便新类别的属性类型一样），再迁移回旧类别时，旧类别设置的属性仍然可以保留。例如下图所示，将一篇文章从 Resources 迁移到 Archives 后丢失了许多属性值。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"40409b06-a719-4739-9079-e58397f44f86","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/205e21a6-0135-4945-8544-b851373fac16/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fcf2a50a-074d-49f0-b379-70a0bd56221c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PARA 明确的信息分类方式让我不再纠结信息应该放在哪个类目，即便需要修改，它提供的流动性也可以帮助我快速调整，减少了我的信息管理负担。这是最初选择 PARA 的原因，但随着实践和深入了解后发现它的威力还不止这些。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"33a2afa8-5612-4025-b3fc-fb52759b72e5","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PARA 让我更加专注长期目标"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5fcfddbf-48ef-495b-a046-9a9e1964a5d1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PARA 强调不同信息之间的关系，例如「背诵 1000 个单词」就是「英语学习」Area 下的一个 Project，「每天收集 5 个新单词」就是对应 Project 下的 Task。这种强调信息关系的原则可以让我保持专注，专注在我真正需要关注的 Areas 和 Projects 上，在每次新增 Task 和 Projects 时就会问问自己"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"他们是否和某个 Project 或 Area 原则"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a872bd10-816f-4a0e-8e27-d0f6684122a9"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"能力"},{"type":"text","text":"方面，要求在制定任务和行为时必须有足够的能力可以完成，如果超出能力，可以"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./将大问题拆分成小问题%20b8cc4607-6474-4da6-bf09-7c7946448c3f.md","title":"将大问题拆分成小问题","data-internal-href":"meta://card/b8cc4607-6474-4da6-bf09-7c7946448c3f","edited":true}}],"text":"简化为一个或多个小目标"},{"type":"text","text":"来降低执行的难度。例如跑马拉松可能对很多人来说都很困难，不妨碍从 1000 米跑起。福格甚至建议一位希望每天自己做饭的用户先从「打开煤气灶」这一动作开始（甚至前期可以不进行下一步的动作）。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ee4bec7b-02ef-4dfd-ab70-af7f9c5d4791"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"提示"},{"type":"text","text":"方面，要求任务的执行需要有一个提醒机制，这种提醒不一定是闹钟这类显性提醒，也可以是潜意识的提醒，将希望做的事情放在自己日常会做的事情后面，例如在刷牙后浇水、洗碗时听书。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cd0e7f70-e75b-4b31-a3b4-995e4f2a9fea"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"举个例子。我有使用 Inbox 收集信息的习惯，Inbox 作为信息的临时驿站需要进一步分类到 Areas 或 某个 Projects，但是很容易堆积，久而久之就更加难以整理，形成恶性循环。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"70eca1aa-da32-4e13-8ac3-44af9e462fab","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/aeaa5469-d45c-43af-9231-2054d96e3455/CleanShot2023-02-1510.25.59-2x.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"820c7453-a588-49ad-8ff3-e04c6de0ebb8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"动机"},{"type":"text","text":"是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"「保持 Inbox 的整洁」"},{"type":"text","text":"但不够具体，而且面对大量信息容易产生畏难情绪，于是将行为改为"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"「整理 3 篇 Inbox 的内容」"},{"type":"text","text":"，这不但更具体，而且在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"能力"},{"type":"text","text":"上也非常容易达成。行为"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"提醒"},{"type":"text","text":"方面，我制定了一个每日任务清单，其中一项就是整理 Inbox，这样我在完成其他任务时也顺便提醒自己完成整理任务。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"813f06ff-339f-4e75-a851-4977344abb9e","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/1aa35d10-7de9-4a90-849c-565e50ae810f/CleanShot2023-02-1211.07.40-2x.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"60c81602-81a1-4a7b-b24a-37bc83b74085"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Notion 提供了定时自动创建任务的功能，可以每天自动新建一个每日任务清单提醒自己完成。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"238adde8-e1e6-4b30-a445-efe4347c4a78","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/deb9625d-49f1-4a58-89a3-10711bb4d857/CleanShot2023-02-1510.32.02-2x.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"152a652d-092a-4564-8b7e-4e271ec69416"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过行为的设计，将原本不断堆积而畏惧整理的 Inbox 通过每天很小的投入让其逐步恢复有序。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"665851f4-9cd5-45ae-8cb2-87fe986303f6","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"评价任务"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8fb212cf-ea7a-4918-bebe-a591380e5693"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有时面对任务清单会开始不知所措，不知道应该做什么，分析发现其中一个原因是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"当前状态、时间充裕度等因素与任务的复杂度难以匹配"},{"type":"text","text":"。例如白天干扰比较多，写作效率就会比较低，放在早晚就比较合适，而背单词受环境影响较小，任务被打断时重新进入状态的成本也很低。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"022affb6-1438-4944-9ffe-c42ff23409ae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"于是我开始对任务进行评价，一方面描述"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"任务预估的耗时"},{"type":"text","text":"，另一方面评估任务"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"是否依赖一个可以专注的环境"},{"type":"text","text":"。例如完成每日的 Anki 背单词任务耗时短，专注力的要求也相对较低（被打断后重新投入工作的切换成本较小），这类任务我会选择环境中干扰较多，时间碎片的情况下执行。阅读、写作、看视频教程等就会选在晚上时间充裕、干扰小的环境开展。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"6c1e2b65-148b-4050-9db3-10ab1963c201","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/1aa35d10-7de9-4a90-849c-565e50ae810f/CleanShot2023-02-1211.07.40-2x.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4d15af87-09bc-4363-b817-3aff3ddcaa85","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"保持积极的情绪"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c0f52307-fa56-4ab9-b03c-07922b3d6e4a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8369eb74-23b0-47ef-afb7-dcb1b01a2f24","cardTitle":"创造习惯在于保持积极的情绪"}},{"type":"text","text":"，在完成一个小任务后可以给自己一个奖励，哪怕只是简单的一个 V 手势也可以起到鼓舞作用。我使用 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.raycast.com/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Raycast"},{"type":"text","text":" 的 Confetti 功能进行庆祝，很喜欢这个功能，输入 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"Confetti"},{"type":"text","text":" 即可运行，我绑定了快捷键 ⌃+⌥+⌘+Enter 让彩带的绽放更佳爽快。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"a645e3b4-ae24-4dfd-8660-2643c2a3b4f3","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/1dc0d9da-bc37-4e99-a5d2-d1aa7aabbe5d/CleanShot2023-02-1000.57.07.gif","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"7293520f-0b27-4f04-83b7-32d1a24f2ab0","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最后"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"84d2905e-98da-415d-8faa-d33611bf33d7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用 PARA 已有 4 个月，目前运行状态良好，没有了之前的分类焦虑。上述提到的设计点是在实践的过程中不断优化的，我一直把工作流当作一个产品进行设计和迭代。在不断优化的过程中也有机会将平时学习的效率思维、心理学知识进行应用，是一个过程和结果都非常令人愉快的事情。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"979911b8-4a90-427a-83b3-801afb09f66f","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/beda0275-cd5f-4691-9268-c38f1edff6ae/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"826168b7-9e5a-421d-a7f2-8cc7c1603b11"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其中涉及到挺多复杂的 Notion 公式，篇幅有限没办法详细解释，感兴趣的同学我们可以评论区或私下进行交流🤝🏼。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0dc3ddc9-250b-40aa-bfcb-ce7eba0d906f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考资料"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a2b9fc33-4a70-43d7-9b1d-95ba41f1946a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b1a86d24-befe-4f41-8f73-3f197cf06495"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://fortelabs.com/blog/para/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"PARA 英文原文"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d25aea42-780e-414e-814a-e0bea4f5bb01","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"558519da-7056-404d-8c4f-008470394995"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://medium.com/pm%E7%9A%84%E7%94%9F%E7%94%A2%E5%8A%9B%E5%B7%A5%E5%85%B7%E7%AE%B1/%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E5%88%86%E9%A1%9E%E7%AD%86%E8%A8%98-e25c4cc39dba","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"如何分類筆記？一套簡單又通用的分類架構 — PARA"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a3d1a7bd-d4a1-4cd9-b922-eb9e5ebbd171","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58bd2a85-d6ee-4812-9219-f65da52f542a"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/190133958","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"PARA个人信息管理实施的简要心得"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"810292ec-7dc7-434e-8438-bdcf5a72e7d0","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3a4a649b-dd07-4434-993c-f278b1ff7912"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://sspai.com/post/61459","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"P.A.R.A. 是什么及在 Notion 中的应用"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a3f04774-7280-4f87-a8b1-3474e3fad5f3","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d0e6827a-bdb3-4f88-8e7e-9aaec8ec133d"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OMkGyMhM7OM","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Build a Bulletproof Notion Workspace"}]}]}]}
