cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"405534b4-8ae6-4eda-bb54-322ca6a436d5","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"SMART 原则"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ec609d29-e817-4cc1-a7b9-4c824c72fb45","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e96e1ba3-29fa-4466-9691-284b0c14970d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是由德国管理学家彼得德鲁克提出的目标设定原则"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c66b6e09-92b0-4a43-a800-98ad276fd2a0","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a15c1936-8d72-435f-9555-d121afef4a76"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"内容"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3319c6a9-ec5e-44ad-bba7-73d7b33e685a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8194ce0f-af23-4d0b-a9b8-1f5d5e918998"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Specific（明确）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3607283d-f1ec-4404-b55c-55810c7999d6","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2c8e848a-f844-49b8-85f0-9a5f9c3f018e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"任务的目标需要明确，不能宽泛，例如「背诵 1000 个单词」而不是「学好英语」。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e9a311c7-fd94-4e66-a24e-3e374a5fd660","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d77d6cb3-5303-4f97-8952-99335feeeb39"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2fd08997-c78a-4c7a-bfee-470185ec39a0"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"021693a5-79e3-433c-910b-708f491ac4c7","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e0ad3bee-d52c-44cd-874d-92e1aa92857f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Measurable（可衡量）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"00118243-ca7f-4b29-8c8c-34938a6275ff","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5a9f21be-ef53-48cf-8963-424818b7fd54"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"任务的过程和结果是可追踪、衡量的；例如背诵单词的数量可以根据 Anki 中的数据统计进行跟踪。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5093af3d-d83a-4e7d-b2ad-d9a66549e1a3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9acf75fd-c244-4ecf-9957-0f6c46014cb5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Attainable（可达成）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0f95aeff-dfcc-44c2-9794-572f71c1cddf","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"591ae442-508b-4411-8938-3845ee15e4b4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目标需要和自己的能力匹配不能过于困难。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bbc0fe50-7dd4-498f-84f7-3639ede66af1","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2c00f4aa-7e02-47ea-b314-36314f07ba86"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以参考"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3b4a2186-2158-4c35-a020-2bead3bae449"}},{"type":"text","text":"的原则设定略高于自己能力的目标。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8f2d999a-f90d-475f-b277-a455a223b227","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7e8aac3a-790d-4ac1-8b47-04e68b3fcac6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Relevant（相关）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"95c36226-eb99-4a05-bc28-e016601eb316","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"72640af0-67e4-4061-9679-cc9de6e56e01"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"任务目标与自己的大目标（例如人生目标、项目目标）具备关联性"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"08e1815f-c8a3-4fd6-9ccd-b1ad9e1e3866","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"650276a3-d066-405e-be68-6f4944da9dfc"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d836f197-7b34-4a33-94f0-5310ce8b3d66"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c070ea12-4804-44a8-8606-883286217b9d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"714b1beb-b629-44df-b040-2aaae38d67f8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"08d9a517-f7eb-4bdf-8ee2-ec23d60471d3"}},{"type":"text","text":" 来组织信息可以让任务围绕自己的领域和项目展开。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"70c32eb7-d896-4cab-a9b0-4b1f50da3086","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fdd0ad1b-c39e-41b3-9abf-938eb2de736e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Time-bound（有时限）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"66666651-7eb4-472b-ab11-d8e2d6d70337","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6914c81e-54c2-459a-946e-34c2458b5346"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"任务需要具备截止日期"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5296d1b6-6b29-485a-9175-2c3889c1e7b4","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"358ccc6b-55ff-4ce9-a9c3-bb4dc47e8efc"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"根据此原则优化了 Notion"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"887ac293-e09c-486b-9473-bc06758932a6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如 Projects、AREA 字段来确定目标的相关性。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"d60f5e64-ef17-4c05-94de-b2ea5bba05f2","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/cd820ba4-2b4d-4aa4-96ee-844bd33f60bd/CleanShot2023-01-2402.07.35.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":572,"originalWidth":1380,"alignment":"center"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"fe53ea21-06a5-4179-9fd4-da0628abf969","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8a03f59c-8f18-4ceb-9b37-d00cdc3e500a"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zh.m.wikipedia.org/zh-hans/SMART%E5%8E%9F%E5%88%99","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zh.m.wikipedia.org/zh-hans/SMART%E5%8E%9F%E5%88%99"}]}]}]}
cards.title: SMART 原则

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3d540836-140d-4676-b30b-6f98b5942583","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"建立系统而不是追求「具体」的目标"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"343e402d-83e8-42b7-aa0c-added826c66f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"漫画作者斯科特·亚当斯认为不要为了某个具体的目标而奋斗，具体的目标是指那些成功你会高兴失败你会沮丧的目标，而是要追求构建一个不断变化、成长的系统。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"30544f6b-cc29-4a50-a269-85330222ee99"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如学习写作、设计就是一个成长系统，没有具体的目标，过程的每一点进步都会让人感到愉悦。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f27f9526-08ee-4489-8841-8474a5069265"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"来自"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c511d9ca-60d8-4e8a-a578-fc2a18ab1376","cardTitle":"《巨人的工具》"}},{"type":"text","text":"中的漫画作者斯科特·亚当斯"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"afb5b6dd-9e30-4a3b-8d8e-dcb7bb705a60"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ab3547be-a32a-425c-98a7-c61e6e0968ec","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"75554758-be41-49e3-a162-672620e7acc3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与亚里士多德"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./幸福的类别%20bfa7758c-ac5f-4d7b-b18c-ec6c32d2eb20.md","title":"幸福的类别","data-internal-href":"meta://card/bfa7758c-ac5f-4d7b-b18c-ec6c32d2eb20","edited":true}}],"text":"实现型幸福"},{"type":"text","text":"的观点一致"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c3c94539-3cc0-416b-96d7-5f35fc3d3b5d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf1dd5e0-f592-47cd-bc02-f4308d3be518"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"54f638f2-9ddd-4e75-b517-be25bdbe4c09","cardTitle":"SMART 原则"}},{"type":"text","text":"相悖了？"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"40532cb9-5ccd-480c-abaa-2bf54e312a55","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3c73d8af-e19b-423e-b377-5619fe0a9f58"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其实不是，SMART 原则的任务目标是指"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"具体任务的目标"},{"type":"text","text":"，自然有具体的完成指标，而此书中描述的更接近"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"08d9a517-f7eb-4bdf-8ee2-ec23d60471d3","cardTitle":"PARA"}},{"type":"text","text":"中的「领域」，是从更长期视角下的产物。"}]}]}]}]}
cards.title: 建立系统而不是追求「具体」的目标

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"269aef74-0f8b-4485-9ff4-d5b50a2187c8","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"《心流》"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b0e05330-61d3-4b77-a28b-063879d1d996"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"作者: [美] 米哈里·契克森米哈赖"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d82f4496-2c83-417a-af15-60c63e8f77f6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"出版社: 中信出版社"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"12009f5e-4d79-44b5-89ec-c6c78ef57722"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"出品方: 中信·先见"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a6866449-8164-4429-91fb-5e4ce08aab35"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"副标题: 最优体验心理学"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"33241555-4396-40b3-ab24-336869cfd842"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://book.douban.com/subject/27186106/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://book.douban.com/subject/27186106/"}]}]}
cards.title: 《心流》

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ab73180e-a0d1-475c-9e2f-c75a9cfbfd19","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"发展多个成熟的技能"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bd8a2162-36bb-44dc-9cc9-cccf93863290"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"一个技能"},{"type":"text","text":"要达到世界第一会非常困难，但是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"发展多个技能"},{"type":"text","text":"并都达到前 25% 就要简单的多。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d90b737b-e2da-4486-96f6-25bd54dc261f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如斯科特本人就同时拥有讲故事、绘画的能力并了解职场，从而有了以职场为主题的漫画热门作品。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"522e0b6d-68c6-4294-a0f5-0e9fa44a8975"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"来自"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c511d9ca-60d8-4e8a-a578-fc2a18ab1376","cardTitle":"《巨人的工具》"}},{"type":"text","text":"中的漫画作者斯科特·亚当斯"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"dcfc6be2-ac38-40a6-96e1-be28d3fb3606"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"79691609-7f0e-4c58-adb7-6ca5c143c0b6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有句话是「只要定语够多，谁都可以得到第一」，看起来是一句戏谑的话其实也存在道理，这种组合能力所产生的稀缺性也是一种价值。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7a1ce0a2-8fa7-44c4-a408-51608b8e4882"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另外，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1be2b4a7-1371-4bb7-9240-37e024fe0ad9","cardTitle":"从多个领域切入学习更能发挥卡片笔记的威力"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5885e16c-a684-4f85-970a-62a81619ff9a","cardTitle":"精神熵"}},{"type":"text","text":"等例子中可以看出，跨领域知识的启发也是有助于能力的发展的。"}]}]}
cards.title: 发展多个成熟的技能

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4bfb5d73-1737-43a6-8892-3714d0bf20ff","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用福格模型养成习惯"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4e92a137-bd8c-402f-9702-ca9650ff2125","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"90abf124-fedf-4550-bd4a-7a616534876e"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b203fec9-07ce-495a-9ceb-8743648ceeb0","cardTitle":"动机"}},{"type":"text","text":"："},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"找到黄金行为"},{"type":"text","text":"，在一大堆自己想做的事情中，找出让自己感觉最好的行为，然后将其作为习惯养成的目标。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d55b52d3-3ca3-485b-96d4-d3b55c791fcb","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"af77e727-eefa-43b6-a5ce-1a9b405f17e8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"动机是抽象的，需要找到一个具体的行为。例如让身体健康就是抽象的，需要具化为「肩颈运动 10 分钟」，行为、目标的制定可以参考"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"54f638f2-9ddd-4e75-b517-be25bdbe4c09","cardTitle":"SMART 原则"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b4c0cb47-4494-4bc8-bd1e-9b1089aec4b6","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"04893411-97f4-44d8-b3cc-8a0be0f1a3f2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如福格的目标是「提高睡眠质量」于是他做了以下几个步骤"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d07c03ea-3fd5-4b98-9a70-14b861aba291","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0dff3f57-dcd0-4f24-84c2-b1565517c201"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"写下相关的具体行为，例如手机关机、晚上泡澡、睡前伸一下懒腰等"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"db6f2be4-339b-45f4-b575-506bf8ffd842","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c8693e72-d1d6-4098-9144-6bf1586dfa72"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"然后思考每个行为"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"673ee1df-ff7a-43c8-95cb-0770f325daf0","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3893505c-e40b-44ca-aadb-741a0bd7bc66"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于目标的影响大吗？"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a7b4705e-e930-4dc8-87e3-020c6f6d1fe3","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"39777739-3832-49cd-a576-dcb967f51ad0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我有能力执行吗？"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ce871b37-1d6f-483f-bb3d-9bb123268892","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6f40c970-c5c4-40c4-8370-e6c4d2e4b0de"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"同时满足上述 2 个条件的行为就是一个黄金行为。"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b2509824-c8b9-49f2-9b4b-298811d6061a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"17d3c6ff-e0e1-4716-b958-85427d5d66a1"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8e068818-d2fd-4f23-b21e-a4d7ba5e986d","cardTitle":"能力"}},{"type":"text","text":"：拆解目标，将黄金行为变成一个个简单的小目标"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e6e70b79-df71-4260-a92e-ac4e97756220","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"724245d9-ded4-42ff-a96d-fb1f5a7e2e22"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如将整理 Inbox 拆解成「每天整理 3 篇」就容易的多。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bb47f45f-9947-4c9c-b334-d2d72f81ace4","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"abb04851-e025-42f1-a765-dc880cd98e3a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"书中的例子是，如果想要养成「每天跑步 1 公里」的习惯，则拆解为穿上跑步鞋、出门、跑步……这里的关键点是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"不要急着增加难度做更大的行为"},{"type":"text","text":"，即便刚开始只是穿鞋但不跑也没关系，要慢慢推进。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"93a95df7-2257-4355-b716-66b541cf377e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9161c066-af08-461e-a38f-b18456ae19c0"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b8cc4607-6474-4da6-bf09-7c7946448c3f","cardTitle":"将大问题拆分成小问题"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4b136432-4a79-4296-a2b4-36436d81d614","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58c0179b-df93-443d-90e2-9451e27e7fad"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"65a51a78-9aa4-4949-9722-71be6efb5f27","cardTitle":"提示"}},{"type":"text","text":"：将你想培养的习惯放在日常生活中的既定动作后，这些动作可以称为提示，例如刷牙后放下杯子和牙刷、关闭电视、洗澡后吹头发……"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a15fe2f8-8eae-41aa-9670-d02fb21f2e63","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"22ec27dc-9ca0-4d86-a402-5319e77f313d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这些既定动作都是一个提示库，是不需要思考就会"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"自动化执行的行为"},{"type":"text","text":"，新的习惯可以以此为助力。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"57916de7-d39f-437d-8ad0-24d5dffa2275","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bb618dbe-5530-45c9-95b8-9a40cf9adc0f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另一个原理可能是既定动作提供了一个情境，增加了记忆的编码"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1763f176-ce4a-48f7-ba42-2c9df9a3ba81","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b6111a56-9adb-4380-b8b8-5075f0f6dfb6"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1b69a1a3-18d9-423e-b96a-9a57b7fd0c1a","cardTitle":"记忆编码与提取时的情境 Context的重叠程度决定了是否可以解码成功"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b7675216-3355-42d8-9468-34bf6f5768b5","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7d3d7c66-cdf2-40c7-83ee-824e4d9f2076"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"更多案例"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8825094b-f314-4a12-b5e8-7f81e1403c64","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a1a6b24e-8d39-4faa-a153-ff4f72a7539a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5c832bd9-06aa-4e79-982d-317074c108c7","cardTitle":"模板可以促进知识的应用"}},{"type":"text","text":"，模版就提供了一种提示。"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b38dea42-308a-4e43-9e3b-b5a4b0c817ec","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d60c47e4-d7fa-439c-be41-590147594d26"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最后，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8369eb74-23b0-47ef-afb7-dcb1b01a2f24","cardTitle":"创造习惯在于保持积极的情绪"}},{"type":"text","text":"，完成目标动作后需要庆祝一下。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5d983a3a-74e5-424d-b380-8d61af111dad"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"05442efe-eaf7-4368-9579-16dc4d088274","cardTitle":"《福格行为模型》"}}]}]}
cards.title: 使用福格模型养成习惯

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1bb98bf5-1ca6-4325-94b2-b5609be26211","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"创造习惯在于保持积极的情绪"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e5d5c2d8-35af-46a2-b762-0b31f903834c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"创造习惯不是刻苦练习，而是将一个积极的情绪和行为进行绑定。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bc71ac06-8f21-48d1-ac0a-664d2ac1e3b2","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"105a8f3f-3240-4710-86d1-225eb5f3db4d"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9f2ede96-d21b-4ff9-8f4e-bc2e76236a39","cardTitle":"情绪是更古老于决策的系统"}},{"type":"text","text":"，权重也比理性决策要搞；并且情绪是自动化的，利用这种自动化更有可能养成习惯。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"69e5f2da-b4da-447b-bac8-8da3891fe22d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"622042bb-48af-4568-a855-4c95d5732c9c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这说明了情绪的一个积极作用，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ad0d0c14-23e0-462e-85a3-9f394ab5d90b","cardTitle":"《思考，快与慢》"}},{"type":"text","text":"中则更多描述情绪/非理性的负面作用。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f4675ee7-1c70-4d8a-a429-e7e8e01e195d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c110a450-389f-4b76-98c6-a224982b60e2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"具体来说，可以在完成一次动作后「庆祝」一下，例如夸奖一下自己，比个 V，或者用 Raycast 撒个花。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d20f7dc1-83a9-43f2-9859-3c740a4ca814","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b6d36d53-9351-410c-a493-803f1c3c0eb6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最重要的是，反馈一定要及时可以在行动的过程中或者行动"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"结束的那一刻"},{"type":"text","text":"，这也才能让大脑的神经元将行动和积极反馈之间建立联系，从而强化行为的动机。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7b829380-06d6-4e30-901d-0d9421476156","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b7c19a29-db2e-4d31-8869-896b75660285"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"77f6c1ff-5867-4973-a055-5fc7ea8f37ea","cardTitle":"循环反馈让事情本身变得有趣"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6440abce-026c-4925-abc0-f4e9c2ce06f6","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"01bda631-e3a7-4107-aa88-1fafb460e8a8"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"f4aa1958-de89-44a2-842f-a5ecc5b86e6f","cardTitle":"反馈延迟"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dffdc34c-586a-4b4d-9ce5-eb4be6cebdc1","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"778e618c-0f31-467e-b27b-95e12322b578"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"得到的每天听本书在结束时就会有一个积极的反馈——「恭喜你又听完了一本书」"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c2c640d6-341b-4651-a952-d70d7a38b1f7"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"05442efe-eaf7-4368-9579-16dc4d088274","cardTitle":"《福格行为模型》"}}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"201baecc-e1be-458f-a420-8d7330df4351"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e4e32500-73c9-4bd9-a6cb-b3faf640ce51"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将目标动作和积极情绪创造链接，是一种"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ffada1e7-e65d-4129-bf23-7f00c1b47c6e","cardTitle":"通过对正确、错误匹配的强化、去强化形成概念"}},{"type":"text","text":"的体现。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cde6bb9b-06c7-4950-9e00-77b39d085b53"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Duolingo 每次答题正确、玩不答完都有非常积极的音效和动画设计，这也促进了用户的持续参与。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e8a871c1-e0e3-4099-8e9d-4aa529f992fe","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"496750fd-0f74-4850-a332-96229f50c9aa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其实 Duolingo 也利用了人性的弱点，例如连续打卡利用的是损失规避，但并没有让我反感。原来我讨厌的是利用人类本性来达成商业目的、消费用户，其实也是可以利用本性来提升用户的幸福感的。"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 创造习惯在于保持积极的情绪

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b705b750-0ca0-4e6f-8ddf-2ec14474800a","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"情绪是更古老于决策的系统"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1780f942-011d-4cfa-a5ce-8ab812bf2e87","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d7a1f36e-6409-4038-8710-174a620591e8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"情绪更加简单，不需要后天的学习即可掌握"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"05ba4761-2cfa-45f0-ba93-d05ce53c6feb","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97d1e15f-4f3c-443a-bd2e-11146f61a63d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如恐惧对应逃跑的行为、愤怒对应攻击行为"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3b4d59af-47d4-4e10-a18e-0a897ad807b5","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8040ed0f-297e-4598-b587-e1a0d25c439b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"情绪的权重大于决策"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"636ebaab-e55a-44ee-832e-cfbbc4c78584","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e17136ad-3c21-46e5-a416-97d39bac82f1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这也是为什么很多时候当存在强烈的情绪时，容易做出不理性的决策。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4c773ca2-6905-4e3d-a1fa-59dd6dbc6c70","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"128cc989-5bb6-46f4-991e-98d065482384"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这也是行为经济学相比较传统经济学的差异，将人认定为非理性的生物。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0b5328fc-e30e-45e3-bdf6-a298b58baebf","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a12b18fd-22bc-41ce-925e-855d3f8df2cb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"短视频等平台除了利用输入、输出的信息差（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"48b07270-7e78-4c85-b43a-0c080a001252","cardTitle":"学习要搞清楚输入和输出"}},{"type":"text","text":"）还利用了大众恐慌、愤怒等情绪"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1e50fb59-bbf5-4979-90e0-576e28e389f1","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"66fa7914-4253-4d39-b7c1-a0faf9adbe28"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/ckyi4x3t000hs01pn0zxwf9wv","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/ckyi4x3t000hs01pn0zxwf9wv"}]}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bba46ac1-e5ac-4a14-983f-8a41111c0ea9","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息熵"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c4326998-ff12-40bb-ad08-51858987b6d0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"假定一个问题，提问者通过提问来揭开问题的谜底（例如问题是某个人的生日），那么最终获得答案的问题数不可能小于某个值，这个值被称为"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"信息熵"},{"type":"text","text":"。这个实验被称为「香农实验」。信息熵的公式是："}]},{"type":"math_display","attrs":{"id":"44966621-c3d6-4315-a710-f7d78f174886"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"log2(x)"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4295782a-143f-495d-adc8-66fe3f3b5bb4"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"x"},{"type":"text","text":" 代表了不确定性的数量。例如抛掷硬币的可能性有 2 种，所以 "},{"type":"math_inline","content":[{"type":"text","text":"log2(2) = 1"}]},{"type":"text","text":"，抛掷硬币的结果所包含的信息量是 1 比特。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fd982bb4-022e-46a5-8420-744a5a3cd17e"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"30467f2e-b84e-49fa-b205-a90e2d6cd2a8","cardTitle":"熵"}},{"type":"text","text":"原本是热力学的概念，香农借用这个概念来描述信息的不确定性。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2e20aca1-d672-4ef5-9894-0d733f0cbe66"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"《信息传》吴军、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d","cardTitle":"信息论"}}]}]}
cards.title: 信息熵

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"969ba9e6-ae68-4602-8e39-c968ff89fec1","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"建模欲望"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"48542323-6937-401e-9215-939e7245c02e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52e0d646-5915-4390-95ce-47498af8e880"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"描述/表象"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"35a771f9-59b6-443a-8a93-87198d1f41a0","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8618fffd-83b9-42b5-a575-b83c9f395187"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"550d2128-2cf7-4c8e-9677-c1bc8f9e13cb","cardTitle":"模型的重要作用是预测"}},{"type":"text","text":"，所以我们会存在建模欲望；而能够预测新情况可以增加我们的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"931b7340-2c2c-4e41-989d-80310c7b70d3","cardTitle":"自主"}},{"type":"text","text":"性。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"99f4693c-2116-4b92-a8ad-a5642a51706c","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1a9e8740-fd0f-482e-a194-10f0701d24c1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"特别是事情是出人意料且消极时，我们会更容易思考问题的原因（建模），因为这种情况剥夺了我们的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"931b7340-2c2c-4e41-989d-80310c7b70d3","cardTitle":"自主"}},{"type":"text","text":"能力，我们需要用建模/"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4cce80ee-7fb7-46fa-930c-f10f65146503","cardTitle":"归因"}},{"type":"text","text":"来抵消这种不良感受。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3762f470-cdf1-4cab-a73b-c913717bbd5e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e1664510-550b-47c1-ba66-bbc84b8bbf0c"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4136d5fd-b0ec-4a81-9110-bca19716f884","cardTitle":"《动机心理学》"}},{"type":"text","text":"- 归因理论 - P71"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5ebd546a-f3a3-4914-ba0d-c8b9f73078d0","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a3db28b1-4464-4700-8115-b329d3375edd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其实好奇心不是孩子专属，大人也具备充足的好奇心（想想你对标题党的好奇心），只是因为大人掌握的知识更多容易，更难被激起好奇心。原因有两个："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7aad0608-bce9-4ab4-97d2-42fbe28b95ce","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"994b220f-a77d-4ab6-b726-ce2bdd20c8cd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"真的懂得已有的知识，所以不好奇"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"fbb83d5c-05c2-4cb6-aefe-e6715440a594","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"410ea00c-7f4f-4441-ad80-4c3adc06fff4"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"固有观念，不愿意放弃已有的认知去了解新知识"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d58a826d-627f-457d-8488-8f6d4250837e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fafda3fc-af96-4dd2-a084-92e902e1166c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何激发自己的好奇心/建模欲望"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c79240ef-2322-4c61-bbcd-6136cdcca03b","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4d67d2a8-d3b3-42b3-ab7f-bb5f2a7c460b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与自己有关的事物更能激发"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5ae466f6-adcf-4b1b-991a-128289d2b03a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a0d84e2a-1a74-425f-8ce1-c83ffbcd84f6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这也是为什么在看 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"724c99ab-a7dc-4b10-87f7-d9e197329511","cardTitle":"《About Face 4：交互设计精髓》"}},{"type":"text","text":" 时面对大量好像有用，但又暂时用不到的知识点时总是犯困。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f2135a6b-094c-41ca-946b-bb967af7db89","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8bc6f2a9-f16d-43b3-af39-04118c1b99bc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"后续可以从其他维度进行学习，例如思考这些知识点和认知心理学有关的点"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"67f950e2-52ea-4184-bfbe-9fe02cae7f27","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7db3bf87-8be9-4b0b-9595-b2988c8a108c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以作为以下理论的案例："},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3b4a2186-2158-4c35-a020-2bead3bae449","cardTitle":"心流"}},{"type":"text","text":"中提到的，通过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"931b7340-2c2c-4e41-989d-80310c7b70d3","cardTitle":"自主"}},{"type":"text","text":"构建略有难度的目标来"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"提升工作体验"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]}]}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ae44dcfd-0818-4752-a57e-b4265f837f11","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"74b5df1b-d798-48c8-aef3-04c4abc3a4c4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原理"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3f4513d2-2328-4d47-a679-20b596082306"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ae404370-513b-4424-b696-b3cd03b7a9be","cardTitle":"知识是对有限案例的抽象以应对无限的新情况"}},{"type":"text","text":"，其中案例扮演着重要的作用，而"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"故事就是一种具体的案例"},{"type":"text","text":"，所以我们本能喜欢故事是对建模的欲望。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3cf5e3a2-4d3c-4a6a-9e77-bb2d869fb2c7","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9f01c762-1dd9-4e26-9c6d-62b223e01a18"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"更多案例"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8ecace98-de6e-49fc-8324-2cb30001c6c9","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f2e213a9-2b32-486a-9092-46ea5bf6d3e0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"看到车祸时我们会忍不住围观并开始研究车祸原因，潜意识认为这样可以让自己避免同样的灾难。"}]}]}]}]}
cards.title: 建模欲望

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2b53f751-9c28-459e-98fe-95fba1067316","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"跨领域竞品分析"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f28b2a36-8829-4d3b-992f-975bfad9d453"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"竞品分析时，需要同类竞品，如果分析的功能是其他领域移植的，那么可以跨领域对竞品进行分析，会有收获。——\n钻石粉丝团开通续费模块参考爱奇艺/腾讯视频，最终了解到不同平台的用户场景差异，并最终选择了适合 CC 场景的设计。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"5309add1-e9e8-425d-b4fd-330c31b41a89"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4221d796-4de4-4689-b2b1-127a9bda837e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTc5MTk1NTM","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-03-09 09:14:19"}]}]}
cards.title: 跨领域竞品分析

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bee13f02-a531-49a0-9b83-ad51b2b91c9f","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息量"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e76684ba-9024-4c0d-8816-4d7c149689de"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于一条信息需要找出它为不确定性带来了多少信息量。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c4328f6c-774d-4a3c-aff5-e07bda5479d1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息量通过「比特」进行度量，类似度重量需要砝码，度量信息量的砝码是将一个发生概率均为 50% 的 2 个事件，如果一个信息可以确定其中一个必定发生，那么这个信息的信息量就是 1 比特。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"99c7d8cd-76db-42ec-b7ae-80730f940973"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d","cardTitle":"信息论"}}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"677f158a-e8df-458b-acab-4a683677cd3d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"949034bb-cc50-4d85-9224-9d7ff060ab40"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以同一个信息对于不同人的信息量是不同的，因为每个人所掌握的信息不同，如果一个信息不能消除你的不确定性则这条信息就对你无效，但是有可能对其他人非常有用。所以才说要跨越圈子进行交流以及"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2b29628e-f1a3-4458-9bd5-f543bfc61c41","cardTitle":"跨领域竞品分析"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1be2b4a7-1371-4bb7-9240-37e024fe0ad9","cardTitle":"从多个领域切入学习更能发挥卡片笔记的威力"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"64261f74-7588-4139-b717-4b4a9300d166"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于消除不确定性的渴望可能来自于"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2a5539c0-d174-4a52-916e-c9fdc5a9f877","cardTitle":"建模欲望"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]}
cards.title: 信息量

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3cb89681-c44d-49d7-9008-5f7739f959bd","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个系统的状态越多则不确定性越大"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"692b8e26-59da-4a87-903d-72444c4fe9e3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如买六合彩和中彩票的状态数量就相差很多，他们的不确定性也就不同。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf97833a-dd28-4042-82bc-cfb0259db282"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d","cardTitle":"信息论"}}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"9ce8abd5-3a40-4811-a5f7-a01710aab422"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"92bc5774-989b-448e-bd9a-2db34150c0d3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这也支撑了"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7de148df-9b26-4093-8e54-7ebf359abb83","cardTitle":"简约式设计 4 步骤"}},{"type":"text","text":"中删除、转移、隐藏原则，减少系统的不确定。这个思路将设计问题转换成信息论的问题，非常有意思。"}]}]}
cards.title: 一个系统的状态越多则不确定性越大

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3577a22d-deec-4c3f-a645-49b389fef53a","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息论"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e2dfd416-c06e-4fd4-9587-9ef8ef9ac1b1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习资料"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"077005e3-16a3-42a3-a7ae-ca96f0ab7534","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e2c9a4f-6418-4c3f-ab3f-fe9332d56adf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"得到课程：信息论 40 讲 - 吴军"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 信息论

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b0cdeb59-b6bf-418b-a632-5b4d0f68ff25","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"事物发展未必会遵从某个单一维度的最优原则"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5d2a8ed9-9508-44b4-8ff7-78f06b8204aa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"文字的编码很多时候也不符合"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"92d0971d-6be1-41de-b0ca-6d656b1e70c7","cardTitle":"编码原则"}},{"type":"text","text":"，为什么不按照最优原则进行设计呢？因为文字是发展而来的，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"orange"}}],"text":"需要考虑人类的接受程度。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fd77a8e7-ff8a-4306-b5bb-cf3107b93836"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"更多的例子"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"59a5ecd1-22e1-4a53-bc53-7e22d297a22b","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f59d6993-eb4b-4da5-8b85-a7ac12391d51"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5268a27c-062a-4d90-8940-9a3400621cdb","cardTitle":"我们仍然在使用动态媒介承载旧的内容"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"529e8230-5b34-417b-9d43-d7564b15109e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"28475a60-19ec-4482-ae3c-37138ce3fc38"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"835d23f4-0a0e-4e5e-88c2-6d379057bb07","cardTitle":"新兴事物需要考虑人和周边环境的接受度"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ec2ef865-b923-4ae6-8151-8afea290a59c"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d","cardTitle":"信息论"}},{"type":"text","text":" 08"}]}]}
cards.title: 事物发展未必会遵从某个单一维度的最优原则

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"be4f0b1b-8cb9-4cf5-9f98-40480f2fea8f","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"新兴事物需要考虑人和周边环境的接受度"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"281af213-5d9a-407f-bbfa-bdb56bc7e14d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"早期以马车居多，新兴的汽车容易让马匹收到惊吓所以发明者为汽车制造了虚假的马头，并且马头还能作为存放汽油的容器。"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fb07d027-b37d-47a0-9916-ea8aeae05828"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9ce6b65d-4622-4afe-8da6-73c72690d427"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"新兴事物不止是会模拟旧事物 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3ae41a4f-dffa-4688-9281-e4021b2e75fe"}},{"type":"text","text":" 还会考虑到人和周边环境的接受程度。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"a21fd5d7-9850-451b-b1b3-5da9c5952afa","src":"https://image.bitautoimg.com/appimage/media/20170105/w600_h338_b7149603fc6e4d83bd7445062a086d3c.jpeg#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"60%","originalHeight":338,"originalWidth":600,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa3e4b07-8ec9-46f6-882d-f9f953d48182"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.techbang.com/posts/67344-horsey-horseless-ma-tau-coaster-design-who-came-up-with-it-why-doesnt-it-pop-up","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.techbang.com/posts/67344-horsey-horseless-ma-tau-coaster-design-who-came-up-with-it-why-doesnt-it-pop-up"}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f02e5914-6981-48b3-9269-047fb87710a8","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"编码原则"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"19e41d24-c51a-43e1-a1e2-a45536b67db1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息编码需要同时满足 2 个原则"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e3fc4857-137b-4955-86ab-a1513f4d7e22","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7df045e0-5c47-4f6e-ad13-7ab183b55e61"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"易辨识性"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4203f452-8808-449e-b55c-2611b019ba59","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f7fb1132-04cd-4fea-8d11-3f7319d7d16e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不同符号的差异要够大，避免难以辨识。想象一下，如果某个符号系统只有 3 个符号 1、l、L，这就大大提高了辨识的难度，而我们正在使用的文字则有比较好的辨识性，所以很多时候一段文字被这段上半部分我们也可以识别出来。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e213f661-2790-49f0-b562-9e1c4602109b","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9ec14ed4-917e-43a1-8d68-54184fc70331"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"除了符号本身提高辨识性，我们还使用上下语境来消除歧义（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0f639883-1301-4361-b47e-8fcec99ac7e4","cardTitle":"信息的冗余度"}},{"type":"text","text":"），例如这句话就很容易识别出中间的字符是 1 而不是 I、L 等其他符号。"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"da06f6d0-0f2c-4c2c-af03-c0ad7da762cc","params":"bash"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我养了 1 只小狗"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e7d94207-f1f5-4fcb-94e9-11be1436ee2d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"01ea3906-82fa-4429-825d-a4f4875bb1f4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有效性"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4fabd8ce-cfb5-4bf5-b243-3b7f7eae7a78","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f505e7e3-ab25-4362-8428-88312dbc04c8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"首先编码是能够解决问题的，其次编码还需要高效。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"编码有效性是理论最佳值在实际应用中的落地。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d54a36ea-fe6c-4411-aeb7-ffdd5e631a68","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a1b7a88a-4e6f-41cc-b50a-8277444b765e"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"654a4e0a-6016-4cf5-9b8c-eeb7509406e3","cardTitle":"香农第一定律"}},{"type":"text","text":"是：编码长度≥"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9886a51e-b5bb-4179-beb0-bef1e8d2519d","cardTitle":"信息熵"}},{"type":"text","text":"（信息量）/每一个码的信息量，如果某种编码方式可以使得公式中的 = 号成立（达到最小的编码长度）则就是一个具备有效性的编码。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f33c7a98-d538-4709-9e23-f321e8b53c79","folded":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"10d71053-8d88-4762-b57f-e0754a7f75d7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有一个测试题：有 64 瓶药，其中只有 1 瓶有毒，喝了毒药的小白鼠在 3 天后会发生反应（例如拉肚子），现在只有 3 天的时间，如何用最少的小白鼠测试出哪瓶是毒药？当然可以使用 64 只小白鼠，但显然不是有效的编码，解题思路"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"465d5cbd-6b12-4e59-a03c-88c5e0a03686","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"00bc302f-9e87-48d6-b6ed-0828e052e3f5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在 64 个对象中找出确定性，需要 "},{"type":"math_inline","content":[{"type":"text","text":"log2(64) = 6"}]},{"type":"text","text":" 比特的信息，也就是 6 只小白鼠，6 就是解决这个不确定性的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9886a51e-b5bb-4179-beb0-bef1e8d2519d","cardTitle":"信息熵"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"684c21c8-5de0-4815-90b4-8a699880e183","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fa6e8147-756c-4849-9d77-d8aec5857e06"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以使用 2 进制对每一瓶药进行 6 位数的编码，例如第 1 瓶药是 000001，第 2 瓶是 000010……每一位数对应一只小白鼠，如果是 1 则喝药，否则不不喝"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b8328e7c-24bf-441b-a513-404b3fe3b313","order":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"39497bdf-18b9-414c-8dcb-230819b06835"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3 天后\b观察中毒的小白鼠，假设 1、2、6 小白鼠中毒，则说明 110001 这个编码对应的药有毒。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"89f70953-75ee-4a47-b2f9-89c9cc3badcd","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b9b67797-60a4-4591-ad52-758a42fd1b05"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"45a2bdf4-c852-4835-ba32-28b509f85ae5","cardTitle":"思考信息的目的来权衡失真率"}},{"type":"text","text":"，有效也是根据场景和目标而定。"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"75017ad6-ebb7-4ac1-9f4b-7e505aa8bcd4"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d","cardTitle":"信息论"}},{"type":"text","text":" 06"}]}]}
cards.title: 编码原则

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"09eef980-e2e5-4ef7-bed3-ef370435ef14","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"香农第一定律"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c80fd5ad-1deb-4ab7-8bbd-24eaad4eed8d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"编码长度≥"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9886a51e-b5bb-4179-beb0-bef1e8d2519d"}},{"type":"text","text":"（信息量）/每一个码的信息量"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"21b76c30-6f25-4a85-9151-6c7a686d513d"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d"}},{"type":"text","text":" 05"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"3e318e7c-083c-46cb-8dad-c980c818cfc7"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3464ec6b-aabb-4187-a775-5f3bcfc43bc3","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b6b7555d-3675-48a6-af5a-9685f8398204"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fbddf42c-d6f6-474d-9a84-0a2a80196574"}},{"type":"text","text":"，套用此定律："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"785d2814-5a4c-401a-b401-172b0eafacd7","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d2159bbb-9abe-4388-8639-f580ad6bfe27"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"编码长度：完成某个任务所需的操作，所需的操作越少、成本越低则越高效。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"03a7d745-3577-4705-ae07-4f6b634c05fc","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6a23ee20-7cd7-46d5-8057-53d1bdf9719b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息量：此操作所产生的价值/影响；所以说价值、影响越大的操作，总是要通过更多的步骤/成本（编码长度）来完成。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e3d827f7-8832-45f0-87eb-f7716485b9bc","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52eea161-8e2d-480a-823b-dedd417f7d44"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以利用"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7de148df-9b26-4093-8e54-7ebf359abb83"}},{"type":"text","text":"中的「转移」将部分信息输入转移给产品本身而不是全部给到用户。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"429de872-ecd9-417a-9d10-8bbc930419da","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"da906fc8-5814-4f64-8654-a0e0ba9d477a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"每一个码的信息量"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"eadcfd79-79ab-453b-84c7-0833d98a4113","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c3cd223-9f5b-49e3-a484-573aeb793cf0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"快捷键：用较少的码输出了较多的信息量，所以编码长度就更短，效率就更高，但是编码的复杂度就更高，因为往往不是用户熟悉的编码而且更具抽象性。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"781e4efa-7c15-4994-a1e5-cf2956cf3d1f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fdb38c06-fe2f-4bfe-bd12-6476d4f0bd91"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"逐步操作：每步操作（每个码）只包含少量信息量，所以需要多步操作"}]}]}]}]}]}
cards.title: 香农第一定律

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"aac9b776-7848-46e6-9453-64125d70c3f1","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"幸福的类别"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"331979f2-5930-4241-8935-2c3ea22aeef9","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2d248e3e-0dac-441c-bb10-55870ed977f2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"享乐型"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c1e5cd99-d6ac-4cfe-87b5-b46ef962450e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"746b6250-3b30-4bbb-b260-61df78fd275b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"追求正面的情绪的获取和负面情绪的消除"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"da862f10-39d5-4e69-8657-2c93d8825460","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9a4848ed-1514-455e-89bc-faeea4f5d400"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"关注结果"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"21ca1b2c-18c1-4ff5-9824-d1d5a8427174","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"62d017ba-e948-432b-b184-763074f72217"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"享乐型是短暂的，每次实现之后都会驱使人们追求下一次的满足，无穷无尽人们很容易陷入欲望无法被满足的困境中。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"80e4a6fb-d208-4370-a628-6a266f589742","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d69922e4-effa-48e6-8057-44262610ca2a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"追求享乐型幸福的人会问：我是否实现了这个目标？"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"37683c38-72af-4093-bef0-bb51fd0ff1dd","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6d3b98b0-2945-4770-b842-cf67f47f0e21"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实现型"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"62657d8e-ab10-4890-b431-3b5b0346fec0","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4ce8196e-ce6f-4cce-a321-be53561ff256"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"关注追求幸福的过程而非结果"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d2eee35a-854d-4d3e-b9cc-6b7dab9f043d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dcea728b-740d-40b9-b409-05c5fcd1f85c"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0da2bfdb-316e-4e21-af83-d71eaad7e6d9"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bf2056c2-e5bf-4f83-b34c-f8af4e8c8ef3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b23b190b-597f-4d88-bd90-4cc26bc914fc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相比享乐型，实现型可以让幸福更加持久，但缺点是比较抽象难以化为具体的行动以及缺少具体的幸福感反馈。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"154f6776-2c47-49be-aba9-009b0a4f8941","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ce04edb-9109-4156-bfe4-88c106845e73"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"追求实现型幸福的人会问：我是否为了实现了这个目标而拼尽全力？"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"24d63bee-7f56-4fe6-b9fe-3464dbb6479f"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4136d5fd-b0ec-4a81-9110-bca19716f884"}},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"亚里士多德"},{"type":"text","text":"的两种幸福观 P16"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"9876daa5-9ffe-4fef-860f-ceb6d7f43b3c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c99e6e37-5f39-4115-a1df-164f514551f0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人们常说海贼王中的 One pice 其实就是路飞在旅途中的经历和结交的朋友，这也是一种实现型的幸福。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f3b18b01-b8c4-41d8-9569-f6307f0d9ce3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"俄罗斯方块的结局就是失败，但是不影响它成为全球范围内受欢迎的游戏，也是一种基于实现型幸福的活动。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a5cb2fe8-de62-4025-8b22-392bce21dbfe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最好的状态是以实现型幸福为主要追求，以享乐型为辅。"}]}]}
cards.title: 幸福的类别

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"5a36b165-25ca-4f2a-919a-cfb80f300fc5","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用 ChatGPT 辅助学习——为自己找一个老师"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4ba75f43-b852-4674-a27c-70980fc3a5ae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们每个人都有许多标签，例如高中生、成绩中等、文科，根据这些标签我和其他拥有相同标签的人分配了相同的教程、班级和老师，这可以带来"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./标准化带来高效率，工作流程也是一种标准化%20ab5c76f5-6147-4f74-8a47-18ba9bfb7dff.md","title":"标准化带来高效率，工作流程也是一种标准化","data-internal-href":"meta://card/ab5c76f5-6147-4f74-8a47-18ba9bfb7dff","edited":true}}],"text":"效率上的提升"},{"type":"text","text":"，因为同一份教程、老师就可以服务几十上百人，而无须为每个人定制，但也正是这样造成了忽略个性的问题。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"88ac460f-6609-410d-bac3-9804650c5958"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"而"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"adab50d8-2221-4985-850f-2bce62c588c8","cardTitle":"ChatGPT 的强大是在于对个人需求的定制化回复"}},{"type":"text","text":"。在过往遇到问题时通常使用 Google 搜索答案，在接受答案之前需要花上一点时间阅读答案所针对的问题细节、背景是否与自己的相同，否则答案可能对自己无效。例如同样是学习编程，不同的人、不同的目标所采用的学习方法都会不同，使用 ChatGPT 就可以得到更加个性化的答案。利用这一特性 ChatGPT 对我的学习产生了很大的帮助，下面从学习的不同阶段展开分享。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"679e9467-730d-4f38-9b50-a20498dd2fa8","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"获取学习材料"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa4c74e4-2f79-4a05-b718-ab82cf4728f8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"知其然也要知其所以然，我喜欢研究某个技巧、方法之所以有效的底层原理，例如下面这个例子，在阅读学习方法的文章时了解到「人们更容易理解和记住直接相关的知识」但不明白原理是什么，于是向 ChatGPT 咨询并获得相关的实验、论文信息。通过获取新的学习材料加深自己的理解深度。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"593aa950-78ac-471a-9cb4-c3186c0743f9","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/ec049fff-ffcc-40aa-90db-20efa522d832/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c5ccd34-54f8-4249-b5e3-106c2a661b42"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最近想找一些教程继续提升一下自己的编程能力，但大多数资源都是视频教程让我觉得很枯燥，我喜欢边学边做的课程，通过"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./动态媒介可以拉近理论与行动的距离%20ce5f21e3-6f55-4a91-b32f-ebfdb6958e33.md","title":"动态媒介可以拉近理论与行动的距离","data-internal-href":"meta://card/ce5f21e3-6f55-4a91-b32f-ebfdb6958e33","edited":true}}],"text":"拉近理论和实践的距离"},{"type":"text","text":"我可以更快获得反馈和成就感。于是我向 ChatGPT 提交了自己的需求，最终选择了 Codewars 这个通过解题来学习和评估编程能力的网站，它不但可以反馈我的编程质量，还可以通过社区看到其他人对问题的解答方式从而学到更多。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"18bbd5ba-3826-4282-8591-f1b11ff778a5","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/6c6797dd-7624-4113-ac59-785be81b8607/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"64e531f2-f2eb-4d30-bab2-9a9394aae75f","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"处理学习材料"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7e182360-99c7-47ff-94fa-8051387c1c0b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在阅读前对内容具备整体认知有助于大脑完成知识的理解。就像拼图前如果不知道最终成品的样子很难从一大堆碎片中找到头绪。我在阅读文章时会使用 ChatGPT 获取文章的概要，在正式阅读前先在大脑中建立一个知识地图。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"19459179-543a-4ffd-b9bf-aef393355672","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/5ad4340c-0374-4e9a-b0c2-ae6b6cc4581b/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"42775310-8a43-41de-953f-366db768bdac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Codewars 是一个编程学习网站，它会提供许多试题要求用户编程解答，代码跑通后会展示其他用户的答案，经常会看到许多更加简洁但是自己又看不懂的解法，此时一个个查询其中的函数不如直接询问 ChatGPT。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"640bc204-bf83-47c1-98d6-ed9a37932821","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/bfae0cc4-f56f-4c4f-b61b-dd543ef0b5e6/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"b762a7a6-b2cd-4071-8afb-6f2e40327160","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/0c6c03b5-33d2-4518-be78-b33b2ce8165a/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4182f004-8e0f-4a16-9f70-918ea14bcc02","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"进行知识存储"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e346e64a-0e01-4706-b0cc-eb0e0ca138e7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/ckx8iz1bs001a01l2dypxfm8p","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"渐构"},{"type":"text","text":"中学习了精细加工和有效训练这两种可以帮助知识更好的存储到大脑中的方法。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a0fa803a-7eed-42b0-9ab2-31de2778c810","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"精细加工"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"43757895-f260-4eb7-95bd-299147d0f6dc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习材料可以分为指令材料和实例材料，实例材料和我们的日常经验贴近所以比较好理解，指令材料则更加抽象，例如英语语法就是一种指令材料。精细加工提供了两种帮助我们学习"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"指令材料"},{"type":"text","text":"的方法。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a04a6d0d-45d0-490b-9a30-bffcb4a8c7bb","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输入更多例子"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d1878805-7584-4c2e-ae3a-f91e7f1b8908"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过查看更多的例子可以帮助我们理解知识，例如在学习「学习迁移」这个概念时，可以向 ChatGPT 获取例子来帮助理解。你可以试着读一下截图中 ChatGPT 提供的例子，是否以从例子中归纳出学习迁移的定义呢？"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"5ba3c551-5068-4efa-9f1e-070c0f971a3a","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/cfae4b4d-324b-4ecc-ad1e-4f90fc07bbe8/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e6fc4f58-b91a-49a5-bec4-0f0aa0935eb8","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"建立新知识与已有知识的链接"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3dbe7154-9466-4daf-bf82-46a6e24fc72d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"建立知识之间的链接可以迸发出新的洞见。例如著名的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"697909cc-84ff-4302-b978-450139f15884","cardTitle":"原子设计"}},{"type":"text","text":"就是在化学元素和设计之间找到关联，将设计的不同单位比喻成原子、分子、有机体等进行管理，现如今已成为行业准则。在知识之间建立链接不止可以产生新的灵感而且还在大脑的信息之间建立了高速公路，让我们提取知识更加的可靠、高效。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"254df78f-36a9-45fe-b5f7-07f982d4b061","src":"https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1612074245280-085718bd7c9b?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxwaG90by1wYWdlfHx8fGVufDB8fHx8&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1000&q=80","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1592dbfe-f5b1-4f3b-9688-20dcc91d61e9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如在学习了信息论中「信息的等价性」原理后，似乎察觉到它和前面提到的「学习迁移」之间的联系，此时我会向 ChatGPT 咨询以验证自己的想法。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"915ae19c-7d5a-4170-871c-c3700331f5a8","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/9d503e6f-9d3a-4ac3-91a1-19754fbb459b/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1a8ed6dd-f20d-43a8-b76d-c38a4d92921d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在学习"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c741f5f8-9f2d-48bb-98b7-31c9891e4eb3","cardTitle":"福格行为模型"}},{"type":"text","text":"后，书中更多是以大家工作和生活都会遇到的通用问题进行举例，我想知道这种行为模式和自己的具体工作——设计之间的关联是什么，是否可以帮助我提升设计能力。通过回答我发现，之前构建的「创造动机、降低使用障碍」的方法论可以进一步补充，增加「提醒」环节，也就是让用户拥有使用某个产品/功能的动机，之后降低他们使用的阻碍并且要有相关的提醒刺激用户使用，避免被遗忘。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"9db40359-1e15-4b7f-bf26-cc292acb4c7e","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/18ce2385-5343-4e64-b82a-6566b0639e94/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"69dce29b-317e-4d6f-8972-32eac609d404","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有效训练"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"feff07d2-57ae-4d09-8107-dc17ef8136a5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有效训练是一种通过"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"实际执行、答案反馈"},{"type":"text","text":"来避免"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./回顾与测试可以避免能力错觉%206f2058bb-6387-43d3-9f5e-d19216acc971.md","title":"回顾与测试可以避免能力错觉","data-internal-href":"meta://card/6f2058bb-6387-43d3-9f5e-d19216acc971","edited":true}}],"text":"能力错觉"},{"type":"text","text":"的方法。短视频中设计师教学绘画，评论区经常出现的评论就是「眼睛说会了，但手不会」，又例如上课时记了笔记，也觉得自己听懂了，但真要开始答题、向其他人解释概念就犯了难，这些都是能力错觉的例子。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c89f976-f3db-4404-af26-0d9fa77a0daa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前面提到我在学习编程时，会请求 ChatGPT 解释函数用法，之后为了避免自己产生能力错觉，同时还会要求 ChatGPT 提供试题来验证自己的掌握程度。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"57473d03-b1d9-4a82-a1e7-19d230b5d3b0","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/68b435d5-cf8f-4e3f-b1c8-c537d9397e89/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2e3c90d8-7ebf-48b7-9d7d-49fc3f678f64"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以直接在会话界面中输入答案，ChatGPT 会判断代码是否能跑通、进行批改。这就完成了一次实际执行加答案反馈的有效训练。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"4ff9024b-4632-40eb-85a3-884d7e71bdaa","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/bf6d2b0b-ae0a-4e05-bd7b-1cbb2f7bd6d6/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d0628ed6-3291-4246-b5a3-f238cee66913"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"同样，在学习概念知识时也可以通过用自己的话解释概念、举例来完成实际执行并向 ChatGPT 索取反馈验证自己的描述是否有误。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"26ca11f7-d030-4376-8e84-3088239261b8","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/ba7812e6-b7c1-40a4-9798-b6ae850d0835/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b6a6f5da-4e38-4372-b533-6ba843ad335d","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"尾巴"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3f21089f-a479-4420-b844-bb0aa394f5d0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"20 世纪上半叶的一位著名心理学家莫尔（O.K.Moore）曾提出一种可以提升儿童教育质量的环境，它应该包含几个特性"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b657e537-ac90-49b1-a9da-1a651b5544d0","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"75df88f2-10dd-4c68-ac31-e12e34dc3aa5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"允许学习者自由探索"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"aad489a6-4e47-4bdc-8b09-55490c128dd5","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"143767ef-b99c-4e1a-a233-ec4882eec9c2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"立即告诉学习者他们行为的后果"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c3848080-1ff0-4211-9ceb-8a2fb2b7f1cb","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f07e1e80-61c4-4bdc-82f3-4fcba83141e2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自主控制"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"fba40abf-b592-4a53-9a09-f69cdbce92bc","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5b5a9830-ebc0-40a4-aef1-e9e9a2e8f29b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使学习者可以对不同领域的知识进行相互关联和发现"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"71bb1823-8169-4afe-8d67-a79ce1857a87"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"下图是基于此原则创造的环境。小孩在较少干扰的房间内操控打字机，另一个空间中成人观察孩子的行为进行对应的反馈。ChatGPT 似乎就成了我们背后的老师，而我们得以用相比百年前更低的成本拥有他。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"72e73bcd-08a7-46aa-932d-5ee0fb3c55a1","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/75602a3e-846b-4a81-861a-77a81fa93130/image.png","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"height":null}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"daf71150-202e-4b84-b060-0261f981a60d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"图片来源：The Edison Responsive Environment (From Omar Khayyam Moore, Autotelic Responsive Environments and Exceptional Children, 1963)."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e296cc3-cc41-43cf-9b57-ce6cfa2e49cb"},"content":[{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"text","text":"\"Hey Moore, what do you think about ChatGPT?\""}]}]}
cards.title: 使用 ChatGPT 辅助学习——为自己找一个老师

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c911d6b3-c3b8-442c-8e56-b0be383e94f6","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"心流"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d69c792f-67a4-47e2-8242-4c3c846866ba","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f8dbc147-d353-43b7-9f9c-9acc261e2949"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"定义"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6a3009d6-1010-425c-8eef-12a30f510c2c","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b3801ad6-47c3-4319-9c51-9dc3f67b5bbb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人们在全神贯注参与活动时的那种忘我的状态。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3dbcbae3-b9f7-4191-81b5-3651c9246e80","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"84c59779-23be-401d-9562-cb83ea9e05c0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在这个状态下，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"你接受的信息和你的目标匹配。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"036851ab-16a0-4b1b-9473-fa1af27cc652","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"786b3ac1-17f5-4d1b-98b4-e9a015e17447"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"达到心流的条件"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"004c2aed-58fc-4c2c-98bb-bd335eaafb4f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c5c177fa-7c94-4645-8058-cf0a18aa026c"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"清晰准确的目标"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b7ec0d59-7f39-4355-8ca4-94af45f755a5","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3b79a3a8-5a01-4102-8c00-8cf35750d48f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"制定准确目标的一个原因是可以更好的获得反馈，并获得更大的前进动力"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"388247e8-1bb8-47c4-88ca-480d89df9d0a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1367e11b-cedf-4cae-85bd-9ed0ecd07b85"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d5682a77-56d4-4c65-bc22-87bfec50dbd1","cardTitle":"学习需要反馈"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"02be330c-53fd-4a0d-bba4-3ba5f7bc759a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f89bdb36-cd97-458e-97b8-bcad51279e8d"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"77f6c1ff-5867-4973-a055-5fc7ea8f37ea","cardTitle":"循环反馈让事情本身变得有趣"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"09a954ef-9627-43e2-b7eb-90dcea22792e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"04dc530b-26cd-4896-9227-e6527dfc1e5d"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b8cc4607-6474-4da6-bf09-7c7946448c3f","cardTitle":"将大问题拆分成小问题"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ab1c275d-a33f-4816-8faf-53496ba56295","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"98719802-4087-427d-95a2-e78dbcecbed6"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"47099549-ac6b-4485-b8d7-24c797df6d87","cardTitle":"设计系统需要反馈机制"}}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b5aa7750-c68a-4d9a-91ff-0795c0937a24","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5300ee9e-03f7-4eaf-b0b6-ea9d98984cf5"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"及时的反馈"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e23503d3-c541-4fbd-a4d4-8903bd9288a3","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fc8992f8-41cc-4885-b627-00b86da45047"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"难度和能力的匹配"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"75e26b12-c416-4259-8997-7d76c77b0d54","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"841d0f62-35bf-4a79-8d90-72871d4ef203"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"难度需要略高于能力 5% 左右。（怎么量化）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c6b94254-7691-42b5-ae65-965a0faf9d64","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"627502d4-5ed3-4c98-be72-f78abd766b58"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4136d5fd-b0ec-4a81-9110-bca19716f884","cardTitle":"《动机心理学》"}},{"type":"text","text":"103 指出这里的能力是指"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b397d4ed-3789-47ed-9f8d-73dee94e4fe1","cardTitle":"自我效能"}},{"type":"text","text":"感，也就是个体对我个人能力的判断，而且还需要高能力和高难度形成匹配才会达到心流，低能力和低难度难以进入心流。"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"055bb62f-7bdf-4a07-ad47-609ac9b5e092"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"048c6703-f8d0-4cb4-8c4b-71bd99b3b8ff","cardTitle":"《心流》"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c86c1063-4e75-469b-9d7c-6ea08e332b40"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"心流可以对抗"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5885e16c-a684-4f85-970a-62a81619ff9a","cardTitle":"精神熵"}}]}]}
