cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e925e69d-6f96-42f1-bc77-5c6b03e7d10c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么要做操作系统"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9386eb1e-3936-4b50-8dac-88b1cd6548a5","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"76b946b5-9e45-4137-917f-feb421aea48d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"操作系统可以连接各个应用，充分发挥计算机的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E4%BA%BA%E7%B1%BB%E5%88%A9%E7%94%A8%E6%9C%BA%E5%99%A8%E7%9A%84%E5%8F%AF%E8%BF%9E%E6%8E%A5%E6%80%A7%20c3c57457-f2a4-4167-a37b-35f799eebc0c.md","title":"人类利用机器的可连接性","data-internal-href":"meta://card/c3c57457-f2a4-4167-a37b-35f799eebc0c","edited":true}}],"text":"可连接性"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d084c0fc-f6da-44fb-b3ad-73319342a179","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6f1c68e3-72eb-4810-a515-d7c55d0d5cca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"操作系统可以完成任何单一应用无法完成的工作"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0ce4b8b5-460e-4765-bfe7-ef935dc25bc9","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fc7a20b9-51a0-4d1a-84fd-5a7bc08d3bc2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"操作系统可以影响应用朝着一致的方向前进"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"765d9635-5d96-453a-9507-c83caeff2cd7","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c04406b0-02ee-4bfb-8682-95e0c620d58b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我喜欢它 :-)"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 为什么要做操作系统

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"554e8ec4-0db3-4fc1-ad27-220c13da5756","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"互信息"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"755bfa24-4c45-41ef-bd59-7eae4caebe65","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c9e6f822-255e-4e79-b74d-e39b575daaa9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"互信息是定义了两个信息之间的相关性，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"edc84b9f-e4fa-485e-8232-b7cbad0518f8","cardTitle":"信息的等价性"}},{"type":"text","text":"是指通过一个信息可以推导出另一个信息，而互信息则存在低互信息（低关联性）高互信息（高关联性）。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"79487281-d9dd-47dc-b0f2-77a90fdeff71","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1941de48-5401-4a14-8a8d-9385dfae983c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d","cardTitle":"信息论"}},{"type":"text","text":"中，存在一个公式可以计算出两个事物的相关性，也就是互信息。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5a193bcf-f881-4dc1-82aa-0030d729fcda","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f2eb4f42-4cd8-4522-962f-bb77b1f83444"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"互信息可能是单向的，例如成功是因为付出努力，但是努力不一定成功。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1fc56a6d-5562-47db-a516-a97845a6f17e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b1fbd5f1-fc4b-4046-97b4-d7ebb11e98ff"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们要寻找的是高相关性的联系。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"468e7864-8b70-42bf-ae5c-c86bb5911fe6","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ced5d69-32f2-4e0b-a131-923fd406fa82"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"da444e38-c184-43fd-8d55-ccde391f7829","cardTitle":"信息的作用是消除不确定性"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7e31da90-c309-464c-8cda-b29f75e4aab9"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d","cardTitle":"信息论"}},{"type":"text","text":" 14"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"7d6112a0-8567-4395-9c46-5d07e0295065"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8fe9d69d-8150-4c32-9f13-a7512b766596"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所谓的引起共鸣其实就是双方的互信息较高。"}]}]}
cards.title: 互信息

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"281d0d52-ea00-4ffa-b6ea-5b80a33c3bdb","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"控制信息获取成本和信息量"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4f8e8836-4de8-467b-8395-7c961c169b41"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"开设赌局的人会根据信息量（哪个号码中奖）来设置信息获取的成本，例如 A 球队有 90% 的概率获胜，则会增加购买其赌注的成本使得获取信息的成本大于信息量本身，从而实现收入大于支出的稳赚局面。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ef8219b-adf1-4604-9204-9bbe18c9a0fa"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d","cardTitle":"信息论"}}]}]}
cards.title: 控制信息获取成本和信息量

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f1bcfe79-2538-4243-a24b-2fbdc2cff7af","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"哈夫曼编码"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e0b45797-7be0-4c0c-92f5-4827a6a16e3b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是一种编码方法，其核心原则是将最频繁使用的信息采用最短的编码。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"或是对最频繁出现的事物投入更多更好的资源。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"08405d33-4bf0-4571-96f8-48da51936c6e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不只是信息技术领域，在涉及到有限资源的分配问题时都可以使用哈夫曼编码的思路。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"69292258-095c-4ba7-a527-b1074864ca69","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"74df29c9-26fe-4e23-bc35-184458ea3ccd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习时前期可以广撒网，随着时间推移开始淘汰一些不感兴趣或感觉浪费时间的内容然后将更多资源向其他学习项目倾斜，这样既不会错失可能性也不会浪费太多时间。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ec1daed3-8437-4bcb-b058-111978fd64e6","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e2f5aed6-3280-40e3-a461-393e00f093e0"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fc2d0745-140e-4b85-9a2b-5a29baee3677","cardTitle":"在一个领域深扎，并不断扩展横向能力。"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"714a964f-e00a-424f-a673-fd4857e564d4","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"262a4ee3-827c-42cd-8904-ddca254dd34a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1be2b4a7-1371-4bb7-9240-37e024fe0ad9","cardTitle":"从多个领域切入学习更能发挥卡片笔记的威力"}},{"type":"text","text":"，并且学习多领域的内容还符合哈夫曼编码的资源分配原则。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"98d15c1f-03d2-44d3-a0d2-6b02a4d5551c","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ad40c03-b6db-4467-afe8-7325a5941ee2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在智能手机的键盘设计上就有采用哈夫曼编码，包括根据用户下一步可能输入的字符来动态调整按键的操作热区。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"57b0fd28-3146-44f1-8526-e263558012dd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在电报时期就有采用哈夫曼编码的思路进行设计的案例："},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"25cb66a6-145a-4854-bf2c-6e9c953b5706","cardTitle":"电报时期的数据分析案例"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"42ae6483-46ef-4eac-9e53-e8ba3cb99fc5"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d","cardTitle":"信息论"}},{"type":"text","text":" 07"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"98e4ff59-6b7d-489a-a680-cef8c148890a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"00039b92-d0ed-4d6d-a81c-b985e4eaf463"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在交互设计中也有许多例子，例如将最常使用的功能放置在最容易找到的地方，不过交互设计是个更复杂的问题，有时为了信息架构等综合考虑不会优先遵从哈夫曼编码原则。例如微信朋友圈入口。"}]}]}
cards.title: 哈夫曼编码

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"39ccb143-c231-42db-8e59-08a6f9e0ef2a","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"电报时期的数据分析案例"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3b978ac6-233e-4de4-bea5-6327f52dfc3b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"早在使用电报传输信息的时代就有人使用了数据分析来迭代设计方案。电报发明者在缺少数据统计的时代通过报社印刷设备的磨损情况得出了常用字母，并缩短了常用字母的输入难度。在之后经过数据统计发现他们的方案距离最优化解相差不到 15%。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"19464132-7f19-467d-8fbb-8a98e0137eba"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0d2152e5-9da0-4f88-8d3a-10fbab94faac","cardTitle":"《信息简史》"}},{"type":"text","text":" 448"}]}]}
cards.title: 电报时期的数据分析案例

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4c8f6131-6fe6-4b91-90ab-3a5132f95bf5","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息的等价性"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"851e6d33-80ba-40c2-85fc-db2c11126066"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不同的信息之间具备等价性，利用这个特性我们可以"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"742b8834-03c4-4b6c-b54d-21a684041b1c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8fa11d1b-78b4-4318-838b-3bdfb17013ee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"更好的获取信息"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4778eb4a-aea6-45dc-91af-d45d043b0b5e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"89a18a2a-036d-46dd-b20f-ec4a8d3f359e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过一系列已知的信息推理出未知的信息，例如苏格拉底是人，人会死所以苏格拉底会死"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"63f5a7c5-5c60-4c55-8092-62dcf25d8045","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"46e6599f-6f1a-4c6e-9551-b361fbb16bf3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"压缩信息以提高传输和存储效率"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"31183457-f524-48cf-a721-21b7b3146c02","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8e7ffa6a-b0a6-41b1-b8c5-dd25b58922cf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"很多信息本身不方便被压缩，此时可以转换为更容易被压缩的信息，在需要使用时再利用等价性还原信息便于理解。"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cf97a3e3-a99a-42ea-bf54-b173a6f72664"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d"}},{"type":"text","text":" 10"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"031505b2-c2eb-4abf-843c-1d0972182a5c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c9332d41-fc1b-4c69-bc9b-462fc92f8b80"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"等价性不等于相关性，相关性不能完全消除不确定性。相关性更多作为"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"09afcff2-e435-4c21-b41b-e60be9c534d3"}},{"type":"text","text":"的信息进行利用。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f6b168be-62f4-40e4-b98b-a37ebcc343e7"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d"}},{"type":"text","text":"30"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"27359e0a-1d04-43a0-b43c-c0f6aaa1e8d2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bacfe56d-d3cf-41dc-9b5f-80f38e75b284"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息的等价性在生活中的应用"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6dcf0661-0dae-437b-a6cb-8747f050fe5f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"27912052-7f69-429c-9183-64b25aec157c"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8e17198a-2546-4ada-b70a-053137ff81d2"}},{"type":"text","text":"就是一种利用了信息等价性来获取信息的方法，通过我们可以理解、已经掌握的知识来理解新知识。所以写作时可以多举通俗的例子来帮助读者理解。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"febd1357-a1b7-436d-8763-3d9d2053ee63","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cb0d934d-eac0-40cb-968d-5ef133d8bf9c"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1e44ae28-e313-4cd6-b4d7-715b0db1197a"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"426ea47d-d600-469e-9567-df50a1171a45","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5a9043e8-f57d-462e-b663-4edc4bd02f1d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过一个具像化的图像来记忆牛顿第二定律也是利用了信息的等价性，通过人类更擅长的图像记忆、更熟悉的符号来记忆更加抽象的概念。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"e4539517-0556-4451-81b7-2886e75075ce","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/acf64238-e8d9-4a5d-95f6-5cba29d71d27/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":493,"originalWidth":951,"alignment":"center"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dbda8bba-2e3f-4fd4-a9f1-c13db71fa5e8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总之，不同的事物都有各自的优缺点，利用信息的等价性我们可以根据需求自由的整合资源。"}]}]}
cards.title: 信息的等价性

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ad82c3d3-bbc6-49b3-86a7-e5626dd6e114","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息的冗余度"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5be7c37b-a2ab-43cf-a4c9-63b245f9f85e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"公式 = （信息的编码长度 - 一条信息的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"05f3c3f7-4c88-437a-9d11-3097f2e04374"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f5aac33c-cfb5-4ee3-9f7f-972dc82e2940","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b6d22742-3308-4c42-a9d0-149e9b016f39"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"冗余度的优点：提高信息接收的效率"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9e1012c3-a929-4049-9570-23e129d2050d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"33df383d-ee94-4f51-91cb-9406d3d830b5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"便于理解"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2d9f7d03-e42c-4c89-a309-cc3bffb6d2ce","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eb4c9f8d-7fc4-4ae5-b094-729595052e9a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"科普文章比论文易读的一部分原因就是科普文章有更高的冗余度，会从不通角度会举不同的例子来解释一个知识。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"33cdfe2f-80b4-48ed-b5fa-a94f86fb833c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"87291490-2a36-43fb-a14f-32bab7b8887b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"消除歧义"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"739e5bd6-2935-4175-b697-6b4397303828","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8ebc48b2-18a0-4832-9d23-4da71908059a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"906c4f60-5825-4089-85a6-3b380d3fdd9e"}},{"type":"text","text":"，非洲会说话的鼓中，因为「太阳」一词存在同音字，于是增加冗余度「早上升起的红色太阳」来消除这种歧义。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"94c6e3ca-fa07-4454-b285-a6f3aef06db6","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f6724a81-c0b2-4944-b3cd-94bb9e4d9b3c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"带来信息的容错性"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1d6c99c3-70be-41ee-8ae5-f94fde0b05c2","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"802bf096-bb1e-43cd-9708-0cd4f73c0a3f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"罗赛塔石碑通过将一段话以 3 种语言进行雕刻从而让现代人有机会破译其中的内容。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"69ac52d7-1e8c-4050-a2db-9ddcc03469e3","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/5c964a64-e147-4262-baf1-17aab432ebd6/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":4288,"originalWidth":3665,"alignment":"center"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2cb73458-caf5-45c4-8967-9560a0e356f8","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ce0f3099-9605-4f2f-bff5-a8ecfd561858"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"冗余度的缺点"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c0aa1fbb-574c-4c29-97c2-a35483b34de0","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0dd20b9a-3685-45ef-8e45-c785cc7ad7ee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"存储和传递信息时的浪费"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cc8c97ea-018f-4508-b5ff-706fc5912c14","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"25251143-c866-45f5-a3d1-98db8ad2e2cd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"考虑到编码的等效性原则，可以使用高效的编码进行存储和传输，使用相对冗余度高的编码进行阅读。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4bb8717c-8b32-438f-b82c-a24baedda863","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff9f1d29-e00c-4343-bc41-f96263f2d05b"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"16632fc5-5d21-4235-8079-0fde53bbbe20"}},{"type":"text","text":"、写"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7"}},{"type":"text","text":"就是一种对信息的压缩存储，减少冗余度，在需要的时候再通过参考资料来获取更多信息进行理解。"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d8a0abdc-9e86-44ca-b78b-b960e1002aef","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fe48c798-f582-4ee4-82d9-9978011ca198"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果信息中存在噪音（通常情况都存在）则过多的冗余度将让信息难以理解。这与"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"54f74a42-98c9-40ce-98df-da4a84f07eda"}},{"type":"text","text":"相反。原子化要求减少信息的冗余以消除歧义。"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1bbb45f9-5ad7-4829-91a2-bce917682d4a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d"}},{"type":"text","text":" 09"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"e70c1e56-3f96-43b5-92b7-9c67c7c7c1f0"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dcd338bb-230c-48be-803a-b2d08af2648d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"47c68b5e-8559-42d9-a3f7-e684854805bd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于生活与工作的启示"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"db56f3b4-0608-401d-9893-ea8756d5a78e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"564fbd35-a75f-4b67-b1e0-005c790261d7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"写作"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"06567807-fa33-4a17-9c5f-e7ac175c2843","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"368f758a-b753-4d5e-89e6-9dd42b3387f1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"多举例、从不同角度描述信息可以帮助读者更好的理解。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b0b15e6e-f594-4c68-bbc8-e4747cbd9594","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2b3310f4-d7fb-4105-96d6-eeb309382828"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"举例利用了"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"edc84b9f-e4fa-485e-8232-b7cbad0518f8"}},{"type":"text","text":"，通过等价的用户可理解的信息来解释新的知识。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6a1b5de1-31e4-4a03-a547-ddf8fac6d504","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ff523a9d-0629-4a78-bad7-62bac7835dad"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"写卡片来压缩信息，并贴上原文链接。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cc4f6c36-18b3-4f0e-aebd-c71bd3422d9a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa3cff31-63f4-46f2-83bf-4080804380a0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"语言精练，避免啰嗦、过渡冗余。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a35ea348-d13b-43eb-86cf-bdbefa4640b3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4046001f-8d08-46a3-b03c-e6f3c99d00dd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"数字生活"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b1a445a0-a541-4dd3-b8c1-7b4d4fb4c144","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5d4188d6-bf46-4f55-882c-2ca1bb74dbda"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"存储多个数据备份提高容错性。"}]}]}]}]}]}
cards.title: 信息的冗余度

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"cf819125-36f5-492f-aeb7-aa4e75cb0e12","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"组块"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"27aed9c0-c156-4263-ac0e-cb64e0a81acf","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"faddfdb7-7c12-4152-9247-9dc4a36a79fe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"组块是一个理解知识、结构化知识然后放到更大的一个结构中去的过程。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0b0f9e9c-1c92-497c-b455-a5097a81ff72","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4425ad02-6cc1-498b-86b7-5fb145c5e57e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"组块是将零碎无意义的信息放置在某个有意义的结构当中，从而降低记忆的成本。例如将 N、B、A、C、P、U、T、A、B 这几个字母组成 NBA 、CPU、TAB 这几个缩写就可以更容易记忆。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"80580442-07a2-456c-8c7b-fa7d81155fe0","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f1b3e6f2-fe96-44c0-9d50-16ebe22d090f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7e0ff3c8-f768-4bd8-b003-efec2a5cef3a"}},{"type":"text","text":"存在容量限制，而限制的单位是某个信息块。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8d345a07-4e7b-42a2-9988-4d5cef0e25d8"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/mKXiU/shi-yao-shi-zu-kuai","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/mKXiU/shi-yao-shi-zu-kuai"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a7008306-4237-42be-8ab8-64705c2d6312","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5ea13972-a110-42b9-90d0-a76327e1b32f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何建立组块"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1bab319a-1776-4238-a929-83fbac3776e3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3de0c023-c784-4a8a-b730-bd58eba24fea"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"保持专注，避免其他无关信息占用"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7e0ff3c8-f768-4bd8-b003-efec2a5cef3a"}},{"type":"text","text":"从而影响思考的效率。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6ce80a4f-06bf-405d-8c03-26b8e553b8ac","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8ebd0725-4488-4db9-ae92-e918a87f6998"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"理解要组块的信息，你需要能够独立的解决所学内容中提到的问题。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d6193fca-d10e-44ee-a5be-22421f376d5b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"66833d7d-621e-44fd-9bb6-36cbfb4ed16a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以利用"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"989780e5-5139-4c22-bc7d-49e368cc88ad"}},{"type":"text","text":"来检验学习效果。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"94499958-0830-4e52-b18b-596f2222f505","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2a4f3de3-da2b-4d10-9a51-b2b76b527ed4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"获取背景信息。前面的步骤只是让你知道知识是什么，而获取背景信息可以让你知道在什么情况下使用什么知识。例如将 Toast 放在反馈、提醒的一种控件下思考时就会对比弹窗等其他反馈反思从而得出其轻量化的特点并依此制定使用策略。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9bb6f4b1-7b61-4e52-b2fc-8d9211ccce27","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d668dfb2-c9df-4750-b8f6-cef3e290ddc5"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0a9b3026-acf7-4264-a096-1fac88047482"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"65b74837-4ba4-4466-87e3-c4c3b865945a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3c5787e4-e495-4f95-bd8c-48ad5c33e7a8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"完整的背景信息对于信息的输入更加友好"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"543c9849-0e0a-44c0-8eb1-1b686e802255","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"30b9e00f-9eba-4001-b3a8-381323d990d2"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d6f9fc71-ea9e-4dd9-b3bc-541cfa0b4099"}}]}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0889db7b-5622-4300-b51c-a21b2c8eb8e1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果对知识的理解就像是拼图，先了解拼图的整体再完成具体的细节有助于工作的开展，最终即便还缺失一些细节也不会对整体造成太大的影响。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"所以在接收信息前先了解整个的结构和结论是很有效的方法。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"67242976-c87d-450c-9785-e7670d2f41b3","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/649e6c32-bf5e-46ef-ba01-cb1b96aa745d/CleanShot2023-02-1723.10.20.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":598,"originalWidth":995,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"566fab98-f496-4568-ad19-d1da56172f94"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/uXutx/zen-yang-xing-cheng-zu-kuai-di-2bu-fen","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/uXutx/zen-yang-xing-cheng-zu-kuai-di-2bu-fen"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"04b7cfbd-17b0-4c4b-ae97-119fb22678a2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7823675a-9a08-441f-a896-eb644c7f285f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何改变我的行动："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f4e18f39-981b-4aa4-8abd-06278723a995","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"17c040c4-4c0b-4fc7-8049-54317b3fba60"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在阅读前阅读大纲和总结，如果没有则使用 AI 提取"}]}]}]}]}
cards.title: 组块

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3040318d-b89d-4cc8-bf8c-2ff12c88b0a8","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息的原子化"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0b44cd21-a3ca-41c2-b3d3-c5e4144c58ef","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c3905b5b-1ddb-46ff-8b76-77412a7c59d0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是什么"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4dd89ef9-2458-4005-b774-a7ac3e33dfbe","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8bf7691f-73a1-4f16-bdd0-b1bc83f1f934"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原子化（原文采用矢量化描述）是一个简化"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c72936bc-ab5b-4f6f-b93a-bcc946c7d5df","cardTitle":"编码"}},{"type":"text","text":"的方法，以使得编码更容易被学习和使用。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"223ce0ad-8f40-47bd-a7f5-77793573a576","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e9e63f6b-222d-4c66-89da-9f993b859b33"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从对象形文字、注音文字的发展来看，文字的原子化是指将符号中存在的共性归纳为几个维度，例如一个汉字就分为表意符号和表音符号这 2 个维度，通过不同表意符号、表音符号的组合就可以创造更多的文字而无需增加新的符号。英文虽然没有表意符号，但是通过读音符号组合而成的词根也是一种矢量化，例如 tallest、shortest 中的 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"est"},{"type":"text","text":" 代表最大级。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f3f12a34-f45b-4451-99db-70b48117b4bf","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"384f834e-839f-4151-bbb5-9718bf1b3cb7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"更多例子"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1db525fa-7014-433b-b6e1-b3a2e7523dcb","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f7ba8aea-3227-4e33-a544-8419b3ab2cee"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"cc764754-7602-4af7-9dff-3ca653e5d527","cardTitle":"设计系统提高产品一致性"}},{"type":"text","text":"，同时也让设计方案的编码更加简单、易于使用起到提高设计效率的作用。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"57376805-cda4-4fa9-a2e7-39685529b53d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"956b2407-a1a4-4b0a-a591-a9b3d66c6330"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3eb247a7-9306-4e3a-a118-5d69e0ffd795","cardTitle":"抽象"}}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"919607de-3df2-4344-9ae1-c9bc2bbc0e7e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a9aaf6b2-f103-4d3d-98db-cf8b7bc87c76"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"缺点"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6a09190a-d6e3-4438-bfb6-ae623bc1b379","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"11eb9e5a-0bc6-4866-94a8-f56d5120f6b5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"会丢失一些信息细节"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8289c6e7-be5f-4055-88cc-8161c09483b1","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4e4321ba-f7ea-4566-84d1-5076de309281"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如高考就是一个矢量化的方法进行人才的筛选，将人通过分数分为几个档位，但是很难完全代表一个人的能力。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"51301b86-f27f-445d-b12c-ca0b84e295fe","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"45e43e30-0bda-43ce-bb14-e2235fcae32d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"根据身高筛选运动员也是类似。"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f0aba69f-4d92-4f1d-906d-7ec5ea6786ad","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"204a8a34-710f-4d7d-9dee-9aeb560f693d"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d","cardTitle":"信息论"}},{"type":"text","text":" 08"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 信息的原子化

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"97b260ee-53eb-45f9-8ecf-6fdc2af88198","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"把新技术当成放大器"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"904d55e7-cde1-48af-9954-3ed6cf71ddef"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们在使用工具时有时是给自己装上了假肢，工具替代了我们原本的能力导致自身能力的萎缩。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c1be1c68-cd4b-49e8-bb8b-5ab3b05a1fc5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们应该把工具当成放大器，当成我们肢体的延伸，作为我们能力的扩展，而不能完全替代自身的能力。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"思考学习最需要让用户掌握的能力是什么，从而避免剥夺用户实践这种能力的机会。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9b765672-f43e-4da6-9eb3-424e75cff436","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6748c085-1d1e-42f5-a14c-67d5f7633c8f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如写作可以辅助思考，但不会替代思考。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f0074026-79f7-424e-9581-88271386a592","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97642c16-2633-4ac6-837d-3b9c293fbebf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./容错设计帮助用户学习%20d561cccf-7bca-40fb-ba3d-552e6351a960.md","title":"容错设计帮助用户学习","data-internal-href":"meta://card/d561cccf-7bca-40fb-ba3d-552e6351a960","edited":true}}],"text":"自行车辅助"},{"type":"text","text":"轮对于练习的影响"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7d04289e-e56c-490d-92ce-2896ff59a472","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9b1a6cd0-81a2-4156-bca3-49026ef803a9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如我用 ChatGPT 打造的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/2276d330-5b41-4d24-be68-ea13487264ff#59c3f615-8539-4c43-b4f8-081a2e1eaa34","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"卡片笔记助手"},{"type":"text","text":"是要来启发思考，而不是代替思考。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"11276d71-9c99-4b6a-97e4-84383a4503a1"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d"}},{"type":"text","text":", "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/326848978","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/326848978"}]}]}
cards.title: 把新技术当成放大器

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"cd4000e6-dad1-409e-8356-d6cbf1585d70","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"福格行为模型"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e6f656b7-b957-4b02-a347-d2e9352f88f7","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a2ff0242-96aa-4a58-9df0-9b4ccc24ca31"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"由行为学家福格提出的模型，其内容是关于某个行为的发生必须"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"同时"},{"type":"text","text":"满足以下条件"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"877d8c16-6e1c-49dc-aaa4-f4d75183de30","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d08f25f4-6705-4c5f-907e-505a369a585e"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./动机%20b203fec9-07ce-495a-9ceb-8743648ceeb0.md","title":"动机","data-internal-href":"meta://card/b203fec9-07ce-495a-9ceb-8743648ceeb0","edited":false}}],"text":"动机"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9e3b9323-2697-415d-82ae-d0cbb6bf6d79","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6d4905f5-7395-4bf7-ab55-453ab6c0002d"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./能力%208e068818-d2fd-4f23-b21e-a4d7ba5e986d.md","title":"能力","data-internal-href":"meta://card/8e068818-d2fd-4f23-b21e-a4d7ba5e986d","edited":false}}],"text":"能力"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a59e3358-07d8-470c-a21c-b59bd23369e1","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"450635fe-5296-41d3-aac8-4a0bf23fd905"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./提示%2065a51a78-9aa4-4949-9722-71be6efb5f27.md","title":"提示","data-internal-href":"meta://card/65a51a78-9aa4-4949-9722-71be6efb5f27","edited":false}}],"text":"提示"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"60a0ddd8-c7c2-4d87-81f9-2fa8f8fbd1d8","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ae715f95-09cc-4cc2-8dd2-d90fe5153ffd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"之所以要同时满足，是因为即便一个人有动机但没有能力也是无法行动，例如我想用英文阅读资料，但是能力并不足够。即便能力和动机都满足，但缺少提示也容易记不起来要做，例如每天锻炼肩颈就经常忘记。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"52da9ceb-d8f1-4d04-b545-aeab58d21469","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8100bfb1-bb02-41a2-998a-cb941d3cd812"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"他开创性的将人的行为从个人品质（例如毅力）的偏见中转移到更加科学可操作性的指导中，认为一件事能否实行是一个"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"行为设计问题"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"67605c7a-9c22-4c01-a6e8-c8f30c6714be","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"42289d4b-2366-4eb9-b191-c76dbecdd509"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"05442efe-eaf7-4368-9579-16dc4d088274","cardTitle":"《福格行为模型》"}}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"8872eb4b-f43f-4e85-bccb-599b827d8f5b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"019c14c7-cd7b-40ff-b6fc-07b28ed7fca2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"之前我认为"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d7894f5a-90fe-494d-85af-2a8803c5ca4d","cardTitle":"工作强迫是学习的动力之一"}},{"type":"text","text":"，但其实还不够，除了动机还需要能力和提示来推动行为。"}]}]}
cards.title: 福格行为模型

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"91df0702-d74b-4ddf-b216-7ea315087790","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"工作强迫是学习的动力之一"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"adf043d9-30dc-4257-b85b-fa94089f91bf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们经常说兴趣是最好的老师，但很多时候对自己有价值的事情不一定是自己最感兴趣的，所以我们要"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"放弃只能用兴趣来驱动学习"},{"type":"text","text":"这个想法，多利用工作和生活的强迫作为学习的动机。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"297e6233-729a-45de-b684-bb16e1a687a1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"From 如何成为有效学习高手 - 许岑"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"25d1c25f-1ec0-400e-96eb-7a77890c1cfb"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9d2675b3-2a1e-4980-98e9-14c3d6c40f02"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"面对工作完成任务的强迫，人们努力解决问题的动机是否来自"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"931b7340-2c2c-4e41-989d-80310c7b70d3"}},{"type":"text","text":"的需求？因为不希望这一切失去控制。另外提升工作"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c77e61f0-5e3f-47ba-b5a6-b5461de3a8f2"}},{"type":"text","text":"可以得到同事的认可满足"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"cce8a953-9092-40ca-a3c9-fe6c5bdeb97b"}},{"type":"text","text":"的需求。"}]}]}
cards.title: 工作强迫是学习的动力之一

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0fc8f3a9-0157-4810-baf4-0fe27bd18bc3","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"内在、外在动机是一个连续体"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f4c71721-2b2a-4b38-a99f-6463726c3e87","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d05fe8aa-3b4e-441d-8954-4c46466bea62"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"652dbe65-439c-4e39-93a9-0232b2a9d387"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b0b986e6-b720-4ac2-937c-580cfe3078da","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"60949bfb-019c-48de-8c09-84edb5db1eda"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"外在动机"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0e775558-f694-4887-875f-1de08e6ef21f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9644b977-b9bd-49e5-ba88-cacc58894710"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"外部刺激对于行为的影响，例如很多工作是为了赚钱而不是兴趣。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f50159e2-268d-429c-97d3-e7d0bcb01d8b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52b1a083-1c3f-4a9a-9aa4-b101a520c727"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"内在、外在动机并不是独立的两个极端"},{"type":"text","text":"，可以认为是一条线上的两端，他们可以通过某种方式进行转换。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"91e70b94-c1bf-41fe-a91b-5f3b783996e6","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f2478b7f-f0e7-4b9e-8a94-477ff3c3e4de"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如一个男孩在父亲的夸奖的外在动机下学习骑自行车，但过程中慢慢爱上了自行车带来的体验，转而由内在动机驱动下行动。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"182c7ca2-095e-4c59-b285-499eeb268dd3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c21e33d-1b67-4d32-bec2-addbd02cf119"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4136d5fd-b0ec-4a81-9110-bca19716f884"}},{"type":"text","text":"P60"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 内在、外在动机是一个连续体

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4307dd28-9815-49ec-a506-113032b881ce","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"专注于过程以避免拖延"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cf2d74b7-9fb7-47ce-b7d2-db7edec2cb01","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a671341c-5c62-4cad-a946-cbf86c4fc5e2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"做事前若想到结果（可能对你没有太大的激励或者比较困难）容易造成拖延，因为它会触发你大脑中痛苦的脑区（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1324f6a8-48ae-4e58-bf6c-caef8430a4eb","cardTitle":"拖延症的神经科学原理"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ec4205a5-0909-447c-b3ee-1781597d02b9","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c17f1307-d2ff-4668-bac2-54d9d814fd10"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在短时间在专注于过程例如我要写作 20 分钟），可以有效避免拖延，这也是番茄工作法的工作原理。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"71c4e6c4-3e2f-4cc7-a77a-70e22648c513"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/30G1X/chong-lang-lian-xi-guo-cheng-yu-jie-guo","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/30G1X/chong-lang-lian-xi-guo-cheng-yu-jie-guo"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"cafcee99-cf58-41ed-8612-f1c2337cef70"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4f722cc5-aeb5-44f8-9eb4-54dc2b20eca3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这似乎与"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"54f638f2-9ddd-4e75-b517-be25bdbe4c09","cardTitle":"SMART 原则"}},{"type":"text","text":"中的目标清晰有矛盾？其实不是，在制定目标时需要明确，是为了方便行动结束后评估结果。而在开始行动前忽略结果专注过程可以让自己更容易启动。"}]}]}
cards.title: 专注于过程以避免拖延

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bc53759c-956b-4ee5-b9a1-bc8ffb31711f","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"拖延症的神经科学原理"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a674824d-4862-4791-8bc3-0711237cbd61","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e53e45a4-6443-4ea4-9af9-0716bca629e7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原因"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"eef99ece-b1f1-45bd-a90c-27450dca2f94","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c0292cde-7c14-47c1-a34d-808c047e6de1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们在面对一项不情愿做的事情时，就好像是你激活了大脑中有关疼痛的区域"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"c72a45f1-358e-4a2c-a4f5-31a7c44f4900","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/b2715405-aca1-404b-8be3-fa3979558ae8/CleanShot2023-02-1200.41.50.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":537,"originalWidth":958,"alignment":"center"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2b25e202-3c99-44a8-a246-23230e0ea0eb","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"33944f44-34e9-4d3a-9993-5382be0a15f9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"此时大脑会寻找其他方式来转移注意力，以消除这种不愉快感"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"37358fbf-2a33-4cdb-91f4-d49e5e4a94b9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如当要坐下来看书时，这种痛苦的感觉让你转移去社交平台中娱乐来获取短暂的快乐。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"c328d2f4-ac52-4079-ae4e-ccdd22aeb811","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/4d71fb9b-df73-49c9-acaa-b875e166c545/CleanShot2023-02-1200.42.05-2x.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":535,"originalWidth":956,"alignment":"center"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"39a5ab4b-1a17-4889-a8b3-3505e5962d76"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"解决方案"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a9ed9da6-a74c-4d02-923d-47f579401102","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"05cd1234-ecdd-4fb9-93fa-8345c51752eb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"研究发现，在真正开始做这一件事情后，不愉快的感觉很快就会消失"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"52ffa0c8-c850-4fd5-acdd-b488ba06cb19","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"760dee24-0e5d-42ba-a47b-d73c0485b585"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0da2bfdb-316e-4e21-af83-d71eaad7e6d9"}}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"47ef14ae-95ec-4105-b12d-c2a8fbca0b22"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/learning-how-to-learn/lecture/Dci3o/a-procrastination-preview","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/learning-how-to-learn/lecture/Dci3o/a-procrastination-preview"}]}]}
cards.title: 拖延症的神经科学原理

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"64439bee-d8c3-4624-8094-639a40c49d63","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PaLM-E 多模态语言模型"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"feed2049-5f4e-43c8-b970-9e1d3c0191ac","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cc60b9ac-e5db-45e2-a85c-859f4318abd7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以识别真实世界的语音、视觉信息并通过语言模型进行处理，在"},{"type":"whiteboard","attrs":{"whiteboardId":"ef954852-b8ea-4b5b-96da-2bd594cd815c","whiteboardName":"AR&VR&XR"}},{"type":"text","text":"领域有很大的应用空间。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7132e433-c8a9-4be7-b3e9-e62dfa9a7f6a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"79ecec68-8173-4adb-bc7e-eb20471ce433"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a995549c-2230-4613-8538-347d182061d0","cardTitle":"计算机需要获取情境信息"}},{"type":"text","text":"，利用此模型可以结合物理世界的视觉信息和用户的文字、语音等指令来执行任务。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b125d9bb-6f0e-4e48-ab4e-578bc6b334df","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"afc0389a-b839-4110-ac18-6e81d8b09333"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如用户面对一栋历史建筑时可以要求 AI 介绍其历史。"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0e5537a5-a093-49b0-a5cf-12c3497ae5b8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考资料："},{"type":"pdf_card","attrs":{"pdfCardId":"b14fa91e-bd06-49a0-a1a4-c11b6afa4820","pdfCardTitle":"PaLM-E 多模态语言模型"}}]}]}
cards.title: PaLM-E 多模态语言模型

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1c4ae824-6f08-4e52-a1c4-ae1cb82a475f","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"先难后易"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3bdecd26-0790-45b0-b408-7ba43e065833","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e01448e8-3ab4-4df3-9b66-adeaf0223ba1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"考试时可以先从难题开始做起，然后如果遇到阻碍则迅速转去做其他题目，不要停留太久"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6f10491f-fbe6-4161-9531-d24ed0453862","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0c8a77c2-2938-4b06-a6d7-cba06d7c8e84"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"此时你的大脑会在后台继续尝试解决这道难题"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"63b8e49a-ca9c-4fcb-8764-fca6d01d31c8","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7028fab8-65aa-42ab-a85d-37fc42331219"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这会触发"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a4e7f587-eea4-4e80-a0a1-464098714749","cardTitle":"交替学习"}},{"type":"text","text":"模式，让大脑的机能得到最大的利用"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a8a576ce-4815-48ce-a59e-bbee969ba2da"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/mZHgA/xian-nan-hou-yi","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/mZHgA/xian-nan-hou-yi"}]}]}
cards.title: 先难后易

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"fe16aad6-28fd-49f7-84df-afb21c292744","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"交替学习"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"07c1548f-970d-4432-b2de-f121da605537","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0a519438-1e6b-48a4-9148-6d46f73933fa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在学习一个领域的知识的同时学习其他领域的知识，或是用不同的方式学习同一个领域的知识（例如通过听力、阅读、写作等多种方式来练习同一个单词、语法）"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"51e3a97c-3c9c-40b1-968b-d4641aa50f68","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bd9ba134-76c4-4fbb-820b-e31bfce80693"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"交替学习有助于打破思维定式，通过链接不同的知识可以产生创造性的想法"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"02c44605-7d0b-42e1-829e-aef56cd0e6f2","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"342f1cf1-31cb-4237-bc0d-58c218abe303"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1be2b4a7-1371-4bb7-9240-37e024fe0ad9","cardTitle":"从多个领域切入学习更能发挥卡片笔记的威力"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b749bed1-0057-4bda-8fbf-41894dfda005"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"认知科学认为，交替学习可能有助于"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8e17198a-2546-4ada-b70a-053137ff81d2","cardTitle":"学习迁移"}},{"type":"text","text":"以对某部分知识小块反复利用，从而提高学习的效率。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"00797c6d-d6d9-4309-9383-7667823a0216","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"怎么做"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0a655386-5266-4e52-8d18-e5843e4a5901","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"72bc8c23-7117-4f99-b923-0e7fa1155db6"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"34173bfa-a7bf-41e3-89cd-3f801c9fa9ca","cardTitle":"发展多个成熟的技能"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d4c4325e-1c00-4370-b7e1-e327903ca881","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0cbf44f7-569c-4370-b46c-2e7bce0d4dab"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以同时阅读不同领域的书籍或者学习课程，但要注意这些内容之间的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./信息正交性%20764cbfa7-d40a-463e-a4ee-8048a85d1114.md","title":"信息正交性","data-internal-href":"meta://card/764cbfa7-d40a-463e-a4ee-8048a85d1114","edited":true}}],"text":"正交性"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d9e6efb0-e262-41fd-be52-f7209d6b33a8"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/qfC6K/guo-du-xue-xi-yi-zhi-si-wei-ding-shi-yu-jiao-cha","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/qfC6K/guo-du-xue-xi-yi-zhi-si-wei-ding-shi-yu-jiao-cha"}]}]}
cards.title: 交替学习

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f5720680-bd2f-4bba-ae8b-be528cb6a1e6","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息正交性"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3dff90f5-6bd2-4a03-ae73-f5f7978ecc5b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cf9dea2a-df56-4252-aa46-8df8c76f9a9b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是什么"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5a5dcea7-1a54-47c8-a925-eeda2b7c6e23","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8079ec9a-37e2-438a-bc41-1427b8d21cfd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息的正交性是指相同的信息不能消除更多的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./信息的作用是消除不确定性%20da444e38-c184-43fd-8d55-ccde391f7829.md","title":"信息的作用是消除不确定性","data-internal-href":"meta://card/da444e38-c184-43fd-8d55-ccde391f7829","edited":true}}],"text":"不确定性"},{"type":"text","text":"而是需要利用正交信息的组合来达到更好的效果。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f78b559d-28cb-4719-b8c5-2f2302ffd27b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f2f70ee3-f007-4f25-9424-4b47cc5e6c1a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息的正交性和传统力学对比可以更加容易理解"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"474529d6-4105-4fa5-97b2-d9b6ed6b9077","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a447d020-01f1-4623-b491-5946bc121457"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"向同一个点施加能量时多次做工可以击破一堵墙，而相同的信息则不会有更多益处。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8bca1476-56e1-421f-8fc1-c3e828f9bc12","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"02e6c9ef-e225-4fcc-88d8-3c3c1716e245"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在对物体作用力时，需要消耗能量，但是在传递信息时不需要消耗传播者的信息。"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"42d054f8-7746-4e9c-86c3-64e9d119b840","src":null,"fileId":"dedf1d81-1e79-4617-b430-5d2e94b0090e","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":566,"originalWidth":1080,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"638b8c3c-8fb5-4df0-a901-65bc77b915df","src":null,"fileId":"b3c7b99d-b7a9-474f-a3e7-426d2064adb5","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1250,"originalWidth":2027,"alignment":"center"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d2c002bb-6a0c-4fa7-8be0-d30e0bacffd5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0bcb0253-24e5-4e76-8b0d-e17888a106fd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5d64bb0a-827c-4046-a264-7a7b5350350d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9a65fe99-9a6b-4064-9833-8d6492277277"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"正交性可以更多的消除信息的不确定性，从而传递更多的信息量"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"eb4b380e-7650-4ba9-a018-ca12ab3b4496","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"13be71e6-88a5-4481-a904-56913f026ce8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如简历中想要体现某个能力但却使用了较多重复的案例，这就造成了不必要的冗余，此时可以利用正交性选择不同维度的信息来体现自己的能力，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"例如写一下自己业余的项目和爱好"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"477885a6-c863-4fbe-880e-3a8104a3b676","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c7cd0ab-f723-40c5-8c4f-1aab6959ec5b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如在语音识别领域，一个方向是提高语音识别的技术，另一个方向则是利用语义分析结合前后文来消除不确定性提高语音识别准确性。"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"09ddb5f7-212a-4db4-94de-30d654b91c84","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"359b6c67-76c7-42eb-99bb-cc7a354e1e83"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"怎么做"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7cb3271c-b623-42ae-b76d-f57604f50d59","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"536dab7a-4960-4eb1-a58a-81faa55e5109"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何找到正交信息"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b39f8ea4-d3cd-4859-8b57-78c4e1c690a5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"caf141e7-6f0e-429e-838d-5c3057477f51"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"选取不同信息源的信息"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1e0feb72-8360-4a7f-ad61-85cb76aeceb1","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"42a2e738-906e-4b3f-bf3f-d725098c8113"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"注意不同的新闻媒体可能也是同一个信息源，因为媒体可能互相引用内容"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f3c65521-997e-4002-975d-7b2fedc5412a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"253941c3-61a1-4e79-a24d-66b3614a7b71"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"避免反复使用相互嵌套或者相互包含的信息"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d04cf8c4-0d1f-4800-81ec-161a872cb3ed","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"32f44da4-c632-44ea-aa1d-5cfbe3410924"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如前面简历的例子，不同的项目经历虽然是不同的信息源但是存在内容相互嵌套、包含的情况（项目过程大同小异）"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1a03350a-2a6b-4584-a251-f47c144cd624","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dddcdd80-21e1-4713-bc13-f004aa3269f0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"看问题可以尝试用不同角度进行思考"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2bf3e40e-3645-4241-86ff-bbc7760ae114","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ad6d75a7-a6e3-4d74-b606-7464029d51cc"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1bd5cafc-0bea-4eed-b97e-506e52ece07a"}}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f47d38a8-cce7-4a39-91c7-2cbbfdc2db0b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0979b663-8599-4084-b66b-aa1875a33342"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"思考信息组合效能的最大化"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f7188ca4-79ae-4b2f-8abb-6018f2858c83","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"21bf1d70-9d9f-47bf-9052-bb4ae0bf9fd2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"选取信息时不能单独看效能而是要组合起来看"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cacc732d-49be-40d6-ac65-59b6c36769fd","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"66c9b19d-9b21-44df-aaab-e9944ffa8997"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将自己的信息源全部罗列出来，按价值大小排序选出第 1 名"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6f0c46e7-7f64-4dcf-bab7-0187f01d4e99","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"88e9cbc4-365a-4c34-a6d5-c35d0e06fd51"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"在第 1 个信息在使用的情况下"},{"type":"text","text":"，对剩下的信息继续排序，选出第 2 个信息"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"19c41ca1-86a8-4246-97cc-87bdf3911674","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5d12bb7c-bdc7-4f1f-b8f4-149c5d5bb158"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以此类推"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"627a2f4d-bab5-402a-b0c7-ff10b0243557","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b8a69234-5bcc-4605-9ca0-f9097cf11754"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"科技和人文的十字入口"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8c9a19cd-d801-463c-8531-4a9aba0eb65f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ba0e0e6-d3b6-4051-b81a-af689a48000a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"就是一种将 2 种正交性很强的信息进行组合获得的强大力量。"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"67f85aac-3a96-4664-aa04-0d6538465e80"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9bd3b497-c149-4f63-8ffd-19fd09bed5bb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何利用信息的正交性"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e780984f-6fec-4a91-8063-913b5492cc0b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d52c403b-3804-41bd-ba47-6112eb6c9740"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"34173bfa-a7bf-41e3-89cd-3f801c9fa9ca"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"53282af2-9cd0-465c-a0cf-b92f1da1aea3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"db3c94c3-20ef-4b61-a4df-99dbe6aa3f9e"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a4e7f587-eea4-4e80-a0a1-464098714749"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1a4f51ec-58c4-4654-a6f7-7c4785470c22","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9a5e1478-191b-4b04-babb-67d06416cab5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在设计流程中，通过竞品分析、数据分析等多种信息源进行设计决策，而不是盯着一个信息不断挖掘。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e0986c1f-de99-4109-8db8-b092557ec54a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0dd0ebda-dbec-4e9c-8c0c-1cf8a44d9999"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4a211073-8125-4b6d-9030-3dd6f45f5b5e"}},{"type":"text","text":"加强记忆。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bc710b33-88ba-4df5-964e-5b4ab9414c40","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ce3dd287-ab93-45ce-ab06-42dc20c892c3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大脑真是一个设计紧密的机器。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a4dae1f2-ce4b-4ecc-9560-e765fbe6cf60","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5b8f04d6-498b-4a41-ab4d-eb2b7b243def"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"多和其他人交流想法，不同人的观点更容易形成正交，最好是不同领域和不同专业的人。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"263ef4ab-f73a-4765-8587-8b4801af290c"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d"}},{"type":"text","text":" 13"}]}]}
cards.title: 信息正交性

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f48aa7e1-6e5e-4540-aca2-fc3c2f9a00bd","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"多重编码"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ba97066-6a1b-4d90-baff-b7b18d081e27"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1971年，心理学家艾伦·派维奥（Allan Paivio）提出了双重编码理论，语言和图像分布存储在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9be47ea3-af35-49cd-8c1c-8a13dd575130","cardTitle":"长时记忆"}},{"type":"text","text":"中。如果一个单词不只提供字符，还提供句子、图片、声音甚至不同人的声音就可以加强对这个单词的记忆。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c11ce79-990a-4093-82b1-d25ad2daa77e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不止可以降低理解难度，还可以利用"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fb740c7c-4130-435b-85ab-1f20463607ff","cardTitle":"动态媒介"}},{"type":"text","text":"创造更丰富多样的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c72936bc-ab5b-4f6f-b93a-bcc946c7d5df","cardTitle":"编码"}},{"type":"text","text":"来提升记忆力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b8addd4a-1442-4019-9cf4-1f132b70af90"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/86657258","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/86657258"}]}]}
cards.title: 多重编码

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2f72b564-5e19-48d9-9ed9-54625bab6a1b","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"置信度"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bac9ecbb-adc7-4679-ad5f-cac619f2a9e3","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"373a0b8e-e831-4759-bac1-adef7d30aba3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用来衡量某些事物的可信度"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1ddd1a20-02a9-4633-b432-8104795d89c5","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"65337f39-e0cd-4ddd-8187-adafadcfe5dc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"需要达到一定的样本量和随机性才能达到准确的置信度，或者说一件事情被重复的次数够多才能有更高的置信度。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cc99ab3c-f19b-4fe3-b356-5aced88a96d5","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1b1c8387-32a8-4c2b-b78c-b98b303d00e7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如投掷硬币来判断硬币是否均匀不能抛 10 下有 8 下是正面就说这枚硬币不均匀，而是要投掷 140 次左右置信度才能达到 95%。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"00d73dba-6a4c-4ec3-9fab-7c8f94f95faf","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ed3faa49-fbaf-44bd-adbc-fbbe8c85d9fe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通常来说置信度高于 95% 才能说这件事情可以相信"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ec561139-6125-4c82-b67b-787313f1b59f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0d36ccc0-9dd7-47b8-86d8-98471a2db326"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d","cardTitle":"信息论"}},{"type":"text","text":" 16"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"0b3a930c-bb0c-4e47-bee4-5d8610173131"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bcd2a4f1-1bb8-4f4e-8d4c-1217f47c2654","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7e6a54e6-65a2-42dc-880a-308d72143333"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们在总结规律时要小心犯「过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1ed2806f-7a14-477d-8320-dabef96f331a","cardTitle":"拟合"}},{"type":"text","text":"」的问题避免将小样本下的随机事件总结为普遍规律。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e120412e-1a73-4378-935d-de2f3ffe0ff1","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a2b56206-27b3-4849-91ad-3bc67261307e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如在业务中在数据量不足的情况下判断设计效果，更何况还可能存在归因错误"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"06fd3dd6-545d-432a-b9a7-1595e0bce950","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"40878104-3ee8-4cac-93fe-9157e4598f6a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"da444e38-c184-43fd-8d55-ccde391f7829","cardTitle":"信息的作用是消除不确定性"}},{"type":"text","text":"，置信度就不确定性进行了衡量，当达到一个值时就可以称之为较确定的事件。"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 置信度

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bedb2a82-d0b8-4d8e-9e9f-026dbff4f1d8","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"互信息通常会被率先找到"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0203bd25-1f72-46fd-b3bb-3dd4b3688617","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6ab4dbdf-1288-4d60-bb32-7f28cbc4aa70"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"da444e38-c184-43fd-8d55-ccde391f7829"}},{"type":"text","text":"，而首先发布的信息消除的不确定性更多，后续的相关信息都是对于此信息的解释、扩展等价值就相对较低。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f7479ed4-0ef2-418d-83ca-cb01242a90bb","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"feaa9564-35a2-4630-9411-df947e3803d6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"AI 的解释是人们的注意力有限，所以会优先寻找价值最大的信息，而剩下的信息价值就会递减。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8e475741-b8de-420c-8bc3-c26cffc715f9","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"017907f0-fa5c-400d-ba85-b820c83ce9c6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"AI 的另一个解释是信息在传播的过程中会出现损失，所以信息源头的信息具有更高的价值。另一个是信息源对信息有更高的控制性。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b781e5b0-dc9e-4816-aa8b-1a9885820e8f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"94160f90-5bd1-4ffa-92e7-79c3147b33e9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果某个信息已经被其他人抢先发布也不用担心，可以利用"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"764cbfa7-d40a-463e-a4ee-8048a85d1114"}},{"type":"text","text":"找到与这条信息的正交信息来创造新的价值。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ce8a5921-a6af-4b87-992f-3188f87dee5a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"908ecf2f-17c4-4e95-b11f-ecd9c290a8d6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"697909cc-84ff-4302-b978-450139f15884"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5885e16c-a684-4f85-970a-62a81619ff9a"}},{"type":"text","text":"等例子。"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"042075a9-4fcf-4e47-9d2d-c3283ddeae71"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d"}},{"type":"text","text":" 15"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"ea550c1a-59d2-4cb3-86f1-4cb9f446e2e4"}},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"43a08896-ecae-4c8e-ab62-b37c9cbdda76","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"782fc016-287d-40dd-97b6-65b2ed78c110"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当看到一个有启发的新知识时，可以尝试和其他领域的知识进行结合，尝试产生新的观点"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dadec563-b222-4fe4-a2e2-0ef876be8e8c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1e30f6fb-05c0-45bb-bd14-accf6cc76ca9"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"965c051a-bc9a-42e4-b001-942ae420289f"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a73f96f7-4d73-4bba-af6e-660ac1790425","folded":true,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fe92f7b4-291c-40fb-96a9-ad82cc883083"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如这条推比较受欢迎，就是利用了信息的正交，从人类学习的角度来思考对于机器的学习"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"c40f3ab4-9adf-402d-a3b5-2b8e02f03c3e","src":null,"fileId":"def4ca60-8d2b-4880-93a7-6a852668b0ee","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":476,"originalWidth":591,"alignment":"center"}}]}]}]}
cards.title: 互信息通常会被率先找到

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4a66f2dd-7962-4622-8a81-4c41117d4256","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"低频信息更容易被丢弃"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"65056e5a-bb8d-4236-a47b-44bbfc2be0ae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在信息的压缩中会使用"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"86f95cdb-1476-4257-8be1-bba01c23f318","cardTitle":"哈夫曼编码"}},{"type":"text","text":"等原则对高频率信息进行编码，以提高整体的效率，而低频率出现的信息因为需要单独处理不容易形成规模化效应，所以经常被忽略，这也是现实中异类不容易被接收的原因，以及在开发流程中「定制开发」相比「复用模板」更让人生畏的原因。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"12f13968-3310-4b12-b507-876220fa9c20"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"af17c1dd-3e58-4e01-9cbc-8f4873cc8d5f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"读"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d","cardTitle":"信息论"}},{"type":"text","text":" 12 有感。"}]}]}
cards.title: 低频信息更容易被丢弃

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d00f4110-2df4-4842-95a1-56b874f472b2","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在一个领域深扎，并不断扩展横向能力。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"ca050deb-db86-43ae-afbb-b05e688527e3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ba4f001-c5ff-4174-84db-9268fb786f0e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MTA2MDQ2NDc","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-12-01 13:52:27"}]}]}
cards.title: 在一个领域深扎，并不断扩展横向能力。

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"148a925c-0cb3-4228-ae67-9c055041943d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息增量"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e30ac70e-c933-4377-934e-e1dedef18699"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"使用已知的知识来减少需要传输和存储的信息量"},{"type":"text","text":"。将 1 个信息作为「主帧」其他的信息只记录与其相差的信息，这样可以实现信息的无损压缩。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ecd99d81-b2ea-4b2c-8d0f-2c6d8923468d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用信息论来验证此方法的有效性"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5da02966-dae5-4a4a-a46b-18c65669c117","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"43361f2e-9cac-4058-99ca-fe9e235decac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"存储数字：2323、2332、3923、5020"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"edf890bd-e8c9-49bf-ba3f-c9f5ae9a0211","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9ab53a88-7a56-4291-b428-2ccde405db3e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"每组数字使用 2 进制需要 12 位也就是 12 个比特的信息量"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"855117ff-515f-4edd-842e-96af510e12f3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"28e9de27-b766-4e14-8312-6498e004835e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果改为记录增减量，则只需要编码：2323、+9、+593、+1097（记录当前数字与前一位数字的差值）"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e7389bff-86e8-49fc-890f-d18a16f12eab"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如许多国家的宪法或者地方政策都是用增量的方式逐步进行，从信息论的角度这可以减少各方利益的牵扯是小成本的促进事物发展的方式。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"566c21b0-62be-4ae4-a32a-29f9fb5ba043"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d"}},{"type":"text","text":" 11"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"0f7ddbac-ca24-44c2-a56b-1403c243690c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"28f61784-4bcb-4f82-8d90-913d823887a0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大脑认知的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"899f5179-783d-4035-807a-53e202e19ace"}},{"type":"text","text":"都是指前一个信息会影响后面的信息，但是使用场景不同，启动效应是指前面的信息会影响对后面信息的理解导致认知的加速或者偏见。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"346a3529-ae75-46c6-b8b0-1ad4bd887aa9"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8e17198a-2546-4ada-b70a-053137ff81d2"}},{"type":"text","text":"也利用了信息增量的原则，将新知识与旧知识进行关联与对比，这样只需要记住新知识相比旧知识的差异点从而提高知识存储的效率。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e6acf7c-1806-4bcc-9c3c-ca6a60c5ab86"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在设计过程中，我们经常会通过竞品分析、用户需求分析等方法来做研究，目的都是了解用户可能存在的经验，基于已有经验进行设计就实现了信息增量，让用户在现有知识的基础上使用产品降低了产品对用户的复杂性。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":null,"color":null}}],"text":"还有在 Web 设计中存在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/78e393cb-5c91-4070-a508-f7d572f0229f","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}},{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":null,"color":null}}],"text":"直截了当"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":null,"color":null}}],"text":"的原则（例如图中可以直接点击进行编辑，而无需打开额外的页面和弹窗），也是利用信息增量，让用户不脱离上下文，即可准确表达信息也不增加产品的复杂度。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"5e8dd8ac-64d6-4bfa-859b-e3ae21359686","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/LxMjHo20230706141950.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":638,"originalWidth":896,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6c7274ea-d795-4470-917e-14f4d7aaee38"}}]}
cards.title: 信息增量

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3ca3714b-fbad-4185-b148-51ba3085d322","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"平衡编码复杂度和长度"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"49fb5209-ce44-4020-a2b8-4db09d982e62","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"924da7a0-d0ec-4dc9-91b4-275b0f32a850"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用较少的符号则编码长度就长，例如 2 进制，这不方便日常交流。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e1df94f7-4864-4959-a8f4-2ce37ab10340","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"36e97acc-f9eb-4ff3-a8d0-32977cbc077a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用较多的符号则编码长度就短，例如 10 进制，但要求我们记住更多的符号，对工具所能录入的符号数量也有要求。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"54da193c-35fc-438a-a9ee-b833483c5fed","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f30119e-d0ad-4325-a497-6f9f51b51090"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d0a603ce-db99-4145-b8b8-37518d68e94f","cardTitle":"计算机拥有快速地模拟任何描述的能力"}},{"type":"text","text":"，计算机具备了提供多种符号的能力。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"52a86fd6-68d0-4a8f-8f15-0ea15ba98bde","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"03c49856-78ac-40c4-a0e7-66a542d350fe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"但不同的编码方式得出的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./信息的等价性%20edc84b9f-e4fa-485e-8232-b7cbad0518f8.md","title":"信息的等价性","data-internal-href":"meta://card/edc84b9f-e4fa-485e-8232-b7cbad0518f8","edited":true}}],"text":"信息是等价的"},{"type":"text","text":"，所以我们可以针对人类和计算机采用不同的、各自都更匹配的编码方向进行信息传递。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f342b8f8-e09e-4528-b081-614c4c998a2b"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d","cardTitle":"信息论"}},{"type":"text","text":" 05"}]}]}
cards.title: 平衡编码复杂度和长度

cards.content:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"371d287e-a549-4139-b88e-b16f31bf5de7","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🧰 Prompt 工具箱"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5098f1c8-ef48-495d-9762-6e8ec58e24c7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"收集常用的 Prompt 语句，方便迭代、管理。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a45ba398-3494-4036-aed0-d48b055177ec","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"72f3febd-540b-44b3-a14f-65f71cb58e23"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"修改语法错误"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"e0fedda2-59dd-4570-b94d-1f7072caa471","params":"!markdown"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"帮助我修改语法错误，并解释错误原因和正确答案："}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"57ab6bfc-45eb-4de5-995d-066988997182","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a3de3a7d-b612-49c3-a9a9-1180afbcb612"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习语法"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"f8b4631d-c8a9-4be7-8a7e-5135e07b68f6","params":"!markdown"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"请说明 {单词} 在下面这个句子中的语法作用，并且提供更多例句，以及提供 2 道英文翻译为中文的测试题（ 分别是 CEFR A2 和 B1 水平）并在我回复后判断我的翻译是否正确:{句子}"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"670f7f78-178c-429a-91ce-8c92dd7e3f63","params":"!markdown"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"请分析这段话，解释之中的语法知识并针对每个知识提供 2、3 个例句：
{句子}
之后，为了验证我是否理解，请测试一下我是否真的理解，你可以提供一个简单的句子要求我翻译。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3274361e-93e9-4c97-9140-42ae1c7f70aa","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f6d16172-a4aa-4faa-b663-bd4a72db281d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习单词"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"b8b55c8f-aff8-4f36-8a47-affa52536e51","params":"!markdown"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":null,"color":null}}],"text":"你是一个英语老师，请对输入的每一个英文单词做出如下处理："},{"type":"text","text":"
* 列出这个单词的国际音标、词性和词根词缀
* 用 CEFR A2 水平的英语对这个单词进行解释，使用英文
* 给出三条包含这个单词的例句，句子要求尽可能简单，常见且实用，并且在第二行附上句子的中文翻译
* 最后请用图像记忆法形容这个单词"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ca20b6f3-8ebc-402d-a1df-fb540a4044b1","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8c0236d0-b94b-42cd-84d8-3d3a105f201f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"翻译"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"37fe65ae-62f7-4b80-8a53-22a6e3eecd16","params":"!markdown"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"您的任务是将以下英文文字翻译成中文，并做出必要的语言修饰，使其更加流畅自然。之后，您需要解释这段话所表达的意思，并提供至少两个具体的例子来帮助用户更好地理解："}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a1cabbee-87a6-422e-9c05-9e9f9f55fc9f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"71b7d477-ee28-4b62-8730-12a29e2b4b2c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"邮件"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"2bfe7ef1-fcaa-4064-8c8d-d6733f67992b","params":"markdown"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"请根据要求： {要求} 写一篇邮件 {目的} "}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"59c3f615-8539-4c43-b4f8-081a2e1eaa34","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"81caab41-52e9-4625-b5cf-a5e17c612675"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"卡片笔记"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"c2e19ba5-c6de-4c43-af6a-95196352fa3b","params":"markdown"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"请针对这段话
1. 提出几个问题
2. 帮助我发散思考和其她知识的联系"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ee93e3cb-fb14-4dce-bceb-c728016a5e17"}}]}
cards.title: 🧰 Prompt 工具箱

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1f155ce9-cd5c-48ee-a12b-15bd28e7ec06","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ChatGPT 拥有复合能力"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4930f1c1-bdd0-480e-ba49-54f4eadddb1d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从信息论的角度来看，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"764cbfa7-d40a-463e-a4ee-8048a85d1114"}},{"type":"text","text":"可以消除更多不确定性带来更大的价值，而 ChatGPT 可以从不同角度来解释信息、获取资讯从而带来更好的用户体验。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c575a5c-39e7-45e4-900d-f7c4724a55eb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如在翻译时，用户的目标不只是翻译为自己可以理解的语言，最终目的是理解文本内容，传统翻译工具只能翻译语言，而使用 ChatGPT 时可以在翻译的同时要求解释、举例来帮助自己理解，还可以利用"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./计算机具备可交互性%20eaa5f279-3304-4e01-ab85-10a309cf9ed7.md","title":"计算机具备可交互性","data-internal-href":"meta://card/eaa5f279-3304-4e01-ab85-10a309cf9ed7","edited":true}}],"text":"交互性"},{"type":"text","text":"来进一步提问或要求 ChatGPT 向自己提问来验证自己是否理解。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"1b49f862-6392-4627-b8d0-e6d4e8f21a52","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/5519c2e9-2f67-40b8-a154-071154a16cb6/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1482,"originalWidth":1448,"alignment":"center"}}]}
cards.title: ChatGPT 拥有复合能力

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"17c15543-26fa-46ec-bcdc-f1847ddf5030","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"香农第二定律"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"47c9f8aa-e8fc-475a-b800-ee04fe08694f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不要超越信道的容量限制，否则效果会大大降低甚至没有效果。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6b6cee74-29b7-4a1b-b4db-6d71ee2b065b"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d","cardTitle":"信息论"}},{"type":"text","text":" 4 步骤"}}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ff2db255-8da3-43ef-85c3-dbe76e4a0867","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d3b8a00c-55be-4107-abc3-85a32a9a53d3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"增加信道数量"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e7c96e91-8068-44b1-ba63-fc15835dc9d2","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9da0ff69-d102-440d-b191-c0c2e7ee41d0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从不同环境、材料中学习更能发挥"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"764cbfa7-d40a-463e-a4ee-8048a85d1114","cardTitle":"信息正交性"}},{"type":"text","text":"的优势以及增加信道提到了信息传输的效率。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0d68bdf1-4277-4fcb-98b1-521a025ba228","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"16f3f0bd-b980-47db-808e-05e70a45e586"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"增加"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0f639883-1301-4361-b47e-8fcec99ac7e4","cardTitle":"信息的冗余度"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2cac0046-1f2d-46eb-98ea-85f5a5c68b48","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8189c1b8-2223-4361-b862-07b69671b876"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"写文章时采用「换一种说法」或者多举例"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0d2e832c-0068-4627-b9b2-53f17877d5f2","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1dbc51d4-b976-4089-a3cb-324c369b0a8c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以用户为中心的设计"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bf7a6d3b-122c-4044-bf29-4459444c907e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52e1df83-54a1-45eb-b96a-fcadd638eb02"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"研究用户并进行设计可以增加产品与用户的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"bc0d4bae-ba23-43f5-9cf3-6240e15deac5","cardTitle":"互信息"}},{"type":"text","text":"，避免信息传输率超过用户的接受能力。"}]}]}]}]}

cards.title: 语言学习的原则

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"400aded0-4214-479f-9ed3-d3a4c26f5f3c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过可理解的输入进行学习"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7add3cf2-51f9-44f7-9c25-7a7825a3dcc2","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"580d732e-f61f-4cfd-8a1f-49d029692e01"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"48b07270-7e78-4c85-b43a-0c080a001252"}},{"type":"text","text":"，而且还必须是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"可理解的输入"},{"type":"text","text":"，想象一下你用听播客的方式学习英语时因为你完全没有获得任何可以理解的输入所以即便听 100 个小时也不会有成长。相反，看视频将语言放在一个情境中再结合图像等多种感官信息，我们可以在反复一起出现的单词和图像之间建立联系。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5239130e-71ff-42a4-b87a-28f014d703a9","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cd128ce0-18db-40dc-b395-aff7c656df32"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可理解的阅读需要满足"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"生词率在 10% 左右"},{"type":"text","text":"，也就是 100 个单词中不超过 10 个陌生单词，否则将难以阅读。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"fb5c24a4-c1f2-43a5-8513-333c0e7a288e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ffb9072c-c7bb-4628-836d-39a7f3dba87e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"但这不意味着不用看书和查词典、学习语法，而是以图形、情境的学习为主，过程中遇到不明白的地方时再通过辞典学习单词和语法，如此循环。"}]},{"type":"embed","attrs":{"id":"14a8b86e-6d34-4882-b454-b7fbc2cf76f3","objectType":"note","objectId":"3875bd51-3dbc-4408-9913-cd3da3ea9d4e"}},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"bc31f328-a3b9-43dc-9327-f783b34ae352","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/70ee7cbe-ed02-49d0-9c95-bcdc0b7df930/CleanShot2023-02-2422.21.47.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":649,"originalWidth":977,"alignment":"center"}}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a4bcd77a-f421-4401-adbd-29d74a0ac1f0","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"214f2355-28da-4954-b992-5c036a4c0d93"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J_EQDtpYSNM&t=131s","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J_EQDtpYSNM&t=131s"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"a8c10cd3-8307-4510-af40-d1befed7a729"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d918815e-7829-4e4b-8eaf-dcbe3d81e0a2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习语言需要在目标语言和已知的意义之间进行关联。类似的，学习知识也需要"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./在知识之间建立关联!链接的好处%200a9b3026-acf7-4264-a096-1fac88047482.md","title":"在知识之间建立关联/链接的好处","data-internal-href":"meta://card/0a9b3026-acf7-4264-a096-1fac88047482","edited":true}}],"text":"在知识之间建立关联/链接"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"13d711fa-d49c-4612-9881-2392944c07f4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这是一个记忆牛顿第二定律的例子，老师建议通过将 "},{"type":"math_inline","content":[{"type":"text","text":"f = ma"}]},{"type":"text","text":" 中的 3 个字母分别用不同的英文单词进行表意来记忆（一只飞翔 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"f"},{"type":"text","text":"ly 的驴子 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"m"},{"type":"text","text":"ule），如果你不了解这 2 个单词则无法优化记忆，因为你做了不可理解的输入。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"a7b2cca6-0742-4215-aed2-c4ffae98f35f","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/4847cada-39f0-4578-ad56-1ac13593cb42/CleanShot2023-02-2722.26.39.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":493,"originalWidth":951,"alignment":"center"}}]}
