cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ae49fd08-0f64-425a-b4d2-d3dce3d50f86","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习和自己有关的知识"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"41c3da5f-7dcb-4146-9aee-25cee6befcb9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如当你看到树上的记号后继续往前发现一只凶猛的熊，你就很容易将这个记号和熊出没画上等号，因为这与你相关。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"3902d30c-ad2d-451b-b9f5-91cbc1f2e944","src":null,"fileId":"12581a52-8643-4c10-9e99-cb1b117f58f2","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":529,"originalWidth":993,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"784f37e5-d220-4053-9545-02390a129499"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://youtu.be/d0yGdNEWdn0","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://youtu.be/d0yGdNEWdn0"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"c12d0a4a-e832-4ec3-a487-8049c3370fc8"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4790ecce-0f08-4cdb-a39b-53323a6f58f0"},"content":[{"type":"pdf_card","attrs":{"pdfCardId":"d8949389-2372-4f54-b532-70285482f663"}}]}]}
cards.title: 学习和自己有关的知识

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"253a2684-3292-48a6-9950-836755a73d1b","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ChatPDF 提高了信噪比"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8db57c6c-7ad9-4b1d-b9bc-08817cfbd0ba","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"10c6361f-c593-4d88-b50a-d56acadaeed0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以往我们阅读时需要读完整篇文档，其中很多可能是我们并不关心的内容"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"130abede-d261-48ef-8fef-d9b3fcd7585a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e0c50324-4575-422a-b42c-66e22c4d023e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当你有明确的要解决的问题时 ChatPDF 可以用提问的方式快速获得答案，这样提高了"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4c46f480-59a1-472a-95be-18883c3479b0","cardTitle":"信噪比"}},{"type":"text","text":"提高了信息传输的效率。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c08e0eef-4a42-41e6-b1a0-bef7d4adcb79","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"390dbdee-e656-4a36-94e4-08cb0067dc85"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另外 ChatPDF 还会对内容进行概述（压缩）也降低了信息阅读的负担，但是要注意"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0f639883-1301-4361-b47e-8fcec99ac7e4","cardTitle":"信息的冗余度"}},{"type":"text","text":"还是有意义，这种压缩所丢失的细节可能会对理解信息造成不良影响。（根据"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"654a4e0a-6016-4cf5-9b8c-eeb7509406e3","cardTitle":"香农第一定律"}},{"type":"text","text":"存在一个最小的编码长度，如果过度压缩会导致信息失真）"}]}]}]}]}
cards.title: ChatPDF 提高了信噪比

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bbea8b05-a2c6-4209-b699-f1777de50810","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"降低噪音"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d4fed395-4b22-4e94-9321-62e4209049c8","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a5f2a7a5-7eb1-45ed-856d-33f97ee02763"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"根据不同的噪音类型来区分噪音，根据以下维度区分"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"20671ef4-32a2-45ee-957b-336cd40905b7","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f4b0b8a4-9d19-48d1-b685-bab5a3e1ad18"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息来源"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e461156b-ebb4-41f1-aabd-cb7f948ca860","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"63e3656a-96db-4e97-8f50-704d11aa47ee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是否已知来源"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cd3c7c88-c864-4459-941c-42eb6ad8897b","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d21fabc6-b609-4037-84c9-334f2ef2da8f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息规律"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b4b28c8c-0d67-4ff6-a046-b0b0a47d77d6","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ce8de98-3392-47a2-b060-25b8da4a90c7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"噪音是否存在规律，存在规律的噪音比较容易消除"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a97a541a-dca6-4c5e-874c-dcb6284b300b","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9f73684f-4707-4e54-b3cf-fb06ce21a9b7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"白噪音：指随机性强的噪音"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ba4dd5fe-7c35-4646-a916-fd9c3e382ac5","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b39757b3-a7fc-48ee-a009-8ffe4813ffaa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分解噪音，寻找最关键的噪音进行攻破"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6fcef5a5-d3b4-4523-b60c-ecb67aa93996","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"480439db-cceb-42fc-9e17-76f4ecff860d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如老婆和老妈掉进河里的问题，很难回答是因为要考虑的信息太多（才不是😅），可以尝试找到其中一个最重要的维度进行考虑、做出选择，比如考虑后半生谁陪伴自己更长或者孝道是否最重要。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a2c8133c-58f8-4d11-bfac-96aaf9c791d0","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ed702405-2eda-4e14-b1b4-ac021a674f4b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"利用"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0f639883-1301-4361-b47e-8fcec99ac7e4","cardTitle":"信息的冗余度"}},{"type":"text","text":"对比多个角度的信息来找到其中的噪音进行消除。"}]}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"319cc052-6b4c-4c49-9caa-9a5c62363c13","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"024c4eb8-f94b-4cd5-85b3-4b1bf90c9185"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d","cardTitle":"信息论"}},{"type":"text","text":" 19"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"151a09f3-eb1e-44c0-855f-bbd951ab7951"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"35a92423-a092-42e2-9b90-0dd09d2749f5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从目前的学习来看，在推特、Discord 学习英语噪音太强了，很难抵抗诱惑进行过滤，所以在实践中学习的维度要增加 1 个了，最新版本："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0bf12ec8-989a-4974-8b0d-4eab01581042","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a8b31acf-f34c-4b19-b1e2-2ca63a8b7ad2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"真实的语言环境中"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"84c02cda-0eef-4233-8cd1-ee40a0b8d696","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a61f7f68-4926-42d2-a813-ac62bc5fc18e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是自己喜欢的事情，愿意做的"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cc8033e5-013a-45ba-a5f9-efe06c38e386","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"49dea9ab-5fc7-467a-af7a-241229a02d6b"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"尽量少的噪音"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"142d2068-d280-4c58-a489-ab9bbbdd9474"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"推特、Discord 符合前面两个，但是噪音太多，可以尝试学习 React 的官方教程来学习英语，符合全部 3 个条件。"}]}]}

    • "}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"c16d0c53-9ea2-4b36-ae84-fca6609d2e68","params":""},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Please respond in the following format:

Please do not include the answers to the test questions in the response. Sentence: The professor tried to elucidate the complex concept to his students. Target language: Chinese"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0c7c7b48-e30b-4289-a3be-ae33f623ce66"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"Target language: Chinese"},{"type":"text","text":" 标记 AI 回复时使用的语言"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bce04cf5-02e1-4052-a1d4-a8b1d839742b","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目标融合"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e8970710-e70b-4db0-a624-acc33ff5ef37","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"226c2477-5591-42b1-a4d0-ab388bb92049"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是指目标和自我的融合程度，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"orange"}}],"text":"更高的目标融合则拥有更强的动机"},{"type":"text","text":"，不止认为是在做某个事而是认为是自我的一部分。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"91942cc9-3275-4000-b1f5-02777ad533ae","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ec2d648-dade-41ef-a8ca-57371f29070b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如认为自己在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"进行设计"},{"type":"text","text":"就是一种低融合度，认为自己是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"设计师"},{"type":"text","text":"是一种高融合度的表现"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9df159ed-0a7d-4ae5-a7e5-e5808e71e324","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"de1003fb-3ddf-42f1-a5a6-5e4ec6bf9e5c"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4136d5fd-b0ec-4a81-9110-bca19716f884"}},{"type":"text","text":"108"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"8b1c8331-228e-4464-87cd-502b3ccd4448"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"89eb6e17-151f-42cb-bb30-8d449cb030bf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目标融合也是一个"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"931b7340-2c2c-4e41-989d-80310c7b70d3"}},{"type":"text","text":"性"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"27f1579d-3ff8-4289-8975-036cc7b766bf","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"习得性无助"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"55e7c561-4c72-4a85-ab29-50ef5070cda8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当我们在面对被控制、丢失"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"931b7340-2c2c-4e41-989d-80310c7b70d3","cardTitle":"自主"}},{"type":"text","text":"性时，一开始会进行"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"476d0d0d-022c-48ef-aef4-8f53efe7535b","cardTitle":"逆反"}},{"type":"text","text":"反抗，但当反抗无效时，就会将这种情境下产生的问题"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"扩大到所有情境"},{"type":"text","text":"，称之为"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"习得性无助"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4b2cff2a-ea20-4305-bcb6-149d42016667"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4136d5fd-b0ec-4a81-9110-bca19716f884","cardTitle":"《动机心理学》"}},{"type":"text","text":"P85"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"98fa2f23-e124-408a-8148-94634cd5a11d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9572b68d-1f09-4430-a7d1-4f78fe78fe7b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"同样在学习领域也存在因为无法理解、掌握学习内容而产生的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8df813d1-a43d-4d93-9ebb-c0013bd1f76b","cardTitle":"解码失败惩罚"}},{"type":"text","text":"，所以利用"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"eaa5f279-3304-4e01-ab85-10a309cf9ed7","cardTitle":"计算机具备可交互性"}},{"type":"text","text":"让学生可以自主探索是一种比较好的方式。"}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a2ffbaa2-2208-45fd-84c8-716b1f4abc2e","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"选择「进攻型」挑战"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7f0f4ac0-70af-4646-ae52-ce14e4968052"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有两种挑战类型"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4ff75e8c-ceaa-4fd1-99cf-09cc80d1c369","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e26387e2-9860-4f37-94c3-661f25d80b5f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"防守型"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a69e85a3-c851-4064-b8dd-57415fc5c957","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"55be352a-57a8-40fa-b5cd-039dcc38e060"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"等着其他人给自己提出要求然后解决问题，同样也能获得成就感，但是主动权在别人手里"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e916ba90-d410-4d44-b1d7-7c4a59e56eb7","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b27c87b4-5928-4ff2-9307-7955d5943e22"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"进攻型"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"615dbb8e-70a6-4a2b-ad16-a5e3f4b1fcde","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"95b1fa42-46b7-4e1f-bf30-40ef085a80db"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主动出击寻找问题和机会，主动权在自己手里"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"47275a9a-a38f-4f22-9a61-f194ce5224e8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果一个人在具体的岗位上做某个领域的工作后容易陷入防守型的挑战状态中，可以通过夸大自己的工作范围，主动出击寻找发展机会。例如萨卡就参加许多未被邀请的会议来了解更全面的信息来获取挑战机会。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fcde4753-2df9-4e01-8aca-b7e10cf2d4d5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"来自"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c511d9ca-60d8-4e8a-a578-fc2a18ab1376","cardTitle":"《巨人的工具》"}},{"type":"text","text":"中的萨卡"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"629fdad5-1349-46f4-940d-da5b699ebe84"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f3974720-4bed-4fed-b1f1-53ad13061275"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如 ICC 工单平台的需求清单大多都是防守型的需求，自主需求则是主动型工作。工作中组长为了提高大家的积极性也是让成员自主选择工单。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"63cea64e-8d4a-4ef4-aa79-adb1a05cce4a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"体现了动机心理学中"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"931b7340-2c2c-4e41-989d-80310c7b70d3","cardTitle":"自主"}},{"type":"text","text":"对人的驱动力。"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b3098cb9-715c-4d45-8429-d9140a9b7cb7","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"模板可以促进知识的应用"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"beb8bdd4-41ab-48b8-8aff-bca12863f6e0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"思考的过程分为输入、处理、输出 3 大阶段。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fb6b468c-f595-4320-b02b-ece944735600"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我认为 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"aeea2c56-4050-4252-81c2-af84f8140412","cardTitle":"Heptabase"}},{"type":"text","text":" 在不断地让这个流程的运转效率更高，其中一个手段是细分任务。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7813d5f5-c9df-4719-87c4-07bebbe0fcfa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如比起常规双链笔记，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"aeea2c56-4050-4252-81c2-af84f8140412","cardTitle":"Heptabase"}},{"type":"text","text":" 在处理环节增加了白板功能，让卡片更容易梳理彼此的关系。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"caf051b0-5b99-44ab-9eff-797cd0e196df"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"而在输出之前，还可以细分出一个流程，就是「应用」。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ec5eb1e-715d-416b-b3d6-4f800d29c010"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将掌握的知识投入到实际的生活生产中去。而应用最好是加入工作流程，成为一种模板/组件。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"644fc3c2-66db-48a9-a20f-2e8a44a4c6ee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如使用 STAR 模板进行复盘。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d00fcacf-527e-4bb7-9495-86cf60a4e817"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这是卡片模板能够发挥作用的地方。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f74dd12-42d0-425b-9060-f3d1859c5258"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"73b7221e-e326-48e2-9397-316d50484a7d","cardTitle":"模板通过学习迁移得以复用 MjE2MDg4Mzg_20220418031222"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a1016cb1-bb08-429a-8879-7605ceb8c3c8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"@模板"}]}]}
cards.title: 模板可以促进知识的应用

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b9caa3e7-8026-49fd-b03e-dfb9951dc0ad","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计系统的分类"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6ff70d84-bb36-458b-b56e-4402cfcb5e54"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"领域型：例如 Material Design ，设计系统不知道自己面向的具体业务是什么，通常拥有庞大的设计世界观"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf15da42-889f-4bd2-aeb4-5419fec01bf7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"业务型：针对具体业务、产品的设计语言"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2071d1ac-c68d-428d-b19d-85ddc2dccc3f"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/39567628","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/39567628"}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0fa9e86b-5f19-4bd3-9123-b067bac953f0","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"情境带来了高级知觉"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"745c39aa-f91b-4554-af52-f32b0a250349"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与其说"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"44cad9e9-7015-4eb8-8dab-ac7aa88b955d","cardTitle":"高级的思考是将所有事物视为整体中的一部分进行领悟"}},{"type":"text","text":"，不如说是因为放在整体("},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c5f07ec4-0358-488a-b4c1-ecc160b0062a","cardTitle":"情境 Context"}},{"type":"text","text":")中，才带来了高级知觉"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b24a8a7b-c552-4015-ae19-46120f3f4476"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么这么说？请参考 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c5f07ec4-0358-488a-b4c1-ecc160b0062a","cardTitle":"情境 Context"}}]}]}
cards.title: 情境带来了高级知觉

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d5898aa0-64f4-4309-a7c2-e826c839cbe5","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"高级的思考是将所有事物视为整体中的一部分进行领悟"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"597ad987-f894-4b8e-b886-34dc3a0a6599"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最底层的思考是对事物单纯的知觉，高级的思考是将所有事物视为整体中的一部分进行领悟——柏拉图"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f8650289-ec34-48c8-8196-c5a596683003"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096","cardTitle":"《认知心理学》"}},{"type":"text","text":"2584"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"1aa194c9-fbb5-495c-9975-9bb451b0e766"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"24bea08d-9e5d-4ef7-8a08-3e4426376aa6"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"33d2d4c8-4a1f-451c-a702-c387154d8e5a","cardTitle":"情境之所以生效是因为提供了冗余的信息"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"550124c9-0a8b-4464-a2a8-851575dec3cd"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1be2b4a7-1371-4bb7-9240-37e024fe0ad9","cardTitle":"从多个领域切入学习更能发挥卡片笔记的威力"}},{"type":"text","text":"，因为高级的思考需要通过多个领域获取更接近整体的视角。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"29d47682-cf07-4441-a02f-6f099e7c4b9c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"那么，什么是「整体」？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a340a6b3-efa6-49c2-b93a-c91e49d65885"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"=> 是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c5f07ec4-0358-488a-b4c1-ecc160b0062a","cardTitle":"情境 Context"}}]}]}
cards.title: 高级的思考是将所有事物视为整体中的一部分进行领悟

Hepta 的社区在讨论的都是自己熟悉的功能；Arc 是我的主力浏览器，它的使用手册的内容也相对容易理解。"}]}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f8c45ff8-acfa-45a8-9112-032755ee5d12","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b2188923-6a14-40ab-8e4e-71c797a54ed8"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strike"}],"text":"重复观看电影"}]}]}]}

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"141752ad-7473-44ad-a9a1-aefbd02346b3","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"面孔识别测试"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ff5119d-86a7-4904-8272-90f98447cc84"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在面孔识别的测试中，缺少"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c5f07ec4-0358-488a-b4c1-ecc160b0062a"}},{"type":"text","text":"/上下文的特征(只看部分五官)会加大识别的难度。 另外对于典型视角更多被记忆、更容易识别的原因之一是，典型视角通常对对象展示的完整性(情境)更高。 "}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"73f25b97-e94b-4bbe-9f12-2d895c0a4a7b","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/490b8902-ff65-4037-884f-3bf98fe5e409/CleanShot%202022-08-09%20at%2012.51.25.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":424,"originalWidth":513,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7fd4a3c6-1ffd-4467-80f7-78edcb98e6ee"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096"}},{"type":"text","text":"2805"}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1839f0e3-039c-47be-9f09-d9792513d347","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":null,"color":null}}],"text":"Scouter"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b8c9cf33-28e9-4082-806c-1256194b5c3c","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f5d0c04e-07d4-4f18-83f0-3ea27dfa1ace"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":null,"color":null}}],"text":"Scouter 是一款针对语言学习者的浏览器插件，目标是帮助你在真实的语言环境中"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"学习语言"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":null,"color":null}}],"text":"。"}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0c9041de-6d91-4387-86d4-b0b4342590f8","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"df3e93ab-0b36-4877-9bba-45c2ff25483a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提供解释、相关例句和测试题"}]}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b3628216-72a4-467e-b649-7abd98735ded","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d17c3342-56b5-448e-9edc-e4be383be22c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"支持连续对话，可参与测试巩固学习"}]}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8fdca072-e134-4e95-83cf-de646786462b","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dfb84d07-eafb-4a18-a484-34cf56f838c6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自定义 Prompt"}]}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"abafd2fd-d074-4155-a0e7-11ebfe7a04ab","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"18dea2f0-600f-4944-aabf-882949a9dcac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Azure TTS"}]}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4c4b4312-a1b1-4ea4-96c4-608bde6c4ea4","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"020b287c-d29e-4c04-98f3-7bfe0bb32fe9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"导入到 Anki"}]}]},{"type":"todo_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4d01aa37-ed39-4001-8aa2-70e87fe35b5f","checked":true},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1342f5b7-c34b-4be6-81da-bd3019d4b19e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"多语言支持"}]}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"2d728b7b-a547-4dda-93b4-d885e44f8371","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-08-0823.22.29@2x20230808232234.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1564,"originalWidth":2236,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a8cb0132-7182-456d-8d90-ce4c5c44b1f3"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/scouter/mncfcjnabpfoagocanfjglfcpmmnkicb?hl=zh-CN&authuser=0","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"🚀 在 Chrome 商店中安装"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4460edb3-b43d-430b-b817-784dd093378c","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不是什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ba200563-5591-420b-823a-66b86b3ee87b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scouter 不是翻译工具，它的目标是帮助你学习以独立运用外语；不只是解释词句，更多是结合了实践练习、间歇重复等方法辅助学习。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b08824d1-254d-4048-81a9-75b0be8533b3"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strike"}],"text":"Scouter 不是对话工具，它只支持对 AI 提供的测试题进行一次性的答题"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"63bfa494-f18d-4b6c-8148-cb0133611413"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scouter 和其他划词翻译工具的区别是什么？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5d66e713-c404-44b8-b3d7-771bde716475"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"1. 学习「不知道自己不知道」的知识。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9b22c562-95c8-4ead-8e54-dcadcea77326"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一般的词典只能查询「知道自己不知道」的词句，例如在一个句子中有个陌生单词，此时就可以使用词典查询其含义；而往往我们在阅读时每个单词都认识但是连在一次就不知道是什么意思，并且也不知道从哪里下手查起， Scouter 可以学习「不知道自己不知道」的句子，利用 ChatGPT 的能力分析句子的语法结构。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"878c086d-f984-4bdc-810f-7d1cf201552e"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"2. 与 Anki 等第三方服务集成"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"266c0d3a-b536-470c-8f32-a03900810025"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scouter 不是也不可能成为英语学习的全部工具，支持与 Anki 等第三方服务集成帮助用户更好地学习。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"24a90296-06c9-40bf-b682-2ea4c03776a9","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么要开发 Scouter"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ea6f52a9-8d3b-40f0-b79b-2fd009bdec9f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在 ChatGPT 推出以前我就在学习英语，并且更加喜欢在真实的语言环境中学习，例如通过阅读文章、参与英文社区的讨论进行学习，但一直找不到一款可以针对目标语句分析、解释其语法的工具，直到遇到 ChatGPT。虽然 ChatGPT 可以帮助我分析、练习语法但每次需要手动复制语句切换到 ChatGPT 窗口粘贴、提问。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f6410bc2-b31f-41a8-8837-3ae3f7f0e064"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"而其他第三方 ChatGPT 客户端虽然支持快捷唤起和自定义 Prompt，但缺乏对英语学习场景的优化（例如没有与 Anki 集成，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"不支持将所选字符放在当前句子中进行分析"},{"type":"text","text":"）。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b033cba5-9bf1-489f-827f-d831b4ed7122"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另外 ，iPhone 发布时我还在读初中，别说参与这场革命甚至连新闻都没有听说和关注；作为继 iPhone 之后的又一个革命性产品 ChatGPT ，我很高兴可以见证这个产品的发展，更愿意撸起袖子参与其中。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a847d3e0-2b49-43c7-ba9d-4f35ae00a6d3","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计理念"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"20bc970b-07a2-471c-b2a0-ee4a02fb2a07"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scouter 最核心的理念是："},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/d79a8df5-c410-4b86-b483-112f07bfffc9","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"在实践中学习语言"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4878a662-7848-4236-b365-a30e08bced08","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"什么才算在实践中学习"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b59190fc-6207-4435-b0b1-43b14fd5b5fa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在实践中学习是指在所学知识最终应用的环境下学习知识，例如 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/community/file/784448220678228461","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Figma 的官方教程"},{"type":"text","text":"就是由 Figma 编辑而成，用户可以在阅读教程的同时直接进行实践操作，可以说 Figma 的理论知识就是出现在用户的实践环境中，用户可以无缝地在理论知识和实践中切换。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"3a06a525-5f7c-4e6a-9a56-576ad77789ff","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/592bee93-bf49-4958-8b43-ded12795d3f8/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":821,"originalWidth":1456,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f142a2e0-c371-4f24-b6a0-9c946d1ecf7d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在语言学习中，通过直接参与外语对话、阅读真实材料的学习也是一种在实践中的学习。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"85f023dc-fe60-4766-b9e8-c6e2570e5406","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么要在实践中学习"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3421bfd1-f300-4a6e-bbf2-6e4f9e4e4fe7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://youtu.be/d0yGdNEWdn0","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"这个视频"},{"type":"text","text":"中，作者介绍了语言学习的几个原则，在实践中学习符合这些原则。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7261e024-cc03-4395-a5d9-86d984d239b0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其一是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1e44ae28-e313-4cd6-b4d7-715b0db1197a"}},{"type":"text","text":"。在实践环境中有充足的上下文，如果某个语法或单词无法理解有时可以通过上下文的文字、图片和视频等信息猜出意思，实践环境中的上下文帮助我们完成「可理解的输入」。例如你可能不懂日语「ビール」这个单词的含义（读音是 biiru），但同时看到画面上有人在喝啤酒时大概率也能猜出这个单词的含义。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"23831081-bf95-4dd8-9787-03b3375dc689","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/70ee7cbe-ed02-49d0-9c95-bcdc0b7df930/CleanShot2023-02-2422.21.47.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":649,"originalWidth":977,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"726809e3-3e5d-4dad-83af-4031a720ee46"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其二是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/eb99d542-7dd7-4deb-b4d4-1e236dc73644#642f40f4-96c8-4887-a2ad-fa2082d6893b","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"使用正在学习的语言"},{"type":"text","text":"。学习语言不是知识的积累，而是大量的肌肉训练（听说读写），通过不断的实践可以完成更多的训练。在认知心理学中也有相关的理论证明实践中学习的益处："},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1b69a1a3-18d9-423e-b96a-9a57b7fd0c1a"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"46ee3824-0e23-4639-b652-9ef63e86d8f1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习是为了最终的应用，如果"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"学习知识的环境和最终使用知识的环境匹配度高"},{"type":"text","text":"，则知识更容易被调用。在一次认知心理学的实验中，参与者被分为两个组分别进行记忆实验，记忆所在的场所分别在水下和陆地上，之后要求测试对象对记忆的信息进行回忆，结果证明"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"当回忆信息时所在场所和记忆时相同，则回忆的成功率更高。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8a2f295c-036a-431d-a446-3cd451313909"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在另一个实验中，参与者需要学习驾驶汽车，一组通过阅读解释性文字来学习，另一组则是通过游戏来模拟驾驶，结果模拟驾驶的参与者跟容易记住知识，在实际驾驶中的表现得更加好。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"42a47452-8534-4ad5-90a7-591a5e29404f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在实践中学习除了上述客观的益处，学习者还能从中获得及时的反馈，起到激励学习的作用。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1a314664-7f50-47c4-94af-ddd82fe99e9b","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何支持用户在实践环境下学习"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0d32c7f3-07ad-4ad2-bd5f-b8691d39b13b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"利用"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./动态媒介可以拉近理论与行动的距离%20ce5f21e3-6f55-4a91-b32f-ebfdb6958e33.md","title":"动态媒介可以拉近理论与行动的距离","data-internal-href":"meta://card/ce5f21e3-6f55-4a91-b32f-ebfdb6958e33","edited":true}}],"text":"动态媒介拉近理论与实践的距离"},{"type":"text","text":"，从而更好地在具体的情境下进行学习。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6d3b2972-1c5a-44b3-b05e-7960f99a7981"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scouter 的强大是在于对个人需求的定制化回复","data-internal-href":"meta://card/adab50d8-2221-4985-850f-2bce62c588c8","edited":true}}],"text":"GPT AI GPT AI 对个人需求的定制化回复能力就解决了这个问题。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ee7a85ec-0641-45b9-b146-19a237dd3543"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"针对这一点，Scouter 提供了 2 种理论知识获取方式"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"92ac21c0-5140-4528-b2a8-57b37e2884da","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"74765b8a-86bb-4537-8b62-befc8d5b1b9c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"精确查询"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ecab63ac-26b2-4ee7-bcd3-800c61850f73","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2218a0cf-a63b-482d-bdfd-513218ed6f4c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"模糊查询"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d09f5f17-c1d4-4eaf-8542-43a81b3f3289"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大多数的学习是「精确查询」，例如不知道某个单词的含义、不知道某个具体功能要如何实现，此时可以通过词典、搜索引擎等工具输入问题获取答案。但有时面对问题，我们不知道问题在哪里，或者说我们没办法阐述问题也就不知道如何获取答案。例如面对一个英文句子，可能每个单词都认识但是连在一起就是不知道其含义，这时对语句进行分析智能提取其中的知识点就非常重要。Scouter 中便于后续复习。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"a30168b8-80a3-4812-ad04-ba88808463d2","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-07-1012.45%20120230809000444.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":710,"originalWidth":1227,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8b4c46d9-306d-44ff-b3de-33a1e0a6b5c1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"还可以使用 生成故事进行阅读，做到不背「单」词。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"eda82743-c082-408f-81bb-f82e2b4aa3f2","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-08-0823.23.46@2x20230809001154.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1468,"originalWidth":1957,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4831f3eb-b568-4a22-9ddc-cc2010171d3f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果你想进一步了解间歇重复的原理和制作单词卡片的方法，可以看看"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://ncase.me/remember/zh.html","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"这个有趣的交互式课程"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d2457e13-58f4-4d86-8c32-8f05d6e207cf"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"图片记忆"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bff9d617-a4c4-4e48-8896-a6781d0d8180"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"显示单词相关的图片，不满意还支持手动输入关键字搜索。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"5754d58f-41df-4d40-9f9b-eb363e5e916b","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-08-0823.56.49@2x20230809001256.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1472,"originalWidth":1962,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ae2537bf-f565-493b-a0e1-1f3ee8ba8c5b"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"自定义 Prompt"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"09c2113c-0f16-4a17-a2a6-5f990d2e08af"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过自定义 Prompt 定制你的学习方法"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"e674f57e-ba62-4e73-8b29-40ff2882c2c4","src":null,"fileId":"5aa2ba8f-a2d9-48df-afce-c35d73dda41c","alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":761,"originalWidth":1016,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"448fe18b-9c83-4839-b34f-f33492130a7e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总的来说，Scouter 可以获取、分析实践环境中的理论知识并结合有效训练、间歇重复等学习方法对理论知识进行消化。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3f4d0c90-57d9-46a4-b117-0c7910660315","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"后续有什么规划"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9d8c3935-a399-4ee3-aec4-336d7049fe24"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目前 Scouter 只有 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/scouter/mncfcjnabpfoagocanfjglfcpmmnkicb?hl=zh-CN&authuser=0","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Chrome 插件"},{"type":"text","text":"版本，未来条件允许的话会考虑增加客户端版本/Raycast 插件。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"83ff4154-7c38-443d-ba62-0f55fafdcdc7"}}]}
cards.title: Scouter

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b8c7bacb-68f0-45ca-be4a-dbd43f631065","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"离职半年的收获"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ec216e2a-72ba-4bc8-a9f2-0af444c449b0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"本来预期是今年春天成为 AR 领域的设计师、产品经理，但因为家事暂时耽搁了，为了缓解长时间没有工作的焦虑，整理一下自己最近这段时间的收获吧。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3e523f4b-7dee-4293-9364-22b3cfd4eba3","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"阅读&课程"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0d1cbbdc-46cd-4939-9bb6-1d1ab0e4c613"},"content":[{"type":"whiteboard","attrs":{"whiteboardId":"4cfd789f-ea16-42ed-aa04-3dad852fefed"}},{"type":"text","text":"，一门关于学习的科学，在学习方法的同时还了解了很多认知科学的底层原理。印象最深也的确改变了我的工作方式的是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"「学习不一定要学习」"},{"type":"text","text":"这一观点，在学习工作的间隙运动、保持充足睡眠不只是休息恢复体力，而是这些行为本身也在直接对学习的效果造成影响。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/learning-how-to-learn/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"教程地址"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"a9d51a91-53bf-4661-b439-d6127cc126fa","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/431ab9d6-1dc2-478d-8dc4-1f82b8a378d4/CleanShot2023-02-1310.41.10-2x.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1072,"originalWidth":1912,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1ddf88d8-cd51-4223-b1a0-2c068acd3c3d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提升"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"08f307fa-364b-4aca-83d4-37970577f588"}},{"type":"text","text":"。现代人每天都要接触大量的信息，应该如何获取信息、如何鉴别有价值的信息是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.xuetangx.com/learn/THU12051000419/THU12051000419/14768552/video/30231565","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"这门课程"},{"type":"text","text":"的核心教学内容。这段时间愈发觉得信息过滤能力的重要性于是学习了这门课程。给我带来的改变是开始更习惯通过论文来获取信息，看了一些混合现实领域的综述。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"c435a34e-8558-47dc-8c31-cbd0ddd45840","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-05-0122.34.00@2x20230507100859.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":2034,"originalWidth":3114,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"56c352ed-65b0-4f1d-ba75-61d9ebd82d03"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d"}},{"type":"text","text":"。接触到信息论最早是通过"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.modevol.com/episode/ckx8eb99w000501l2ewyt2kto","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"渐构"},{"type":"text","text":"的视频，发现这是一门非常底层的知识，对各个领域都可以带来价值，相比渐构比较硬核的内容，得到的《信息论 40 讲》则更加通俗易懂，除了解释概念还从大家比较容易接触到的职场、投资等领域结合案例讲解信息论的应用。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"96a4534e-7cef-4744-a1f6-dfc439dcbc7c","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-05-0122.36.08@2x20230507221818.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":2034,"originalWidth":3114,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3647bf5c-daf4-4ed0-8017-dd0171130a37"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习人像摄影。每次出门因为没办法给老婆拍出好的照片成了每次外出的一个瑕疵，于是想系统的学习一下人像摄影相关的知识，除了学习理论知识，每次外出拍完回来对成果进行复盘总结经验也是一个不错的学习方法。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"6890afde-8586-407b-b786-ab23a3375cec","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-05-0122.37.18@2x20230507221833.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":2034,"originalWidth":3114,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"79b43d3e-ac7e-4ae1-9de6-42dcaf56bd9d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"正在阅读"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4136d5fd-b0ec-4a81-9110-bca19716f884"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fabd7df7-5dee-4aec-8207-d71bd31c2a46"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"709c82f1-b25b-4a9d-a4a7-5401a3594871"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"多邻国英语进度达到 34%。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4a49c524-efd5-484c-a1b1-30cde43642c6","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"计算机先驱"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"255726ef-647e-4437-a409-0541067c85b3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这半年最大的收获可以说是对计算机先驱的研究和理解，在更早的时候因为了解了计算机先驱的思想也开始有了"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./我要做的贡献%2032ee5ebe-b846-4be0-85e0-5dda2ff9cc89.md","title":"我要做的贡献","data-internal-href":"meta://card/32ee5ebe-b846-4be0-85e0-5dda2ff9cc89","edited":true}}],"text":"自己的愿景"},{"type":"text","text":"，经过这段时间的学习，对 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d"}},{"type":"text","text":" 的思想有了更深入的理解，并且可以将其思想与现在或未来要做的产品进行结合，对产品设计提供了很大的帮助。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"44ae88fd-71de-456a-a2d2-3aa1fc41de47","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-04-2802.02.5820230507221847.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1031,"originalWidth":1895,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e4f1105b-06b2-47d7-9773-8c364ac2f2e1","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"产品"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5d22f0a4-b144-4c94-81af-e78744b3d9a5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"做了一款英语学习插件—— "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2d4a5130-ce79-4532-89e6-f1e81d300716"}},{"type":"text","text":"，开始接触 Chrome 插件的开发，也是一款利用了 Open API 的工具，可以将过往累积的设计知识和最近学习的计算机先驱的思想、对 AI 的理解结合在这一个产品中，过程感觉非常爽（就是用户量感人😅）。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"65e399b0-1985-48eb-b7c9-0aef7c039717","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-05-0122.39.26@2x20230507221900.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1990,"originalWidth":2408,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4aa7fd05-2e3f-463b-b687-80d4ab712069"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"做了自己的个人网站——"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b81a2f54-ec5b-4de0-9e97-ab841c0e18f9"}},{"type":"text","text":"，后续还会持续优化，特别是让其他同学可以利用这个项目搭建自己的数字花园。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"94752313-c714-475f-bf44-019b80604ac2","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/9fbf682c-71a2-4dd6-b915-056bc841b1e0/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":2000,"originalWidth":3000,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2c795308-acf6-47ec-99b0-aa6bd79ade59"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为了 AR 学习 Unity，但因为缺乏"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8f5a1330-0ed6-4fea-a5c6-84c7cec89df4"}},{"type":"text","text":"暂时搁置了。不过最近因为要局部装修房子倒又重新用起来了 🫤。想了一下，这种工具的用法，还是等真正临近要使用时再学习比较好，否则没有实际使用的反馈学起来很费劲。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"54a954df-085b-4b03-8b03-fd98b3442e7c","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-05-0122.42.20@2x20230507221920.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":2228,"originalWidth":3358,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f3d13e4e-37dd-4896-bb39-d55475303f89"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"阅读了一些官方的 AR 设计文档和论文，对 AR 产品的设计有了一个大概的认识。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"70b5063f-e4d9-49cd-9ffa-ec0d67193294","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-05-0122.43.59@2x20230507221933.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":2034,"originalWidth":3114,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f613283b-0866-46e0-a094-c60eb1538bbb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另外 UI 设计方面一直想学，也有"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8f5a1330-0ed6-4fea-a5c6-84c7cec89df4"}},{"type":"text","text":"，但就是很难提起兴趣…… 🤣甚至花几分钟刷 Dribbble 都没有坚持下来。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d299a802-0294-4864-91f7-1d8e4d28bd64","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"文章"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ac7998fb-db59-4f18-9bc7-50da94459d5c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ddd902c7-7e7d-4795-89c8-920c8709cccf"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"cacc6dc6-1209-42d1-b34c-d1b828a3ebc3"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7c59d337-b5f8-4c05-a19c-214a1202ee78","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d568e4ff-4032-48ca-bb43-b09ba1a48fe3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"写了"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"29fbc0f9-653a-4a74-84b5-428992d4d1ab"}},{"type":"text","text":"，迭代了 Notion 的使用方式。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e774f720-30f9-4da3-ad32-63ec3599ffc1","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58f5113e-6704-49aa-a737-2803590f9e23"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"525448a5-5898-40cb-81e8-ef318f6c7275"}}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0d255894-4916-4e18-ab5d-c9f411920a0e","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"后续计划"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"59e18705-262c-4777-b05b-81b324e0d942"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"几个在写的文章"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"33ff7fdf-ac62-47ba-b792-83126eddc509","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e0a0a964-4126-47a3-934e-ff7e49250295"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8cc50ba9-06ee-4452-911d-3459b4953448"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"29177fde-8a1c-4b85-a8ef-360e6d9dcde0","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c45bb340-883d-4fb0-aa6f-403f23dce420"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2d4a5130-ce79-4532-89e6-f1e81d300716"}},{"type":"text","text":"（会写一些背后的设计思考，以及我如何将计算机先驱的思想结合到这款产品中）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"00a9b1d9-b6af-4682-9ee1-8ae7e25be534","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7865afb7-26d6-40cc-b074-803fcb59c036"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一款 Chrome 插件正在开发中，期望 6 月前能上线。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d61cf9a8-b276-4932-94a7-8466d2ad046b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"等家里事情搞定开始准备作品集、投简历吧。"}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"684126e2-7f86-4c08-8425-b1bbf57ec7af","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息素养"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"11586eb3-1448-4b77-a9b0-6aff7dd99b41","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bff30ab4-b008-4ea7-abb6-cc35a2c51a18"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以意识到需要信息"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"12edc6e7-5443-4a45-a8cd-901722b92782","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d5e8689e-ed58-40e5-a922-3f96e945fe52"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"知道自己不知道"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8c46c508-6920-401f-be45-e5b75f1dfddb","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e95ae118-6e3b-4441-ae5e-2b660ece94bc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以找到想要的信息"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dac7d46e-bbf1-4d07-a5bf-9f6e312a8069","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dd26dcf4-d73f-44c3-883f-74ea3273cc74"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"根据自己的知识结构和想要获取的信息高效地找到目标信息。例如知道性能、参数信息可以优先通过「手册」查找。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dfa9439e-5e4c-460b-9987-069114c70e91","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a365003a-8211-4567-96eb-325902f91711"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7caa40d4-cc3d-488c-b91d-d8ffd07c1d41","cardTitle":"文献查找渠道"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bfea4065-eec9-42f9-8835-1357777c1c54","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eea72e94-729f-4fdc-9ab0-3b795c787101"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b5a960c2-98de-441f-bc1d-a21c40787d8d","cardTitle":"文献检索原则"}}]}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"29be7338-112f-494d-9596-0f535c27e9d3","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4c8b3273-f838-425c-86c7-33244894dfc7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以判断信息的有效性和价值"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"50b99b7e-bfc1-4e93-a163-17d 背后的方法论"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7fcacbd3-2dd0-4d97-b56a-39b2a8427cd1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"计算机先驱 曾提出"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0664b70b-4e1a-46e1-bbae-0d978dcfbe7b"}},{"type":"text","text":"的观点，例如我在使用 flomo 时了解到了背后的方法论，包括 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"08d9a517-f7eb-4bdf-8ee2-ec23d60471d3"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7"}},{"type":"text","text":"，让我有非常多的收获，所以我慢慢养成"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E4%B8%BB%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%9D%E8%80%83%E5%B7%A5%E5%85%B7%E8%83%8C%E5%90%8E%E7%9A%84%E6%96%B9%E6%B3%95%E8%AE%BA%E4%B8%8E%E4%BD%BF%E7%94%A8%E5%9C%BA%E6%99%AF%20bb20a72c-a7bb-4c43-8b43-d3d033a74d15.md","title":"主动思考工具背后的方法论与使用场景","data-internal-href":"meta://card/bb20a72c-a7bb-4c43-8b43-d3d033a74d15","edited":true}}],"text":"主动思考工具背后的方法论"},{"type":"text","text":"的习惯。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"1e8f716d-44e8-4c81-a6ae-e35c70c925ff","src":"https://miro.medium.com/max/1400/1*_K94xHxcq-O0ZtJTotNxLQ.jpeg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":495,"originalWidth":739,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ee97c64e-6be4-4b18-bdca-5b3692a57744"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"aeea2c56-4050-4252-81c2-af84f8140412"}},{"type":"text","text":" 半年了，感受很不错，作为用户同时也是一名设计师不免对美好体验背后的方法论产生兴趣，于是有了今天的文章，仅代表个人观点。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e6fdb255-15b9-4211-918d-205331d01a2a","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"鼓励链接"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f6698e97-bcd5-4078-b03d-366461ac03ba"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大脑存储的不是知识结构，而是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E5%A4%A7%E8%84%91%E5%AD%98%E5%82%A8%E7%9A%84%E6%98%AF%E7%9F%A5%E8%AF%86%E5%8D%95%E5%85%83%E7%9A%84%E9%93%BE%E6%8E%A5%E5%BC%BA%E5%BA%A6%2038e20838-59e0-4e48-9f27-22708c51096e.md","title":"大脑存储的是知识单元的链接强度","data-internal-href":"meta://card/38e20838-59e0-4e48-9f27-22708c51096e","edited":true}}],"text":"知识单元之间的链接强度"},{"type":"text","text":"。著名的常青笔记法也"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E5%B8%B8%E9%9D%92%E7%AC%94%E8%AE%B0%E9%9C%80%E8%A6%81%E5%BB%BA%E7%AB%8B%E5%A4%A7%E9%87%8F%E9%93%BE%E6%8E%A5%202f189f74-c27a-4ea8-94fd-edb348872849.md","title":"常青笔记需要建立大量链接","data-internal-href":"meta://card/2f189f74-c27a-4ea8-94fd-edb348872849","edited":true}}],"text":"建议建立大量的链接"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"848fd9ef-0b7b-4097-8f3a-adf3c90a625a","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/7sR2H320220723002657.jpg#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"40%","originalHeight":710,"originalWidth":640,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"21ddba3b-6a29-4714-912f-6ac7306e262c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"笔记之间通过链接相互关联形成"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4bce1c0b-73e0-4517-bd63-2d777514ab30"}},{"type":"text","text":"，从而使得知识的流动性更强更不容易被遗忘。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3b96c126-ad51-473d-a3fc-5025c2d214b2","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Heptabase 的链接类型"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"711e2da1-cbec-4a30-ac86-52879b46ad71"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"根据链接的紧密程度"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"由弱至强"},{"type":"text","text":"分为"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8718777a-8753-48f3-8306-a9552023dc13","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"74135015-563c-4785-a341-552a78bda417"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"同一个白板"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a64f57e9-87b0-41ae-815c-55bd208e33c7","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"18db73cf-a001-4913-b6ae-0aae01193572"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"同一个 Section"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"79d68a42-940f-4516-80ad-4e898ebf39a4","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c4f4ebeb-f2d2-4418-900d-714d3c388a9d"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"在白板中与其他卡片存在连线"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"85037f30-e47e-48dc-b879-21475b13594c","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cee1e843-a229-4bac-b9b4-38d81cabe130"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"在白板中与其他卡片的位置邻近"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dcade42b-dceb-4f6d-8ab5-3ba133d7b0a9","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"83c58696-256f-418e-8360-251f5dfeeb50"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"反向链接"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8bcff4a3-80cb-4da7-89f1-1b667f3f1e34","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2c5d26b7-2c84-4f8c-bf36-cc76246b3115"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行内引用（正向引用）"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a38cfa7f-cfd1-42ac-8014-cb71354b6ca0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"双链笔记应用强调建立知识之间的链接，而上述 1～4 是大多数双链笔记所不具有的链接类型，这些链接增强了知识之间链接的可能性，更丰富的链接类型有助于"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1a187bdb-4015-4f18-a47e-dda30c57f876"}},{"type":"text","text":"的形成，从而给我们带来更多意想不到的的启发。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3d63fe5f-d535-4b5a-854e-a797b9aff532","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Heptabase 的功能设计"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0c63a28f-7bd3-43d9-af37-bffe324e4c02"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Heptabase 存在一种「uncategorized」未分类卡片，此类卡片同时满足两个条件"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f14133a5-ee00-4ce8-a941-402d23e5876c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"90f5d1b4-6b16-446d-8337-965fc513ce81"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"未被其他卡片 @ 提及"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6530a104-14a4-44a4-a203-b1dc41351d24","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f52e08a7-0696-4e0d-8743-ee9bff2c2bc8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"未放置在某个白板中"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"74e6a6d4-24ef-4454-a454-e294d341dd0e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"需要注意的是，即使给卡片打上标签， Heptabase 也不会认为卡片完成了分类。我可以定期筛选这些卡片思考链接让卡片「脱单」。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"33fe67fd-a4e3-47a6-b042-076936adf4df","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/7c88fd4d-3f13-4f61-ba2f-037fcfef607d/image.png#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"50%","originalHeight":231,"originalWidth":380,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"09eccf8f-54db-4f7b-854c-cd6f6c0d0bcf","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"辅助思考的过程"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c345bf73-e354-4177-ab5d-01e36867bd6c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这应该是 Heptabase 想要实现的最核心的价值。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"36dd5633-5c5e-4b00-a439-8f4074e5df74"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"传统笔记工具是记录用户思考的结果（可能笔记的内容还不成熟，但也至少是阶段性的成果）解决了大脑存储能力有限的问题。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e4a1db63-0824-4e1d-bc1b-fc2bdcc2b91a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现代笔记工具加入双向链接等功能促进了知识的链接与"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1a187bdb-4015-4f18-a47e-dda30c57f876"}},{"type":"text","text":"的产生，降低了知识生产与洞见产生的难度。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"22ed83e1-1c9b-4ce8-85d1-58d5ae727f28"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以，目前的笔记工具已经提升了人类知识存储和知识生产的能力，然而"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"思考的过程仍然依赖用户的大脑"},{"type":"text","text":"。而"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./%E8%A7%86%E8%A7%89%E6%98%AF%E9%87%8D%E8%A6%81%E7%9A%84%E7%9F%A5%E8%A7%89%2078dbc7a8-c9db-40a2-b31e-b5d73b1f1474.md","title":"视觉是重要的知觉","data-internal-href":"meta://card/78dbc7a8-c9db-40a2-b31e-b5d73b1f1474","edited":true}}],"text":"视觉化"},{"type":"text","text":"是辅助大脑思考的重要方法，想想 72×9 还可以通过口算获得结果，那么 326×36 呢？在纸笔的帮助下将计算过程可视化就相对没那么困难了。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"9deb4cce-156a-4009-ac4f-b274affcf682","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/kEZ4TF20221127224219.jpg#center","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":"20%","originalHeight":244,"originalWidth":206,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f875d26e-49d8-4f4b-a2a3-0bd003e0a7f0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"aeea2c56-4050-4252-81c2-af84f8140412"}},{"type":"text","text":" 中，用户可以在白板中通过摆放卡片、连线等方式，让思考的过程可视化，从而降低了思考的负担，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fab7e306-6fcb-46e1-a939-add1658da9af"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"df319c49-9b64-430c-bf3b-ff8f0ef3cf6c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"麦克卢汉在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7aaa1af5-c318-47f9-a54b-2f12e8ecfb57"}},{"type":"text","text":"一书中提到「"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2233e58a-4804-4cda-bd5b-6fb169161984"}},{"type":"text","text":"」，文字的内容来自语言，印刷的内容来自文字，那么语言的内容来自哪里？来自思考。我们的知识从抽象到具体经历了思考、语言、文字等阶段。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"36a48cf3-f25f-4226-bfe2-7a90cdaf69c1"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"aeea2c56-4050-4252-81c2-af84f8140412"}},{"type":"text","text":"的白板提供了思考到语言/文字的中间媒介，让思考、语言、文字的跃迁流程变得更加顺畅。再加上前面提到的基于白板提供了更多维度的知识链接类型，让思绪可以自由地在不同领域之间穿梭。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9f64bfa1-fcb0-4337-a9c8-cfde16a227c6","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Heptabase 的功能设计"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e1f3c2aa-2180-4be3-9ac9-41f31f59956b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"69946a6c-8dc1-4cfa-b394-2ce5a22a3d96"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在白板中思考时，用户可以通过侧边栏、搜索框很容易地将卡片、高亮加入到当前的思考流程中。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5a076de5-92cf-477d-9320-46a4aecf9071","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d52f60e3-c01a-4cf4-837f-01c1ac2ccfb8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以通过前面描述的多种关系来组织卡片"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"04899464-2127-463d-b3bb-e7123a470f24","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a6382977-ec54-4790-9928-875d792a6aba"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以快速将文本图层转化更加成熟的卡片"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"13f8f281-598a-4b81-8284-a88b956acb51","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"325e61e7-ab26-4922-ade7-db708de58ae3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以通过子白板对复杂知识进行拆分"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8e8c0e19-4ae0-49d4-a0cb-3022d2e16c3f","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"保留思考的过程"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0c599c58-efc8-413d-aa11-e547a516baae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于复杂主题的学习和写作是一个漫长的过程，再加上在一段时间内我很难只做一件事，所以支持在中断研究一段时间后，重新回来时可以快速接着之前的思考路径继续研究是一个非常重要的产品支持。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"042459e8-2a2e-4090-8164-66c29a0a72ee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"之所以可以做到保留思考的过程，是因为"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5fbce1ac-77af-4d82-b66f-02ae7b55da64"}},{"type":"text","text":"，它们记录了我们思考的每一个过程。而传统的文字笔记在某种程度上是思考的结果。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"07d81cc2-a2bb-41f4-9b41-1b59793c0c08"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这有助于沟通中消除歧义，了解对方思考的脉络"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2c3c3665-c96a-47dd-89dd-a93d21a0a246","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ce33f804-9e30-4b72-9092-13f1fe5e1058"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5059fa9c-4c4e-42aa-b4db-1419f5fc7a26"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2e54b24b-1dd9-430e-9992-79ff51e535ba"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d3c295dc-1773-4306-b90e-d81f2c063610","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Heptabase 的功能设计"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"794b6700-a6e0-4a4c-9a94-eecf0959c546"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"dcd57531-0093-422d-abb6-2607a934063d","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"利用方法论改变笔记工作流"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ca0aa7d5-2d43-48e7-b786-e7f75a9b157b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"根据链接类型，由弱至强，先放到白板然后连线、位置摆放建立初步的关系，再通过 Section 将零散的知识初步形成结构框架"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"98c0a4a4-2f51-4bed-994a-862f97968aa0","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a33f70d2-8e2b-4cc2-9d6c-b4d81372f7fc"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a2737a90-08c8-4f8e-a78e-346f68c94e1d"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"06ec3aa5-c692-406c-83ac-4a058d1b460b"}},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"9b6b4aa3-33c6-499e-a705-dcca3ccabfbd"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d0ed9734-5d60-4700-a495-f230fd418715"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fb772242-206e-471f-be1f-33c4356d8c98"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"保留思考的过程"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dec5bce2-d74d-4ee4-9baf-5d4e3c72f4d6","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f60dde5c-3958-4b06-bb75-d317b660b458"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"58663cdc-6f17-4e67-a652-c616f1a87fe9"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bd921dfd-29c4-46c3-aa70-e3b208ddd6e6","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9176f250-148e-471e-9c78-fb357e5947f5"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5a7ea923-db52-464a-b9e0-63910aaa037c"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d755c1ba-4b4c-43b5-a552-4412b09a996f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7e5f3003-21d5-43fa-a414-2d468e6a2780"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2faa1ac7-fa42-4dfa-bc6b-e7ebba4be7f5"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7dd1b850-de5c-4b19-85a6-91870fd44fcb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"增强信道带宽"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"57309f2a-f269-40a4-8b38-7aea98a8220b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fc9a6a1c-a821-4cc6-aaf7-f6f98d6d4e22"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"什么是信道"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3386a3fb-aa65-4629-98d4-3ecf66431aa8","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragr ChatGPT 为例，自动化部分就是 GPT 自动生成的结果，人工编辑部分就是对结果的评价和修改以及追问等等。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"a93fd77b-66ab-43b8-9286-54a21ae3b496","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-04-1413.53.49@2x20230523224130.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1694,"originalWidth":1522,"alignment":"center"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0adaf58b-1fe1-42e2-b9a2-e492b6c5895c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"007eeaab-db17-490e-a713-f94c8699508b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设计方案"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b638d14a-8d00-41cd-8889-9fb5a74187bc","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2d950699-7953-4053-bd9c-da7ab6e26322"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"之前在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1ea450ab-4644-4310-9c79-28f2651297ee"}},{"type":"text","text":"的开发中就犯过一个错误，过于看重智能生成的部分而忽略了对生成后的内容进行优化的编辑体验，忽略了 AI 生成的结果现阶段还达不到直接使用的效果。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3d46ddd7-e49c-4456-b080-d49c42812bee","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c6dc4d0e-e891-4ec2-91bb-6f5fdcc5ff6b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最近做"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2d4a5130-ce79-4532-89e6-f1e81d300716"}},{"type":"text","text":"也犯了同样的错误，一直在优化 Prompt 希望 AI 可以一次性生成令用户满意的结果却忽略了连续对话对结果的不断优化。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"54795ef6-11ec-439a-a59c-508afe015806","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4f13558c-19ee-4d89-b8dd-29fc06075a14"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"新版本中决定加入连续对话功能，同时也不放弃对 Prompt 的不断优化。"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"a466bc27-595b-4a70-ae83-cef90b1a52d8"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e67b3947-2972-4b27-8a38-1d55366813e5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"相关笔记"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f3552967-1dd2-402c-a7b4-30acae78798f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c7d4f31d-cb6c-46d6-908d-aa10029064ca"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/2023-04-05#aa7f57bc-7ffd-4027-878c-322f7eb7e4f4","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/2023-04-05#aa7f57bc-7ffd-4027-878c-322f7eb7e4f4"}]}]}]}
