cards.title: 在什么情境下使用就在什么情境下学习

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a28e7e84-4c41-4c32-ac93-9e33417f317d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将番茄钟作为货币"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3a1e3d8c-cc6a-4b45-8cec-b1c669c7454f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b4ca0946-d4ab-4343-b74f-2ab6c3ace1c4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最近感觉节奏不受控制，经常沉迷在那些自己感兴趣但不是最重要的事情上，导致最重要的事情没有推进，于是决定优化一下自己的番茄工作法。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"184704f2-c514-4bc0-9f51-4b67b5fac12a","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d3a1d900-19c0-4162-821c-10784941c626"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"首先将每天的行动分为 2 种类型"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"dde9a15c-ecb3-4597-aa59-52ab6dec3e36","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"06569c93-5004-499b-8e42-f5d1c78c2e73"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"收入型：那些对自己的目标最有帮助的任务，每完成 1 个番茄钟则增加 1 个 🍅。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"60debd0f-b9bc-4811-ae1f-ce691d953432","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b9390827-c5bb-4dfa-86f9-a688290cd1bb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"支出型：自己感兴趣但不是最重要的任务，每完成 1 个番茄钟则减少 1 个 前面累积的🍅"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e33165dc-7a98-490a-a2cf-798460395412","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"49e2a3ca-4551-4dda-9715-60f3bb738112"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"举个例子，写作对我的帮助比较大，但是比较困难经常畏难不愿行动，我将他归为「收入型」；而研究和开发工具我很感兴趣，做起来经常忘了时间，将它归为「支出型」。所以我需要先完成「收入型」的任务累积🍅，然后再用这些🍅 来购买做自己感兴趣事情的时间。"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 将番茄钟作为货币

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"fe635636-d653-4929-806b-1db8622abbb4","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用番茄工作法累积 10000 个 🍅 后我放弃了累积 🍅"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"931d2499-c418-4681-bd82-1ce8cfa85227"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为最近生活和工作节奏改变很大，有很多干扰难以避免，很难完成 1 个完整的番茄钟，于是有几个月没有继续用番茄工作法。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1ee2195e-edd8-49f1-93a0-6987f092c0b3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"后来听了少数派播客"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://sspai.typlog.io/episodes/ep80#t=00:36:27","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://sspai.typlog.io/episodes/ep80#t=00:36:27"},{"type":"text","text":" 里面的一个观点启发很大，大概意思是不要为了累积番茄和执行番茄工作法。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7657feed-912d-487d-82c2-410609c7d782"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不要觉得接下来只有 10 分钟的时间或者在一个容易被打断的环境下而放弃开启番茄钟，即便注定会被打断也有进入专注的必要，因为专注哪怕只是 10 分钟也是有意义的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ed95ee03-64b2-4c10-a4d8-022d23e66ca1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以最近我又重新开启了番茄钟，但是不再执着于🍅数量的增长，而是为自己不断累积的专注时长而高兴。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9302ed29-40d6-434b-9b4a-caf7f505dbbf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这也是一种关注"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./专注于过程以避免拖延%200da2bfdb-316e-4e21-af83-d71eaad7e6d9.md","title":"专注于过程以避免拖延","data-internal-href":"meta://card/0da2bfdb-316e-4e21-af83-d71eaad7e6d9","edited":true}}],"text":"过程"},{"type":"text","text":"的工作方式。"}]}]}
cards.title: 使用番茄工作法累积 10000 个 🍅 后我放弃了累积 🍅

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"de0e793b-b88c-4785-a694-50f4b858cf4b","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一致性效应"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e4ec819d-9c95-4b74-bef2-04d435c08ff8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"记忆"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c72936bc-ab5b-4f6f-b93a-bcc946c7d5df"}},{"type":"text","text":"与提取时的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c5f07ec4-0358-488a-b4c1-ecc160b0062a"}},{"type":"text","text":"的重叠程度决定了是否可以"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"60496aba-b042-4863-a1b5-c25a02eae7ac"}},{"type":"text","text":"成功"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ca42acde-e875-45c1-ae52-35146fbe91e8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如在水下实验进行记忆，在回忆时仍然在水下则更容易提取成功，在陆地上则成功率下降"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e9ff500-6c54-49ee-950b-9996389b4373"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096"}},{"type":"text","text":"4245"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"2ea7d7c5-a608-4e16-96a2-f0c61c54226e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"94b26e9a-4064-4d6a-bc75-fa24ef4c7045"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所以在 "},{"type":"whiteboard","attrs":{"whiteboardId":"4cfd789f-ea16-42ed-aa04-3dad852fefed"}},{"type":"text","text":"的课程中也提到可以尝试切换不同的学习场所，避免让某个知识和单一的场景绑定，导致遇到问题时无法调用。"}]}]}
cards.title: 一致性效应

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bd3a9d1b-c7eb-4003-be1f-c7715e9d4d95","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"编码"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"541a6f22-1d05-4398-883f-9ba9adc14e9d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1b512beb-0575-4ef5-adbf-8ae287add8a9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用一种符号表达另一种符号，用一个抽象表达另一个抽象就是编码"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0d2152e5-9da0-4f88-8d3a-10fbab94faac","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":" 2963"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c89af6a7-eff1-4959-bac0-53b2e3c80edf","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d60d5ae4-8600-4413-b8fd-b5fc8d3bdc35"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"编码方式影响记忆水平 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096","cardTitle":"Invalid card"}},{"type":"text","text":"3862"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"77ebf77f-453c-41b9-b1b9-d257cba77a7b","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ae0cc3d9-6801-4ad2-bf06-e6b968112c6b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个对于单词再认的实验证明，通过语义编码的单次比起大小写特征、读音编码的单次再认准确率更高。"}]}]}]}]}
cards.title: 编码

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f4967963-ef82-457e-9cfb-2e1a2b169ef1","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信道容量取决于双方的互信息"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"47c6a341-1b0f-4335-bf22-02401075071c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2c52f130-458d-4870-b5dd-b1ef0a7366f5"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"707a2573-3ca5-4c50-b7f7-b310089bf4dd"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"45fa3099-f72a-4f94-bc40-3819b93269c8","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f28ecb25-3727-4e0c-bffd-0b16a7bb48f2"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"bc0d4bae-ba23-43f5-9cf3-6240e15deac5"}}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"92bf0d9b-b274-497f-a729-5c4818ede771"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5c00f7ef-e83a-4e86-8d8f-6ea167b71a4d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当两个对象在沟通时，信息通过某种方式进行传播，而信息是否传递到位取决于双方的互信息（我理解为双方的设计模型/心智模型的匹配程度）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"183ea778-3997-4e1e-b736-3e7986e892f2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这也是为什么要做用户研究来让设计模型贴合用户的心智模型。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0ff389f8-0d98-4d24-b98b-1fd85ad8f9bb","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0559b54b-849c-4e62-bd0a-d58012845191"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4d55742e-8b43-4312-afdb-5312cd296224"}}]}]}]}
cards.title: 信道容量取决于双方的互信息

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"019c163a-d0b5-442e-8e62-6410596faa13","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":null,"color":null}}],"text":"ZigZag"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"8537ca21-29ae-4488-9d54-443edb95dfcf","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Ic4jZU20230619124932.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1200,"originalWidth":1369,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"48201e33-6d5d-412f-a47e-10fdb033872d","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"简介"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"825d9e0c-a048-4c65-8654-825d9d531ac1"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e915ff1c-2850-4891-8375-173303a41118"}},{"type":"text","text":"创造的一种数据结构。它和表格很像（基本单位都是「单元格」），但没有表格的限制，例如 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":null,"color":null}}],"text":"ZigZag"},{"type":"text","text":" 的单元格左侧可以链接到任意单元格的右侧，而不仅仅是它相邻单元格的右侧。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bdbbb516-0688-442b-8993-f3ee93c4d4f3","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"价值"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8f8737bb-912c-4d3d-a391-28f648891a80"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"ZigZag 突破了传统的层级结构。这样可以扩大主题而不让主题限制在一个狭小的范围内，创造了更多的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c5f07ec4-0358-488a-b4c1-ecc160b0062a"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.southampton.ac.uk/~lac/zigzag/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"这里"},{"type":"text","text":"可以体验 DEMO。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e082b2d-5db1-40c6-8d47-bd13d72a632d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这种设计支持了"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"1a187bdb-4015-4f18-a47e-dda30c57f876"}},{"type":"text","text":"的形成，可以发挥"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"764cbfa7-d40a-463e-a4ee-8048a85d1114"}},{"type":"text","text":"的价值。我们可以在当前的笔记工具的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2ffab447-a5cb-41e1-b790-4047343c038f"}},{"type":"text","text":"、白板的功能设计上看到 ZigZag 的影子。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"16a87c68-2459-42d8-8370-2928c78371fe","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/1GVmZR20230615233301.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":273,"originalWidth":473,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"0fc2b9d0-2816-4be8-87ea-cdd30bb29e7d","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-06-1615.37.17@2x20230616153740.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":772,"originalWidth":1734,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e6a46967-cd44-4263-a705-199bb17caa97","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考资料"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d3f5619e-64d3-4263-838a-df8ad04f8fbf","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"74dce0b4-a082-4743-8f68-f74aba9c3a27"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主页："},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.xanadu.com/zigzag/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.xanadu.com/zigzag/"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1389998f-517b-484b-a11f-80f749b3f889","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"07b59eaf-5997-4128-a04b-37d7f59b8507"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"http://www.dgp.toronto.edu/~mjmcguff/research/zigzag/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"http://www.dgp.toronto.edu/~mjmcguff/research/zigzag/"}]}]},{"type":"video","attrs":{"id":"ceaf516f-e85e-42b6-b7ff-e25c4465a6bc","fileId":"c93fa1b1-23b7-4cf4-b5aa-34366c18a8f4","url":null,"source":"video","width":"100%","alignment":"center","originalWidth":null,"originalHeight":null}}]}
cards.title: ZigZag

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"30c9546a-2c9b-4359-9693-b72aa1091f5f","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用多邻国的一些心得"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3518923e-8678-404e-9db4-11623f842ba9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"今天完成了 187 天连胜了，作为喜欢在实践中学习语言的人，多邻国的学习方式给我带来了不错的效果，分享一些使用心得。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e8f13229-7ec8-46a7-a2d1-f016e99645db","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b94bb808-b884-4439-94dd-13f507d0e876"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"错题本不要立刻复习，而是间歇半天或更长时间复习，这样可以起到"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"217a65c9-9df9-431d-aaa5-301db4a9ed2d"}},{"type":"text","text":"提升记忆效果的作用。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"70f689d6-3fed-46d3-a3b4-d53443765326","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"84633669-8fe8-45dc-8eed-cd7f272cc9c9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"每个部分的「传奇奖杯」可以在下一个部分通关后再回头刷，同样起到间歇重复的效果。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3419200f-ae1b-414e-b28c-cb7f9cdafb44","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e8e9d791-9cd4-4201-98dc-4e985de29a97"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"完成每一个单元后都在笔记本上默写刚刚遇到的句子（尽可能多地写，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"6f2058bb-6387-43d3-9f5e-d19216acc971"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4ce91b79-9977-4055-af31-a342dc0b3f43","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7471ab2a-be86-4731-891c-e524e075ac72"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Web 网页和移动端 APP 似乎是不同的课程路线，在手机上也使用浏览器学习可以更好地保持多端进度同步。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"59e4225a-4cb8-4639-92ec-9b07b4242667","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"83646855-90f5-4b5b-a7e2-ada0a1481c38"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使用手机端输入体验差，我会只学习口语，这样完全不会用到键盘输入。"}]}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"c33865ac-26bb-45d2-9ed9-21066adee393","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-06-1518.32.45@2x20230615183326.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1249,"originalWidth":1142,"alignment":"center"}}]}
cards.title: 使用多邻国的一些心得

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"50007684-b770-43dd-aca1-2effaaff7c12","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"回顾与测试可以避免能力错觉"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"abf20807-5892-42e2-bd62-2bde334f8fa4","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bcc707b5-7c2d-4d44-8016-b46c91af5b61"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是什么"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"35a54350-a4e3-4a7f-a55f-0b4ac93beb07","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eecf43c6-a21c-4b6a-88b2-0c3beb499a06"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能力错觉是一种觉得自己会了，但实际上并没有掌握的现象。例如在高亮划线后就觉得自己会了，或者记录笔记后就觉得自己会了，但真正要使用知识时或向他人描述时却无法应用。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bcb98470-c6ad-4b8f-a266-5e203e18cc5d","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c8424ff9-bd71-4a39-a0ab-28c20aeedd9b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何避免"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2b83e818-1d9a-4a28-9438-4fc0e1698c79","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5cc1f473-f044-433a-97b4-0153313d28c7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"进行回顾，抛开书本和笔记回顾所学内容，看自己还能回想起多少。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d185d7c3-4316-43a9-b9b9-d3b3e4e4a390","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97d24900-8851-45d8-b6ef-eb969241712e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Duolinggo 的学习建议也是在结束一个单元后写下自己记得住的句子。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c426e800-31e5-49c7-ad00-92f49caddf78","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f2ed7e42-7ffc-4ca3-b035-7c98151ecee7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自我测试，可使用"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"989780e5-5139-4c22-bc7d-49e368cc88ad","cardTitle":"康奈尔学习法"}},{"type":"text","text":"输出自己的内容。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d4c9b268-2da4-4a41-88ae-fb6e9a30c44e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5ce24825-c1c1-4732-b6eb-056ce4e757a9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"离开学习时所在的环境进行回顾，因为知识会以学习时的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c5f07ec4-0358-488a-b4c1-ecc160b0062a","cardTitle":"情境 Context"}},{"type":"text","text":"作为提示，一旦离开这个环境（例如在考试中）就很难回忆知识。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"51990793-602b-4a83-9d35-d4021794fab2"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/64d91/neng-li-cuo-jue","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/ruhe-xuexi/lecture/64d91/neng-li-cuo-jue"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 回顾与测试可以避免能力错觉

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bc9aa7f9-f503-4806-a4d8-30cf8efdbfe2","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"推荐 Figma 的分支功能"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3e083445-b6b4-4700-ba90-ef4ecfb9e6cc","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"是什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"899014df-6c8b-4c07-b9ce-4a66d89e2ca4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分支是软件版本管理中的一个概念。在软件开发中，往往存在多个功能、优化点同时进行，为了减少互相的影响，负责不同功能的工程师将在各自的分支中进行开发，最后合并。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"1bc6bc0e-358a-4bce-a808-7237b26be594","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20211223195415.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c9ec1828-78c8-4e93-9b33-5099ff4a8c27"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分支并不是一个新概念，早在 1972 年就诞生了第一个版本管理工具，我们工作中熟悉的 SVN 其实也是一种版本管理工具。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"b015b620-2f4a-48da-9e7b-8fe1c6b2249b","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20211223195112.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2dbc61a2-fb69-47a0-932a-14f37700ba66"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"简单理解的话，当前的线上版本可以是一个主干，我们在分支中测试新功能（验收）最后合并到主干得到一个新版本。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"a6c3db02-179f-41e1-aaaa-440f0a50182d","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20211223195141.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8d84ba82-ddba-4193-8fab-f9785729619f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以设计组件库文档举例："}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"dfaae8c2-a3f7-4f6f-a334-640213b0835c","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20211223195153.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d86be314-c5cf-49e8-9a36-ad033b800916"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主干文件是我们最终确认的组件设计，其中包含下拉菜单、按钮 2 个组件，创建分支，并在分支中新建一个「弹窗」组件，分支中的操作不会影响主干文件，在合并后分支的操作会整合进行主干文件中，获得一个新版本的组件库。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e2d89efc-e6eb-4f46-b6d4-fe04bf69f293"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"figma 在今年 4 月发布了分支功能，相比软件开发，figma 的分支做了一些减法以降低上手的门槛。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2fec26bb-6c91-43ec-8ae4-570b93271459","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9d3ff46a-5ab8-42d4-b1f2-ffcca4192be2"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/591bab8b-cba6-4141-ba05-25e593b3111d","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"figma 分支功能"},{"type":"text","text":"的几个优点"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"acfdc868-c325-479c-b637-b39cc7efd7c4","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"efa0966c-f285-4da9-904c-ed6bae6fcb73"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"轻量，对设计友好"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"fcf4ee6a-97be-4a4f-af44-09776cc5791c","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"89d5c780-6934-46a0-ba3f-eb1fc95a35ee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分支权限独立，编辑不影响主干"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6271711f-d0ac-4ef1-ae9a-8c45692271f9","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d902e210-3b0e-4f78-b17b-bcc4f3e77268"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"修改/合并操作可控（需要审核）"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b031583d-a2ae-440b-8c0c-069b8f45d062","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"轻量，对设计师友好"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5fec4264-8d06-4108-97ec-c1eae02bc5f2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"克隆、拉取、提交、合并…… 传统工具拥有丰富的功能，也带来了使用上的高门槛。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"abc06e60-a599-4643-bcf2-0a342b4c9293","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20211223195214.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3ae015c0-773c-4516-982c-9c6e45a5c06c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"figma 在此基础上进行简化，只需要创建分支、修改文件、合并修改即可完成整个工作流程。其中创建分支可以理解为拷贝文件，相对较容易上手。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"73c0fb43-f4aa-4937-86b3-f9c4c6e689e1","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20211223195229.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"25648bde-67cf-4d47-a523-e4d00ed2166a","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分支权限独立，编辑不影响主干"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58633250-4333-4197-b659-39e61f45aaa0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"figma 中创建的分支（可以理解为拷贝）与主文件互不影响，包括权限在内也是相互独立"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7b137cca-e8ec-493e-8ac7-99222a055a80"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"权限管理更全面，项目数据更安全（特别是和外部合作时）"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d5ebac80-202b-4863-a601-c9540fd3847c","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"修改/合并操作可控"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"285c760b-14e7-476b-8bcb-ba769d1b5520"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前面提到，分支的操作不影响主干文件，如果希望修改的内容合并到主干文件中，则需要点击「合并」，在合并前，若用户没有主干文件的编辑权限，则需要请求有权限的用户审核、通过。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"89545b08-6b72-48e8-9470-9691e7ab6830","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20211223195241.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3c266171-3158-4aa2-adb4-bd5030b9ee58"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这在产品功能层面对流程进行规范化。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4de5a3df-66d1-4e6c-8819-126e038e957c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"基于这些特性我们能做什么？"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"83eeed79-82a2-4caa-b759-dc22668fc2ad","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"怎么用"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d19637a3-1475-46aa-80e0-27f32c9f2181","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1. 与策划协作文案修改"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1d6c75ff-471f-4d6d-acb6-84cdff9d878e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通常策划会在策划文档中维护一份产品的文档，但对于开发、QA 等阅读者来说，需要在两份文档间比对，比较耗时，体验差，最理想还是在交互文档中就显示实际的文案。但文案修改相对繁琐交互和策划来回沟通也会导致文档更新不及时的问题。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eea0ec3a-58bf-477e-b6a1-7f632794a52f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以创建 Figma 的分支，在分支中给策划提供编辑权限（不影响主干文件），待策划编辑完毕后"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"审核、合并"},{"type":"text","text":"到主干中。审核可以避免误操作修改了文案外的内容。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"258b867b-60ab-4a70-bef3-4cee06db9dc3","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20211223195258.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c179867a-bbe8-44b7-aba0-03f7b85b8b2f","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2. 对比新旧差异"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"847f84e9-1d9f-4ab8-b5bf-667f25670b73"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Figma 提供了对比功能，可以对比分支和主干文件的差异，适合 UI 和技术沟通修改点。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"6ff117ea-892f-4e98-92f8-ed76863e44c0","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20211223195313.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6e728456-83a1-435d-83a6-6607397d3227","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3. 组件库维护"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ca8abc7-775e-4d13-8de2-3a2acd186083"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"组件库是团队共同维护的文件，如果有新想法、新需求目前只能在群里沟通或者在自己的文件中设计草稿不敢轻易编辑组件库。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"62dd4b6b-d99d-426f-8621-560ccf856f23"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以使用分支功能维护组件库"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"7a9af391-200b-4e10-b61a-9b522fdd3cf0","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Company/20211223195324.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8773b6aa-fbdc-4f7d-8919-78c7a772d20f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"具体操作是主干文件作为确认的组件供成员使用，分支文件作为开放区域，成员可以在其中提交组件的优化建议，定期盘点分支中的修改点完善确认后合并到主干开放使用。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1f73df17-2a6c-4a0d-807c-fa1b22b4d45e","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"什么时候不要用"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9ff071b2-d8b9-46c5-89f2-7f055bb50272","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ebc0a629-ad07-4dae-9d0b-6edf7294a0aa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"重构设计时：在新文件中进行编辑更高效"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3b6ce608-2e57-4137-b368-0241c0d9d9ae","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"528a3e77-7f4f-4906-920e-e733a8682ecc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"修改较少时：与其使用分支增加操作成本，不如直接编辑快速完成"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0c05cb3b-59a6-485f-9c2c-a2ce69e3e99a","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e6c848bd-06fe-42ab-b888-b9ac029e6270"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们可以考虑在以下 3 种场景下使用分支"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c3984404-41a7-4d65-afd1-2f50b2e00a67","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bd11a257-d039-491a-91c6-582ac0c0be0d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与策划协作文案修改"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e7fc30d8-2bc6-47cc-a604-bb4579812b9a","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5c7425b0-741c-466f-8335-fdb30769cfca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对比新旧差异"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f1f7f9b4-470a-45e9-b82f-8c661e78cb9b","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"189ef249-1f25-491d-af30-0dd4b48c051b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"组件库维护"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ab8128eb-ab16-499d-a98a-5fee52fe520c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考资料"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7ea3d5d3-e089-405d-9ae0-85241d2791b4"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://figmacn.com/post/branching-is-online","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Figma 分支功能上线 | "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"Figmacn.com","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Figmacn.com"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5f5e4da3-7ad1-41af-99ec-7b7758283fa8"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/best-practices/branching-in-figma/when-to-consider/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Branching in Figma"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2182356c-a0e3-4afd-847f-169f464a7354"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.figma.com/blog/how-and-why-we-built-branching/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"How (and why) we built branching"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1e5303bd-ef3d-4b0b-a583-c405dc3534c1"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://help.figma.com/hc/en-us/articles/360063144053-Create-branches-and-merge-changes","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Create branches and merge changes"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"df2e0930-77d4-4616-b448-330b47183259"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000037773739","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"【云小课】版本管理发展史之Git+--代码托管"}]}]}
cards.title: 推荐 Figma 的分支功能

cards.content:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"db30d3ae-5303-4f3a-b52c-3678b5bf8afe","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我如何做读书笔记"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8a8f4dbf-2570-475b-9de4-7f2f718c93b5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前段时间在 Twitter 分享了我如何使用 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"aeea2c56-4050-4252-81c2-af84f8140412"}},{"type":"text","text":" 做读书笔记，收获了挺多关注。今天想利用这篇文章展开讲一下"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"每一步骤的操作方法以及设计思路，这些思路可以在大部分笔记工具中实践。"}]},{"type":"code_block","attrs":{"id":"d4a55475-563a-4332-ac63-644c258e7ea0","params":"html"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"{HTML}\n

我的阅读笔记方法几乎一样，非常好用。

1. 将有启发的知识点写到 Journal 中
2. 每本书建立 1 个白板，定期将 Journal 的笔记转为卡片放到白板中思考
3. 参考书本的结构和自己的理解建立 Section 和连线
4. 将过往的知识加入这个白板中建立链接
5. 在白板中梳理出一条脉络进行写作，输出文章 https://t.co/Q9Mki6LFIr pic.twitter.com/cfMrhZ00Xj

— Jiang (@arui_kisi) June 28, 2023
"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"54a1d5e5-54ca-4cff-83e9-cb0539817517"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4136d5fd-b0ec-4a81-9110-bca19716f884"}},{"type":"text","text":"中提到一个叫「目标距离」的概念，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"92679849-fadb-4578-875d-8f468a0db68b"}},{"type":"text","text":"，例如为了完成一次旅行，可以将目标拆分为做攻略、买机票门票… 这样拆分后单个任务从开始到结束的距离就要比整体任务要拉近许多。我的笔记流程也按照这个原则拆分为 5 个步骤："}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bd57bba2-04dc-41f5-8c51-e2e174620081","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8983ff72-780e-4a5e-a356-389eb2b69f56"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将有启发的知识点写到 Journal 中"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"485be683-bc67-4e3b-9816-d42b3e11f89b","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c84e254c-61c0-4c41-9dce-241cd9ddfc20"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将 Journal 的笔记转为卡片放到白板中思考"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0075ca02-cab8-422d-8a25-5e235b2b8366","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f0f51c64-52d5-45ac-83e5-36900e9e3569"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考书本的结构和自己的理解建立 Section 和连线"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"32425c1c-31e7-4abb-bad4-22fe739271fc","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"61e9aa54-f01a-4fdb-8b7e-5ff35dd57c2a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将过往的知识加入这个白板中建立链接"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b1b36158-771b-41ad-a58d-71df8db9fe37","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9939a11c-3663-4a0d-bcaf-f642d6a3f9ab"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在白板中梳理出一条脉络进行写作，输出文章"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e33b2548-49db-48ed-b999-ba2ca1b5ca42","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将有启发的知识点写到 Journal 中"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4c4570c9-989b-489a-830e-cb9b3b4570ad"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"写笔记时经常会纠结自己写的内容是否有价值，开始写之后又开始考虑格式、用词是否准确等问题，这增加了笔记的负担。而 Journal 的意义是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"提供一个无压力的输入环境"},{"type":"text","text":"，因为这里的信息不会「污染」到核心的卡片盒。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e97640d4-1e14-423a-a1c9-7ab6a3c23612"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我在阅读过程中遇到比较有启发的内容就会先记录在 Journal 中，我的笔记都会尽量和其他笔记进行链接，但是这个阶段不要求自己花费太多时间在思考上，而是先记录下来。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a2d9724e-acd6-401b-9d5c-40fee67b1af0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前面提到工具提供了无压的输入环境，我们还可以从自己的心态上鼓励自己进行记录。过去认为笔记、写作是一种思考的结果，但越来越觉得"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a84b1daf-24b2-42f2-bb04-70df800a0018"}},{"type":"text","text":"，很多没想明白的信息在书写的过程中就逐渐清晰，所以不用担心一开始写的不好，因为"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"写作是一个过程而不是结果"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"00cd97de-31b2-41d2-8bd2-e34bb81df96f","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/4U3AS820230703161547.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":2022,"originalWidth":2736,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d9a0b81d-adfe-4a72-947f-a6f49886e5f0","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将 Journal 的笔记转为卡片放到白板中思考"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ffc3d2d9-3722-4faf-9b12-d88b0b38d543"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在完成记录后，每隔一两天会开始浏览之前写的笔记，对有价值的内容进一步进行完善，然后转为正式的卡片，在转为卡片时我会做几件事情。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a47a52c2-3d83-4567-a6be-3bd24ed62460"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"用自己的语言来编写卡片"},{"type":"text","text":"，这样可以避免"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/6f2058bb-6387-43d3-9f5e-d19216acc971","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"能力错觉"},{"type":"text","text":"。能力错觉是一种觉得自己会了，但实际上并没有掌握的现象。例如在高亮划线后就觉得自己会了，或者记录笔记后就觉得自己会了，但真正要使用知识时或向他人描述时却无法应用。用自己的语言描述就是一次对知识理解程度的自我测试。此外，笔记的标题我也会认真的编写，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/df6f8dce-542c-4bcb-9726-fb4beb3ec529","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"标题是对笔记内容的高度概括"},{"type":"text","text":"，如果没办法很简单的概括比较的内容很可能是笔记信息比较松散或自己没有很好的理解。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f0e6b201-1c87-4b3a-94ba-09765449c79a"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"建立初步的双向链接"},{"type":"text","text":"。我会思考卡片中的知识是否和其他卡片有关联，通过简单的回忆和搜索来寻找卡片建立链接。这种链接不但可以"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/38e20838-59e0-4e48-9f27-22708c51096e","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"加深知识之间的关联"},{"type":"text","text":"从而提高后续知识运用的可能，还可以起到启发思考，成为发现新的观点的机会。例如我在学习「能力错觉」这个概念时发现其中运用的方法和"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"989780e5-5139-4c22-bc7d-49e368cc88ad"}},{"type":"text","text":"类似，都要求通过复述来验证自己的学习成果，这让我对费曼学习法背后的作用原理有了更深入的了解。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"271d8b0d-cdb0-436d-88c7-a1300dae3f46","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"整理白板"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ef796107-8d92-4ba7-9f73-8e25ee81f315"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"每本书我会建立 1 个白板用来存储相关的笔记，我会定期参考书本的结构和自己的理解建立 Section 和连线，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"对知识进行拆分、组织和关联"},{"type":"text","text":"，用这种方式展开思考。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"783104ff-dc1c-4776-a675-a4025b47c8ea","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-07-0416.42.39@2x20230704164256.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1960,"originalWidth":2970,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e2b91e0e-40ad-4731-8d67-6ec8dd38891e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"aeea2c56-4050-4252-81c2-af84f8140412"}},{"type":"text","text":" 中，我可以通过摆放卡片、连线等方式，让思考的过程可视化，从而降低了思考的负担；为什么可以减少负担？下面展开讲讲。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c49f981c-06fe-486c-8974-34d5bb7d2452"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人类的大脑处理能力有限（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"41bdc291-4294-494b-b464-9b1ccb16b278"}},{"type":"text","text":"），具体说是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e68e36f9-ce66-4a4d-aed5-1ded71abe21c"}},{"type":"text","text":"；当你在专注一件事时很难再同步进行其他任务。例如很多人喜欢在读书学习时听纯音乐，因为相比有歌词干扰的其他音乐，纯音乐对大脑的干扰更低，不至于因为歌词抢占主线任务的注意力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d9c39bbe-960a-4d5d-9b81-b339f4d72c68"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当我们在思考时，需要对思考的材料进行回忆，同时还需要组织材料，大脑处于多任务的运行状态。而将抽象的思考过程通过白板进行可视化，相当于将回忆、比对材料的负担转移到白板中，从而让大脑更好地做创造性的思考。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"80da454c-b3d2-4ac7-9dce-06065ada6380"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"很重要的一点，是不局限于单本书的内容，而是要"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"思考这些知识和过往笔记的关系"},{"type":"text","text":"（建立深度链接），他们或互相佐证或相互矛盾。通过"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/965c051a-bc9a-42e4-b001-942ae420289f","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"将新知识加入到已有的知识体系中"},{"type":"text","text":"，有以下好处"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bea77013-1815-4c84-be37-f74be69ea9ff","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"60f66367-110b-4bb3-ab31-369219be5ca6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过相关知识的联想可以提升提取强度，更容易被调用。参考"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b036a7c2-5d67-4748-abff-e782ebae170c"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b06a887a-d1ef-401d-bb95-5b8068f015b8"}}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"615f7b71-e289-4932-8c57-7700dcebfceb","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3ba0a4db-2ccd-4370-aba6-e783dc2ea091"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"通过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8e17198a-2546-4ada-b70a-053137ff81d2"}},{"type":"text","text":"强化知识的掌握"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c67ce9d7-80d0-4464-8b60-896a7989c0b9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"「创新来自于各种想法意想不到的链接」这一点可以展开讲一下。有许多概念是通过链接不同领域的知识诞生的，例如设计领域非常著名的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"697909cc-84ff-4302-b978-450139f15884"}},{"type":"text","text":"灵感来自于化学。就像物质由原子组成分子再组合成有机物，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"http://bradfrost.com/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Brad Frost"},{"type":"text","text":" 运用原子的思路组织设计系统，在设计领域得到广泛的应用。心理学领域的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5885e16c-a684-4f85-970a-62a81619ff9a"}},{"type":"text","text":"也借用了物理学"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"30467f2e-b84e-49fa-b205-a90e2d6cd2a8"}},{"type":"text","text":"的概念。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"3052b74c-a3b7-4d77-8ec2-579cda75a588","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/7uLp0J20230704180852.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":483,"originalWidth":1200,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d1f6dce0-7356-4252-b01b-50bc11cb7451","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输出文章"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"86d08d83-9620-4d3b-9b22-f598de19ab51"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"白板梳理之后，通常都会对这本书的知识有了比较深的理解，这时我会从中找出一条我比较有启发或理解最深的脉络进行写作，输出文章。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"66b37bc7-4103-4e5d-8979-0dec48c659a4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"根据"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"989780e5-5139-4c22-bc7d-49e368cc88ad"}},{"type":"text","text":"，输出是一次检验自己学习成果的机会，在输出的过程中发现自己说不清楚的知识会根据"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"笔记中记录的页码"},{"type":"text","text":"找到原文进行复习、查阅资料，进一步加深了对知识的理解。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"7850b92d-b513-485d-a9c9-875c0d41d941","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8490814d-e836-4091-b3f3-b97b9c829891"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以上就是我的读书笔记流程"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6497e03c-5142-4899-b81c-adee5d4bb460","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f05b8186-908e-44a9-946b-f9fd5bf5a431"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"记录阶段要求无压力，写作只是一个过程。"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c51dbc90-a152-4910-95e6-176b8c3e8aeb","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7fb1f791-ba4e-4534-b51a-c1979edc6d7d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"转写卡片时要用自己的语言，认真对待卡片标题。"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e2fb7f9d-2fe1-47ec-9b9e-fa0e8ce4c173","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9adb97fa-c008-4802-8f1b-fdc1210c334d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在白板中整理卡片进行思考，要思考这些知识和过往笔记的关系"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"68fa9af6-e84f-4e06-a4fc-93cd610d3e5d","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"79a18096-b125-4d56-a89f-aa1b8e4d0465"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"输出文章验证自己的掌握程度。"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 我如何做读书笔记

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e899bc90-2836-4dbd-bc05-f84b0a87fe00","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目标距离越近则动机越大"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1b8fe760-1721-478b-8a7c-5950b2d4d0f8","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"08cee44b-98a0-4823-80a7-646dd725f218"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"距离一个目标越近眼看就要实现时，动机就越大，平时做俯卧撑之类的运动到接近目标时经常就会不自觉的提速。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2c3eead0-d58e-48d0-a2ea-7905c681f09b"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4136d5fd-b0ec-4a81-9110-bca19716f884"}},{"type":"text","text":" P158"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"632e93b6-14ed-495e-bdc0-3b85b8a515fa"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0de9c64d-02f4-498f-8432-d0bf34773aa8"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b8cc4607-6474-4da6-bf09-7c7946448c3f"}},{"type":"text","text":"除了让目标更容易获得阶段性进展和反馈，还可以提高行动的动机。"}]}]}
cards.title: 目标距离越近则动机越大

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"958a067f-eb31-42bd-845e-742f9d02c089","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"笔记的标题就像一个 API"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d49f3a8f-296f-422f-bff5-70782ddb16ea"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"标题是对整篇笔记内容的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/ccb4fa3e-cea3-47ce-bc31-d0e0a026e42a","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"抽象概括"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"49a92d20-371d-4891-a65f-07c0a7c1c63c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"59eff2bf-e62c-47bf-abd3-9f300b5b29f0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"使得在不同地方调用时不用了解比较正文即可获得笔记的主题、概念等相关信息，提高了链接的便利性；"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4226b0b9-e6ba-4847-bf0e-59bfe33abb9d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d57450ab-1c63-4113-8730-c0c0e9016f37"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"此外如果一个笔记无法用一个标题来概括，那很有可能不满足"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"697909cc-84ff-4302-b978-450139f15884"}},{"type":"text","text":"原则或是自己对笔记背后的概念不了解造成的，可以检验对知识的掌握程度。"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ceac7db6-c11c-446f-b8a7-3228d5b92172"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://notes.andymatuschak.org/z3XP5GRmd9z1D2qCE7pxUvbeSVeQuMiqz9x1C","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://notes.andymatuschak.org/z3XP5GRmd9z1D2qCE7pxUvbeSVeQuMiqz9x1C"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"9f0c080f-3f52-422d-a59d-98fc8f3e7411"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"61890c4f-b700-4a72-a314-17db85b91766"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=MjI0NzA3ODU","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2022-04-27 09:14:07"}]}]}
cards.title: 笔记的标题就像一个 API

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f7e11fee-c480-4019-b4a4-8ed216624022","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大脑存储的是知识单元的链接强度"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"35f66ea7-2a8e-4636-9c31-0d349ebc0159"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大脑存储的不是知识结构，而是知识单元之间的链接强度"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"20be9ab7-68ba-428c-8e58-bc91f652e470"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5e94d4df-8d79-4660-a955-2102f73fd096","cardTitle":"《认知心理学》"}},{"type":"text","text":"5501"}]}]}
cards.title: 大脑存储的是知识单元的链接强度

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"44f7ac37-20ac-4950-a4d3-b9a198ccb12f","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人脑是单线程的"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"46b11e56-de60-4888-9ce9-5e1d59f68052"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"需要文字记录是因为，人脑是单线程工作，如果一直被一个想法占用则无法思考其他想法。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"55fd2267-c535-4353-8b93-34bf5d17a2f9"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"6a84e7b5-cb38-4682-8a6f-f8623e3be6a8","cardTitle":"书面语言是人类有意识思考的前提"}}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8da84017-3703-4317-8be4-97ba2be72161"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3f4f2942-02f6-4aa9-886a-14b401e53ade","cardTitle":"写作辅助思考的过程"}}]}]}
cards.title: 人脑是单线程的

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3f8f569c-7ad6-4684-8eb9-580879864b6a","level":1},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"623a27de-a58d-4516-a13f-18b30c0f0f3b","cardTitle":"感知"}},{"type":"text","text":"存在容量限制"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8114d69c-b7b6-47ab-9403-fd81bcc33230"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"并且，一个感官通道（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7f526777-0ab1-4f99-9782-72d63ebacde9","cardTitle":"通信/信息系统"}},{"type":"text","text":"）容量达到上限后，就难以倾注更多注意力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8f9cf4b9-205a-4e34-aad1-6e1b064a231b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如听音乐时难以听到他人说话，但有时不会影响另一条通道的工作，例如变听歌边跑步就互不影响。"}]}]}
cards.title: 感知存在容量限制

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9b2b9df7-42ef-46c6-bbe1-1b5d1437212d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"记忆相关的两个维度"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ab6afb1e-8fb4-4699-a2cf-10f34c9c6b00","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4f83674c-e90f-421e-bfb0-4c8c0f34bb32"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"存储强度"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"00e0625c-7a08-4679-b4a3-49e6068d2849","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"303c15be-fa01-40bc-ae2c-9a9db570ddc0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"提取强度"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"94d85de7-3bcc-46b6-8535-c46971f0b057"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"传统学习强调存储，却忽略了提取。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"83288f66-c3e8-4dcb-8ff9-c68324291136"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何提升提取强度"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"db499666-d173-4ea6-890e-ae424b023a12","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1878923f-76a9-4dc7-ad3f-69691e2de6fe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"增加输入摩擦（手写笔记、用自己的语言写） "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"38d9247c-1b0b-47ca-a119-933af80d71c2","cardTitle":"笔记需要增加输入成本"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"106ade20-52b9-434f-bb6c-a51c858dee85","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"94747fa1-da2d-4590-8fa0-7274a2f55836"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"建立知识之间的关联 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4bce1c0b-73e0-4517-bd63-2d777514ab30","cardTitle":"非自愿记忆"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"30343878-f372-4a40-b69c-ae68fc88a384","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4aef8848-87e4-4184-af4e-aff33dd1a65f"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"86fcabdd-a9bd-47a0-ad4a-296fbd89a9fa","cardTitle":"通过加入情境、视听信息来强化符号的记忆"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c27eab84-4eb2-4d6f-ad78-7e3af5c95278"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7","cardTitle":"卡片笔记"}},{"type":"text","text":" p166"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"20904005-9ea1-45f1-bbf0-ca52317d3be9"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"37162d65-96da-4008-80a1-90a4d47a005c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=NDUwMDI5Ng","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-07-22 09:26:08"}]}]}
cards.title: 记忆相关的两个维度

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"30a4cb9c-1d83-4f9c-84a3-cd3e53aaa0b8","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"远程工作求职经历"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ba92b3a3-6856-4b24-bbfc-013db360a712"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我上一份工作是在国内的大厂里担任交互设计师，在疫情期间经历了几个月的居家办公尝到了一些甜头，例如平时通勤在路上要花掉 2 个小时，而居家后这段时间可以做很多自己喜欢的事情，业余时间大大增加了；另外远程也可以更好地平衡好工作和生活。于是离职一段时间后就开始尝试续找远程的工作机会。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"95e4261c-c0cc-4cbb-9b24-3ba7cf79abf0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"期间经历过 1 次笔试、2 次面试，目前还没有应聘成功，所以也不算成功经验的分享，简单和大家聊聊这段求职经历的感受。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6942019c-3774-4361-9c03-8946c09cf51d","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"寻找工作机会的渠道"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2221c830-fbf9-4015-a7a6-2c0265a4760a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"远程的工作岗位并不多，我主要从以下几个渠道寻找。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1e15374a-82f6-4fd0-938e-f1a58d02be5f","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"BOSS 直聘"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"13d328c8-47af-444a-8997-8106b9c2895a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"BOSS 直聘的岗位大多还是比较传统，不过可以通过「远程」等关键词搜索，然后再筛选职位来找到目标的工作。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"25287e03-6d39-42bf-9fb9-8d3e81696a1b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"建议"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"使用"},{"type":"text","text":"电脑端，因为只有电脑端可以在「全国」范围内搜索，移动端只允许按照城市进行筛选，而远程工作并不需要限定在特定城市。另外建议在设置中隐藏简历，避免 BOSS 主动联系，因为大概率这些岗位都不支持远程。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2727c6ba-7f3a-438a-9f7d-3bbf04527e9d","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"远程工作社区"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b43b9d12-0488-4a13-8204-682133fbc1e1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://eleduck.com/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"电鸭"},{"type":"text","text":"为代表的远程工作社区，除了招聘信息，还有很多远程工作的经验和感受分享。不过在电鸭投递简历还需要付费，也可以通过在评论区留下联系方式免费和招聘方沟通。评论区让岗位竞争变的可视化，你可以看到有哪些人在和自己竞争 1 个岗位，真的是一幅僧多肉少的景象😂有时候看到很多履历很厉害的人应聘时都会打消自己应聘的动力。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"5ea4e7e3-2506-4638-a77d-b38e69d7ba95","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-07-2112.33.42@2x20230721123404.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1866,"originalWidth":2836,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ac019790-e5a5-4d42-807a-270667e3baf9","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"企业官网"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"24d610f6-c892-4fbb-a981-78161b1de6db"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"心仪公司的官网也是寻找工作机会的渠道，以下是我收集的支持远程工作的团队："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8f836e23-1606-4126-9283-589e4b1d2863","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"42022745-58a8-432f-b80d-1c4bf4531def"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.zhipin.com/gongsi/5a7a69d7a2fc346d1nJ83tq4.html","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"少数派"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f834c07a-51cb-4703-9c6e-bf3d2685be91","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f3edc7b1-f0a5-4914-84ba-47abf4a4a8d6"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.zhipin.com/gongsi/job/e6aac092990e17570nZ92N2-FQ~~.html","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"vika维格"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c8c4bae3-3d6e-485c-ae21-96f34811a420","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3f465a73-9f58-4515-9cd8-60acbf51161a"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.lagou.com/gongsi/v1/2b4003ca6213f62e825b9ffa50d650e9461252d366474670.html","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Xmind"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"eb3cf418-05b2-4abb-b533-c6d169c38fcc","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"11bf18c6-61a5-4cf8-b82a-8bd6d9c84423"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://tower.im/jobs","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Tower"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1c725a0c-bfd9-4092-b068-e814e87ae59f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"706cc445-fbe0-41e2-940d-96536dd494e1"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://gitlab.cn/careers/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"极狐(GitLab) "}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3494b706-90a8-4c11-9012-b1d423862c89"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://github.com/greatghoul/remote-working","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"这个项目"},{"type":"text","text":"收集了更多支持远程的团队。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c7bb26df-0b39-49db-8c12-ef35b321908f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"你可以到想去的团队的网站看看，例如 Logseq 团队没有对外披露招聘信息，不过官网上可以看到接受工作申请。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"ca6d0e45-ba69-47ae-a928-b92bcd8fd8a1","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-07-2112.32.45@2x20230721123310.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1866,"originalWidth":2836,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"4bf29014-7208-45d1-a784-e47f203d87ef","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"任职要求和薪资"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1758ddf3-cc3f-4094-9ff7-318be6a5e8cc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"同岗位远程工作的薪资通常会低于普通坐班，任职要求方面在交互设计相关的岗位来看"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"通常会更高一些"},{"type":"text","text":"，例如除了需要具备交互设计能力，通常还需要 UI、视觉设计能力，另外可能由于远程团队很多都有布局海外市场的原因，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"英语的听说读写能力"},{"type":"text","text":"也成为了任职的标配或加分项。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"31c10d20-6b72-4049-bd22-e5372807254e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这里顺便提一下，在面试时通常会被询问上一份工作的薪资，用人单位会依次来评估你的成本，如果直接说自己在大厂的薪资很可能大大降低自己的性价比，后续有机会我会这样说「我之前的薪资是 XXXX 不过我也知道远程工作待遇会低一些，具体你们按自己的规划即可」"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"523e11cc-fc3c-4fdd-a5d7-d745b8fd072e","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"体验与感受"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d9fce8f5-aa33-457f-a086-5664056adc99"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果你是一名交互设计师，并且很明确自己一定要做远程工作，强烈建议掌握 UI 设计能力成为一名产品设计师，或者可以往产品经理方向发展，现在远程工作基本不会招国内比较普遍的纯交互设计师了。另外一定要让英语达到可以在工作中应用的水平。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ae7a6e7-6112-47ad-9237-a98765e64ecd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"打造个人品牌很重要，我通过搭建个人网站、维护社交平台账号等方式对外输出自己的思考和知识，当需要对用人单位展示自己时会非常方便，甚至有一次面试是用人单位通过这些渠道主动联系我的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"72457020-1b0c-4bce-9dc9-36fa7245c17d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最后聊聊不「上班」这段时间的感受，由于离开了工作团队，和人的交流变少了，也失去了原本团队带来的归属感和工作带来的成就感，于是我开始在其他渠道寻求，包括开始运营社交媒体、更频繁的写文章，做了一款"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://sspai.com/post/80529","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"工具产品"},{"type":"text","text":"，然后就是高频的刷新邮件、社区的通知中心以及查看产品实时的用户访问情况，老实说这种状态不算健康，后续还是要更多投入到学习中去。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"10868848-070f-459e-93c1-89448650bc45"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最后祝大家工作顺利，生活愉快 🌻"}]}]}
cards.title: 远程工作求职经历

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"af03595c-baa7-4939-b0c7-fbb71bb3fafc","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我的一些记忆碎片和想法"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3453e551-6060-4195-9481-7e0f9aaa3f7f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可能喝了太多茶，失眠了。最近老是回忆过往的事情。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d17a4fd7-f37e-403c-a53c-1d63caf36fa5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对外发布的讯息中大多目标也是做到「有用」，想了下，总是发这样的信息也挺无聊的，我希望自己是一个活生生真实的人活着，即便是在数字世界中。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"440bab55-fd08-4976-bc9e-934ab23782fc","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/X0pDyi20230829043725.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1194,"originalWidth":2120,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e250b80f-2c9f-4c4b-b9a9-c21357d0d567","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为产品学习日语"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"30a907a8-b6e2-466c-8c00-4a04d27c1889"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我大学学的是商务日语，很多同学都是因为喜欢日本的动漫和文化才选的这个专业，而我有些不同，这要从高中讲起了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ee7d0834-15ac-4ac0-b7d5-ddca0ee7f339"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"高中的时候通过新闻了解了「钓鱼岛事件」当时全国浸泡在极高的反日情绪中，更有极端者砸毁店铺和日系汽车。那时正值国庆期间，我到了一个山上的景区兼职，和山下的景色不一样的是，这里的游客所携带的相机，都是日本品牌。这让我对日本的产品产生了很多尊敬——究竟是怎样的魔力可以让人一边恨一边又用他们的产品？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"47af32f7-693d-4aec-9e50-0423943eacc7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我希望可以了解日本，了解他们产品成功的原因，去学习他们然后打造出更优秀的产品来打败他们，所以选了日语专业。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f866a9f1-fcdc-4b69-88a2-6687cb244583"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"就像我学习编程、学习设计一样，这一切都是因为我对产品的热爱，对创造的向往。相信会一直热爱下去。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"48ed04eb-500c-4ad8-95f5-cd65a7a8b375","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"老师"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d7323ba2-fc74-4d2a-8280-a2dfbb70381b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我的外教是一位白话讲的比普通话好的日本人，她叫佳子。她想学中文，我想学日语，所以我们经常会约定时间聊天练习口语，一半中文，一半日语。她很温柔，她说教我们就像教幼稚园的孩子一样，要用低幼的语言和我们对话，同时也要付出足够的耐心。记得她唯一一次生气，是因为外语协会的活动我们临近活动开始时间才邀请她，导致她不得不临时调整日程，她很严厉地对我说这样给她带来了很大的困扰。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"75ef53e7-9ff5-4558-afb9-b666062150f8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"教我基础日语的老师可以说对我有知遇之恩。我一直比较内向，很多活动、比赛甚至课堂上回答问题都不太主动，是他推荐我参加了专业内的一个讲故事比赛，还拿到了不错的成绩。我第一次感觉到了原来自己的能力还可以，于是一发不可收拾，整个大学期间参加了很多比赛，得了很多第二名，我很喜欢这个名次，它提醒我「我还可以」而且最重要的是这世界上还有很多比我更厉害的人，这能激励我不断前进。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"72f10495-262e-40b6-b15d-ba0a921bce95","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"摇滚乐"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"22083cc7-9b90-42fa-8af1-53877a0083b6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"中国是一个接收信息和发布信息都被监管的国家。他们决定了我们能看什么、能讲什么。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c80e36ab-6e8e-4e7f-bcbe-ba3e2e34fda7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"摇滚乐用她隐晦的甚至没有符号的语言给我讲了这个国家很多的故事、不同时代的青年共同的情感和愿望。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"59521378-c5df-4942-bba2-601540b0b093"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从《高山下的花环》中听到了越南战争中失去父亲的孩子的痛苦和坚强，不同方言的「如果是这样请不要悲伤」不知道多少次安慰了我；从《硬汉》学习了什么才是真正的硬汉——不成为只有钱才能影响到情绪的臭傻逼；从《人民拥抱想象力》中重新读了鲁迅，知道人应该像大河，要「不绝地与河堤对抗」；《银河公园》中的星星时常问我「你是否还年轻」"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":null,"color":null}}],"text":"……"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a547fd9b-eb7b-49d1-b40e-f676bb89506d","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Smartisan"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"965ca389-5611-43d1-841c-0c50ab6395b4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"锤子科技是我最尊敬的公司，「希望通过创造好的产品（消费类电子产品为主）让世界变的美好一点点」这句话让我也有了同样的目标。我的第一部 Smartisan 设备是 T2，也是第一个用自己的工资买的手机。在发布会时我还在实习，我天真地和主管请假，理由是看 T2 发布会，主管回了一句「光我什么事」。不过在我的哀求下我还是请到了假，去了锤友在电影院举办的聚会。"}]}]}
cards.title: 我的一些记忆碎片和想法

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"64cb087a-3dd3-4900-b646-532a315d9482","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"招募用户"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"cca94814-fb28-4a4b-af16-14471da4d3b8","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c0b0285e-9585-444f-a705-a8bcd563228f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"早期的用户通常需要创始团队逐个招募（可能是私聊的方式），不要害羞勇敢走出去吧。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"85611cdc-2385-4b85-8b19-9ef448c0371d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"31e039e7-e756-488b-ac49-65253a507982"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"你需要找到招募目标用户的渠道，通常可以"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"观察早期来的用户"},{"type":"text","text":"，看看他们属于什么群体，然后到对应的群体中进行招募会更快一些。"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 招募用户

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f3fff579-90ce-4356-8aa0-594e7cb428c2","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"照顾用户的感受"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"76b2004a-3884-4a23-9f17-a3b6668d05d1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"产品早期用户较少，可以更容易做到照顾每一个用户的感受"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"a6b08cc7-0af6-42ed-875b-431a583fbc19","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"32d18263-7978-4034-91c7-5986d600c46f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如通过手写信的方式逐个发送邮件表达感谢"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e23d9bea-f7e2-4525-9763-06e59017141e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eb02e0b0-7e1a-4b24-babb-3a57f810995e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"重视用户的问题"}]}]}]}
