cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8ec03f9c-cb29-4b92-9f58-ae6c7e0bcc7b","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"先手动解决问题"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7b8d02f0-57b2-4356-9c92-77c30cca2333"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"先手动解决问题，等到真正有问题得到解决之后再考虑自动化，避免一开始就想让事情变的完美、高效。"}]}]}
cards.title: 先手动解决问题

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"db932f93-aa74-4656-aa8d-0dba79c70a81","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scouter：学习 YC 课程后我做了什么"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4d68f2ed-9f27-4564-8aa6-344dc39c230d"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2d4a5130-ce79-4532-89e6-f1e81d300716"}},{"type":"text","text":" 最初只是一个练手+给自己做的工具，随着用户反馈的增多加上暂时还没办法到线下坐班，所以准备当作一个正式的产品开始运营。"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.ycombinator.com/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"YC"},{"type":"text","text":" 中有很多文章，简单看了几个就有了很大的收获，这里分享我付出的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"实践"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"34454261-a9c9-4eb3-93c8-544cfed6847a","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"招募用户"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0424334c-0c4b-4f7a-8b85-a678b7edfe4f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"尝试教程提到的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"35faad6c-c685-4b57-8a58-a4e5dced84f5"}},{"type":"text","text":"的方法，就是不厌其烦的一对一招募。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fa9b4f71-b696-454e-a352-3e60866df597"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我先是在一些社区（例如 V2EX）搜索用户和语言学习相关的发言，看到可能潜在的用户就直接私聊/发邮件推销。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"953fb010-465a-4c17-bfa8-958a1efe3159","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Kb085720230903120913.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1806,"originalWidth":1960,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"536db822-8702-4b13-aec3-bd67bbc83be4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"之前在少数派发过"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://sspai.com/post/80529","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"宣传文章"},{"type":"text","text":"，有用户询问是否具备某个功能，当支持此功能后我会回到评论区进行通知，并私聊提出问题的用户邀请使用。在 Twitter 中看到有相关内容的推文，也会在评论区甚至私信推荐一下自己的产品（打扰大家了🙏🏼），效果总体还行。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"97449e8d-1e4f-4aa2-a06c-062b6126d753","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/gFC64L20230902033643.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1038,"originalWidth":1768,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a26df0ea-cd00-498a-8d06-86fb9f511a24","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不要追求用户量"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9ae13ded-739f-43b4-afe5-d043f6de6f1a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不要追求用户量而是优先通过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"298a3706-00f4-4fff-aae6-b0a502a1fd68"}},{"type":"text","text":"找到"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e793962c-d0f7-413b-9fe8-568ed8828277"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f791d256-97fa-455f-8c92-3d43d08a000b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"之前我会经常看产品的数据，这是非常容易获得反馈，也是验证产品是否成功的标准，然而除了因为数据增减而高兴、沮丧之外，对产品没有任何的帮助（此时还没有做更细化的用户行为数据埋点）。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e3b62d06-7a3e-4b67-9017-1019b7085209"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PMF 是指产品与市场匹配，从 Scouter 的活跃用户数据来看很明显还没有匹配市场：有 2 个数据剧烈的起伏点，是因为在少数派写的文章被精选、首页推荐，但在数据波动之后虽然活跃用户数上升到了更高的水平，但增长的速度并没有提升很多。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"73a5df8b-1c1c-459b-add5-ad4ffb4f208f","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-09-0203.39.43@2x20230902034006.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":494,"originalWidth":1920,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"946ec2e5-d764-4de3-b327-c5f1184ee2a9","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与用户沟通"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c113b577-3814-4b9e-be8b-c1615fe4d2d4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与用户沟通才能了解到产品对他们的价值以及现存的问题，更深入理解他们的背景和目标。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f8877d3c-3ba6-4099-96bd-132360f34185"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我会在 Discord 中对于新进社区的成员主动留言沟通，相比较之前的根据用户反馈问题后再追问的方式更加积极了。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"3577653b-301b-4bdd-8111-3e451f5dc575","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CjUGM020230903121045.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1158,"originalWidth":1910,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9068ae7f-c39b-4f96-a913-08ce4a664944"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对于用户我比较关心以下几点"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"84dc0de1-dbc0-4ab0-b8d1-6c035fb8aa5d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"62906d28-f762-48c3-aed4-b47deb3eac91"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用户的背景是什么，他学习语言的目标是什么"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"44ce3999-9ece-4c31-8b16-253eaf122e20","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"614abccf-c60f-4a32-b32f-25a7fe8809fc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么使用 Scouter ？"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"98a04b9a-c37d-49a4-bfa6-8223033c93c4","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8620fad7-de47-463c-a0d9-76424fe7898b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scouter 目前最让他感到不顺手的地方是什么？"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38920939-769b-4a8e-b4c0-e08588c9f1eb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在沟通过程中可以获得几个维度的信息"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5d0dc172-32ff-4967-99a0-15c36168f3d4","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"16daee0a-80d3-4e29-9b50-4b5a315f32c0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用户觉得好，但 Scouter 还不具备的"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"65c0f7a4-787c-4617-a0d7-ce849fd52747","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"672688ea-2b9e-4663-b4d2-0b21ef89906c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用户觉得好，且 Scouter 已经具备的"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b18e4b56-21fc-4f21-8522-c854b778b64f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b365428b-edb8-4384-9b33-a68ce2683cf7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用户觉得不好，但 Scouter 不存在此问题"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"10228f6f-2332-4c8b-819c-c9726c3fa1d5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"40b0cad3-bde3-47c7-8f08-410f9ebf16cc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用户觉得不好，且 Scouter 存在此问题"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"50fbbaf3-6540-4985-837e-f009b70d9cdd","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f9db0088-c6d1-46ff-886d-5eec3c904565"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用户的学习目标和身份背景等信息"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa178b2b-056f-4759-9c22-425780907e1f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我在 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"aeea2c56-4050-4252-81c2-af84f8140412"}},{"type":"text","text":" 中整理这些信息，并对不同维度的内容附上不同的颜色，这样我可以快速了解不同用户的共性和差异。过程中，发现支持导入 Anki 是很多人看重的功能，随后就进行相关优化——支持导入发音、简化导入的信息等。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"5b32687a-0fe6-4aa7-9b8e-9904e1a2107b","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/Hl8KV420230903120957.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":815,"originalWidth":1189,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0f8df7ed-90e8-4e04-ae9f-5fad0b79cbe0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不过目前还面临一个问题，就是社区活跃度不高，比较少引发讨论。怎样提升社区活跃？想了几个方案正在执行"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8cf783b6-fba5-43f2-9407-ca5600c5ad32","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4f2b4bbf-0985-4c00-a804-2c2e0b567488"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"新人进入社区后主动打招呼"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"49453f68-b25c-4792-bc48-ea3cad553b04","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"78fc43e0-a4c6-4b9e-be6b-020739f2b70b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分享一些语言学习相关的思考、教程"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1f11eda0-672e-4f16-9089-10ea1b566dd6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目前来看效果一般，可能根源还是社区的人数太少。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8b399424-774d-4de6-8eb5-cccd552d20bb","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"付费"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"56c3150e-3974-4a31-ab73-dc6c0ee48186"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一直有想通过产品来获取收入，但对产品没有自信所以一开始并没有做付费的功能，只是在角落放了一个打赏的按钮。通过 YC 了解到，产品应该支持付费，因为付费可以"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"验证产品"},{"type":"text","text":"是否真正满足了用户的需求。另外，许多用户卸载时反馈没有 OpenAI Key，所以无法使用产品，我可以通过收取一定费用然后提供 Key 给用户解决这个问题。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"77bd23e0-0087-4e73-a494-ce61f680484a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"付费方案要解决几个问题"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"60395ce8-b254-4dc9-b4ec-92d2998547b8","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97ab78ef-1bfa-4be2-9f83-11887e79db01"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"付费后提供什么功能？"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"9d931e03-c2b5-4a15-9317-6d1af82abbd0","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"af574e37-194b-4059-8920-011e52af4c1d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何验证付费状态？"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c01f887f-7e10-4183-9d43-7d42b5b534b0","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c4b96fe6-460c-4d8d-83e7-f9e3ff25df0b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何收款？"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e87cfa09-27c9-45c8-9a66-a8b06b4b8daf","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a0ac94f9-7cb7-41b0-ac93-28b26be2ef29"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"买断、订阅还是按照用量？"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2d17def9-978c-4c5b-9fd7-49440ce60f41","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"付费后提供什么功能？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"23208372-2d3a-438a-bf93-48e16225b4bf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"由于要解决没有 Key 的用户使用 Scouter 的问题，所以最初规划付费会直接提供用户 API Key。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7afddf5c-bd16-4be5-a4eb-008fa5514a02"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Key 的服务商对比了几家之后选择了 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://openrouter.ai/account","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Open router"},{"type":"text","text":"，原因有几点"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"63f3ab03-1f77-4dd8-92d1-32a0874833d4","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"50d6db4a-7004-4cda-ba23-d975a83ea904"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"价格是我知道的最便宜的"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"16bfdd8c-1265-4a1b-9c19-371f74adc776","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d89a09de-7d96-46f3-9a35-43aff7eb8719"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"支持 Key 的额度管理，这样我就可以避免一个 Key 被多人共用导致的成本超标"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"df85816f-53d9-48af-afce-a67338eb48bd","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c04b51b0-4a32-4c23-b496-6380b53f735c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"支持多种模型可选"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9c803c70-0498-4daa-a422-b5c2160880e6","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何验证付费状态？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"695e072f-bf67-4ac8-af23-6b21af989380"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Open router 提供了查询 Key 的额度接口，后续可以基于剩余额度来开发更多付费功能，例如当有额度时可以解锁 Pro 功能等等。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c176a358-0853-4219-8ff8-fa2a81578638","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何收款？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"deb5e516-96e4-4d58-8265-51f1abd2f32e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"收款方式方面，根据"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"0fc0d902-8445-465b-b929-6cf85574f0e4"}},{"type":"text","text":"的原则，直接贴了微信的收款码，用户在付款时备注邮箱，通过人工来发放 License Key。同时为了支持更多付费渠道，还接入了 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.lemonsqueezy.com/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Lemon squeezy"},{"type":"text","text":"。先验证有付费的价值，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"待真的有大量付费后，再考虑更加自动化的方式"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"fdabd49e-c350-4e84-b133-c421650d5828","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"买断、订阅还是按照用量？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d330bbed-6f13-4d9b-acfc-a29be2204fdf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"按月订阅是我优先考虑的选项，因为这能体现用户的付费留存、鼓励产品持续成长。但考虑到 Key 的成本最后没有选择，因为没有账号系统，我暂时没有办法限制 1 个 Key 只能被 1 位用户使用。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6300c415-ef8b-47c6-941e-366a675f8f50"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"买断对于按量付费的 API 来说也显然不合适。最后选择了按量计费，会提供用户 1,000K Token 的额度。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8a857b97-f439-4c18-be56-4ddd199a3490","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"方案迭代"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ee5ed48c-772e-474b-a873-c2f9c60d96ca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在上线付费功能后，很快获得了收入，同时也出现了一个卸载的峰值，不过总体用户数还是处在增长的趋势。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"715adb50-bda2-4122-9be3-dc650de2cf0a","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-09-0718.10.11@2x20230907181044.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1680,"originalWidth":2240,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2be86d1a-53f8-4972-8c77-f6140cdebd8a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"很快，这个付费方案发现了问题，就是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"不稳定"},{"type":"text","text":"。因为 API Key 是由第三方服务商提供，近期出现了被 OpenAI 限制的情况，导致 OpenAI 的模型不可用。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"c6b4b928-d39c-42f0-b46a-3761d498f889","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-09-0311.16.4120230903111700.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":554,"originalWidth":2720,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"93af3479-1835-4ebc-83cf-825f101e8e4a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"作为用户付费后要提供的服务，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"长期稳定的承诺是最重要的"},{"type":"text","text":"，所以我立即调整了方案：付费后可"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"解锁 Pro 功能"},{"type":"text","text":"，例如图片搜索、追加查询等我完全可控的功能。最近上线了「导入发音到 Anki 中」我预测可以解决很多用户的痛点，但并没有作为 Pro 功能，因为发音的服务由第三方提供，同样存在不确定因素。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"23b82a5e-c000-419d-9a7e-c56c3c61d65b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"验证付费状态方面，生成 UUID 手动发送到用户的邮箱，然后利用 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://aircode.io/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"AirCode"},{"type":"text","text":" 搭了一个简单的服务器，利用 AirCode 的图形化数据库管理功能手动将 UUID 填写到数据库中，前端提交 Key 查询时会返回 Key 是否有效，从而解锁 Pro 功能。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"60989742-0a8c-4731-a1a1-1d45fa40c84a","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-09-0311.34.59@2x20230903113521.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":880,"originalWidth":2280,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c571aa33-6574-45cc-b653-adcdf985fe3d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"收款方式仍然是微信收款码，同时去除了 Lemon squeezy，因为提现的门槛太高，对国内开发者很不友好。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4eb83065-194c-4122-819c-604832db2a1e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这次调整尽量也不影响旧付费方案的用户，Key 的额度仍然可用并且同时也支持解锁新方案中的 Pro 功能。上线后也有用户开始付费了。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1e11e762-9cc6-46f3-9884-656e1656075e","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"照顾用户的感受"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2e508437-9b82-4adc-9415-8902f00081c8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目前用户付费后我是手动给用户写邮件发激活码，这可以比机器自动发多许多温度，比如第一个付费用户我就把对方对我信任的感激以及回复晚了的歉意表达出来。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"b52ef7cd-de34-4eef-9df2-283f830db101","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-09-0203.34.0320230902033431.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1100,"originalWidth":1956,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b78e3bd3-aa37-4aa1-baf6-7f5728132dd9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另外，对于社区中用户的问题也会积极了解情况、解决，解决之后会单独 @ 对方表达对需求的重视。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ef0a9dba-224b-4a3c-85f2-486731614c0d","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9556036b-0398-4059-8b91-1c5c0b41c7fb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这些事情都符合一个原则——"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"518bf0f4-d1a2-4d6f-9d2a-e9908842e6a2"}},{"type":"text","text":"，推荐大家阅读一下"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"http://paulgraham.com/ds.html","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"原文"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"95a96668-193f-4453-a066-b7730c9c2c85"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"利用这个项目学习到了很多，除了运营产品的方法，还对语言学习方法有了更系统的认识。之前开发过很多自娱自乐的小工具，Scouter 则是第一个认真当作产品来维护的工具，只有认真对待它，它才会给你回报。"}]}]}
cards.title: Scouter：学习 YC 课程后我做了什么

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"55e5e465-c13f-4d63-b42b-79f2ac3b8aeb","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"与用户沟通"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dd65aa2d-1522-4634-8ef2-ecc7803f975e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在创业早期最重要的事情是和用户沟通、开发产品。应该避免会议、宣传其他事项影响了这 2 件最重要的事情。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e28e611b-c378-4cfb-b7ba-c4382499d1ac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这也是要"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"text","color":"orange"}}],"text":"尽早推出产品"},{"type":"text","text":"的原因，尽早推出尽早和用户沟通确认产品真正解决了他们的需求。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c99f17e-677b-4e08-84f0-8fbdabcae63a"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.ycombinator.com/library/4D-yc-s-essential-startup-advice","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.ycombinator.com/library/4D-yc-s-essential-startup-advice"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"c6ebf1de-65df-46c1-8eaf-4d01c4dea474"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f4cf2526-71a4-4fbc-a9e8-9d94013d8f58"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7d7d411f-d394-4913-954f-595789ce5b79"}}]}]}
cards.title: 与用户沟通

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"509217b2-fa34-411f-94d6-d80578dd359c","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PMF"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b0aa06e2-d797-4999-8a36-a53e7e69b6fc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PMF 是指产品与市场适配，既做出了用户真正需要的产品，如何判断？根据用户"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"dbe253e2-0d11-473b-a24e-97b4ebab3ebc"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"789c116d-2612-4964-86a3-c4049149872a"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f16b13c5-f372-4a49-9b9a-b86442688252"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://medium.com/founders-notes/%E5%89%B5%E6%A5%AD%E7%AD%86%E8%A8%98-%E5%9B%9B-%E6%A0%B8%E5%BF%83%E6%8C%87%E6%A8%99%E7%9A%84%E6%88%90%E9%95%B7-e6ff7b53385#:~:text=%E6%98%AF%E6%89%BE%E5%88%B0-,Product%20Market%20Fit,-%EF%BC%88%E7%94%A2%E5%93%81%E8%88%87","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"\"Product Market Fit\""}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9eb68041-1ad1-40e1-be39-05382cc9a8a7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这篇文章则提供了更容易判断的标准：当你为维持产品感到不知所措时，当你为应付产品的基本运行而焦头烂额无法估计大的更新时，当用户消费的速度和你提供服务的速度一样快时，这说明你的产品和市场匹配了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7645d20b-89a0-49d6-a0d7-4bdecb77dddb"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.michaelseibel.com/blog/the-real-product-market-fit","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.michaelseibel.com/blog/the-real-product-market-fit"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e6685520-40c7-41be-ae2d-e1c5fa96e725"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"下面这篇文章则量化了 PMF 的达成标准："},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"当 40% 的用户认为不能再用这款产品会「"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"},{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"非常失望"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"」时证明达到了 PMF"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"70ff59e7-8f78-44a7-9bf0-ab7b80661818"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://medium.com/@shengyuchen/how-to-talk-to-users-bd6ba2dae896","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://medium.com/@shengyuchen/how-to-talk-to-users-bd6ba2dae896"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e0c439ec-3b0e-4f2e-8fec-609de46360b7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"没有达到 PMF 的几个特点"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8f8928f1-44f7-4d74-a1fd-f48eafa023b2","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6a7b2cb6-c7d4-4904-ab1d-fa54ad55e936"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用户不会自发的和其他人推荐产品"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"fe845ed6-99d7-4094-82e4-e4f3e040a3f0","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"28c7a79d-c30d-4860-91e1-93d93e9b811c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"目前有部分用户会推荐，但人数不多"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ba6e78ae-a4c8-4702-8e55-206d86111ea8","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bea401e0-ca59-40de-87fd-5c5e335f88ad"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用户增长速度缓慢，口碑没有传播"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a96e9f68-b530-4923-9642-afd8ce6cb234"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://review.firstround.com/how-superhuman-built-an-engine-to-find-product-market-fit","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://review.firstround.com/how-superhuman-built-an-engine-to-find-product-market-fit"}]}]}
cards.title: PMF

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6c360f84-d2c9-4235-8903-5d69b85e06ee","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"生成学习方法"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c4fce51b-b70d-4a6d-adf3-a60bb4a09ad1"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"f51688e4-ab53-4f33-b890-65864c0e376d"}},{"type":"text","text":"是指学习不是被动的接收输入的信息，而是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"有选择"},{"type":"text","text":"的注意某类信息，然后主动"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"构建信息之间意义"},{"type":"text","text":"的过程。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"77c52aa5-a64c-41d6-a334-6a7a3ab0ea83"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"生成学习的主要流程"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3d10fa44-e255-460d-b7bd-bc522bb93904","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4fe2cff9-83ae-4f97-89ff-a52c04e96bd8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"选择阶段"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"035a7339-380a-4a09-bc8a-3ce140ed08bd","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4dbc1851-dce7-40a5-8db4-79fb100a503a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"构建意义阶段"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"0c22177b-471b-42f2-bd86-4fc24190dfd8","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5572fc00-e8cd-4eec-96de-efc5ef69f686"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"完成构建阶段"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7114af37-841b-4ef0-b39a-e0c0887daff7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://kns.cnki.net/kcms2/article/abstract?v=ohXIcpZjJKzQHacE-INAYHBVRuLt5cwP-0DivDjQsgfgFWmgBSduQ8OsmB1EqDsF35-So8FZE2fRip0MX4XxYuguVJwKz7oJOrBul0IOkMoc7qqNvipiV6iImoPgw-EgrY4VFpjs0wBkYH17HOFBrw%3D%3D&uniplatform=NZKPT&language=CHS","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"《八种生成学习策略》"},{"type":"text","text":"这篇论文中，作者介绍了几种策略，接下来分享一下我的实践方式。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"7fb25f7c-35f7-4093-b217-6f7ff6ed1274","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"选择"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"96f014eb-2e45-45f5-ac4f-20ceba635625"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cceb8f65-e459-439b-b2a3-361a4e68bc91"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习者受自己"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9be47ea3-af35-49cd-8c1c-8a13dd575130"}},{"type":"text","text":"的经验与知识结构影响，选择自己想要学习的内容"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5c8611e3-2ff5-4b41-93bf-ffa340ccbd02"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当我在选择学习目标时，我会从以下几个方面进行思考。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"395c28d7-3cf2-49e0-a205-8209e77a5f98","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PARA"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"da287428-0e88-4b64-bc08-1fdb3ca25f50"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"08d9a517-f7eb-4bdf-8ee2-ec23d60471d3"}},{"type":"text","text":"是一种知识/信息的管理方法，其中一个 A 是指 Area，也就是你收集的信息和知识应该"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"围绕少数几个领域"},{"type":"text","text":"，这样可以帮助你保持专注，并且让知识更容易形成聚集，知识之间更容易相互联结，对于"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"意义构建"},{"type":"text","text":"阶段会比较有帮助。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5f3aaa92-89a9-432f-b43c-4c864cb9b2f3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我作为软件行业的从业者认为做产品就像烹饪一样，应该理解食材和食客等因素，所以我把领域集中在认知科学（了解人）、技术（了解食材）和设计（烹饪方法）这几个方面。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"0e121670-8d4e-4c69-80c7-d38b43bfc0ae","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信息正交"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8be7a5bf-4f95-40c5-af30-1687db0d72cc"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"764cbfa7-d40a-463e-a4ee-8048a85d1114"}},{"type":"text","text":"是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5863c3f7-a3b1-4770-ba78-b56bba78cd5d"}},{"type":"text","text":"中的一个知识，是指在评价某个信息的价值时，不能单独评估，而是要将其周围的其他信息放在一起共同评价。例如饮食讲究荤素搭配，蔬菜虽好但如果今日菜单中已经有许多蔬菜，那么添加一些肉类就更加合适。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"9578486e-34e1-4b44-80f1-0ab58f7d04f1","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/HtVcWr20231108132311.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1250,"originalWidth":2027,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e9510ab6-8f3a-462a-bb95-de0b37f23b27"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在选择自己的目标时，吴军老师在《信息论 40 讲》中介绍了利用信息正交的具体操作方法，在确立自己的目标后："}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"5abeaef4-33f9-440b-8552-9c5c5cff1c0b","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b271823c-ca68-4231-9fdd-41dfaae4af56"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"第 1 轮排名，先按照优先级排名列出学习的项目"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e3ae2def-3f55-477b-94f2-4f8d4afe59ef","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c1f963f3-e9f7-4881-b45b-38bf67cd2987"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"第 2 轮排名，同样按照优先级排名，不过这一次要思考排名对象与第 1 轮排名第 1 的项目结合后的价值，也可以结合自己已有的知识/技能思考其优先级"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d04c29c5-2d51-4245-94d1-a66fcbce63a0","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e3165c0b-df00-45f2-997a-da56f16c7abd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"进行第 3 轮排名"}]}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"edd53255-8377-4c33-915a-d3c1e8543cbd","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/1RtZpg20231108132328.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1074,"originalWidth":1688,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"57a3f3d4-e490-4975-9f54-3a0f59e284ad"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我职业生涯的目标是可以打造一款革命性的产品，为了实现这一目标而进行学习。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b7286f9a-f8bb-4701-ae86-83470d3840cf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"首先列出了所有我想要学习的项目，发现最重要的是英语，因为很多优秀的知识都是由英文书写的，不管学习什么，提升英文信息的获取能力都是最重要的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ccc8a26b-4599-425f-9fb2-00e41e9ca326"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"计算机先驱的思考为我提供了非常多的启发，他们描述了计算机令人憧憬且至今仍未实现的未来，如果英文水平可以比较无障碍阅读，我最希望进一步了解他们的思想，所以在第 2 轮排名中将其排在了第一。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c0cb63da-9771-4285-8d50-9968abb1981f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在第 3 轮排名中，我在设计、认知科学、编程和创业知识之间纠结了一会，发现自己没有想清楚到底是要以设计师身份加入一个团队打造产品，还是要以创业者身份带领团队。最后选择了加入团队，那样会离我理想的产品更加接近。学习计算机先驱的思想可以帮助我理解产品的大方向，之后最重要的就是如何沿着这条方向将产品打造出来，所以选择了在团队中更加实用的 UI/UX 设计能力。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6c4ce51c-c86c-4a80-afde-6549346f05d5","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实践土壤"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ffce0be-b742-4ab9-b985-9b64c5282582"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"光有长远的目标还不够，学习项目的选择还要结合当下。「"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"我要学习的知识在当下可以帮助我做的更好吗？"},{"type":"text","text":"」这是我筛选学习内容最重要条件之一，如果缺乏"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/8f5a1330-0ed6-4fea-a5c6-84c7cec89df4","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"实践土壤"},{"type":"text","text":"会面临几个问题"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c87602ad-47a8-4cf8-b73e-0ee9b6290f52","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ddb49e2b-51df-4faf-9dda-5be5c7ca5aa3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"降低动机，做所有事都需要动机，如果学习的内容近期对我没有帮助则动机就会大大降低"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ffdf8d58-97ab-4302-9e21-2e8c85f3107f","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"08fd5940-3c92-4c8d-a14b-6038acb1d294"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"缺少反馈，学习的内容无法在实践中检验，不知道自己学习的情况从而优化学习节奏/方法"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8694c718-b544-460a-860a-9b000946caa6","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7a6ded64-bcfe-4e2d-9d0d-c4f930710907"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"知识更容易被遗忘，根据「用进废退」原则，没有实践的知识很容易遗忘导致投入的浪费"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1fad10a7-69a1-407c-b203-78432d7d122d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在学习英文时，我会找适合我水平的文章进行阅读；在学习计算机先驱的思想后就将其运用在 1 张卡片，然后将这些卡片放入白板中思考彼此的关系。"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"49d0a8af-3a00-4fc3-90f0-20324467fe74"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"debb9256-a8c4-44a9-a482-217c04859c3c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将文本信息转换为图示表示的过程能够有效地促进学习者的认知加工，即从文本中选择相关的信息，以图示的形式组织信息的表征，再整合已有的知识来阐述信息的意义和与图示之间的关联。——八种生成学习策略_洛根·费奥雷拉"}]}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"aeb47a92-234c-4afb-a999-9bdd744c7c19","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-11-0218.43.22@2x20231102184335.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1168,"originalWidth":2352,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ab3d1392-1920-49e6-a5a5-345f3a20f0c3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"空间思考对于学习复杂知识非常有效："}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"2e95dd3e-5b75-467b-a1bd-0218c5ac77fc"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b01adc47-d160-4a9d-a4c2-d181215c10ab"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习材料具有高度复杂性或空间延展性，或学习者无法以一己之力完成相关空间联系的内化，又或学习者无法得到现成的合适的外部空间表征。由此可见，空间生成策略对于学习者学习复杂的空间概念， 如 STEM 时会特别有效——八种生成学习策略_洛根·费奥雷拉"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b87e923e-c7d2-4a35-a72c-c73838ac1748","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"建立外部链接"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ebd308df-71f2-401d-88c5-0740eb7157cd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"建立外部链接就是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/965c051a-bc9a-42e4-b001-942ae420289f","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"将新知识和旧知识放在一起思考"},{"type":"text","text":"。一方面，通过相关知识的联想可以提升知识的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/b036a7c2-5d67-4748-abff-e782ebae170c","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"提取强度"},{"type":"text","text":"，所学知识更容易在未来得到应用。另一方面，通过对比不同的知识往往会激发创意。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"10319451-0d87-4b84-bac6-a8e159769bc2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如设计领域非常著名的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"697909cc-84ff-4302-b978-450139f15884"}},{"type":"text","text":"灵感就来自于化学。就像物质由原子组成分子再组合成有机物，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"http://bradfrost.com/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Brad 运用原子的思路组织设计系统，在设计领域得到广泛的应用。心理学领域的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"5885e16c-a684-4f85-970a-62a81619ff9a"}},{"type":"text","text":"也借用了物理学"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"30467f2e-b84e-49fa-b205-a90e2d6cd2a8"}},{"type":"text","text":"的概念。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"af08ad0c-feaf-4554-be23-d81e03c2f1c2","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/dQssJY20231108132342.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":483,"originalWidth":1200,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2c7e2f44-9ad6-4381-b4a5-69c301918439","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"联想要义"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0a4de43a-27f7-4911-9991-176ecc09adfd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"前面提到了利用白板思考知识之间的关系，在此阶段，我会联想旧知识中相关的概念，同样拖入白板中进行连线、标注。"}]},{"type":"blockquote","attrs":{"id":"26bf0f5b-d484-4083-b044-f87087b44e3b"},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"175ca744-f707-4cb8-a615-efe9864b5f99"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"联想要义"},{"type":"text","text":"是指学习者通过积极联想授课重点，建立彼此联系，从而创建心理表征。（Leopold and Mayer， 2015）"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"29e22008-4f9d-41ac-9ba0-c93dd34e0fbb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如了解到「生成式学习」有效之后我开始思考其有效的原因，发现各种学习策略都涉及到对学习材料不同方式的加工，而之前在认知心理学中了解到的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4348348e-b6c0-490b-af1f-22bb0b3bc5eb"}},{"type":"text","text":"概念提到：对信息加工越深则在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9be47ea3-af35-49cd-8c1c-8a13dd575130"}},{"type":"text","text":"中停留的程度就越好，正好解释了「生成式学习」的原理。这就完成了一次与外部知识的链接，不但对新知识有了更深入的理解，也对旧知识进行了复习。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"a0d3286a-5d41-4ec2-af8c-24caa1708d82","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-11-0218.59.59@2x20231102190010.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1298,"originalWidth":2550,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"79cd8ea9-0782-4af1-b106-62b1c4c99d4a","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习策略的选择"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c802cf8d-a566-4c42-8ee4-0588629dedaa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"要想选择合适的学习策略，需要"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"结合学习者已有的知识以及学习材料的特性"},{"type":"text","text":"（Wittrock，1989）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9a56c231-8668-486a-9b51-c4c9ea5349b3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习材料比较复杂和具有空间延展性时，空间策略会比较有效（Stieff al.，2014）。反过来，如果是记叙文等平铺结构的材料，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"使用自己的语言复述"},{"type":"text","text":"会比空间策略更加有效。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e90a45ff-4cca-4d50-b57d-06ac3ae54b84"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当然学习策略可以混合使用，例如可以将复杂的学习材料拆分为几个小知识，然后使用复述来完成内部理解，再利用空间策略梳理各个知识点的关系，进而加入外部知识进行联想"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"72b1e381-8f53-4aee-9481-21b1aa7917e5","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"完成构建"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"25513ed8-c974-4932-9a23-2b35a1468ff8","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"费曼学习"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"044c8dcc-3b49-4f03-ab8d-749e9e7b370c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"费曼学习是一种以教代学的方法，尝试将自己所学的概念教授给他人。在这个过程中可以完成对学习内容的巩固，若发现无法讲清楚则可以回过头复习一下。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ef1de69b-0fdb-42fc-99af-f340b6b086fd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我将这种「教学」分为轻度、重度两种。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8768b969-eabd-4d99-9d6f-7d6e7b10d50f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"之前会在吃饭期间和同事分享所学的知识，不但能达到前面提到的效果，对方的反馈往往也会给我新的启发。后来离职之后，这种轻度的分享转为通过 Twitter 发文。重度的「教学」则是通过写文章，在团队内则会通过演讲的方式和大家分享。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d6e406fa-58c1-4a35-9b9f-ac91950fa35f","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习不一定要学习"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5ba8dc40-8dfa-48bb-af58-76e93ad8c956"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"经常说劳逸结合所以要多休息、多运动，原本一直以为是学习之外的修整方式，没想到竟然也会直接对学习效果产生影响。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"7e43b4a9-1e2d-40d0-8b09-c4e54a1f897f","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"睡眠"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4ebdf2ed-df2d-4cd3-bf0d-8d558032b8d2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"很多人应该都体验过睡眠不足时的那种晕眩、头疼的感觉。睡眠状态下大脑可以排出毒素从而避免学习工作时难以集中注意力。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"5e928547-332c-4f55-bfc1-e144e209667b","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/6W4knh20231108132359.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":542,"originalWidth":954,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"123dd0b4-d5dd-403c-87cc-013709e47cab"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"睡眠时会让前额叶（负责处理"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7e0ff3c8-f768-4bd8-b003-efec2a5cef3a"}},{"type":"text","text":"）放松，从而大脑其余部分可以更轻松的进行"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"16632fc5-5d21-4235-8079-0fde53bbbe20"}},{"type":"text","text":"于连接，这对知识的吸收与灵感的迸发都有益处。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"07039173-f3e4-432e-864f-0206f8a746a2","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/aklnQi20231108132419.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":538,"originalWidth":957,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"e8ab04d7-466a-4bef-8722-56562be32f90","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"运动"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f161edf-a1f4-4087-a221-e7ada5f91ed7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"充足的活动有助于学习，实验研究了关起来的大白鼠和生活空间较大可以相对自由活动并于其他白鼠进行交流的大白鼠，发现那些有更多空间的白鼠的神经元有更多的增长，神经元的增长有助于学习。如果没有充足的空间，锻炼也可以刺激神经元生成。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ee366270-0eb0-469c-970f-f302b56b3940","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"尾巴"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b2c89028-a11d-47a8-ab5a-3f743d1c2909"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"生成学习流程包括选择学习内容、理解学习内容并与外部知识共同联想进行扩展，最后通过输出来完成知识的构建。其中最核心的是，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"学习不是被动输入而是主动建构的过程"},{"type":"text","text":"，所以学习应该主动筛选信息源，有目的的学习，而不是被动的接收。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d5bed7dc-9db4-4bc9-8ac5-dbd6c08420f8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"希望大家都能找到学习的乐趣，都能有收获🐣。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"169566ef-3a32-41ea-ab22-7c5bfb067e13","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"参考资料"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b66dd910-adeb-4768-a38a-30bee5ff4d17","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bbcf0b4e-597b-4ce2-b2cc-91479bfe37d3"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":null,"color":null}}],"text":"洛根·费奥雷拉,理查德 E.梅耶,陆琦等.八种生成学习策略[J].数字教育,2016,2(03):86-92+2."}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4b36b8cf-9a3c-4faa-bb17-5d3717afe933","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ff7e831-6dd9-42d1-bbf5-bee3a21f7ffe"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":null,"color":null}}],"text":"谭敬德,陈清,张艳丽.维特罗克生成学习理论认识论特征分析及其对教学设计的指导意义[J].电化教育研究,2009,(08):"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f3f2fe07-63cb-400d-b4f9-d5955104063b","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d3423921-e461-466b-80b0-4a5908f4fb8e"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/learning-how-to-learn/lecture/AsWfx/the-importance-of-sleep-in-learning","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"睡眠对学习的帮助"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d7fa8eaf-81a7-447e-88b1-5ffa6f19ec35","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"241eb415-d69f-4ed0-b321-337aa239bc84"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.coursera.org/learn/learning-how-to-learn/lecture/8IUbH/interview-with-dr-terrence-sejnowski","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"充足的活动有助于学习"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"4bf1e22a-3a7c-410d-8e18-a33288033231"}}]}
cards.title: 生成学习方法

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"73ba7bb2-391e-41f6-bf77-e82711021aa0","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"维特罗克生成学习理论"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"be3336a3-6cf3-4a2f-8083-69f6e2fc18e5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b28b12ad-df38-4b83-915f-dc11fdf01543"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"分为 3 个阶段"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4bda055a-4598-405b-8391-3159070b279e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f761ace2-ed59-4984-9358-99deec94da0c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"注意和选取阶段，学习者受自己"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9be47ea3-af35-49cd-8c1c-8a13dd575130"}},{"type":"text","text":"的经验与知识结构影响，选择自己想要学习的内容"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"fd1056a3-11a0-4df5-8b0e-99eb72354312","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ec1ea642-d92c-4e12-9767-566dadc59073"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主动构建意义阶段，学习者将学习材料放在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7e0ff3c8-f768-4bd8-b003-efec2a5cef3a"}},{"type":"text","text":"中，并且与"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9be47ea3-af35-49cd-8c1c-8a13dd575130"}},{"type":"text","text":"的已有知识主动构建意义的过程，意义构建有可能成功也有可能失败，失败时学习者会返回检查学习材料。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"abbf4906-ebcb-416b-8fda-f863fc1f63b5","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d32ebcd0-06fa-490c-9e95-7e19c8de2b23"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"构建完成阶段，完成理解、意义构建后，新知识就会从"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7e0ff3c8-f768-4bd8-b003-efec2a5cef3a"}},{"type":"text","text":"加入到"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9be47ea3-af35-49cd-8c1c-8a13dd575130"}},{"type":"text","text":"中"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2990a0f3-2a53-49dd-8b94-fc455d537c5d"},"content":[{"type":"pdf_card","attrs":{"pdfCardId":"4cf5b72d-4f2c-4dbd-9a60-51b5ce209ce6"}}]}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9c87442b-96af-4422-925c-9ed3d683051a","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"制定学习趋近型目标"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"26aed1ee-fb82-452d-b341-25c690c38df0","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3dc12183-ce82-4c14-9255-202c66bff8b1"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4136d5fd-b0ec-4a81-9110-bca19716f884","cardTitle":"《动机心理学》"}},{"type":"text","text":"P94 认为"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c77e61f0-5e3f-47ba-b5a6-b5461de3a8f2","cardTitle":"能力"}},{"type":"text","text":"的目标受到 4 种属性的影响"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"46f03420-4594-47f1-806e-917ae45aa698","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c38df7b2-f98e-4065-b4d0-75e02e505eeb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习：目标是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"提高"},{"type":"text","text":"自己的能力，例如提升个人认知能力"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"09287dab-b759-437c-bbfd-fcb6d736e9b2","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c755a8d3-34f0-4513-a316-193eecb8d25c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对应"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8b5219f7-66f3-4ef5-8479-5543929eaf77","cardTitle":"输入"}},{"type":"text","text":"知识时的动机来源，通过输入提高能力。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"868648af-f546-4f68-8f28-72e7989ac533","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5bcf80f3-be78-4633-a359-d93db98e4542"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"成绩：目标是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"证明"},{"type":"text","text":"自己的能力，例如考 100 分"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"824cbb57-5e23-4ee7-b7aa-9c3a58017198","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"27c248e9-07db-4e13-90ac-d33e00937e5d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对应"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d7f9511c-fe15-4a6f-a832-6d51eca7cce2","cardTitle":"输出"}},{"type":"text","text":"时的动机来源，通过输出证明自己的能力。"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"72086d81-eb1a-4b82-a0a6-ac98f1558ef5","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"059ec2f0-a0c6-409a-b4f9-3d9d206707f3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"趋近：趋近好的目标，例如在考试中获得 100 分"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"69a2fb49-5d93-409d-8620-50eecceb5780","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4b0d64aa-ee58-4a57-8d6a-c3387fec4a55"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"回避：回避不好的结果，例如不要考试不及格"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"10ec03c5-7195-4ac2-bd38-83de92240e51","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa76f9ba-3282-42d4-a34f-90746a25cce9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这 4 种属性相互组合可以获得 4 种类型的目标"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"089e9dd2-c262-4059-a5be-8731615f2ac6","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"593f2b31-2b0b-4b82-8eec-351ece85af7f"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"学习趋近"},{"type":"text","text":"：例如提高绘画水平"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b7d14bdb-6ee4-4fc4-9fff-9b19a36e4995","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5875ce10-6f04-4cd6-a2ed-7932e341302d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习回避：例如避免日语水平下降"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"094c879c-777c-4979-baee-e2c174cb6c1e","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a1cb653a-a76c-415f-94e3-41966f4b018b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"成绩趋近：例如获得驾照"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"4ae902e4-c7f9-4274-b1bd-c7bf6cb4c48b","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5724b38a-eb21-48b1-982a-a12993f08feb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"成绩回避：例如避免考试不及格"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"472db0a1-8595-4a35-bca4-41b2a86e9083","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9a404fb8-828a-448b-a512-410ff0b917f1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"埃利奥特、霍莉的研究表明，"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"学习趋近"},{"type":"text","text":"型的效益最大，成就回避型则效益最差，所以我们应该更多选择学习趋近型的目标。"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"0adae166-7005-4525-9f30-ccfc471272e3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"66e5343c-baa4-49c3-91b1-6071ace61d4f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"上述观点似乎和 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"54f638f2-9ddd-4e75-b517-be25bdbe4c09","cardTitle":"SMART 原则"}},{"type":"text","text":"有所矛盾，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"54f638f2-9ddd-4e75-b517-be25bdbe4c09","cardTitle":"SMART 原则"}},{"type":"text","text":"之一是目标需要明确、可衡量。但仔细想想，也不矛盾。学习型的目标重在能力的相对提高，这时也可以制定明确、可衡量的结果，例如提高英语能力，可以制定背诵 1000 个单词、阅读 10 篇英文文章等具体目标。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6ed28736-c64c-4925-ac17-7b48d7c0857a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我近期的目标（2023-01-29）是「成为 AR 领域的交互设计师」乍一看是成绩趋近型，其实是学习趋近型，这个目标"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"不是为了证明"},{"type":"text","text":"自己的能力。"}]}]}
cards.title: 制定学习趋近型目标

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"15f93f67-1635-4832-ab0d-ef9c1fa8e763","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"确认偏差"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"20ab390c-0615-4da9-914e-1a1b1e4ae1a7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人们容易接受那些与自己的观点接近、自己喜欢的观点，从而造成了确认偏差"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"72aef143-291b-4adc-bd89-f6e188dc572b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"解决方法是不预设观点和目标，而是广泛的收集信息，而观点和结构会从收集的信息中自然浮现"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a98b4bfe-9326-4db5-835e-3f926c7f72e4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"| "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"f20defc2-8e3f-49c6-92a2-c4f4aa94f4c7","cardTitle":"《卡片笔记》"}},{"type":"text","text":" p136"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"68986054-fd72-436a-9ae1-f94aa3cfe4d2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8a37f45a-3e8d-4d33-9805-b4d6a8606ac1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Created in "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://flomoapp.com/mine/?memo_id=NDQ2ODY0NA","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"flomo"},{"type":"text","text":" 2021-07-21 12:44:57"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"07a9b7f2-b5d7-472b-8e98-dc6363d9bfc5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa18ff2d-ec50-41bf-bbbb-e534fa7a730c"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ad0d0c14-23e0-462e-85a3-9f394ab5d90b","cardTitle":"《思考，快与慢》"}},{"type":"text","text":"中提到一种与之类似的「可得性偏好」，如果一件事情更容易出现在大脑，人们就认为更容易发生。"}]}]}
cards.title: 确认偏差

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"f2ed9557-2d1f-4698-a7d7-60e9885d2127","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"指读法"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"95c449a0-c427-4dd1-bee9-3bbdb99b789a","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a8ba4c50-798e-40c2-b073-3a19b63b2d25"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用手指🫵指着文字进行阅读可以提高阅读速度，避免"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"注意力"},{"type":"text","text":"分散"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c6776ae6-0801-4f03-8ed0-f3bc25d4bee7","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bed1a2d8-6b56-432b-9ca5-000852581484"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"电子书或者手机可以开启音频，跟随音频的速度看文字也可以控制注意力，遇到思考的地方就暂停一下"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"610c4b5c-9ffa-4d2f-bd6f-d01e296488f3","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6b211bdc-cf94-44eb-96e3-28d6ed2cad16"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"6a84e7b5-cb38-4682-8a6f-f8623e3be6a8"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7f6dee7f-4464-4a7d-9bd5-1c771f5d8190"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"得到 - 脱不花 - 怎样成为高效学习的人 03"}]}]}]}
cards.title: 指读法

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1db394b3-7227-4578-9368-4e8b7630e748","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"内容与样式分离"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"6e0b2c74-dd97-432f-b927-15cfe7b7e7bb","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"39dc6eb2-0457-4ca1-98e7-41f033a7f376"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"描述/表象"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e77f32fc-d996-4aa2-9b8c-9d5317183e79","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bcded168-587c-4ee8-9692-279d41b956c1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在对外输出内容时，需要将内容和样式分离"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c8b87f88-7a11-4a0b-9eab-e94864dfaa8c","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ed5c7581-f88e-41e9-862f-ee051dfa439a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如先写演讲文字稿，再配图、排版，最后再做出 PPT"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"d655d297-fcbb-4968-b7e9-416fcdcbfee8","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"517dc580-0535-4262-9a65-451cdaa3aec5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原理"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"3d458dac-8d87-4ab2-bc2c-0732d7a0a7fe","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1260f3b7-a048-4aa0-a35f-74f509d0f635"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":" "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"41bdc291-4294-494b-b464-9b1ccb16b278","cardTitle":"人脑是单线程的"}},{"type":"text","text":"，在输出内容时过于在意样式会分散注意力"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7d0db685-ad21-4dac-98f3-7460fe88aa85","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"12496323-2600-4432-bd20-2fa42cb286c9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"更多案例"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b633c337-b7d6-40bd-b9bd-ecf33e1bd389","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d8aa8a85-4d08-4efa-ac14-3c32352991c6"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8cb0a3f5-54e0-44ca-a98f-06e252bd2b44","cardTitle":"将思考和行动分离"}}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"beccb878-dc51-4374-84d6-1b4c54cdbf23"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1dD4y1e7JA/?spm_id_from=333.1007.top_right_bar_window_history.content.click","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1dD4y1e7JA/?spm_id_from=333.1007.top_right_bar_window_history.content.click"}]}]}

cards.title: Notion

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"45942c27-7fba-4938-a49b-150310990589","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"关于注意力的方法及其有效性的思考"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0e706e97-938b-4672-8b52-59e72839ce1d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最近整理关于学习方法的笔记时发现了很多方法都是关于注意力的调度。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"03d93a35-d108-46b0-a0eb-4afcbf7242e8","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"关于注意力的方法"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c3952c21-1fad-4578-adb9-2ee3c892d511","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习与思考"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"28880b40-ce1c-4db5-a2df-1f39e5044af6","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"指读法"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fdff6891-b58b-423c-9c5e-6fefd7e99a02"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"f7da3c25-ce2f-42a3-8980-64dd39144de0"}},{"type":"text","text":"是指阅读时用手指指着文字，视线跟随手指进行阅读，是一种可以提高阅读速度的方法，原理是帮助我们将自己的注意力集中到手指指向的区域。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"360f99dd-6303-4519-ac9d-16402c2c1f47","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将思考和行动分离"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5e5b94ef-60df-4e9b-8a19-4960ae7bbfbc"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"aeea2c56-4050-4252-81c2-af84f8140412"}},{"type":"text","text":" 的写作流程中，从白板选择卡片加入侧边栏也是一种注意力的调度，这样可以避免被白板中错综复杂的关系打扰，专注于其中一条思路（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"42d4adf0-59fe-4b09-99b1-2a42316da3d2"}},{"type":"text","text":"）。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"b9ef73bf-cb12-4a11-acf5-976d53066441","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/6RFLzu20231216111410.jpg","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1722,"originalWidth":3220,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c213deb-1110-4528-b584-130a778628db"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这其实是一种"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8cb0a3f5-54e0-44ca-a98f-06e252bd2b44"}},{"type":"text","text":"的方法，对于写作这一任务，白板负责思考，而编辑器才是最终码字的地方。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c214cedb-705a-4bd6-8f33-dc5a6b10a4dc","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"任务式学习"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"27486e5b-f064-4af2-84d2-df4c049e71c7"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d452ab93-a1d3-4693-b572-57d23cd0f147"}},{"type":"text","text":"是指学习、研究要为了解决某个具体问题。例如相比「成为 AR 领域的设计师」以「通过 Aframe 框架开发一个 AR 工具」这个任务更加具体，从而"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"让注意力集中在少数的几个问题上"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"92cc9300-9c50-46da-b97f-f2f84df687de"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"脱不花在《怎样成为高效学习的人》中建议我们读书前应该问自己几个问题"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e1c1235f-0eef-40c9-b35f-3927183eb963","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"94682586-26e2-4d70-91d1-a165c71eb6ec"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从书名来看，我认为这本书会讲什么？"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"683c5163-e13f-4999-ae46-6798d0a1fb70","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"14497c44-7a35-42c0-8978-779714d7b294"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"关于这个话题我之前知道哪些知识？"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2b18e63a-fd7d-42c0-8093-f853e2c1f778","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"730084c1-b4a2-4cd4-8011-2d6ea764c0fc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我最希望从中解决哪些问题？"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ebb88d52-3994-4bbb-ba5d-475ff69875b4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这其实也是在构建一种任务式学习，让我们在阅读过程中带着「回答这几个问题」的任务开展阅读。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a7137800-efb5-47d3-9c5e-a288838afafa","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将大问题拆分成小问题"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6045561e-41d4-4932-affb-9570c87b10e6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"例如设计和开发过程中都会通过"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"3091fac6-3d69-4450-973d-4e7c165bb1c3"}},{"type":"text","text":"的方式让不同环节关注不同的任务。"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"d387058d-6ac5-47a1-8266-1cb76c1c34b7"}},{"type":"text","text":"也是将日常的素材收集与梳理文章的任务分离，避免"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"573ad5ba-f97c-4396-812b-ba2515725a99"}},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"42f03a74-51f8-4029-be45-f2622ae7c058","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"产品策略"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"fe5540cc-ebae-4f95-9b0a-f4b4ce99868a","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Notion 的策略转换"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4772be5c-f790-43de-a3aa-b185a1464b1a"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"97834cec-3e17-4ab3-8fab-0b2f40a7a24e"}},{"type":"text","text":" 的目标是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"68e2d9f9-d2cb-440b-8d97-b5becdcc4afe"}},{"type":"text","text":"，但一开始却遭遇了失败，随后从将目标修改为「做一款编辑器」，缩小了范围逐步取得了成功，这也是控制注意力带来的好处的案例。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"a1867dd2-83aa-4283-b7f0-33b9756272d5","level":4},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"打造 MVP"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1a1cdb3d-7700-45d9-ab59-5a9dbb88fced"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不要试图构建一个完美的产品然后才推给用户，尽量构建一个虽然不完美但可以解决问题的产品，然后放到用户面前进行讨论。和 Notion 的策略一样，"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"198bbdcc-4fba-4e5a-b84e-0dadaff90e7d"}},{"type":"text","text":" 策略将注意力集中在最关键的功能上。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9a9d2de6-98e1-4547-a2a0-19477c81143e","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么有效"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"202b36d9-d0a2-4d34-9c71-cea46b5b98a1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"拥有具体的目标时人们会更好的调动注意力去关注那些与目标相关的信息、行动，忽略其他无关的信息，是一种有效的资源调度方式。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"79a117c0-39f4-4c5a-97d9-c8c02b68ae72"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在缩小目标范围后，就会减少在不同任务之间的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/c0599d03-acb3-45d9-a9bb-1173dff99b76","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"切换成本"},{"type":"text","text":"，从"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7f526777-0ab1-4f99-9782-72d63ebacde9"}},{"type":"text","text":"的角度思考的话，减少切换成本就是减少信息在传递过程中编码和"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"60496aba-b042-4863-a1b5-c25a02eae7ac"}},{"type":"text","text":"的次数，从而提高效率。"}]}]}
cards.title: 关于注意力的方法及其有效性的思考

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"40b3d394-d3cc-4964-8f1c-9f4ea4224d57","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"任务式学习"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"387d4833-309c-4e64-97c5-1bf11555fd58","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"10af7094-0076-4937-9c01-749de630b50e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其实和"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"f4fb4d44-4766-4ed0-b28d-271e28a50362"}},{"type":"text","text":"的原理类似，其中讲到阅读前问自己几个问题，也是给自己指派任务，这样可以在后续的学习中更好控制"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"color","attrs":{"type":"background","color":"yellow"}}],"text":"注意力"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2436371a-1845-40c1-a927-2a951fe08152","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8e64051e-e8ff-427f-bcfb-b997f8020c13"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"任务式学习的原理可能是"},{"type":"pdf_card","attrs":{"pdfCardId":"d8949389-2372-4f54-b532-70285482f663"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dacfbdf1-bbc6-4b62-a0a8-087384596e7d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"得到 - 脱不花 - 怎样成为高效学习的人 03"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"540cc042-2ad4-44e2-b43a-58079baf1579"}}]}
cards.title: 任务式学习

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3656ca89-2c5c-4a07-ac0e-651ccc6d7e03","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"打造 MVP"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"7c87abbe-61f5-4625-86cc-e3f9b0b19e7e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b5ffd5b6-1557-4a62-87d5-846034c3d620"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不要试图构建一个完美的产品然后才推给用户，尽量构建一个虽然不完美但可以解决问题的产品，然后放到用户面前进行讨论优化方案。"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f7ffa069-e56a-4f27-a7fc-5cdc72e07097","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e9e3b9ec-0abe-4f8b-a86e-d575c8a2a064"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如何打造"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2166263f-9b87-4618-9f84-42c31614ae81","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f42891b1-0968-43c0-982c-d2fbe3e80233"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"找到用户"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"420a36ee-ade5-4a85-b179-1c8dbdc171ec","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"537bfb48-4453-4e21-bf8b-c1a15a57c362"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"找到那些迫切要解决问题的用户（头上着火🔥的用户）他们愿意尝试不完美的解决方案（MVP）"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8d00e244-3770-40c2-ad6c-7a4e19a095f0","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"73c7bdc1-d9b3-4233-aad0-b86689165358"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"b304df25-5100-4448-83ef-1d1b4d528f3f"}}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"92d4895a-1ec3-46a7-bcea-0e5f104f5de7","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8999e303-3960-4543-bdf7-7aba2b9cd2eb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"定义功能清单"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"75b2cf08-12ab-4a22-bfcf-c4db693b0a1d","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d1b81867-3cc7-4fb4-92b9-3c843b8372ee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"设置一个上线截止日期，例如 2 周后"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"2b1dc2bc-9f93-4f67-93f0-ca24a239c217","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7f6561dc-dafa-41e7-9787-4084cac80d76"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"基于上述时间列出一个功能清单"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"98a1eabc-8836-4ed5-9211-f6289e4e3b4e","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c1653865-2ca7-4250-854b-24c4ce2fd88d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"思考清单中的每一项功能，思考是否是早期版本必要的"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"b075bfe1-0d29-4e05-b941-f445d29a0181","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ac7d3c9-b334-4cb5-b912-9c593317528f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"专注于构建清单内的功能"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7832b18d-25ee-48ac-a292-1bb0e0b36d59"},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.ycombinator.com/library/Io-how-to-build-an-mvp","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"https://www.ycombinator.com/library/Io-how-to-build-an-mvp"}]}]}
cards.title: 打造 MVP

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"2827ebce-3dee-42b9-affe-ea5465e9fede","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"高效总是违反直觉"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"772cdc41-f58d-494e-a54f-eceb74e6203d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以信号塔的例子，为了满足媒介/输入工具的要求（信号塔不支持复杂的符号传递、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fe0a6b37-330d-4c9e-afb4-a8c3b47b0a80","cardTitle":"符号需要符合媒介的要求"}},{"type":"text","text":"），工作人员使用编码后的符号用以传输信息，信息需要通过编码表对照之后才能知道最终的意义。"}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"7288b4ad-cc55-46f1-a978-71c54ed4b6ec"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c1ab1b4a-223d-4b0a-98e1-60508ceeefb2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从信息论角度："}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"277b3ceb-e85a-4a6c-bd3e-7866847664e8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为直觉的操作都是基于我们已经非常熟悉、反复复用的原子操作组合而成。而高效则可能采用了新的符号对复杂信息进行重新编码以减少编码长度（减少操作步骤、减少"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"fa697159-324f-41eb-9527-cd5b1dd293a6","cardTitle":"产品设计中的负担"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c0599d03-acb3-45d9-a9bb-1173dff99b76","cardTitle":"减少切换成本"}},{"type":"text","text":"），这种符号非经常使用的原子符号，所以需要更多的记忆与思考。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b1df6458-1387-4f5d-bdb7-f9f083ea5b52"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从认知科学角度："}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bdd4a0c8-eba1-4bb1-b16d-0e8b72db4f85"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另一方面，直觉的操作许多都是图形化、场景化的，而高效的操作（例如命令行、快捷键）都是象征性的指令，人类在处理前者拥有更多的经验所以会更加容易。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"396e9258-22df-45de-a078-6d65811f87ee","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5e9be781-afa6-4272-b178-749c7e7605af"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8361867a-615b-4343-a9d8-070eb1ece272","cardTitle":"三种认知状态"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"c6d26f11-0a28-4802-bfc9-77ff9d35ba02","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4c7d3144-2e53-49ae-ac36-fab8c2ab556b"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"86f15e1c-42d9-4b87-b4cf-1bd2f0dc0602","cardTitle":"图形与表象对于问题解决具有意义"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"18b3bf95-7f82-4002-97ba-b003a543491f","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a27464bd-9dbf-4b1d-a62d-e5d6bd48a478"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"6bdc733a-de27-41be-8e69-f994a7d1930b","cardTitle":"图形界面将命令和选项转义到屏幕上"}}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"1790703a-8c8a-44d5-be27-0f8cc53f85c3","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"22070ea3-57d6-4e0e-a02e-b53460819277"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"8e001bb5-7e3f-43c7-a8a5-114cfcda05db","cardTitle":"人脑识别、理解、存储图像信息有更高的效率"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f481fef-ac50-4e75-90d0-459ec096c335"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有没可能让交互简单、直觉的同时又达到理论最高效呢？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c042ac4-c423-4db2-8e2f-fcd995ddc240"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"根据"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"654a4e0a-6016-4cf5-9b8c-eeb7509406e3","cardTitle":"香农第一定律"}},{"type":"text","text":"，的确存在这样一个最高效的可能（最短编码）。在"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"9886a51e-b5bb-4179-beb0-bef1e8d2519d","cardTitle":"信息熵"}},{"type":"text","text":"（可以理解为交互可带来的价值）不变的情况下，增加每个码的信息量可以缩短编码。例如在"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/92d0971d-6be1-41de-b0ca-6d656b1e70c7#f33c7a98-d538-4709-9e23-f321e8b53c79","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"小白鼠测试毒药的实验中"},{"type":"text","text":"，每只白鼠（码）就包含了 1 比特的信息。传统点击操作每个操作包含的信息量就少，而快捷键包含的信息量就大（直接绕过中间的步骤直抵目标），这种采用了新的编码来传递信息的方式增加了认知的负担，有没有一种不增加认知负担的高效编码？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eaa6dc69-1a09-438a-b1c8-984cb14c7e48"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我认为"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"77cc495a-923c-4b26-a64e-0a0f5c17f9d5","cardTitle":"语音交互"}},{"type":"text","text":"是一种最短编码的可能，语音是人类熟悉的编码方式所以非常容易使用。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ecf93539-cdd8-472b-9d2f-6f60218d2df8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"多模式的编码方式可以提高编码效率。可以想象成一份工作有多 1 个工人和 3 个工人投入生产的差别。"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"769ad67b-f459-4430-a397-6976dfb172ee","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1879c299-f33d-4b18-b526-f7b07bb1b45e"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"7cd969ea-16e7-45bc-b929-847abb91f577","cardTitle":"AR 的交互是多模式的"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2b18d7d4-7e1c-4055-a2bd-d524817938a9"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"64d5ea37-cf19-4618-a866-1b295ae312c5","cardTitle":"输入的符号与最终要传递的信息差距越大则编码解码的难度就越大"}},{"type":"text","text":"，语音、手势等直觉交互减少了意图与动作的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"./减少切换成本%20c0599d03-acb3-45d9-a9bb-1173dff99b76.md","title":"减少切换成本","data-internal-href":"meta://card/c0599d03-acb3-45d9-a9bb-1173dff99b76","edited":true}}],"text":"切换成本"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"e7f957db-6599-466a-b8aa-ac155129d774","folded":false},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8a8d85e0-1387-44c6-a277-69b4200a0e6b"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"89a810cb-b7f2-498e-94bd-781bb3a423b2","cardTitle":"减少切换就是在减少重新编码解码的成本"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f3163b4-3ed5-4d3e-b2b3-1310b810eff5"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"a995549c-2230-4613-8538-347d182061d0","cardTitle":"计算机需要获取情境信息"}},{"type":"text","text":"，通过这种方式让计算机自行获取信息来消除不确定性，减轻了用户的负担。"}]}]}
cards.title: 高效总是违反直觉

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"98152f32-ce32-4ae8-9221-df27c94f8b9e","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2023 总结"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0aea3912-5f0a-427f-8005-43056393e890"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2023 年过去了，这一年我没有上班，生活方式和之前有了翻天覆地的变化。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"624fa79e-04bb-481f-a9c7-2fabcb168816"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"先复盘一下"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/cacc6dc6-1209-42d1-b34c-d1b828a3ebc3","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"先前制定的目标"},{"type":"text","text":"。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d109c562-271a-4629-a0a2-3faba04a1956"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"英语学习虽然没有通关 Duolingo，但掌握了很有用的一个学习方法——"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/58db49b3-7388-46c4-99d4-63d8dbec2cf2","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"沉浸式语言学习"},{"type":"text","text":"，开始有意识地进行英文阅读练习，目前效果不错。Anki 的单词卡片数量完成了目标，达到了 1293 个，期间为了方便自己制卡还开发了 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2d4a5130-ce79-4532-89e6-f1e81d300716"}},{"type":"text","text":"，它可以快速获取单词的发音、相关图片、例句等信息并一键添加到 Anki 中，这款产品对我还有另一个重要的意义待会会介绍。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c5c8011a-52eb-423a-ba30-a46163e78d3c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"计算机先驱的学习方面，把 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"de914081-b034-4c80-9a3f-4d8bcf3338be"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"e915ff1c-2850-4891-8375-173303a41118"}},{"type":"text","text":" 的一些文章都看了一下，对他们要做的事情有了大概的了解，比较深入的是 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"243e776f-c21a-4821-99e2-cfe0a399737d"}},{"type":"text","text":"，可能是关于他的资料比较多的缘故，以及他对计算机与教育的思想我更加感兴趣。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"346222e1-1a41-47cd-95d5-dc0b5e263dda"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习的内容和之前有了很大的区别，之前更多学习工作相关的内容，比如设计知识、设计系统搭建等等，今年看了很多「闲书」比如《月亮与六便士》、《变形记》，学习了许多学习方法，例如 《How to learning to learn》（这是"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/w/0c3ae3dc7860222021a6f500efebd03df53880633d2ad3bce3e51e24fc48e4fc","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"我的学习笔记白板"},{"type":"text","text":"）。这些都是我感兴趣并且和工作关系不大的内容。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"63272308-0293-4c30-8c66-e2e4f0b26451"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"接下来从几个方面复盘一下："}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c87f3e64-287e-47cf-ad1f-71a8520a36af","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"收入"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1049a7b9-a82d-4325-a5ae-a10c20f67c0a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一年没有上班，工作几年的存款很快就被购物节、旅行、家装等大头消耗掉了。为了缓解收入焦虑以及不让自己对工作过于陌生，期间接了几个设计外包，累积的收入刚好可以把每月的社保给抵消掉（是的，社保我还是没有停），维持生活更多地还是来自家人的资助。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a013f713-8f48-4b72-82e9-3edacb1fd63b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"今年开始做副业，前面提到的 "},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2d4a5130-ce79-4532-89e6-f1e81d300716"}},{"type":"text","text":" 以及其他几个"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/3dd9a603-a7f3-44e9-a6d7-cd2ebda08952","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"小工具"},{"type":"text","text":"帮我获得了 50USD 的收入，前几天用这笔钱在 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"bandcamp.com","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"bandcamp.com"},{"type":"text","text":" 上买了一张喜欢的专辑，算是跑通了副业的整个流程，虽然钱不多但我有很重要的意义，我做的东西不再是「玩具」成为了有人愿意付费的「工具」。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"d91e4970-655a-451c-ae01-8fd36799f13e","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"生活"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1b413ea7-3d43-47af-ae55-f8bef667763e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我和老婆都是比较喜欢窝在家里的人，再加上平时要工作的原因，外出基本都是去家附近的商场吃饭、看电影。今年时间自由后去了很多地方旅行，包括重庆、成都、长沙等，有的地方待半个月少的也有 3、4 天，算是比较沉浸地体验了。中间还回了一趟 4 年没有回去的老家，和爷爷奶奶一起生活了一周。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2a60723d-bf0d-432d-a3f6-0e4f14e96d6d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最让我印象深刻的是都江堰，老婆望着山间透过薄雾若隐若现得塔说：「大家都说西方绘画是写实，中国则是写意，其实中国绘画也是在写实，这眼前的景色就像一幅水墨画」"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"377bb2a1-3bd5-49ef-abcc-e0d669b9c602","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/q7yrGn20240105014143.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1414,"originalWidth":2120,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7e6ef724-d84e-4d3e-a044-db5951830af6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"亲密关系上，看到了自己身上很多问题，理性知道问题以及解决方案，无奈每次遇到时又陷入自己的惯性情绪中。我对于亲密关系的投入实在太少了，读了"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"4136d5fd-b0ec-4a81-9110-bca19716f884"}},{"type":"text","text":"了解到人的动力来源主要是"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"931b7340-2c2c-4e41-989d-80310c7b70d3"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"c77e61f0-5e3f-47ba-b5a6-b5461de3a8f2"}},{"type":"text","text":"、"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"cce8a953-9092-40ca-a3c9-fe6c5bdeb97b"}},{"type":"text","text":"这 3 个方面，反思了一下自己的动机核心是证明自己的能力，哪怕是归属需求也是在社会群体上的归属。希望今年可以把更多精力投入到亲密关系中，不要让生活这一木桶出现明显的缺口。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3e3eb8b5-458c-434e-9887-88f6c59ed8aa","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"创作"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a25c147a-3771-4daa-a359-5d2e306b76d4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"上班时会和同事在吃饭时间交流自己的想法和见闻，离职后开始经营自己的 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://twitter.com/arui_kisi","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Twitter"},{"type":"text","text":" 来填补口头交流的空缺，主要分享自己正在学习的东西、音乐和其他想法。Twitter 负责轻量的输出，难度更大的是写作，主要集中在对学习方法和产品的研究："}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"ee65ec06-102d-47d2-8ae3-7e72574fa18c","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3c475aca-bb4b-4a10-8707-43cc1cc3e258"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"🌲 Bank"},{"type":"text","text":"，都是首先基于我自己的需求出发的工具。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"207b83ef-e696-42e9-994b-2254553349c5","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-08-0823.22.29@2x20230808232234.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1564,"originalWidth":2236,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a254dae5-eb90-41e0-9234-d437114e8e49"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"很多人对我个人网站的搭建感兴趣，但是搭建成本比较高，所以写了一个"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://share.dabing.one/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"工具"},{"type":"text","text":"可以快速将 白板的内容转为一个网站。因此还帮助了一位朋友迈出写作的步伐，很开心。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"c6ab3e2a-66c2-4a3b-b5d9-24660352ab76","src":"https://jiangzilong-image.oss-cn-beijing.aliyuncs.com/uPic/CleanShot2023-05-3100.24.5420230531002518.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1047,"originalWidth":1704,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"77ab8bee-4c22-4758-b03b-14461ec2bf99"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主业上对于 的文章后了解到这属于"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/8361867a-615b-4343-a9d8-070eb1ece272","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"感性"},{"type":"text","text":"的学习方法，通过体验和实际操作来获得知识和技能，前面提到的"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"58db49b3-7388-46c4-99d4-63d8dbec2cf2"}},{"type":"text","text":"本质也是一样的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"50230952-ad1e-4d9f-956c-32d7e5796b4d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主业其实是最让我感到焦虑的事情，因为时间一分一秒得流逝，未来依然非常渺茫，我可能找不到我真正想要的工作。每隔几个星期都会陷入到非常低迷的情绪中，直到最近了解到"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://app.heptabase.com/0cb3b1c5-93e5-479e-adb6-51ec3456431c/card/bfa7758c-ac5f-4d7b-b18c-ec6c32d2eb20","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"不同的幸福类型"},{"type":"text","text":"，开始以「实现型幸福」作为自己的主要幸福观，以结果为指南针但更多关注过程中"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"自己是否尽力"},{"type":"text","text":"，这样心态调整后就没有那么焦虑了。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"bd0df3cf-2e3c-4f4a-aef7-7a72883e4524","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"内容消费"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"155d1ce4-247d-45fd-9f83-f0d9f8de3b5f","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ffe12fa7-d360-4392-9c37-5d05761c2e99"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"放弃了微博转为
