"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"code"}],"text":"api_url"}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"8187b16a-a5b2-4823-8107-6dd728c588ca"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ae7be3cf-6b29-46d1-bcc2-1f7cace6dc16"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"下面是过程中遇到的问题以及解决方法记录"}]},{"type":"bullet_list_item","attrs":{"id":"fdc7a41b-5c70-4c93-b60c-f63470f49a46","folded":false,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0d24ea7b-3329-48ed-870f-ada0a9e4bc24"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"34a1c52c-6a09-4805-bc30-8dc0e1dd896b"}}]}]},{"type":"horizontal_rule","attrs":{"id":"8bcea874-8683-4d45-903e-7bbee90eeda2"}},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8977254f-ac48-499d-9fa3-09fff85a2e0a","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么不用其他方式"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"6370bb54-c7d0-4d1c-b645-8531d81d6c36","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"工具选择"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3ebe14bf-d995-4367-a753-f89bd37d22f6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"尝试过 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://gohugo.io/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"HUGO"},{"type":"text","text":" 和 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://sspai.com/post/66678","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"Notion"},{"type":"text","text":" 等方式、研究了 "},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://obsidian.md/publish","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"obsidian publish"},{"type":"text","text":"，也实践用 Notion 维护了一年的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://blog.dabing.one/","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"博客"},{"type":"text","text":"，但一直没有找到比较理想的方案。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e8e1153e-7062-4d74-bc99-35649b3f9e32"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一方面，笔记在 Heptabase 中，文章放到其他平台会导致"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"2ffab447-a5cb-41e1-b790-4047343c038f"}},{"type":"text","text":"失效。我在实践卡片笔记法，文章与笔记有高度的关联性，例如下面这篇文章中就存在多个卡片链接，但是这些链接在 Heptabase 以外的地方显示时就无法正常打卡笔记，所以不得不转为普通文本，这不但增加了工作量，也使得原本文章的脉络失效。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"549e91e9-2264-43f5-a64a-0f3ca5d590af","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/7fa14e75-12eb-4ff4-97bc-1b5f0582d7ae/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1200,"originalWidth":3000,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d5931650-60b2-4ffb-a071-745be15a9f49"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"另一方面，笔记、文章数据在不同平台有多份副本，后续修改起来就要穿梭在不同平台中进行更新，维护成本高。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c54c03ef-56eb-40a6-9e14-811265d016bd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Heptabase 本身也支持公开笔记，但移动端的支持不太好，于是决定自己开发了一个。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"c81396f8-934a-4110-aab5-ff52e41008c4","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"博客 vs 数字花园"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0cdb7e18-dcca-42d8-b841-2986737b0f1b"},"content":[{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"ab437229-34b9-4ae4-ba2e-ec1bc233710c"}},{"type":"text","text":"的理念与我正在使用的卡片笔记法、Heptabase 的设计哲学更加贴近，所以放弃了持续 1 年的博客，改用数字花园的方式维护自己的个人站点，下面会详细介绍一下原因。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"29560b8d-5fb7-42be-b09d-317b8d959b3e","level":2},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对数字花园的理解"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b8ce8df6-a294-4d62-b5ef-329c9425acb4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"聊一下我对数字花园理解，以及如何将这些理解体现到网站的设计上。"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"71425709-59e5-4f24-954e-804aefdb7aa5","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"知识的持续性"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"043b900a-633c-4ad5-825c-4e63f85d5b2d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"数字花园的内容是持续迭代的，我可以发布尚不成熟的想法（不一定要等到输出完整的文章）并且可以在发布后持续的修订。所以在笔记列表中，不是强调笔记的创建时间而是展示最近编辑时间，并将最近编辑的笔记展示在最前，方便阅读者理解笔记的活跃状态。"}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"1921fe0f-1048-4821-b10a-6f63e6971219","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/3a43cd07-74f1-4223-a696-2ac8cf82c590/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1600,"originalWidth":3000,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7a798d19-4291-4ddf-a619-6347152779e9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这和我运用的卡片笔记法理念一致，通过不断的积累、迭代卡片完成文章的输出，而不是一来就面对一张白纸一步到位完成创作。（"},{"type":"card","attrs":{"cardId":"270a7c26-0d76-48d7-87e1-6960e8ce400d"}},{"type":"text","text":"）"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8e2b7e83-373e-42c4-b09a-b2622faba0e9","level":3},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"思考的脉络"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"98229307-484f-459f-b10c-500611cf7a90"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"传统博客通常会按创建时间展示文章列表供用户阅读，通过标签筛选某个类型的文章。而数字花园则强调思考的脉络，具体体现在以下几点"}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"bf84b8c7-0a9b-4b3a-8728-09c32b48b139","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8d3f8b2d-323b-4646-867d-fb40e29fcda8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"弱化文章列表，用一个介绍页/索引页作为阅读者漫游的起点"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"8569d6ae-aa48-4f0b-8244-1223bbe68c13","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"78809ebb-a8bf-4da1-a4fe-036005607da9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"支持双向链接，阅读者可以看到与当前文章关联的其他知识、想法"}]}]},{"type":"numbered_list_item","attrs":{"id":"f36e7365-db80-4623-b597-44d1f7bd4f25","order":null,"format":null},"content":[{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"98fcacd1-c4ff-4ef3-a946-4b605252c9ea"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"支持开头提到的"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://notes.andymatuschak.org/Evergreen_notes","title":null,"data-internal-href":null,"edited":false}}],"text":"面包片导航"},{"type":"text","text":"的交互方式，阅读者可以快速地在不同笔记间流转"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b18e8dbb-cb0b-4a1d-97c6-b63952fb5ac2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"数字花园的首页与双向链接："}]},{"type":"image","attrs":{"id":"ab11aced-d85e-4b9b-83a8-30c20dd76d30","src":"https://media.heptabase.com/v1/images/3120a828-7e72-4637-aaff-ff8b5d72a2b3/25b1dc56-b936-4afd-a3c6-eec9c58a47c9/image.png","fileId":null,"alt":null,"title":null,"width":null,"originalHeight":1560,"originalWidth":3000,"alignment":"center"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c9856908-5d86-4908-9e5a-15922d27ce95"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总的来说，使用持续迭代的、重在体现思考脉络的方式记录想法，最终也用同样的方式分享知识，这是我选择数字花园并开发此网站的原因。"}]}]}
